Dee akali mendeme namba maka kayapala mona lapo palyala naenge doko mona yaepasetae kalyamona,’ pii dutupa Jone lamaiyepape!” Jisasame lea.
Jonenya disaipele dutupa pilyeteaminopa, endakali kambu pyao kateamino dupa Jonenya lao Jisasame pii lamaiyoo, “Wamba nyakamame endakali napalenge yuu dokonya aki mende kanja peamipi? Kembo maitangepi mende poome ema ema pyoo kateamo kanja peamipi?
Pande akali mende yonge pee epe tambo lapae yati pipae mende pyoo kateamo kanja peamipi? Yonge pee epe yati pipae dupa pyoo yuu isingi kiŋi dupanya andaka katengema.
Kiniaka doko, nyakamame aki mende kanja peamipi? Potopesa mende kanja peamipi? Kini, baa potopesa mende kateamo kandeaminoaka doko, baa mee potopesa mende daana lao langilyo.
Akali doko kandao dapa lao pepa pyapae silyamo: ‘Kandeleno! Nambame nambanya wai minao paenge akali doko embanya wambao pekena latopa embanya kaita doko depa lanya setakata!’ lapae silyamo.
Nambame nyakama kiningi langilyo, yuunya endakali dupa pitaka Jone Kaimbu Pingi dokome ita minao kalyamo. Kiniaka doko, endakali mende Kaitinya Katenge dokome isingi endakali dupanya etete anasale joo katenge dokome Jone ita miningi.
Jone Kaimbu Pingi dokome pii lamaiyoo kateamo gii dokonya pituu indupa tuu lao endakali longo dupame etete konga lao Kaitinya Katenge dokome nyakama isina lao kalyanya pilyamino.
Potopesa dupa pitakapi Moseseme pii pepa piapi dupame Kaitinya Katenge dokome isingi dokonya lao pii doko lao panao ipao Jone pyakalyiamo dokonya tuu leami-pyaa.
Dee nyakamame setami tamo kandao doko, dake apata salapape: ‘Ipatana’ latae Ilainja doko Jonena, nyakama kalekaita singi dupame pii doko salapape!
<range>
“Nambame endakali tata indupa palelyamino dupa aki mendepa makande pyuape? Wane kole dupame kamapi dupanya kambu lapoma pyao pitipala pii dapa lao yanu pyaloo pyoo lengema: ‘Naimame nyakamanya pulupapulatakalamanoaka doko, nyakama lyala nayalamino! Nyakama kondo kayao ee latakalamanoaka doko, nyakama itingi laa nayalamino!’ Wane dupame dopa lao katengemana nyakama dopalema lamo.
<range>
Doko, Jone baa ipupala nee endakipi epe mende nanao katapumopa dupame baa kandao, ‘Enjele koo mendeme baa minao kyakasilyamona,’ lelyamino.
Endakalinya Ikiningi doko ipupala nee endakipi epe dupa nao kalyamo. Dopa pimopa dupame baa kandao, ‘Akali dakeme neepi endakipi tuu lao nawaka katao, takisa nyingi akalipi mana koo minao paenge endakalipi dupa-pipa kaita minao kalyamona,’ lelyamino. Dopaka doko, Gotenya masepae dokome dii angi mandyuu, baanya masepae doko tolataena lao panasingina,” Jisasame lea.
Jisasame kalai pupu lapae etete longo piamo yuu taono dupanya endakali dupame mona kapilyala nayaminosa, baame endakali dupa pyalanya lao katea.
Baame lao pituu, “Taono Kotasina tange dupame koyatama iki lamo lao masina! Taono Betesaita tange dupame koyatamaka iki lamo lao masina! Dupame kalai pupu lapae nyakamanya yuu dolaponya kandeami dupa wamba Taya yuupa Saitone yuupa dolaponya endakali dupame kandeamili kandao doko, dokaitame kenai lumbanya aiyombanya pyalyetala mena kende matapu pyoo yuu wamba waka mona kapilyiamili!
Goteme endakali mokosetamo gii dokopa yuu dolaponya kenda pipae ipatamo dokome Taya yuupa Saitone yuupa dolaponya kenda pipae doko ita minatana lao nambame nyakama langilyo.
Dee nyakama taono Kapaneame tange dupanya kenge doko kaiti-kisa kapa pao seta laape? Daa, Goteme nyakama yuu koo dokonya pyandata! Dupame kalai pupu lapae nyakamanya yuu dokonya kandeami dupa wamba taono Sotoma yuu dokonya kandeamili kandao doko, indupa dakepa Sotoma yuu doko koyala nayao mee sipyali.
Goteme endakali mokosetamo gii dokopa yuu dokonya kenda pipae ipatamo dokome Sotoma yuu dokonya kenda pipae ipatamo doko ita minatana lao nambame nyakama langilyona,” Jisasame lea.
Gii dokopa Jisasame lao pituu, “Apane, emba yuupi kaitipi dupa pitakanya Kamongo kalyeno! Mana longo kandenge endakalipi masepae endakalipi dupame nakandena lao yalo piino dupa wane ŋaŋa joo katengema endakali dupame kandena lao embame panasiino dokonya nambame emba lao tama pilyo.
Kini, Apane, embame pitona lao auu pyoo masiinoli pyoo petee-pyaa.
“Nambanya Takangeme dupa pitaka nambame isepe lao namba-kisa setea. Endakali mendaipi mendeme Ikiningi doko masala naenge. Takangeme iki masingi. Dee endakali mendaipi mendeme Takange doko masala naengeaka. Ikiningimi iki masingi. Dee Ikiningi dokome Takange doko endakali mende laitaka pitoo lao masetala petelyamopa endakali dokome Takange doko lao masingiaka.
“Nambame nyakama imambu nyalapa latona, kenda pipae andake dupa pitaka soo namba-kisa ipupape.
Nambame endakali dupa andanda semaiyoo, namba tange anasale joo katenge. Nambanya lataiyanya itakalya silyamo doko nyoo nyakamanya lataiyanya setapala, namba-kisa mana nyalapa. Nyepala dokopa nyakama imambu setami.
Nambanya itakalya epe soo kalyamino doko tawe lapaena,” Jisasame dopa lea.
Maitakao Jisasa Sambasa gii mendenya wiisa ee kaina mendenya kaita peamopa, baanya disaipele dupame lopo kayapala wiisa dii mendapua kii lao nyoo nama-namapeami.
Dopa piaminopa Patasi dupame kandatala Jisasa lamaiyoo, “Embanya disaipele dupame Sambasa gii dokonya daa latae singi mana doko minilyamino kandape!” leami.
Dokopa Jisasame pii doko yanu pyao, “Nyakamame Dapitipi dee baa-pipa awapa kateamino akali dupapi lopo kayapala Dapitimi piamo doko nyakamame pepanya itaki pyala nayamipi?
Baame Gotenya losuu anda dokonya kolandatala betesa Gotenyana lao setapae dupa nyepeamopa, dupame neami-pyaa. Betesa dupa pitisa dupame iki napengena, waka dupame daana latae singi-pyaa.
Dee nyakamame Moseseme mana pii pepa piamo dupanya mende itaki pyala nayamipi? Sambasa gii dupanya pitisa dupame mana yalao losuu anda andake dokonya kalai pilyaminoaka doko, tenge mende nasingi.
Dopana angi dakeme losuu anda andake doko ita minilyamona lao nambame nyakama langilyo.
Pii mende dapa lapae silyamo: ‘Kundi dingi doko daana, kondo kayamaingi doko nambame auu kaenge.’ Pii dopa lapae silyamo dokonya tenge doko nyakamame masiamili kandao doko, tenge nasingi endakali dupa-kisa kapa pao tenge setala nayamili.
Endakalinya Ikiningi dokome Sambasa gii doko isoo kalyamona,” Jisasame lea.
Dokopa Jisasame yuu dutupa yakinatala dokaitanya losuu anda mendenya pea.
Peamopa akali kingi kumapae mende petea. Endakali mendapuame Jisasa kosimi lamana lao masetala baa pisoo, “Sambasa gii dupanya endakali yaina pyapae dupa mee injisepenge doko, naimanya mana setapae dupanya kapa pelyape daape?” leami.
Dopa leaminopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakamanya akali mendenya mena sipisipi mende katatamo kandao doko, Sambasa gii mendenya yuli koko mendenya mangatamopa sipisipi tange dokome minatala kopyoo kamanda nanyetape?
Endakalimi sipisipi dupa etete ita minao kalyamino daape! Dopana naimame Sambasa gii dokonya mana epe dupa minapengena,” lea.
Dopa latala baame akali kingi kumapae doko lamaiyoo, “Embanya kingi doko tinoka,” lea. Tinokateamopa kingi doko yangi epe dopaleaka jia.
Dopa piamopa Patasi dupame losuu anda doko yakinatala pao Jisasa pyao kumasemana lao kambuiyami-pyaa.
Jisasame pii doko sepala, baame yuu doko yakinatala pea. Dokopa endakali longo dupame baa watao peaminopa, baame endakali yaina pyapae dupa pitaka auu pisakamaiya.
Dopa petala baame kyoto joo dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame namba lao panala nayalapape,” lea.
Dopa piamo dokome potopesa Aisayanya kambunya pii mende Goteme leamo doko angi jia.
“Dake nambanya kalai akali doko nambame baa yapao nyepeo. Nambame baa etete auu kayapala, baa kandao etete mona epe palyingi. Nambanya Sipitisa doko baa-kisa setatopa, baame nambanya mana tolatae doko endakali tata dupa pitaka panao lamaita.
Baame tanga lawapi yako lawapi napita. Baanya kambu dokonya pii kyotopi mende kaitini kembo dupanya nasetamiaka.
Kembo maitange mende tambapala lakalanya pitamo doko baame etete lakasala nayata. Ita langa mende konjalanya kii lao setamo doko baame etete konjisala nayata. Baame dopa pyoaka katao mana tolatae dokome ita minatamo dokonya tuu lata.
Dokopa endakali tata dupa pitakame baa lao masoo minatala malisoo katatamina,” Aisayame dopa lea-pyaa.
Gii dokopa endakali mendapuame akali lenge monda pii laa naenge enjele koo paleta mende laminao Jisasa kateasa epeami. Jisasame akali doko auu piseteamopa pii lao lenge tao pia.
Dokopa endakali kambu piamino dupa pitakame mona andapala lao pituu, “Akali dake Dapiti Yumbangepe?” leami.
Dopaka doko, Patasi dupame pii doko sepala lao pituu, “Enjele koo isingi Belesapulu mambele iki baame enjele koo dupa watao pilyamona,” leami.
Dopa leaminopa Jisasame dokaitanya masiamino doko kandatala dokaita lamaiyoo, “Yuu dupanya kiŋi mendeme isingi tata dupanya mende wakale pyoloo petala yanda pitaminopa tata doko etete koyata. Dee yuu taono mendenya tamopi anda mendenya tamopi endakali dupa wakale pyoloo petala yanda pitaminopa taono doko tamopi anda doko tamopi etete koyataka.
Dee Sataneme Satane tange watao pyatamo kandao doko, baame baa tangeaka wakale pyoloo petala yanda pimaita. Dopa pitamo kandao doko, baame isingi tata doko aipa petala kyoto joo katatape?
Nambame Belesapulu mambele enjele koo dupa watao pyapuli kandao doko, nyakamanya mana nyingi dupame api mambele enjele koo dupa watao pyapimilipi? Dokonya dokaitame, ‘Nyakamame kopeta leami lamona,’ latami.
Dopaka doko, nambame Gotenya Oli Sipitisa doko mambele enjele koo dupa watao pyato kandao doko, Goteme nyakama isala ipatamosa.
“Aipa petala akali mendeme akali pupu lapae mendenya andaka kolandatala baanya pinju setamo dupa kapa pao nyetape? Baame akali pupu lapae doko wambao kendeme yaki pinya setapala tamo kandao doko, kapa pao baanya andaka pinju setamo dupa pyao nyeta.
“Endakali mende namba tata joo nakalyamo doko nambanya yandapipi lamo. Dee endakali mendeme namba-pipa endakali nyoo limbala naelyamo dokome endakali dupa saa lasingi.
Tenge dokonya nambame nyakama langilyo, Goteme endakali dupanya koo pingi dupapi baa kandao lamba latamino dupapi dupa pitaka kunanya nepakamaita. Dopaka doko, endakali mendeme Oli Sipitisa doko kandao lamba latamo kandao doko, Goteme baanya koo doko kunanya nepakamaiya nayata.
Endakali mendeme Endakalinya Ikiningi doko kandao lamba latamo kandao doko, Goteme baanya doko kunanya nepakamaita. Dopaka doko, endakali mendeme Oli Sipitisa doko kandao lamba latamo kandao doko, Goteme baanya koo doko indupapi tendapi kunanya nepakamaiya nayatakana,” Jisasame lea.
“Ita epe dupame dii epeaka mandenge. Ita koo dupame dii ka mandenge. Ita mendenya dii mandelyamo dupa wambao kandatala ita angi doko dopale lamo lao masingima.
Nyakama kanopato pambeanya mandipae! Nyakama koo dupame aipa petala kapa pao pii epe mende lengemape? Endakali monanya palelyali pyoo kambunya pyakalyingi.
Endakali epe mendenya monanya epe palelyamo dupaka pyakalyingi. Dee endakali koo mendenya monanya koo palelyamo dupaka pyakalyingi.
“Nambame nyakama dapa langilyo: tenda mokosetamo gii dokopa Goteme endakali pii mee ambe lengema dupanya maa minao tenge angi doko piseta.
Emba tangenya pii dokonyaka Goteme, ‘Emba-kisa tenge mende nasilyamona,’ lata. Daa tamo kandao doko, emba tangenya pii dokonyaka Goteme, ‘Tenge emba-kisa silyamona,’ latana,” Jisasame lea.
Gii dokopa mana setapae masingi akalipi Patasipi mendapuame Jisasa lamaiyoo, “Mana Lenge Akali, embame kongali mende pipinopa naimame kandapuma laka lao masilyamanona,” leami.
Dopa leaminopa baame dokaitanya pii yanu pyakamaiyoo, “Endakali indupa palelyamino dupame Gote yakinenge kooma lamo! Nyakamame kongali mende kandamana lelyaminoaka doko, nambame kongali mende pyakala nayatoo. Goteme potopesa Jonaa-kisa kongali piamo dokoaka makande petae seta.
Wamba Jonaa doko kotaka gii tepo kuka gii tepoaka wapaka andake mendenya ingi koko paleamoliaka pyoo, Endakalinya Ikiningi doko kotaka gii tepo kuka gii tepoaka yuu koko palita.
Wamba akali Jonaa dokome yuu Nenepa tange dupa pii panao lamaiyamopa dokaitame sepala mona kapilyiaminoaka doko, indupa Jonaa doko ita miningi akali doko ae kalyamo. Tenge dokonya Goteme endakali mokosetamo gii dokopa endakali Nenepa tange dupame sakatatala nyakama kosimi latami.
Wamba Isingi Enda Kuini mendeme yuu Sauta-kaita pituu masingi akali Solomone lenge doko kanjanya kaita etete londe mendenya epea-pyaa. Dopaka doko, indupa akali mendeme Solomone etete ita minao ae kalyamo. Tenge dokonya Goteme endakali mokosetamo gii dokopa, Isingi Enda Kuini dokome sakatatala nyakama kosimi latana,” lea.
“Enjele koo mendeme endakali mende yakinatala dokopa, baa mendasa koto nyoo kalyanya yuu sapu dupanya paelya paena pyoo panda kutingi. Kutao kayapala, baame lao pituu, ‘Nambame anda wamba yakineo dokonya dee pilyoo pato,’ lenge. Dopa latala baame anda dokonya pao kandelyamopa anda kuaa doko potoma polao yati petae kalyamo kandenge.
<range>
Dopa petae kalya silyasa baame pupala enjele etete koo kalange lanyepala anda dokonya dee pilyoo ipao katengema. Dokopa akali doko wamba kopeta kateamoaka doko, indupa etete kopeta katenge. Endakali tata koo indupa palelyamino dupa mendai dopaka pyoo katatamina,” Jisasame lea.
Jisasame endakali kambu dupa pii lamaiyoo kateamopa baanya endangi dokopi baanya kaiminingi dupapi ipao kamaka katapala, baa-pipa pii lamana lao masiami.
[Dopa piaminopa akali mendeme Jisasa lamaiyoo, “Yaa, embanya endangi dokopi kaiminingi dupapi kamaka katapala emba-pipa pii lamua laka lao masilyaminona,” lea.]
Dopa leamopa Jisasame akali dokonya pii yanu pyakamaiyoo, “Nambanya endangi doko apipi? Nambanya kaiminingi dupa apitupape?” lea.
Dopa latala baame baanya disaipele dupa kingimi laitaka petae katao lao pituu, “Datupa nambanya endangipi kaiminingipina, kanjepape.
Nambanya Takange kaitinya katenge dokome masingili pingima endakali dupa nambanya kaiminingipi, pimalengepi, endangipina,” Jisasame lea.
Dokondinaka Jisasame anda doko yakinatala pao endaki pete lemba dokonya petea.
Peteamo dokonya endakali etete longo mendapua ipao kambu piaminosa, baa sipi mendenya pyakalyetala ongonya petea-pyaa. Dokopa endakali kambu doko pitaka endaki lemba dokonya kateami.
Kateaminopa Jisasame kongali lawaka pii longo dokaita lamaiya. Lamaiyoo pituu, “Kandeleno, akali mendeme ee wai lyandala pea-pyaa.
Pupala lyandeamopa yangi kaitininya pea-pyaa. Peamo dupa yaka dupame ipupala nao eteami-pyaa.
Yangi kana-kisa yuu epao napalengenya pea-pyaa. Yuu epao napalenge dokonyana wai dupa pupae langa lea-pyaa.
Langa leamoaka doko, niki teamo dokome pyao nea-pyaa. Dupa pingi pyalakao napiamosa sapuiya-pyaa.
Yangi lyiki tenge palengenya pea-pyaa. Lyiki dupa andapala ee wai dupa kuii pyambea-pyaa.
Dopaka doko, yangi yuu epenya pupala dii mandea-pyaa. Yangimi andate mendai, yangimi kingi ita tokange, yangimi kingi ita tepoma lao mandea-pyaa.
Nyakama kalekaita singi dupame pii doko salapapena!” lea.
Maitakao disaipele dupame Jisasa kateasa ipupala baa pisoo, “Embame endakali dupa kongaliaka lao pii lamaiyoo kalyeno doko aipuma pilipi?” leami.
Baame nyakamanya pii yanu pyakamaiyoo, “Kaitinya Katenge dokome isingi dokonya yalo petae dupa nyakama laitaka petelyamo. Dopaka doko, dokaita laitaka napilyamo.
Opale singi endakali doko mendapua apata konda pyoo maitamopa, baa-kisa longo seta. Dopaka doko, opale nasingi endakali doko-kisa setamo dolapo nyokonyeta.
Nambame endakali dupa kongali pii lao lamailyo dokonya tenge doko dapa: endakali dupame kandelyaminoaka doko, angi nakandelyamino. Silyaminoaka doko, angi nasilyamino. Dee dupame masala naelyaminoaka.
Goteme potopesa Aisayanya nengekaita lungu petala pii mende dapa lea-pyomo doko endakali dupa-kisa angi jema-jema pilyamo: ‘Nyakamame pii sepala dee setamiaka doko, etete masala nayatami. Nyakamame kandatala dee kandatamiaka doko, angi mende nakandatami.
Doko endakali dupame kaleme soo lengeme kandao, moname masoo petala nambame auu pisatale lao dee mona kapilyetala ipatamane lao nyakama tangeme mona pyakilyoo, kale poyao lenge iminjoo katpelyaminona,’ Aisayame lea-pyaa.
Dopaka doko, nyakamame lengeme kandao kaleme soo pilyamino dokonya nyakama mona yaepasetae kalyamino.
Nyakamame kandelyamino dupa wamba potopesapi endakali tolataepi longo dupame kandawanimi kumiaminoaka doko, nakandeami. Dee nyakamame silyamino dupa sowanimi kumiaminoaka doko, nasiamina lao nambame nyakama kiningi langilyona,” lea.
“Dopana, akali mendeme ee wai lyandeana lao kongali pii dokonya tenge doko dapana salapape.
Kaitinya Katenge dokome isingi dokonya lao pii doko sepala masala naenge endakali dupa pitaka ee wai kaitininya peamo dopalema. Endakali dopale dupanya monanya ee wai lyandakamailyamo doko akali koo dokome ipupala yukuoo nepenge.
Dee pii doko sepala mona yaepao yapa nyingima endakali dupa, kana palenge yuunya wai peamo dopalema.
Dupame moname auu pyoo masala nayao gii kuki iki katengema. Dupame pii doko watao minilyaminosa, dupa minao kenda pisowapi watao pyawapi pingima. Dopa pilyaminopa yapa yakinengema.
Dee endakali yangi dupa ee wai lyiki tenge palengenya peamo dopale dupame pii doko singima. Katato mange doko aipa pitope lao masetala nea kaengepi, munipi oapi dupa auu kaengepi dopale dupame pii doko pyalya minilyamopa dii manja naengema.
Dopaka doko, pii doko soo masetala dii mandenge endakali dupa, wai yuu epenya peamo dopalema. Dupanya yangimi andate mendai, yangimi kingi ita tokange, yangimi kingi ita tepoma lao mandengemana,” Jisasame lea.
Jisasame dee kongali pii mende dokaita lamaiyoo lao pituu, “Kaitinya Katenge dokome isingi doko akali mendeme baanya eenya wiisa wai epe lyandeamo dopale.
Kuka gii mendepa endakali dupa pitaka palipiaminopa, akali dokonya yandapipi mendeme ipupala wiisa wai lyandatae kaina dupanya wiisa jepae tanu koo mende lyandatala pea-pyaa.
Maitakao wiisa dupa langa latala andao dii manjanya piamopa tanu koo dupa awapa kateamo kandeami-pyaa.
Dokopa akali ee tange dokonya kalai akali dupame baa peteasa ipupala pisoo, ‘Akali andake, embame embanya ee dokonya wiisa wai epe lyandala naepe? Tanu koo kalyamo dupa anjatae kalyape?’ leami-pyaa.
Dopa leaminopa baame dokaita lamaiyoo, ‘Doko akali yandapipi mendeme lyandao piana,’ lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa kalai akali dupame baa lamaiyoo, ‘Naimame dupa yukuoo nepala pumili lao masilipi?’ leami-pyaa.
Dopa leaminopa baame dokaita lamaiyoo, ‘Daana, tanu koo dupa yukuwatiti wiisa dupa awapa yukuotamina, lapota pyasoo andao katao wambu pitamo gii dokonya tuu lena kayalapa. Wambu pitamo gii dokopa nambame nee mandyuu mau pingi akali dupa lamaiyoo, “Wambao nyakamame tanu koo dupa itatenya soo yangapengena yukuoo yaki-yaki pyepape. Dopa petala wiisa dupa elyambu petala nambanya nee setenge anda dokonya setalapape,” latona,’ lea-pyaana,” Jisasame lea.
<range>
Jisasame dee kongali pii mende dokaita lamaiyoo lao pituu, “Kaitinya Katenge dokome isingi doko akali mendeme masetewai mende baanya eenya lyandeamo dopale.
Ee wai dupa pitakanya masete wainginya dii doko etete yakane. Dopaka doko, lyandataesa langa latala andao ee wai pokatae waka dupa pitaka ita miningi. Andao ita jilyamopa wangya dupanya yaka dupame ipao anda pingimana,” lea.
Baame dee kongali pii mende dokaita lamaiyoo, “Kaitinya Katenge dokome isingi doko enda mendeme iisa mendalapo nyoo palawa longo-pipa kapilya mina-mina pilyamopa, iisa dokome palawa doko pitakanya tayapala andasingi dopalena,” lea.
Jisasame endakali kambu andake doko pii lamaiyamo dutupa pitakanya mende mee lamaiya nayao kongaliaka lao lamaiya.
Dopa piamo dokome wamba potopesa mende-kisa lungu petala Goteme pii dapa leamo doko angi jia: “Nambame dupa pii kongali lao lamaito. Tee piamo dokonya pituu indupa tuu lao yalo petae dupa nambame lao pyanga pyatona,” lea.
Dokopa Jisasame endakali kambu andake doko pena latala baa andaka kolandea. Dopa piamopa baanya disaipele dupa baa peteasa ipupala lamaiyoo, “Eenya tanu koopa makande pyoo kongali laleno dokonya tenge doko naima langi,” leami.
Dopa leaminopa baame yanu pyao, “Ee wai epe lyandeamo akali doko, Endakalinya Ikiningi doko.
Ee doko, isa yuu dake. Wai epe lyandeamo doko, Goteme isingi endakali dupa. Dee tanu koo dupa, akali koo dokome isingi endakali dupa.
Tanu koo lyandeamo akali yandapipi doko, Satane. Wambu pitamo gii doko, yuu dake etatamo doko. Dee nee mandyuu mau pingi akali dupa, enjele dupa.
Dopana, tanu koo dupa yukuoo elyambu petala itatenya soo yangengema, mana mendai dokoaka yuu dake etatamo gii dokopa seta.
Endakalinya Ikiningi dokome baanya enjele dupa epena latamopa dupame ipupala, koo pina lao mapisingi endakalipi tanga lao koo pingi endakalipi dupa baame isingi endakali dupa-pipa awapa katatamino dupa nyoo elyambu pitami.
Dopa petala koo dupa itate andake dokonya soo pyandataminopa dupame dokonya katao ee lao yamataka lao nenge gilyoo katatami.
Dokopa endakali tolatae dupa niki tele pyoo dupanya Takangeme isingi dokonya katatamina, nyakama kalekaita singi dupame pii doko salapapena!” Jisasame lea.
“Kaitinya Katenge dokome isingi doko munipi opale epe mendapua eenya yalo petae kateamo dopale. Akali mendeme doko kandasetala sanga pyambea-pyaa. Dopa petala baa mona yaepao pao baanya oapi dupa pitakame muni nyepala ee doko sambea-pyaana,” lea.
“Dee Kaitinya Katenge dokome isingi doko mamakumi pisinisa andake pingi akali mendeme mamaku epe dupa kutao kateamo dopale.
Akali dokome mamaku eteteaka epe yole andake pupenge mende kutao kandatala dokopa, baame pao baanya oapi dupa pitakame muni nyepala mamaku doko sambea-pyaana,” lea.
“Dee Kaitinya Katenge dokome isingi doko akali dupame wapaka nyingi mandi gulangala jepae mende endaki petenya pyandatala wapaka tata tata dupa pitaka nyingi dopale.
Tumbatelyamopa wapaka nyingi akali dupame pyalya lao lembasa nyepala isa pituu yapengema. Yapapala epe dupa nyakamanya pengenya pyandatala koo dupa nepengema.
Dopana, yuu dake etatamo gii dokopa mana mendai dokoaka seta. Enjele dupa ipupala endakali tolatae dupa-pipa koo pingi katatamino dupa yapao nyepala, itate andake dokonya soo pyandatami. Dopa pitaminopa dokonya katao ee lao yamataka lao nenge gilyoo katatamina,” Jisasame lea.
<range>
Jisasame dokaita pisoo, “Nyakamame pii dutupa pitaka masilyamipi? lea. Dopa leamopa dokaitame baa lamaiyoo, “Masilyamanona,” leami.
Dokopa baame dokaita kandao, “Gotenya pii lapae masingi endakali Kaitinya Katenge dokome isingi dokonya mana nyepeamino dupa pitaka akali anda tange dopale. Baame baanya oapi singi palo dokonya oapi enenge wambataepi epe silyamo dupa nyoo kamanda pyalyingina,” lea-pyaa.
Jisasame pii kongali dutupa lamaiyoo etapala yuu doko yakinatala pea.
Baanya yuu tenge dokonya pupala endakali dupa nyakamanya losuu anda dokonya mana lamaiya. Dopa piamopa dupame walu latala lao pituu, “Akali dakeme masepae datupa anjatae nyia laape? Baame kalai pupu lapae dupa aipa petala pilya kanjemape?
Akali dake kapendaa dokonya ikiningi daa kandamuape? Baanya endangi doko Matia daa kandamuape? Baanya kaiminingi dupa Jemesapi, Josepepi, Saimonepi, Jutasapi dutupa daa kandamuape?
Baanya pimalenge dupa pitaka naima-pipa ae napilyamape? Dopana, baame pilyamo datupa pitaka anja mana nyia laape?” leami.
Dopa latala dupame baa kandao mona koo palyiami. Dopa piaminosa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Yuu dupa pitakanya potopesa mende andanda semaingimaka doko, baanya yuu tengepi baanya palupi dupame iki baa kilya kandengemana,” lea.
Dupame masoo minala nayaminosa baame kalai pupu lapae longo yuu dokonya napia.
Gii dokopa yuu yakane isingi akali Etote lenge dokome Jisasame pilyamo lapae dupa sia-pyaa.
Sepala baanya kalai akali dupa lamaiyoo, “Akali doko Jone Kaimbu Pingi doko. Baa malunya sakatapya dokonya baame kalai pupu lapae dupa pyoo kalyamona,” lea-pyaa.
Doko wamba Etoteme dapa pia-pyaa: baanya kaiminingi Pilipa etanenge Etotiasa lenge doko baa tondao nyia-pyaa. Dopa piamosa Jone Kaimbu Pingi dokome Etote lamaiyoo, “Embame enda doko tondao nyilino doko kopeta pilinona,” lea-pyaa. Dopa lati siamosa Etoteme Etotiasa lao masetala Etoteme Jone ŋili kendeme anjetala anjingi andaka pyandea-pyaa.
<range>
Baame Jone pyao kumasotoo lao masiamoaka doko, Juta endakali dupame potopesana lao masiaminosa dupa paka kayapala kaya-pyaa.
Koto mende Etotenya mandenge gii dokonya akali limbao petamino kaina dokonya Etotiasa wanenge doko lyia-pyaa. Lyiamopa Etoteme auumi kumapala wanaku doko dapa lamaiya-pyaa: “Nambame kiningi etete langilyona, embame opale mende namba-kisa dii lao tee lateno doko nambame kapa pao dyaapona,” lea-pyaa.
<range>
Dokopa wanaku dokonya endangi dokome baa pii mende lamaitiamopa dapa lea-pyaa: “Embame Jone Kaimbu Pingi dokonya aiyomba doko kepao pelesanya setapala dasa namba dii!” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamosa Kiŋi Etote mona kenda kaya-pyaa. Dopa piamoaka doko, wamba baame pii, “Kiningi etete langilyona,” lao leamo dokopi, akali limbao peteamino dupapi lao masetala, “Lelyamo doko baa maiyepa!” lea-pyaa.
Dopa latala baame yanda singi mende anjingi andaka pupala Jonenya aiyomba doko kepao nyala pena lea-pyaa.
Pena lateamopa Jonenya aiyomba doko kepanyetala pelesa mendenya setapala ipao wanaku doko maiya-pyaa. Maitiamopa minao endangi peteasa pea-pyaa.
Dopa petamopa Jonenya disaipele dupa ipupala baa nyoo pao malu piami-pyaa. Malu petala dokopa dupame Jisasa ipao lamaiyami.
Jisasame pii doko sepala, baame yuu doko yakinatala sipi mendenya pituu endakali napalenge yuu mendakaita baa iki pea. Peamopa endakali dupame sepala nyakamanya yuu taono dupa yakinatala baa watao endaki pete kilikili dokonya peami-pyaa.
Peaminopa Jisasa netesa pao pyakamatala, endakali kambu andake mende kateamino kandea-pyaa. Kandatala baame dokaita kondome kumapala, dokaitanya endakali yaina pyapae dupa mee jakamaiya-pyaa.
Dokopa alemandi baanya disaipele dupame baa kateasa ipupala lao pituu, “Dakaita endakali napalengema lamo dokonya yuu kuilyamona, taono yakane dupanya pao tange nee sambama pena laa!” leami.
Dopa leaminopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Daa, dupa napenana, nyakamameaka dokaita nee maiyepa!” lea.
Dopa leamopa dupame baa lamaiyoo, “Angenya naimanya nee longo nasilyamo. Betesa yuungi-pipa wapaka lapoma iki silyamona,” leami.
Dokopa baame lao pituu, “Dutupa nyoo minao ae ipupa,” lea.
Dopa latala baame endakali dupa tanu dupanya petena lea. Petena latala baame betesa yuungi wapaka lapoma pyoo siamo dutupa nyepala, kaiti-kisa kandalyetae katao yaka pilino lea. Dopa latala betesa dutupa konjepala baanya disaipele dupa maiyamopa, dupame endakali dupa mokosoo maiyami.
Dokaita pitakame nao tiaka kayateaminopa, kakana siamo dupa disaipele dupame nyoo baseketa mandi kingi ita-kisa dee lapomanya mandyuu tumbasiami.
Nee neamino endakali dupa pitaka enda wanepi dupa itaki napyao akali iki taosene yuungipi mendeme neami.
Dokopa Jisasame baanya disaipele dupa sipi dokonya pituu endaki pete ongonya yangitena wambao pao katena latala, baame endakali dupa pena lea.
Pena latala baa iki loma salanya yuu manda dokonya pea. Pupala yuu kuala epeamopa baa iki dokonya katea-pyaa.
Dokopa sipi dokonya pituu endaki pete kainasale paanya peaminopa poo andake mende paanya peamino dokaita-kaita lao ipupala, endaki doko buli piamo dokome sipi doko yangi pyasa-pyasa pia.
Yuu yongalanya pee payamopa Jisasa baa endaki pete ketae dokonya moko katao disaipele dupa peteamino dokonya epea.
Dupame baa endaki pete ketae dokonya moko katao payamo kandatala etete walu leami. Dopa petala dupame, “Doko timango mende lamo!” lao pakame kumapala ae leami.
Dopa leaminopa Jisasame dokaita yapa lamaiyoo, “Namba kalyona, nyakama paka nakaenya, mona palyepa!” lea.
Dokopa Pitame baa lamaiyoo, “Kamongo, embaka tamo kandao doko, embame namba endaki ketae moko katao emba kalyeno dokonya ipu laa,” lea.
Dopa leamopa Jisasame, “Emba ipu!” lea. Dokopa Pitame sipi doko yakinatala endaki ketae dokonya moko katao Jisasa kateamo dokonya paanya pea.
Peamoaka doko, baame poo leamo doko kandatala paka kayapala baa endakinya landa pyalanya pia. Dopa petala baame, “Kamongo, embame namba nisa!” lao ae lea.
Dopa leamopa Jisasame yapa pyakamatala Pita minatala lamaiyoo, “Kuki masoo miningi! Aipuma embame mona lapo palyalepe?” lea.
Dopa lateamopa sipi dokonya pyakalyiambinopa poo doko yatu lea.
Dokopa disaipele sipinya peteamino dupame, “Kiningi etete, emba Gote Ikiningi lamona,” lao tama piami.
Dokaitame endaki pete dokonya yangi-kaita Genesatete yuu dokonya pao pyakameami.
Yuu dokaita tange endakali dupame Jisasa lamo lao kandatala, yuu dosa singi dupa pitakanya wai leaminopa yaina pyapae dupa pitaka soo epeami.
Dopa petala dupame Jisasa kandao, “Yaina pyapae dupame embanya yonge pee ketae pingi londe dokonya puna dosa iki kingimi watandenalena,” lao kyoto joo leami. Dokopa Jisasanya yonge peenya watandeamino endakali dupa pitakanya yaina dupa mee jiami.
Gii dokopa akali Patasipi mana setapae masingi akalipi mendapuame Jetusaleme katao Jisasa kateasa ipupala dapa lao pisiami: “Embanya disaipele dupame mana wambatae naimanya yumbangeme seteamino dupa aipuma yalengemape? Dupame nee nalanya dokopa kingi kaimbupingili pyoo napingima lamo!” leami.
<range>
Dopa leaminopa Jisasame dupanya pii yanu pyakamaiyoo, “Doko aipuma nyakamame nyakama tangenya mana wambatae dupa watao minatala, Gotenya mana setapae dake yalengemape?
Wamba Goteme lao pituu, ‘Embanya endangi takangepa dolapo andanda semaiyoo katape!’ dee, ‘Endakali mendeme baanya endangi tamopi takange tamopi mende kandao pii koo latamo doko, baa kumina lao pyao kumasepengena,’ lea.
Dopaka doko, endakali mendeme baanya endangi takangepi mende kandao, ‘Wamba nambame emba nisoo oapi dioliaka doko indupa nambame Gote maitapuna,’ latamopa nyakamame baanya endangi takangepi andanda semaiyoo nakatapenge jilyamona lengema. Dopa pyoo nyakamanya mana wambatae dupa watao minalanya Gotenya pii doko mee injisingima.
<range>
Wamba potopesa Aisayame nyakama minakasingima akali nyakama makande pyokondape pyoo dapa lea-pyaa:
‘Endakali tata dakeme kambumi namba lalyingimaka doko, nyakamanya moname namba-pipa kopala naengema.
Dupame endakalinya mana setapae dupanya mana lao pituu, “Dake Gotenya mana setapaena,” lengema. Dopa latala dupame namba mee ambe tama pingimana,’ lea-pyaana,” lea.
Jisasame endakali kambu piamino dupa epena latala lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame sepala masokondape pyepape!
Nengekaita penge dokome endakali koyasala naenge. Dopaka doko, nengekaitanya epenge dokome endakali koyasingina,” lea.
Gii dokopa disaipele dupame ipupala baa lamaiyoo, “Patasi dupame embanya pii doko sepala imbu kaelyamino doko embame kandelepe?” leami.
Baame dokaitanya pii yanu pyao, “Nambanya Takange kaitinya katenge dokome waingi pokala nayamo dupa pitaka pingi-pipa yukuota.
Dopana nyakamame dupa katena kayalapape. Lenge monda dupame lenge monda yango dupa kaitini laitaka pingima. Akali lenge monda mendeme lenge monda yango mende kaitini laitaka pipyali kandao doko, dolapo lapota yuli mendenya mangambilina,” Jisasame lea.
Dopa leamopa Pitame baa lamaiyoo, “Embame kongali leleno dokonya tenge doko naima langi,” lea.
Dopa leamopa Jisasame lao pituu, “Nyakamame apata masala naengemakape?
Kini, nengekaita penge dupa pitaka inginya pupilyamopa, tao nepenge doko nyakamame masala naelyamipi?
Dopaka doko, monanya palenge dupa nengekaitanya epenge dupame endakali koyasingi.
Monanya paliuu pyakalyingi dupa datupa: masingi koopi, endakali pyao kumasingipi, kepo kolengepi, endakalipi nyele-nyele paengepi, pake nengepi, sambo pii lengepi, lamba lengepi dopale dupame endakali koyasingi. Dopaka doko, endakali mendeme kingi kaimbu napinya mee nee nyoo nelyamo dokome baa koyasala naengena,” Jisasame lea.
<range>
Jisasame yuu doko yakinatala yuu taono Tayapa Saitonepanya yuu siamo dupanya pea.
Peamopa Kenane enda mende yuu dokaita petenge doko ipupala puu lao lao pituu, “Akali Andake, emba Dapiti Yumbange, embame namba kondo kayape! Enjele koo mendeme nambanya wanenge doko etete koyasilyamona,” lea.
Dopa leamopa Jisasame pii mende yanu pyao baa lamaiya naya. Dokopa baanya disaipele dupame ipupala baa lamaiyoo, “Enda dakeme wii lata-lata pyoo naima watao epelyamona, embame baa pena laa!” leami.
Dopa leaminopa Jisasame dupanya pii yanu pyao, “Goteme namba Isataele tata dupanya mendapua mena sipisipi alu petae joo kalyamino dupanya iki puu leana,” lea.
Dopa leamoaka doko, enda dokome ipao baa kateamo dosa luma lakapala lao pituu, “Akali Andake, embame namba nisa!” lea.
Dokopa Jisasame baanya pii doko yanu pyao, “Naimame wanenya nee dupa nyepala pyale lao yana dupa maitamanopa auu napitana,” lea.
Dokopa enda dokome lao pituu, “Akali Andake, embame kiningi leenoaka doko, yana dupame endakali yana tange dupanya nee katai pyapae isa kopo lelyamo dupa nyoo nengemana,” lea.
Dopa leamopa Jisasame enda doko lamaiyoo, “Enda, embame kyoto joo masoo minao petenge lamona, embame pyakapyali lao masilinoli pyekenana,” lea. Dopa leamo gii dokopaka baanya wanenge doko mee jia-pyaa.
Jisasame yuu doko yakinatala endaki Galili pete tengesa dosale epea. Ipupala manda mendenya lalyoo pupala petea.
Peteamo dokonya endakali kambu longo dupa ipao pituu, endakali moko koopi, lenge mondapi, kuli uanga petaepi, mumaapi dee waka yainame pyapae longo mendapuapi apata laminao ipupala, baanya moko kateamo dosa setami. Seteaminopa baame dupa mee injisia.
Dopa piamo doko endakali kambu piamino dupame kandeaminopa, mumaa dupame pii lao, kuli uanga petae dupa tolao, moko koo dupa kaita payao, lenge monda dupa lenge tao piaminosa, dupame mona andapala Isataelemanya Gote doko lao lalyiami.
Dokopa Jisasame baanya disaipele dupa epena latala lamaiyoo, “Endakali dakaita yuu gii tepoma namba-pipa katapumano doko, indupa dupa nee natami nasilyamo dokonya dupa kondome kumilyo. Nambame dakaita mee pena latopa aopyoo latala kaitinisa lopome lawambe latala lombapae setamina, mee pena nalatowana,” lea.
Dokopa disaipele dupame baa lamaiyoo, “Endakali napalenge yuu dakenya naimame endakali kambu dakeme tiaka nao nena lao maiyanya betesa longo dupa anjatae nyakamaimape?” leami.
Dopa leaminopa baame dokaita pisoo, “Nyakamanya betesa akipate silyape?” lea. Dopa leamopa dokaitame baa lamaiyoo, “Betesa kalange-pipa wapaka yakane mendalapopi silyamona,” leami.
Dokopa Jisasame endakali dupa isa petena lea.
Dopa latala baame betesa kalange dutupapi wapaka dupapi nyepala, Gote lao yaka pilino latala konjia. Konjepala baanya disaipele dupa maiyamopa, dupame endakali dupa mokosoo maiyami.
Maiyaminopa dokaita pitakame nao tiaka kayateaminopa, kakana siamo dupa disaipele dupame baseketa mandi kalangenya mandyuu tumbasiami.
Endakali nee neamino dupa pitaka enda wanepi dupa itaki napyao akali iki taosene kitomendeme neami.
Napeaminopa Jisasame endakali dupa pena latala, baa sipi mendenya pituu yuu taono Makatana-tena pea.
Dokopa Patasipi Satyusipi mendapuame Jisasa kateasa ipupala baa minao makande pyoo baame kaitinya-tae kongali mende kandamana pina leami.
Dopa leaminoaka doko, baame dokaitanya pii yanu pyao, [“Yuu kualanya kone yuu pumbuti yuu pilyamopa nyakamame, ‘Kaiti kate pilyamona, paina pyaapome lamo,’ lengema.
Dee yuu yongalanya puli ita waiyepae paelyamopa nyakamame, ‘Kaiti iminjeta kate pyata pilyamona, aiyuu ipapome lamo,’ lengema. Nyakamame kaiti doko kandatala opa pyaapome lamo apa pyaapome lamo lao yapengemaka doko, indupa gii dakepa kongali dupa nyakamame yapapenge nanjilyape?]
Endakali indupa palelyamino dupame Gote yakinenge kooma lamo! Nyakamame kongali mende kandamana lelyaminoaka doko, nambame kongali mende pyakala nayatoo. Goteme akali Jonaa-kisa kongali piamo dokoaka makande petae setana,” lea. Dopa latala baame dupa yakinatala pea.
Dokopa disaipele dupame endaki pete dokonya yangitena paanya betesa kame setala peami-pyaa.
Dokopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Kandeleno! Nyakamame Patasipi Satyusipi dupanya iisa dupame nyakama koyasetamina wandyuu kalyepape!” lea.
Dopa leamopa dupame nyakama betesa nasiamo tenge dokonya nyakamalapo leami.
Dopa leamino doko Jisasame kandatala dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakama kuki masoo miningi dupame, aipuma betesa nasilyamo lao nyakamalapo mende lamai-lamai pilyamipi?
Nyakamame masetala naelyamipi? Nambame betesa yuungi akali taosene yuungi dupanya konjakamaiyo doko kame silyamipi? Dopa piopa kakana siamo dupa nyakamame baseketa mandi akipatenya mandyuu tumbasiamipi?
Dee nambame betesa kalange akali taosene kitomende dupanya konjakamaiyo dokopa kakana siamo dupa nyakamame baseketa mandi akipatenya mandyuu tumbasiamipi?
Nambame betesanya lao nalalo doko, aipa petala nyakamame masala naelyamipi? Patasipi Satyusipi dupanya iisa dupame nyakama koyasetamina kandao kalyepape lalona,” lea.
Dokopa betesanya palyingi iisa doko kandao laa nayao Patasipi Satyusipi dupame mana lamaingi iisa jepae dupanya kandao kalyepape lalame lamona lao disaipele dupame masiami.
Jisasa baa yuu taono Sisatia Pilipae-tena pea. Pupala baanya disaipele dupa pisoo, “Endakali dupame Endakalinya Ikiningi doko kandao apina lengemape?” lea.
Dupame yanu pyao, “Yangimi emba kandao Jone Kaimbu Pingi dokona, yangimi Ilainjana, yangimi Jetemaya tamopi potopesa waka dupanya mende tamopina lengemana,” leami.
Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Dopaka doko, nyakamame namba kandao apina lengemape?” lea.
Dokopa Saimone Pitame baa kandao, “Emba Kataisa Gote saka katenge dokonya Ikiningi dokona,” lea.
Dopa leamopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Saimone, Jone ikiningi, emba mona yaepasetae. Doko embame pii kiningi leleno dake endakali mendeme langya naya. Daa. Nambanya Takange kaitinya katenge dokome emba-kisa panasia.
Nambame emba kandao dapa langilyoaka: Pita, emba kana yangapae kyoto. Kana yangapae doko-kisa nambame nambanya sosa doko sakatasoto. Yuu koo dokonya pupu lapae dokome sosa doko nyoo isa palyala nayata.
Nambame Kaitinya Katenge dokome isingi dokonya kii dupa emba dito. Embame isa yuu dakenya mende pyakilyina kayakamaitino doko, kaitinya pyakilyina kayakamaitaka. Embame isa yuu dakenya mende yukuokamaitino doko, kaitinya yukuokamaitakana,” lea.
Dopa latala baame disaipele dupa kyoto joo lamaiyoo, “Namba Kataisa dokona lao mendaipi mende lamaiya nayalapape!” lea.
Gii dokopa pituu Jisasame baanya disaipele dupa panao dapa lamaiya: “Namba Jetusaleme pupenge. Patopa isingi akalipi, pitisa mupapi, mana setapae masingi akalipi dupame tanda longo ditala namba pyao kumasetataminopa kote teponya Goteme dee sakatasetana,” lea.
Dopa leamopa Pitame Jisasa laminao umbisale pupala pyalanya lao, “Kamongo, emba dopa etete napina! Goteme emba kondo kaenana!” lea.
Dopa lao pyalanya leamopa Jisasame kandapilyetala Pita lamaiyoo, “Satane, emba nao puu! Embame namba koo pyaale lao makande pilino. Embame Gotenya masingi doko masala naenya, endakalinya masingi doko masilinona,” lea.
Dokopa Jisasame baanya disaipele dupa lamaiyoo, “Endakali mendeme namba watao payatoo lao masetamo kandao doko, baame baa tange kame setala baanya ita poko doko nyoo soo namba watao paena.
Endakali mendeme baa tange isoo auu pyoo katapu laka lao masetamo kandao doko, baa alu pita. Dopaka doko, endakali mendeme namba lao masetala baa tange kame setamo kandao doko, baa auu pyoo katata.
Doko, endakali mendeme yuunya oapi dupa pitaka nyoo setao katapala baa koyatamo kandao doko, oapi dupa pitakame aipa petala baa nisetape? Dee aki mendeme baa tange kii tamao nyepengepe?
Endakalinya Ikiningi doko baanya enjele dupa-pipa baanya Takangenya tii pipae doko tambetambe kapa pao ipata. Ipupala endakali mendai mendai lao dupame mana minataminoli pyoo yanu pyata.
Nambame nyakama kiningi langilyona, endakali ae kalyamino datupanya mendapua kumapala nayataminopa Endakalinya Ikiningi dokome kiŋi joo isala ipatamo gii doko kandatamina,” Jisasame dopa lea.
Koto tokange pateamopa Jisasame Pitapi, Jemesapi, Jemesa kaiminingi Jonepi dutupa laminao yuu manda ketae mendenya pupala nyakama iki kateami-pyaa.
Kateaminopa dutupanya enombasa Jisasa baa waka jia-pyaa. Baanya lengelyaapi doko tii pyoo niki tele pia-pyaa. Dee baanya yonge pee dupa kyoo lao pakenana timbokopaele jia-pyaa.
Dokopa akali Mosesepa Ilainjapa Jisasa-pipa awapa pii lao kateambinopa dutupame kandeami-pyaa.
Kandatala Pitame Jisasa lamaiyoo, “Kamongo, naima angenya katamanopa auu pilyamona, embame kapana lao maseteno kandao doko, nambame angenya aiyaa anda tepo pitoo. Mende embanya, mende Mosesenya, mende Ilainjanyana,” lea-pyaa.
Pitame pii doko lao mee kateamopa kopa etete kyoo lapae mendeme ipupala dokaita sanga pia-pyaa. Dopa piamopa kopa tambetambe dokonya pii mende lea dokome, “Doo kalyamo doko nambanya Ikiningi etete mona setenge doko kalyamo. Nambame baa kandao etete mona epe palyingina, nyakamame baanya pii doko sakamaiyepape!” lea-pyaa.
Dokopa disaipele dutupame pii doko soo etete pakame kumapala tombauli siami-pyaa.
Dopa piaminopa Jisasame ipao dutupa watandatala lao pituu, “Nyakama paka nakaenya, sakatalapa!” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa dupame kandalyetala endakali waka mende nakandao Jisasa baa iki kateamo kandeami-pyaa.
Dokaitame yuu manda dokonya katao lanao ipao pituu Jisasame kyoto joo dutupa lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame kanjimino doko mende lamaiya nayalapape. Lamaiya nayawaka katao Endakalinya Ikiningi doko malunya sakatasetamo gii dokonya tuu laapapena,” lea-pyaa.
Dokopa disaipele dupame Jisasa pisoo, “Mana setapae masingi akali dupame aipuma, ‘Ilainja wambao ipupengena,’ lengemape?” leami.
Jisasame dutupanya pii yanu pyakamaiyoo, “Kini, Ilainjame dupa pitaka dee katengeli pina lao tolasalanya ipupenge.
Dopaka doko, Ilainja ipateana lao nambame nyakama langilyo. Ipateamopa endakali dupame baa lamo lao nakandenya, baa-kisa pyuani kayamino dupa pitaka piami. Dupame mana mendai dopaka pyoo Endakalinya Ikiningi doko tanda maitamina,” lea.
Dokopa disaipele dupame baame Jone Kaimbu Pingi doko kandao lalumuna lao masiami.
Endakali kambu pyao kateamino dokonya dutupa ipateaminopa akali mendeme Jisasa kateasa ipao baa lao luma lakapala lamaiyoo, “Akali Andake, embame nambanya wane doko kondo kyayakape! Baa mandipaeme nyilyamosa paa longo itatenya tapa endakinya mangata pyoo etete koyao tanda nao katenge.
<range>
Nambame baa laminao embanya disaipele dupa katamisa epoaka doko, dupame kapa pao mee injisala nayalaminona,” lea.
Dopa leamopa Jisasame lao pituu, “Kanau! Masoo minala naenge uanga pyoo paengema endakali nyakama! Oo koto koto ongo namba nyakama-pipaka tole katatama laape? Nyakamame nambaka nenge nyoo katatami laape? Wane doko laminao namba kalyosa ipupa!” lea.
Jisasame wane doko-kisa enjele koo paleamo dokome wane doko yakinena lao pyalanya leamopa yakinatala pea. Peamo gii dokopaka wane doko mee jia.
Maitakao Jisasa iki peteamopa disaipele dupame ipupala baa pisoo, “Aipuma naimame enjele koo doko kapa pao watao napyalamape?” leami.
Dopa leaminopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakama kuki iki masoo minilyamino dokonya kapa nanjalamo. Nambame nyakama kiningi langilyo, nyakamame awa wainginya dii palenge dopale joo masoo minapimili kandao doko, opale mendaipi mende pyaanya kokala nayamili. Nyakamame yuu manda dake lamaiyoo, ‘Emba asa nasina omosa sala puu!’ lapiminopa kapa pao pupyali.
[Dopaka doko, loma sowapi nee nanenya kayawapi pingi dokonya-kaita iki enjele koo dopale dupa watao pingi. Kaitini waka mendenya-kaita daana,” lea.]
Galili yuu dokonya Jisasapi baanya disaipele dupapi pao kambu pyatala baame dupa lamaiyoo, “Akali mendeme Endakalinya Ikiningi doko endakali dupa laitaka pyaanya enge nyalanya pilyamo.
Laitaka pitamopa dupame baa pyao kumasetataminopa koto teponya Goteme baa dee sakatasetana,” lea. Dopa leamopa disaipele dupame mona etete kendame kumiami.
Dupa pao yuu taono Kapaneame dokonya pyakameaminopa losuu anda andake dokonya takisa nyingi akali dupame Pita kateasa ipupala baa pisoo, “Nyakamanya mana lenge akali dokome losuu anda andake dokonya takisa pingipi napingipi?” leami.
Dopa leaminopa Pitame lao pituu, “Kini pingi daape,” latala andaka kolandea. Kolandeamopa Jisasame wambao Pita lamaiyoo, “Saimone, embame aipa lao masilipi? Yuu dakenya kiŋi dupame takisa tata tata dupa api-kisa nyingimape? Dupame yuu tenge tange dupa-kisa nyingimape, pande katamana lao epenge endakali dupa-kisa nyingimape?” lea.
Pitame yanu pyao, “Katamana lao epenge endakali waka dupa-kisa nyingimana,” lea. Dopa leamopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Dopa tamo doko, yuu tenge tange dupame takisa napyapenge.
Dopaka doko, naimame akali dokaita kenda pisala nayamana. Dopana, emba endaki pete dokonya wapaka nyingi uku doko pyandala puu. Pyandatala wapaka wambao nyeteno doko nyoo nengekaita angapu lakyetala muni mende palyapomona nyepe. Muni doko nyepala losuu anda andake dokonya nalimba lapotanya takisa pyao dupa maipina,” Jisasame dopa lea.
Gii mendai dokopaka disaipele dupame Jisasa kateasa ipupala baa pisoo, “Kaitinya Katenge dokome isingi endakali dupanya api alyasale joo kalyape?” leami.
Dopa leaminopa Jisasame wane koo mende epena latala dokaitanya kaina dokonya katasetala lao pituu, “Nyakama kapilyetala wane koo nanjetamino kandao doko, Kaitinya Katenge dokome nyakama etete isala nayatana lao nambame nyakama kiningi langilyo.
<range>
Endakali mendeme baa tange anasale jetala wane koo dopale jingi doko Kaitinya Katenge dokome isingi endakali dupanya alyasale katenge.
Dee endakali mendeme namba lao masetala wane koo dapale mende lanyilyamo dokome namba lanyingiakana,” lea.
“Endakali mendeme namba lao masoo miningi wane koo datupanya mendeme koo pina lao mapisetamo doko, baa etete koyata. Baame dopa pitame lao kana etete andake mende mangenya anjetala nyokaimbatamopa kumina lao solowata pete andake kaina dokonya soo pyandamili kandao doko, baa kuki yaka jipyali.
Koo pina lao mapisingi yuunya endakali dupa koyatami iki lamo! Koo pina lao mapisingi mana dupa kapa pao sepengeaka doko, endakali mendeme mapisetamo doko, baa koyata iki lamo!
“Embanya kingi mokopi mendeme emba koo pyaale lao mapisia kandeno doko, kepanya nepape! Emba kingi tamopi moko tamopi tanoma kateta lete etete katenge ongonya pateno doko, auu pyoo katate. Kingi mokopi pitaka kateta itate konjala naenge dokonya soo pyandatamo doko, auu pyoo nakatate.
Dee embanya lenge dokome emba koo pyaale lao mapisia kandeno doko, lukunya nepape! Emba lenge mendai iki tao lete etete katenge ongonya pateno doko, auu pyoo katate. Emba lenge lapota tapeta ita tao katenge yuu koo dokonya soo pyandatamo doko, auu pyoo nakatatena,” lea.
“Nyakamame wane koo datupanya mendaipi mende angi mende daa lamo lao masetamina kandao kalyepape. Nambame nyakama langilyona, wane koo dupa isingi enjele dupa koteaka lao nambanya Takange kaitinya katenge doko-pipa awapa katengema.
[Endakalinya Ikiningi dokome endakali alu petae dupa pyoo nyala epea.]
“Nyakamame aipa lao masilyamipi? Akali mendenya mena sipisipi andate mendai katatamo kandao doko, dutupanya mendai alu pitamopa baame aipa pitape? Baame sipisipi kingi ita mange mendai wakyoo-kisa dee mange mendai wakyoo dutupa tanu nao pau manda mendenya katena latala mendai alu pitamo doko pao kutata daape!
Nambame nyakama kiningi langilyona, baame kutao kandatatamo kandao doko, mendai doko kandao etete mona yaepata. Sipisipi kingi ita mange mendai wakyoo-kisa dee mange mendai wakyoo alu napitamino dutupa dopa pyoo mona yaepala nayata.
Dopaka pyoo nyakamanya Takange kaitinya katenge dokome wane koo datupanya mende alu napipya laka lao masingina,” Jisasame lea.
“Embanya endakali yango mendeme emba koo pingitamo kandao doko, emba baa katatasa pao nyalambo iki pitipala baanya koo pitamo doko lao panasoo lamaipi. Lamaitinopa baame embanya pii setamo kandao doko, embame embanya endakali yango doko dee lanyete.
Baame embanya pii nasetamo kandao doko, pii pepa pyapae singili pyoo, ‘Lapo tepopi mendeme pii dupa pitaka sokondape petala kyoto injisetaminopana,’ embame mendalapo lanyepala deaka lamaiya pupi.
Baame dutupanya pii nasetamo kandao doko, embame sosa doko lamaipi. Dee baame sosanya apata pii nasetamo kandao doko, baa netesa endakalipi takisa nyingi akalipi dopale lamo lao masepe.
“Nambame nyakama kiningi langilyona, nyakamame isa yuu dakenya mende pyakilyina kayakamaitamino doko, kaitinya pyakilyina kayakamaitaka. Dee nyakamame isa yuu dakenya mende yukuokamaitamino doko, kaitinya yukuokamaitaka.
“Dee nambame pii mende nyakama dapa langilyo: nyakamanya endakali lapomame isa yuu dakenya katao mona mendai palyetala mende pyekena lao loma soo tee latambino kandao doko, nambanya Takange kaitinya katenge dokome kapa pao pyakamaita.
Doko, endakali lapo tepopi mendatupame namba lao masetala mendasa kambu pyao pilyami dosa namba dupa-pipa awapa katengena,” Jisasame lea.
Dokopa Pitame ipupala Jisasa pisoo lao pituu, “Kamongo, nambanya endakali yango mendeme paa akipatesa namba koo pingyetamopa nambame baanya koo yanu doko kayapengepe? Paa kalangesa kayapengepe?” lea.
Dopa leamopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Paa kalangesa daa. Kingi itaka kalange dupanya paa kalangesalao lelyo.
Dopana, Kaitinya Katenge dokome isingi doko akali kiŋi mendeme baanya kalai akali dupa-kisa yanu siamo dupa pyekena latoo lao masoo kateamo dopale.
Kiŋi dokome tee pyao yanu dupa pyekena lao kateamopa kalai akali dupanya mende laminao epeami-pyaa. Akali doko-kisa baanya muni yanu yakiaka etete longo sia-pyaa.
Baame yanu doko kapa pao pyapenge nanjiamosa baanya akali andake dokome lao pituu, ‘Nyakamame akali dake, baanya endapi, wanepi, dee baanya oapapi dupa pitakame muni nyepala yanu doko pyakalapape!’ lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa kalai akali dokome baa lao luma lakapala, ‘Nambame embanya muni dupa pitaka yanu pyakatona, embame namba maka nakaenya malisepoko!’ lea-pyaa.
Dokopa akali andake dokome kalai akali doko kondome kumao baanya yanu doko kayapala baa yakinea-pyaa.
“Dopa peteamopa kalai akali dokome pupala baanya kalai akali yango mende kandanyia-pyaa. Akali doko-kisa baanya muni yanu kina andate mendai sia-pyaa. Dokonya baame baa minatala mange minao lakatete pyoo pituu, ‘Embame nambanya yanu doko pyaka!’ lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa baanya kalai akali yango dokome tombauli sepala, ‘Nambame embanya muni dupa yanu pyakatona, embame namba maka nakaenya malisepoko!’ lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamoaka doko, baame malisala nayatowana lao masetala, akali dokome muni dupa yanu pyao etapalaka andaka ipatana anjoo pyandala pena lea-pyaa.
Dokopa baanya kalai akali yango dupame piamo doko kandatala mona etete kenda kayapala, doko pitaka nyakamanya akali andake doko pao lamaiyami-pyaa.
Lamaiyaminopa akali andake dokome baa epena latala lamaiyoo, ‘Emba kalai akali koo lamo! Embame namba pisipino dokonya nambame nambanya yanu emba-kisa sipumu doko pitaka kayapu.
Nambame emba kondo kayapu dopaka pyoo embame embanya kalai akali yango doko kondo kayapili, yaka nanjipyalipi?’ lea-pyaa.
Dopa latala akali andake dokome imbu kayapala baanya kalai akali doko anjingi andaka tanda maiyoo isingi akali dupanya kingilyaka maiyoo pituu, ‘Akali dakeme nambanya muni dupa pitaka yanu pyao etapalaka andaka ipatana anjoo soo pupa,’ lea-pyaana,” Jisasame lea.
Dopa latala baame kongali pii doko etasoo lao pituu, “Nyakama mendai mendai lao dupame nyakamanya endakali yango mendeme koo pingyetamo dupanya yanu dupa kiningi etete kayala nayatamino kandao doko, nambanya Takange kaitinya katenge dokome nyakama mendai dopaka pitana,” lea.
Jisasame pii dutupa lamaiyoo etapala, Galili yuu doko yakinatala Jutia yuu dokonya endaki Jotane yangitena pea.
Dokopa endakali kambu longome baa watao peaminopa baame endakali dokaitanya yaina dupa yuu dokonya mee jakamaiya.
Dopa piamopa Patasi mendapuame ipupala baa minao makande pyoo lao pituu, “Enda watao pingi tenge dupanya mendenya-kaita akali mendeme baanya enda doko pena lao watao pyatamopa naimanya mana setapae dupanya kapa patape napatape?” leami.
Dopa leaminopa baame yanu pyao, “Nyakamame pii dake itaki napiamipi? ‘Tee piamo dokopa Pyoo Injiamo dokome endapa akalipa lao wasia-pyaa.’
Dopa petala baame lao pituu, ‘Tenge dokonya akalimi baanya endangi takangepa yakinatala, baanya etanengepa kopatala dolapo yonge mendai joo pititambina,’ lea-pyaa.
Dopana dolapo lapoma joo napetenya, yonge mendai joo pititambi. Goteme nyoo pyasetae doko endakalimi wakale pyoloo napipengena,” Jisasame lea.
Dopa leamopa Patasi dupame baa lamaiyoo, “‘Akali mendeme baanya enda doko watao pyao pituu, watao pingi pepa mende maitala watao pyapengena,’ lao Moseseme mana setekea-pyoomo doko aipuma setea laape?” leami.
Dokopa Jisasame dokaitanya pii yanu pyao, “Nyakama tuu-tuu piaminosa enda watenge kaita doko Moseseme nyakamanya setekeamoaka doko, wamba tee piamo dokopa mana doko nasia-pyaa.
Dopana nambame nyakama dapa langilyo: akali mendenya etanenge dokome kepo kolala nayatamopa, baame mee watao pyapala enda waka mende lanyetamo kandao doko, akali dokome kepo kolatana,” lea.
Dopa leamopa baanya disaipele dupame baa lamaiyoo, “Enda akalipa tole pyao petenge mana doko dopale tamo kandao doko, akalimi enda lanyala nayao katataminopa auu pitana,” leami.
Dopa leaminopa baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Endakali pitakame kapa pao dopa napitami. Goteme endakali mendapua mana doko maiyamo dupame iki pitami.
Akali mendapua enda nanyepenge jepae mandeami dupame enda nanyoo mee katengema. Mendapua lakapo nyepae dupame kapa pao enda lanyala naengema. Dee mendapuame Kaitinya Katenge dokome isingi doko lao masetala enda lanyala naengemaka. Mana doko kapa pao watao minatamo dokome mininana,” Jisasame lea.
Gii dokopa endakali mendapuame wane wanakupi koo dupa-kisa Jisasame kingi setapala sekena lao laminao epeami. Dopaka doko, disaipele dupame dokaita pyalanya leami.
Dokopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Wane wanakupi koo dupa epekena kaita lyokala nayakalapa! Kaitinya Katenge dokome wane wanakupi dapale joo kalyamino endakali dupa isoo kalyamona,” lea.
Dopa latala baame dokaita-kisa kingi setapala yuu doko yakinatala pea.
Yuu mendepa akali mende Jisasa kateasa ipupala lao pituu, “Mana Lenge Akali, tenda namba lete etete katatopa lao mana epe aki mende minawape?” lea.
Dopa leamopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Aipuma embame aki mana mende epepe lao namba kandao pisilipi? Mendai iki baa epe. Emba lete etete kalyanya masii kandeno doko, mana setapae dupa watao minape!” lea.
Dopa lateamopa akali dokome baa pisoo, “Mana setapae dupa andutupape?” lea. Dokopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “‘Embame endakali pyao kumasala nayape. Embame kepo kolala nayape. Embame pake nala nayape. Embame endakali mende minakasalanya sambo laa nayape.
Embanya endangi takangepa dolapo andanda semaiyoo katape. Dee embame emba tange auu kaengeli pyoo endakali yango dupa auu kayao katapena,’” Jisasame lea.
Dokopa akali dokome pii yanu pyao, “Mana setapae dutupa pitaka nambame watao minio doko mee minawaka kalyona, dee aki mende nambame pipenge jilyape?” lea.
Dopa leamopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Emba tolalakao tolatae katatoo lao maseteno kandao doko, emba pupala embanya oapi dupame muni nyepala endakali tipya dupa maipi. Dopa pitinopa embanya epe etete dupa kaitinya sakatana, embame namba watao ipupi,” lea.
Dopa leamopa akali dokome sepala baanya oapi etete longo singi dokonyana, mona etete kenda kayao yakinatala pea.
Dokopa Jisasame disaipele dupa lamaiyoo, “Nambame nyakama kiningi langilyona, kamongo mendeme baa Kaitinya Katenge dokome isina lao kalyanya lekeleke tata.
Dee mendeaka nyakama langilyona, mena kamele mendeme kepo tii mendenya kolandalanya lekeleke tapyaliaka doko, kamongo mendeme baa Goteme isina lao kalyanya etete lekeleke tapyalina,” lea.
Dokopa disaipele dupame pii dutupa soo etete walu latala lao pituu, “Dopa tamo kandao doko, api kapa pao pyoo nyepae katatape?” leami.
Dopa leaminopa Jisasame dokaita kandatae soo yanu pyao, “Endakalimi kapa pao dopa napipengeaka doko, Goteme dupa pitaka kapa pao pingina,” lea.
Dokopa Pitame baa lamaiyoo, “Kandeleno, naimame dupa pitaka yakinatala emba watao paelyamano dokonya tenda naimame aki mende nyetamape?” lea.
Dopa leamopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nambame nyakama kiningi langilyona, tenda dupa pitaka enenge jetamo gii dokopa Endakalinya Ikiningi doko etete kamongao kiŋi petenge toko dokonya pitita. Gii dokopa nyakama namba watao paelyamino dupame Isataele tata kingi ita mende-kisa dee lapoma dupanya pii tolasakamaiyanya kiŋi petenge toko kingi ita mende-kisa dee lapoma dupanya pititamiaka.
Dee namba lao masetala anda tamopi, kaiminingi tamopi, pimalenge tamopi, takange tamopi, endangi tamopi, wane tamopi, ee tamopi dupa yakineamino endakali dupa pitakame dupanya yanu etete longo waa palyoo nyepala dee lete etete katatamiaka.
Dopaka doko, enomba nyoo katenge endakali longo dupa maita-kaita katatami. Maita-kaita katenge longo dupa enomba nyoo katatamina,” Jisasame dopa lea.
“Kaitinya Katenge dokome isingi doko akali mendeme yongama wamba sakatatala akali mendapuame baanya getepe ee dokonya kalai pyekena lao lanyala peamo dopale.
Pupala ee tange dokome akali mendatupa-pipa pii lao wasoo mona mendai palyetala, muni kina mendai mendai lao yuu gii mendainya singili pyoo nyalapalena latala, akali dutupame baanya getepe ee dokonya kalai pyaa pena lea-pyaa.
Maitakao baame yongama kiloko mange mendai wakyoapi mendenya dee kamapisa pupala kandeamopa, akali mendapua mee dupanya kateami-pyaa.
Kateaminopa baame dupa lamaiyoo, ‘Nyakama apata getepe ee dokonya kalai pyaa pupa. Nambame nyakama yole yaka dyaapona,’ lea-pyaa.
Dopa lateamopa akali dupa kalai pyaa peami-pyaa. Pateaminopa kotaka andawai pungupungupi, alemandi kiloko tepopi dupanya deaka patapu dopaka pia-pyaa.
“Dopa petala alemandi kiloko yuungi laanya piamopa baa deaka pupala akali mendapua mee kateamino kandatala dupa lamaiyoo, ‘Aipuma nyakama indupa gii dake pitaka mee dakenya katalamipi?’ lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa dupame yanu pyao, ‘Akali mendeme naima kalai nandyomona,’ leami-pyaa. Dokopa baame dupa lamaiyoo, ‘Nyakama apata nambanya getepe ee dokonya kalai pyaa pupa,’ lea-pyaa.
“Yuu kualanya piamopa akali ee tange dokome ee isingi akali doko lamaiyoo, ‘Embame kalai akali dupa epena latala yole maipi. Maiyanya pituu embame kalai akali etete maitakao ipamino dupa wambao maima-maima pyoo maiyoo pao, tee pyao ipamino dokonya tuu lape,’ lea-pyaa.
Dokopa akali mendatupa kiloko yuungi laanya piamopa ipao kalai piamino dupa muni kina mendai mendai lao nyiami-pyaa.
Dee akali wambao yongama sakatao kalai piamino dupame ipupala nyakama muni mendalapo apata nyalamano lao masiaminoaka doko, dupa apata kina mendai mendai lawaka nyiami-pyaa.
Nyepala dokopa dupame akali ee tange doko kandao imbu kayapala mumu lao lao pituu, ‘Akali etete maitakao ipamino datupame kiloko gii mendai iki kalai pimino doko, naima niki popome kumao indupa gii doko pitaka lekeleke tao kalai pyemano. Dopaka doko, embame dupa naima-pipa kapa kapa lao yole pilinona,’ leami-pyaa.
<range>
“Dopa leaminopa baame yanu pyao akali dupanya mende kandao dapa lea-pyaa: ‘Kaimia, nambame emba koo pingyala naelyona, emba muni kina mendai nyatalena lao nalimba mona mendai palyala nayalambape?
Embanya yole doko nyoo puu. Nambame emba yole dyoo dopaka pyoo akali maita pyao ipao kalai pyomo doko maitoo lao masetala maiyo.
Nambanya muni dokome mendita mende pitoo lao masoto doko kapa pao napitope? Dee nambame auu pyoo dokonya emba mona koo palyilipi?’ akali ee tange dokome dopa lea-pyaa.
Dopaka pyoo endakali enomba nyoo katenge dupa maita-kaita katatami. Maita-kaita katenge dupa enomba nyoo katatamina,” Jisasame lea.
Jisasa Jetusaleme pao pituu, baanya disaipele kingi ita mende-kisa dee lapoma dutupa iki lanyepala kaitinisa dapa lamaiya: “Kandeleno! Naima indupa Jetusaleme pelyamano. Akali mendeme Endakalinya Ikiningi doko enge nyepala pitisa mupapi mana setapae masingi akalipi dupa laitaka pitamopa dupame baa kosa lao pyao kumasemana latami.
<range>
Dopa latala dupame baa endakali tata waka dupanya kingilyaka maitaminopa, dokaitame baa kandao lamba lao konjame pyapala ita pokonya pyao yukuotami. Dopa pitaminopa koto teponya Goteme baa dee sakatasetana,” Jisasame lea.
Gii dokopa akali Sepete ikiningi mendalapo endangi dokome laminao Jisasa kateasa ipao luma lakapala baa-kisa mendita mende tee lea-pyaa.
Dokopa Jisasame baa pisoo, “Embame aki mende auu kaelepe?” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa enda dokome baa lamaiyoo, “Emba kiŋi jeteno gii dokopa nambanya wane dalaponya mende embanya kingi tolae-kaita katata mende koya-kaita katata lao laa,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa Jisasame lao pituu, “Nyakamame lelyamino doko masokondape napilyamino. Wane nyalambome kapo penge namba nato dokonya kapa pao natambipi?” lea-pyaa. Dokopa dolapome baa lamaiyoo, “Nalimba kapana nambana,” leambi-pyaa.
Dopa leambinopa Jisasame dolapo lamaiyoo, “Kiningi etete nyalambome nambanya kapo penge dokonya natambiaka doko, nambanya kingi tolae-kaita petena lengepi koya-kaita katena lengepi doko nambanya kalai daa. Nambanya Takangeme katatamina lao yapao nyiamo endakali dupa katatamina,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa pilyamino lapae doko disaipele kingi ita dutupame sepala nyalambo kaiminingipa dolapo imbu kayami.
Dopa piaminopa Jisasame dokaita pitaka epena latala lamaiyoo, “Endakali tata dupanya yuu isingi akali kenge singi kalyamino dupame endakali dupanya alyasale joo katengema doko nyakamame masilyamino. Dee dupanya akali andake dupame nyakamanya pii watao minekena lao kyoto jingima doko nyakamame masilyaminoaka.
Dopaka doko, nyakamame dopa napinya, nyakamanya mende akali andake joo katapuli lao masetamo kandao doko, nyakamanya kalai akali joo katapenge.
Dee nyakamanya mende enomba nyoo katapuli lao masetamo kandao doko, nyakamanya kendemane joo katapenge.
Dopaka pyoo Endakalinya Ikiningi dokome baanya kalai pyekena lao naepea. Baame endakali dupa nisoo kii tamao nyalanya baa tangeme kumala epeana,” Jisasame lea.
Dupame yuu taono Jeteko doko yakinatala peaminopa endakali kambu andake mendeme Jisasa watao peami.
Dokopa akali lenge monda lapoma kaitinisa peteambi-pyaa. Akali dolapome Jisasa epelyamo leamino sepala dolapome puu lao ae lao, “Dapiti Yumbange! Kamongo! Embame nalimba kondo kayape!” leambi.
Dopa leambinopa endakali dupame dolapo pii kaena lao pyalanya leami. Dopa leaminoaka doko, akali dolapome dee eteteaka puu lao ae lao, “Dapiti Yumbange! Kamongo! Embame nalimba kondo kayape!” leambi.
Dokopa Jisasa ipao katapala akali dolapo epena latala lamaiyoo, “Nambame nyalambonya aipa pyakapili lao masilyambipi?” lea.
Dopa leamopa akali dolapome baa lamaiyoo, “Kamongo, embame nalimbanya lenge tasakapili lao masilyambanona,” leambi.
Dopa leambinopa Jisasame dolapo kondome kumapala baanya kingimi dolaponya lengenya watandeamo awapaka lenge talu petala baa watao peambi.
Dokaita Jetusaleme tengesale pao pituu, Olipimanda yuu dokonya taono Betepasi dokonya peami. Pao pituu dokopa Jisasame disaipele lapoma wambao pena lao lamaiyoo, “Yuu taono yakane nyalambonya enomba-kaita omo silyamo ongonya pupala, mena dongi mende anjetae yakane apata katatambinopa, nyalambome pupae kanjambinona, liangao minao ipupape.
<range>
Endakali mendeme nyalambo kandao pii mende lea kandeno doko, nyalambome baa lamaiyoo, ‘Kamongo dokome kalai mende dongi dalapome pipenge jilyamona,’ laapape. Dopa latambinopa yapa pealapomona,” lea.
Dopa piamo dokome akali potopesa mendeme pii mende dapa leamo doko angi jia:
“Nyakamame Sayone tange dupa dapa lamaiyepape: Indupa nyakamanya kiŋi doko nyakama katamisa epelyamo kanjepa. Endakali andanda semaiyoo katenge doko dongi maita dokonya pituu epelyamo. Baa dongi mendenya yakane dokonya maitanya pituu epelyamona,” lea-pyaa.
Disaipele dolapome pupala Jisasame leamoli piambi-pyaa.
Dopa petala dolapome dongi matakai dokonya yakane doko kateta minao epeambi. Ipupala nyalambonya yonge pee ketae pingi dolapo dongi maita dolaponya ketae seteambinopa, Jisasa dongi yakane dokonya pyakalyetala pituu pea.
Peamopa endakali kambu andake mendeme nyakamanya yonge pee ketae pingi dupa kaitini dokonya kuiyoo seteami. Yangi dupame ita yoko dupa yandao kaitini dokonya kuiyoo setami.
Dee endakali dupa wambata maita pyata pyoo pao pituu puu lao dapa lao wee leami: “Dapiti Yumbange, embame pyoo nyoo katape! Akali epelyamo dake auu pisetaena Kamongo Goteme epena lapumopa epelyamo! Etete Ketae Kaitinya Katenge, embame pyoo nyoo katapena,” leami.
Jisasa Jetusaleme pyakameamopa Jetusaleme tange dupa pitakame walu latala lao pituu, “Akali dake apipi?” leami.
Dopa leaminopa endakali awapa peamino dupame, “Baa Jisasa lenge Galili yuu taono Nasatete tange potopesa dokona,” leami.
Jisasa baa losuu anda andake katenge kame dokonya pupala topo setao peteamino endakali dupapi sambao kateamino endakali dupapi dupa watao pyapala, muni aloo pingi akali dupanya tepolo tokopi yaka maileome topo nyingi akali dupanya petenge tokopi dupa lokalyinya nepea.
Dopa petala baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Gotenya pii pepa pyapae singi dokonya, ‘Nambanya anda doko kandao endakalimi loma singi andana latamina,’ lapae silyamo. Dopaka doko, nyakamame anda dake pake nao makongao paenge endakali dupa yalo pingi kananda injisilyaminona,” lea.
Endakali lenge mondapi moko koopi dupa Jisasa kateasa losuu anda andake kame dokonya epeaminopa baame dupa mee injisia.
Dopa piamopa pitisa mupapi mana setapae masingi akalipi dupame Jisasanya kalai pupu lapae piamo dupa kandata, dee wane kole dupame losuu anda andake kame dokonya katao, “Dapiti Yumbange, embame pyoo nyoo katape!” lao wee leamino doko sepa petala imbumi kumiami.
Dopa petala dokaitame baa lamaiyoo, “Wane dupame pii lelyamino doko embame silipi?” leami. Dokopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Kini, nambame silyona, pii mende dapa lapae silyamo: ‘Embame wane koopi ŋaŋapi dupanya nengekaita lumbakamainopa dupame emba lalyokondape piamina,’ lapae silyamo doko nyakamame itaki pyala nayamipi?” lea.
Dopa latala baame dokaita yakinatala Jetusaleme dokonya kamalyatena pao yuu taono Betani dokonya palea.
Jisasa yongama wamba dee Jetusaleme pilyoo pituu baa lopo kaya.
Lopo kayapala baame piki ita mende kaitini lembasa kateamo kandatala dokonya pea. Peamoaka doko, dii mende kutao nakandao yoko iki pyoo kateamo kandea. Dokopa baame piki ita doko kandao, “Embame tanga tangapi dii mende dee namanditi, etete daana!” lea. Dopa lalu piamopa piki ita doko sapuiya.
Dopa piamo doko disaipele dupame kandao mona andapala lao pituu, “Piki ita dake aipa petala pupae lao sapuilyape?” leami.
Dokopa Jisasame dokaitanya pii yanu pyakamaiyoo, “Nambame nyakama kiningi langilyona, nyakamame masoo minao katao mona lapo palya nayatamino kandao doko, nambame piki ita dake pilyoli pyoo nyakamame kapa pao pitami. Nyakamame doko iki pyaa nayao dee yuu manda dake kandao, sakatalala solowata pete andake dokonya mangena latamino kandao doko, lataminoli pita.
Nyakamame masoo minao loma soo tee latamino dupa pitaka nyetamina,” Jisasame lea.
Jisasa losuu anda andake dokonya pilyetala endakali dupa mana lamaiyoo kateamopa, pitisa mupapi Jutamanya isingi akalipi dupame baa kateasa ipupala lao pituu, “Embame apinya pii minao kalai datupa pilipi? Apimi kalai datupa emba-kisa seteape?” leami.
Dokopa Jisasame dokaitanya pii yanu pyakamaiyoo, “Nambame nyakama pii mende pisilyoakana, nyakamame yanu pyakatamino kandao doko, nambame kalai datupa dokonya pii minao pilyona lao nyakama langitoaka.
Joneme kaimbu pyakamaiyamo doko apimi pina leape? Goteme pina leape, pande endakalimi pina leamipi?” lea. Dokopa dokaitame pii doko sepala nyakamalapo lao pituu, “Naimame, ‘Goteme pina leana,’ latamano kandao doko, ‘Aipuma nyakamame Jonenya pii doko masoo minala nayamipi?’ lata.
Dee, ‘Endakalimi pina leamina,’ latamano kandao doko, endakali pitakame Jone doko akali potopesana lao masingima dokonya paka pyaumuna,” lao nyakamalapo leami.
Dopa latala dokaitame Jisasanya pii yanu pyakamaiyoo, “Naimame masala naelyamanona,” leami. Dokopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Doko tamo doko, nambame kalai pilyo datupa pii leamo doko nyakama langya nayatoakana,” lea.
Dee Jisasame lao pituu, “Akali mendenya wane lapoma kateambi-pyaana salapape! Dolaponya takange dokome ipao wane mupa doko lamaiyoo, ‘Emba indupa getepe ee dokonya kalai pyaa puu,’ lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa wane dokome yanu pyao, ‘Namba daana,’ lea-pyaa. Dopa leamoaka doko, maitakao mona aloo petala pea-pyaa.
Takange dokome wane mende doko kateasa pao dopaka lamaiya-pyaa. Dopa lamaiyamopa, ‘Apane, yaka lumu,’ leamoaka doko, angi napea-pyaa.
Dopa latala wane dolaponya andukumi takangenya masiamoli pia lusilyamape?” lao Jisasame dokaita pisia. Dopa lao pisiamopa endakali dupame lao pituu, “Wane mupa dokome lumuna,” leami. Dopa leaminopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Dee nambame nyakama kiningi langilyona, takisa nyingi akalipi kepo kolao paenge endapi dupame nyakama nyoo maita pyatala Goteme isina lao kalyanya ipao wambelyamino.
Doko aipumape? Jone Kaimbu Pingi doko nyakama kateamisa ipupala mana tolatae doko laitaka peteamoaka doko, nyakamame baa masala nayami. Dopaka doko, takisa nyingi akalipi kepo kolao paenge endapi dupame masiami. Dopa piamino doko nyakamame kandatala mona aloo petala baa masala nayamina,” Jisasame lea.
Jisasame, “Dee kongali pii mende lelyona, salapape,” latala lao pituu, “Akali yuu andake singi mende katea-pyaa. Akali dokome getepe ee mende kakopatala pokea-pyaa. Pokatala baame getepe ee dokonya getepe dii lyao indyalanya yuli mende lakea-pyaa. Dee isoo pititamo anda ketae mende piaka-pyaa. Dopa petala akali mendapuame ee doko isakao katena latala, baa yuu londati mendakaita pao katea-pyaa.
Dopa petala yuu mende getepe wambu pingi gii doko ipateamopa baame baanya kendemane mendapuame ee isakamaingi akali dupa kateamisa pupala, getepe dii mendapua lyao peekena lao nyakala pena lea-pyaa.
Peaminopa ee isakamaingi akali dupame baanya kendemane dupa minatala, mende pyao indyepala mende kumi pyao kumasoo, mende kaname pyao takyoo piami-pyaa.
Dopa peteaminopa akali ee tange dokome dee kendemane mendatupa pena lea-pyaa. Wamba pena leamoli pyoo pena laa nayao dee longole pena lea-pyaa. Dopa piamopa ee isakamaingi dupame wamba piaminoliaka piami-pyaa.
Dee etao doko baame baanya ikiningi doko dokaita kateamisa pena lao pituu, ‘Dupame nambanya ikiningi doko andanda semaitamina,’ lao masetala pena lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamoaka doko, ee isakamaingi dutupame wane doko epeamo kandatala nyakamalapo lao pituu, ‘Wane dakeme takangenya moya nyepengena, yapa pyao kumasema! Pyao kumasetala baanya ee moya nyepenge dake naima nyetamana,’ leami-pyaa.
Dopa latala dokaitame baa minatala ee dokonya kamalyatena soo pyandatala pyao kumasiami-pyaa.
“Dopana akali ee tange dokome ipupala ee isakamaingi dupa aipa pitape?” lea.
Dopa leamopa dupame baa lamaiyoo, “Akali koo dokaita tanda maiyoo pyao kumaseta. Dopa petala baame getepe ee doko akali waka mendapuame isakao katena latamopa, wambu pingi gii dokonya dupame getepe dii lyao maiyakamaitamina,” leami.
Dokopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame Gotenya pii pepa pyapae singi dake itaki pyatala nayamipi? ‘Anda pingi akali dupame anda pingina daa latala nepeamino doko pingina mupa jetea. Kamongome dopa pipumu doko, naimame kandamanopa auu etete pilyamona,’ lapae silyamo.
Dopana, nambame nyakama dapa langilyo: Goteme nyakama dee isala nayao baame isingi dokonya dii manditamino endakali dupa iseta.
[Endakali mendeme kana doko-ketae lombao sepala baa indyuu tale pita. Dee kana dokome endakali mende pyao takyembatamo kandao doko, endakali doko etete kunguma jetana,” lea.]
Dopa lao Jisasame pii kongali leamo dupa pitisa mupapi Patasipi dupame sepala, “Naima kandao lalumu,” lao masiami.
Dopa lao masetala baa anjemana lao kaita kutiaminoaka doko, endakali kambu kateamino dupame Jisasa baa potopesana lao masiaminosa paka kayami.
Jisasame dee kongali pii mendapua dokaita lamaiyoo lao pituu, “Kaitinya Katenge dokome isingi doko kiŋi mendenya ikiningi doko enda keleamopa baame nee andake mende yawakamaiyamo dopale.
<range>
Kiŋi dokome endakali wamba epena lateamo dupa nee andake dokonya nala epena lao baanya kendemane mendapuame lanyala pena lea-pyaa. Dopaka doko, dokaitame nala ipumana lao masala nayami-pyaa.
Dopa piaminosa baame kendemane mendatupa pena lao pituu, ‘Nambame endakali wamba epena lateo dutupa kandao dapa lamaiyepape: “Baame baanya nee andake doko depa latelyamo. Baanya mena pulumakao maipa dupapi dee pulumakao andapae dupapi pyapalamo. Dupa pitaka depa latae sepelyamona, nyakama dokonya nala ipupa,” lao lamaiyepape!’ lea-pyaa.
Dokopa dokaitame lamaiyaminoaka doko, tuu petala nyakamanya masiamili piami-pyaa. Dupanya mende baanya eenya pea-pyaa. Mende baanya pisinisa dupanya pea-pyaa.
Dee yangimi kiŋi dokonya kendemane dupa minatala mana koo minao pyao kumasiami-pyaa.
Dopa piamino doko soo kiŋi dokome imbu kayapala baanya yanda singi amii dupa pena lateamopa, dupame pupala kendemane pyao kumasiamino endakali dutupa pyao kumasetala dutupanya yuu taono doko pyao yangeami-pyaa.
“Dokopa kiŋi dokome baanya kendemane dupa lamaiyoo, ‘Nambanya nee andake doko depa latae sepelyamoaka doko, nala epena leo endakali dupa kooma lamo.
Dopana nyakamame kaitini kembo dupanya pupala endakali kutao kandatamino dupa pitaka nee andake dakenya nala epena lamaiyepape!’ lea-pyaa.
Dopa lateamopa kendemane dokaitame kaitini dupanya pupala, endakali koopi epepi kandeamili pyoo laminao ipao kambu pyateaminopa, enda kelyao nee napenge anda doko etete tumbiami-pyaa.
“Peteamino dokonya kiŋi dokome endakali dokaita kanjanya kolandatala kandeamopa, akali mende yonge pee enda kelenge giinya pingi doko napyoo mee peteamo kandea-pyaa.
Kandatala baame baa lamaiyoo, ‘Kaimia, embanya yonge pee enda kelenge giinya pingi doko napyene lamo doko aipa petala emba dakenya kolandalepe?’ lao pisia-pyaa. Dopa lao pisiamopa akali dokome pii mende lapenge nanjia-pyaa.
Dopa piamopa kiŋi dokome kendemane dupa lamaiyoo, ‘Nyakamame baanya kingi mokopi dupa yaki petala yuu etete iminjetae dokonya baa soo pyale laapa! Dokonya katao baa ee lao yamataka lao nenge gilyoo katatana,’ kiŋi dokome dopa lea-pyaa.
Epena latae endakali longo katengemaka doko, yapao nyepae kuki iki katengemana,” Jisasame lea.
Dokopa akali Patasi dupame pupala kambu pyao pituu Jisasame pii mende latamo dokonya-kaita baa-kisa tenge setamana lao masetala pii wasiami-pyaa.
Dopa petala nyakamanya disaipele mendapuapi dee Kiŋi Etote tata mendapuapi dupa Jisasa kateasa pena leaminopa dupame pupala baa kandao lao pituu, “Mana Lenge Akali, emba pii kiningi lenge akalina, embame kiningi pii lao Goteme endakali dupame pipimili lao masingili pyoo mana lamailino lao masilyamano. Embame endakali dupa paka nakayapala itange kandao mokosala nanenge.
Dopana, naimanya mana setapae dupanya aipa lapae silyape? Kapomane Isingi Mupa dokonya takisa dupa naimame pyakamaipengepe, pande kayapenge? Embame aipa lao masilipi? Naima langi,” leami.
Dopaka doko, Jisasame dupanya mana koo doko kandatala lao pituu, “Nyakama endakali minakasingi akali! Aipuma nyakamame namba minao makande pilyamipi?
Nyakamame takisa pyapenge muni ongonya mende namba laitaka pyepa!” lea. Dokopa dokaitame muni mende maitiaminopa baame dokaita pisoo, “Muni dakenya endakali lengelyaapi wasetae kalyamopi kenge pyatae kalyamopi doko apinyape?” lea.
<range>
Dopa leamopa dokaitame lao pituu, “Doko Kapomane Isingi Mupa dokonya kalyamona,” leami. Dopa leaminopa baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Dopa tamo doko, opale Kapomane Isingi Mupa dokonya dupa tange maiyakamaiyepape. Dee opale Gotenya dupa Gote tangeaka maiyakamaiyepape,” lea.
Dokaitame pii dutupa sepala mona andao baa yakinatala peami.
Koto gii dokopaka akali Satyusi mendapua Jisasa kateasa epeami. Dupame endakali kumapala dee sakatala naengena lengema. Akali dupame ipupala Jisasa pisoo, “Mana Lenge Akali, wamba Moseseme dapa lea-pyaa: ‘Akali mende wane manja nayao mee kumatamo kandao doko, baanya kaiminingi mendeme enda walyakae doko pisetala wane manditamo dupa kaiminingi kumapae dokonya manjakamaitana,’ lapae silyamo.
<range>
Gii mendepa akali mendenya ikiningi kalange naima-pipa kateamano dokonya mupa dokome enda nyepala wane manja nayao baa mee kumia. Kumateamopa kaiminingi lapo dokome enda walyakae doko baa pisia.
Dokome dopaka piamopa kaiminingi tepo dokome enda dokoaka pisia. Dopaka pyoo kaiminingi kalange dutupa pitakame enda dokoaka nyepala pitaka kumateaminopa maitakao enda doko kumia.
<range>
Dopana, endakali kumapae dupa dee sakatatamino gii dokopa enda mendai dokoaka kaiminingi kalange dutupa pitakame wamba nyiamino doko apinya joo pitita laape?” leami.
Dokopa Jisasame dokaitanya pii yanu pyakamaiyoo, “Nyakamame Gotenya pii pepa pyapae singi doko masala nayao baanya pupu lapae doko masala nayawaka pingima. Tenge dokonya nyakamame etete kopeta lelyamino.
Endakali kumapae dupa dee sakatatamino gii dokopa endakalipa nyala nayao kaitinya enjele dupa katengemali pyoo katatami.
Endakali kumapae dupa dee sakatatamina lao Goteme nyakamanya pii pepa pyao setekeamo doko itaki napiamipi? Baame dapa lea-pyaa: ‘Namba Apotakamepi, Aisakepi, Jekopepi, dutupanya Gote dokona,’ lapae silyamo. Baa endakali lete katenge dupanya Gotena, kumapae dupanya daana,” Jisasame lea.
<range>
Dopa leamopa endakali kambu piamino dupame baanya mana leamo dutupa sepala walu leami.
Jisasame pii dutupa leamo dokome Satyusi dupanya nengekaita lyokapya lapae doko Patasi dupame sepala, baa kateasa ipao kapeami.
Kapatala dokaitanya mana setapae masingi akali mendeme Jisasa minao makande pyaanya pisoo pituu, “Mana Lenge Akali, mana setapae dupanya anduku mupa joo silyape?” lea.
<range>
Dopa leamopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “‘Embame embanya Kamongo Gote auu kayao katao, embanya monapi, imambupi, masingipi dutupa pitaka baa iki maitae katape.’
Mana setapae doko etete andake mupa.
Dee mendai dopaleaka lapo doko dake: ‘Embame emba tange auu kaengeli pyoo embanya endakali yango doko auu kayao katape.’
Mana setapae lapoma dolapome Moseseme pii pepa piamo dupa pitakapi potopesame pii pepa piamino dupapi dupa tumunya minalyoo silyamona,” Jisasame lea.
Patasi dupa kapatae kateaminopa Jisasame dokaita pisoo, “Nyakamame Kataisa doko kandao apina lao masilyamipi? Baa apinya yumbangepe?” lea. Dokopa dupame baanya pii yanu pyakamaiyoo, “Baa Dapitinya yumbangena,” leami.
<range>
Dopa leaminopa baame dupa lamaiyoo, “Dopa tamo kandao doko, Dapitimi aki mende masetala baanya yumbange doko kandao ‘Kamongona’ lea-pyaape? Doko, Oli Sipitisa dokome Dapitinya mona sakatasiamopa baame dapa lea-pyaana lapae silyamo:
‘Kamongo Gote dokome nambanya Kamongo doko lamaiyoo, “Emba nambanya kingi tolae-kaita katape. Katatenopa nambame embanya yandapipili dupa embanya moko pundipundi ongonya katena latona,” lea-pyaana,’ lea.
Dopana wamba Dapitimi Kataisa doko kandao ‘Kamongona’ latamo kandao doko, aipa petala baa Dapiti yumbange jilyape?” lea.
Dopa lateamopa akali mendaipi mendeme Jisasanya pii doko kapa pao yanu pyapenge etete nanjia. Koto gii dokonya pituu tee pyao akali mendeme pii mende dee baa pisalanya paka kayami.
Dokopa Jisasame endakali kambu piamino dupapi baanya disaipele dupapi dupa lamaiyoo lao pituu, “Mana setapae masingi akalipi Patasipi dupame Mosesenya panda nyoo kalyamino.
<range>
Dopana, dupame nyakama langitaminoli pyoo dupa pitaka watao minao pyepape. Dopaka doko, dupame mana minataminoli pyoo naminalapape. Doko, dupa tangeme lelyaminoli pyoo napingima.
Dee dupame kenda pipae dupa andake pyoo yaki pipala, endakali dupanya lataiyanya nyoo sakamaingima. Dopa pingimaka doko, dupame etete kukipi mende kingi maiya naengema.
Dupame kalai pilyami dupa pitaka endakalimi kandapimili lao pingima. Dopa pina lao dupame Gotenya pii pepa pyapae dokonya mendatupa pepa pyao nyepala matajoo peta kitambu joo piseta pingima. Dupame nyakamanya yonge pee kisa pingi puna dupanya yati pipae dupa londe pyoo anjinya pyandata pingimaka.
Dee dupame nee andake nelyami dupanya petenge toko enomba nyoo dupanyapi, losuu anda dupanya enomba nyoo petenge toko dupanyapi dupanya pilyanya auu kaengema.
Kamapi dupanya endakali dupame nyakama lasa lata ‘Mana Lenge Akalina’ lata, pipimili lao auu kaengemaka.
Dopaka doko, endakali dupame nyakama kandao ‘Mana Lenge Akalina’ lena lao kayala nayalapape. Doko, nyakamanya Mana Lenge Akali mendai iki katamopa nyakama pitaka kaiminingiaka kalyamino.
Dee nyakamame isa yuu dakenya endakali mende nyakamanya ‘Takangena’ laa nayalapape. Kaitinya katenge doko iki nyakamanya Takange.
Endakali dupame nyakama kandao ‘Akali Andakena’ lena lao kayala nayalapapeaka. Nyakamanya Akali Andake mendai iki kalyamo. Doko baa Kataisa.
Nyakamanya mende alyasale joo katatamo doko, nyakamanya kalai pyekenge akali joo katapenge.
Endakali mende tangeme alyasale joo katatamo doko, anasale joo katena lata. Dee endakali mende tangeme anasale joo katatamo doko, alyasale joo katena latana,” lea.
