“Mana setapae masingi akalipi Patasipi nyakama koyatami iki lamo! Nyakama endakali minakasingi akali! Nyakamame endakali dupa Kaitinya Katenge dokome isala naena lao kaitini lyokakamaingima. Nyakama isina lao nakatenya dee endakali isina lao kalyanya pipimino dupa isina lao kayala naelyaminoaka.
[“Mana setapae masingi akalipi Patasipi nyakama koyatami iki lamo! Nyakama endakali minakasingi akali! Nyakamame enda walyakae dupanya anda yuupi dupa minamao nyepakamaitala, endakali dupame nyakama epepe lao masina lao loma londe pyoo singima. Dokonya Goteme nyakama-kisa kenda pipae etete andake mende setata.]
“Mana setapae masingi akalipi Patasipi nyakama koyatami iki lamo! Nyakama endakali minakasingi akali! Nyakamame endakali mende Juta injisalanya solowata pete andake dupanya yangi-kaita pata yuu dupanya mendasa pata pingima. Dopa petala nyakamame endakali mende nyepa pilyamino dokome nyakamanya mana koo dupa ita minao yuu koo dokonya mupa joo pupenge endakali injisingima.
“Kaitini laitaka pingi akali lenge monda nyakama koyatami iki lamo! Nyakamame endakali dupa dapa lao mana lamaingima: ‘Endakali mendeme losuu anda andake dake mauwana kiningi etete dopa pitona latamo dokome latamoli napipenge. Dopaka doko, endakali dokome losuu anda andake dokonya golome wasepae dupa mauwana kiningi etete dopa pitona latamo dokome kayala nayao latamoli pipengena,’ lamaingima.
Nyakama lenge monda kyakaenge! Angi doko andukupi? Golome wasepae dupape, pande golome wasepae dupa Gotenyana lao makande pingi losuu anda andake dokope?
Dee nyakamame endakali dupa dapa lao mana lamaingimaka: ‘Endakali mendeme losuu anda andake dokonya kundi maingi olata toko doko mauwana kiningi etete dopa pitona latamo dokome latamoli napipenge. Dopaka doko, endakali mendeme opale epe mende Gotenya lao setapae olata toko ketae dokonya singi doko mauwana latamo dokome kayala nayao latamoli pipengena,’ lamaingima.
Nyakama lenge monda daape! Angi doko andukupi? Opale epe setapae dokope, pande setapae doko Gotenyana lao makande pingi olata toko dokope?
Dopana, endakali mendeme olata toko doko mauwana lelyamo dokome olata toko dokopi opale epe Gotenya lao setapae olata toko dokonya singi dupa pitaka apata kandao lenge.
Dee endakali mendeme losuu anda andake doko mauwana lelyamo dokome losuu anda andake dokonya katenge doko apata kandao lenge.
Dee endakali mendeme kaiti doko mauwana lelyamo dokome Gotenya isoo petenge toko dokopa toko dokonya petenge dokopa apata kandao lenge.
“Mana setapae masingi akalipi Patasipi nyakama koyatami iki lamo! Nyakama endakali minakasingi akali! Nyakamame takae mondai itamaiyapi dupa paa kingi ita lao mokosepala mende doko Gote maingima. Dopa pingimaka doko, mana tolatae miningipi, kondo kayamaingipi, lelyamoli pingipi, mana setapae dupanya pii angi dopale dupa nyakamame watao naminingima. Nyakamame mendatupa dutupa yakinala nayao pituu angi datupa watao miningima pyali yaka.
Kaitini laitaka pingi dupa nyakama lenge monda daape! Nyakamanya kapo penge dupanya pongena mende pelyamo doko nyoo nepengemaka doko, mena kamele dupa mee goe lengema daape!
“Mana setapae masingi akalipi Patasipi nyakama koyatami iki lamo! Nyakama endakali minakasingi akali! Nyakamame nyakamanya kapopi pelesapi dupanya ketae-kaita iki kunanya nepao katengema. Dopa pingimaka doko, pake nyilyamino dupapi pyuani kayao pilyamino dupapi dupame kapo pelesapi dupanya koko-kaita tumbatae katena kaengema.
Lenge monda Patasi! Wambao embame kapo dupanya koko-kaita katenge dupa kunanya nepape. Dopa pitinopa ketae-kaita kunapayaka seta.
“Mana setapae masingi akalipi Patasipi nyakama koyatami iki lamo! Nyakama endakali minakasingi akali! Nyakama endakali malu dupanya akaipu wai nyetae katengeli pyoo kalyamino. Endakali dupame ketae-kaita kandelyaminopa etete epe jilyamoaka doko, koko-kaita endakali kumapae kuli akipi tamopae dupame tumbatae katenge.
Dokaita joo endakali dupame nyakama ketae kandao epepe lao masingima. Dopaka doko, nyakamanya koko-kaita sambo epe jili pingipi, mana setapae tanga lao koo pingipi dupame tumbatae kalyamona,” Jisasame lea.
“Mana setapae masingi akalipi Patasipi nyakama koyatami iki lamo! Nyakama endakali minakasingi akali! Nyakamame potopesa kumiami dupanya malu dupa makande pyoo, malu ketae dupanya anda auu pipae dupa pinya katengema. Dee nyakamame endakali tolatae kumiami malu kananda dupa yati pingimaka.
Dopa pyoo pituu, ‘Wamba naimanya yumbange dupa kateami gii dokopa naima kateamali kandao doko, naimame dupa-pipa awapa potopesa dupa pyao kumasala nayamalina,’ lengema.
Nyakamame dopa lelyamino dokome nyakama tangemeaka potopesa pyao kumasiamino dupanya mandipaena lao panasingima.
Dopana, nyakamame nyakamanya yumbange dupame tee piamino doko pyoo etasalapape!
Nyakama kanopato! Kanopato pambeanya mandipae! Goteme nyakama yuu koo dokonya nyoo pyandatamo doko, aipa petala nyakamame wandyatamipi?
Tenge dokonya minao nambame nyakama dapa langilyona salapape: nambame potopesapi, mana kandenge akalipi, pii lapae masingi akalipi dupa nyakama katatamisa epena lato. Dopa pitopa nyakamame dupanya mendapua pyao kumasetami. Mendapua pyao ita pokonya yukuotami. Dee mendapua nyakamanya losuu andaka dupanya konjame pyapala yuu taono mendenya watao pyata mendenya watao pyata pitami.
Nyakamame dopa pitaminosa wamba akali tolatae kateamino dupa pitaka pyao kumasiamino dokonya tenge doko nyakama-kisa seta. Dopa piamino mana doko wamba akali tolatae Epolo lenge doko pyao kumasiamino dokonya pituu tee pyatala, akali Betokayanya ikiningi Sakataya lenge doko losuu anda andake dokopa olata toko dokopa dolaponya kainanya pyanya seteamino dokonya tuu lea-pyaa.
Dopa piamino dupa pitakanya yanu doko Goteme endakali indupa palelyamino dupa-kisa nyetana lao nambame nyakama kiningi langilyona,” lea.
“Kanau! Kanau! Jetusaleme tange! Nyakamame potopesa dupa pyao kumasoo dee Goteme epena latae akali dupa kaname pyao kumasoaka katengema! Gii longo paka nambame nyakama nyoo limbatala yaka matakaimi yakane dupa papa pundipundi yapu nengeli pitoo lao masoo katewaka doko, nyakamame tanga leami!
Dokopa nambame nyakamanya anda doko yakinatekelyona, doko mee katakata.
Ongonya nambame nyakama langilyona, indupa pituu tee pyao nyakamame namba etete nakandawaka katao, ‘Akali epelyamo dake auu pisetaena, Kamongo Goteme epena lapumopa epelyamona,’ latamino gii dokonya tuu latamina,” Jisasame lea.
Jisasame losuu anda andake kame doko yakinatala peamopa, baanya disaipele dupame losuu anda katenge dosa anda petae katenge dupa baa laitaka pyaanya epeami.
Dopa piaminopa baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Kini, nyakamame datupa pitaka kandelyamipi? Kandelyaminoaka doko, nambame nyakama kiningi langilyona, ae kaname petae kalyamo datupanya mendaipi mende kalyamoli petae katena lao kayala nayao, pitaka kalunya nepatamina,” lea.
Olipimanda yuu dokonya Jisasa peteamopa baanya disaipele dupame elyakao ipupala baa pisoo, “Embame laleno dutupa andukupa pitana lao lalepe? Aki mende pitamopa naimame kandatala emba dee ipanya pilino, yuu dake etalanya pilyamo lao masetama laape? Dokonya embame naima langi,” leami.
Jisasame yanu pyao dokaita lamaiyoo, “Endakali mendeme nyakama minao kyakasetana kandao kalyepape.
Tenge doko endakali longome namba epele lao ipupala, ‘Namba Kataisa dokona,’ lao endakali longo minao kyakasetami.
Yanda andake dupa pitaminopa kii-kau latapi, yanda andake dupa pilyamino lapaepi dupa nyakamame setami. Sepala paka kayatamina paka nakayalapape. Dopale dupa ipupengeaka doko, yuu etenge gii doko dokopa ipatala nayata.
Akali tata mendeme tata mende yanda pimaita, kiŋi mendenya isingi tata mendeme kiŋi mendenya isingi tata mende yanda pimaita pitami. Dee yuu wakale wakale dupanya lopo andake dupa sepa titiwali dupa minata pita.
Dopaka doko, pitamo dutupa pitaka enda wane maita pyalanya tee pingi dopale joo pita.
“Gii dokopa endakali mendapuame nyakama tanda dyuu kenda pisina lao maitami. Dopa pitaminopa dupame nyakama pyao kumasetami. Nyakamame nambanya lao pii lamaitaminosa endakali paliuu pelyamo dupa pitakame nyakama imbu kaengitami.
Gii dokopa endakali longome masoo miningi doko yakinatami. Dupame nyakamalapo yandapipi dupanya kingilyaka mende mai mai pyoo mende imbu kayamai kayamai pitami.
Endakali sambo potopesa longo mendapuame ipupala endakali longo minao kyakasetami.
Mana setapae yalenge mana doko etete andatamosa endakali longo dupanya auu kayamaingi mana doko kupa palita.
Dopaka doko, endakali mendeme kyoto joaka katao baa etatamo doko pyoo nyepae katata.
Dee Kaitinya Katenge dokome isingi dokonya lao Wai Pii Epe doko yuu dupa pitakanya endakali paliuu pelyamo dupa pitakame sina lao lamaitami. Lamaiyoo etapatamino dokopa yuu etenge gii doko ipatana,” lea.
“Losuu anda andake koyasingi aii pyapae doko kandao wamba Goteme potopesa Daniele-kisa lungu petala leamo doko panda etete epe dokonya katatamopa nyakamame kandatami. (Pii dake itaki pyatamo endakali dokome tenge doko masepenge.)
Kandatala dokopa Jutia yuu dokonya katatamino endakali dupa yuu manda dupanya paka pyakao pupenge jeta.
Endakali mende baanya anda patakisa katatamo dokome baanya oapi andakote setamo dupa nyalanya napupenge jeta.
Dee endakali mende eesa katatamo dokome baanya yonge pee ketae pingi doko nyalanya pilyala nayapengeaka jeta.
Enda wane tongatapi enda wane andu nengepi dupa gii dokopa etete kondo pita!
Nyakamame koo kana palitamopapi Sambasa gii mendenyapi paka pyakao napataminopana loma soo kalyepape.
Gii dokopa kenda pipae andake ipatamo dokome yuupi kaitipi tee piamo dokopa pituu indupa tuu lao kenda pipae epeamo dupa pitaka ita minata. Dee kenda pipae dopale mende tenda tendapi etete naipataka.
Goteme yuu gii dupa kaketatona lao masala nayali kandao doko, endakali mendaipi mende nakatatama jipyali. Dopaka doko, baame baanya yapao nyepae endakali dupa lao masetala yuu gii dupa kaketata.
“Gii dokopa endakali mendeme nyakama langyoo, ‘Kataisa doko asa kalyamo kanjepa! Amasa kalyamo kanjepa!’ lea kandeno doko, baame kiningi lelyamona lao nyakamame masala nayalapape.
Doko, sambo kataisapi sambo potopesapi longo dupa ipupala kongalipi kalai paka pipaepi dupa pitami. Dupame Gotenya yapao nyepae endakali dupa kapa pao minao kyakasepenge jipyali kandao doko, kyakasimili.
Kandeleno! Nambame nyakama ene pimopa langitilyo.
“Dopana, endakali mendapuame nyakama langyoo, ‘Baa endakali napalenge yuu dokonya kalyamona,’ leami kandeno doko, nyakama dosa napupape. Dee dupame, ‘Baa asa yalo petae kalyamo kanjepa!’ leami kandeno doko, kiningi lelyaminona lao masala nayalapape.
Doko, niki pyakaengesa-kaita pituu yuu wapaka pilyamo doko pyoo niki landa pingisa-kaitapi yuu pitakanya tii piyoko lenge. Dopaka pyoo Endakalinya Ikiningi doko ipata.
Opale mende kumapae silya mendasa yaka lakepame dupa ipao kambu pingimana,” Jisasame lea.
“Gii dupanya kenda pipae ipatamo dupa etalu petatamopa niki doko iminjoo, kana doko tii napyoo, kaiti-kisa bui katenge dupa kondao isa ipao, kaitinya kuingi dupa ema-ema pyoo pita.
Dokopa Endakalinya Ikiningi doko ipatamo dokonya kongali doko kaiti-kisa pitamopa, yuunya endakali tata dupa pitakame etete ee lao yamataka latami. Dupame Endakalinya Ikiningi doko kaitinya kopa ketae dokonya pupu lao etete tii pyoo ipatamo kandatami.
Beto mende puu lao latamopa baame baanya enjele dupa pena lata. Dupame pupala yuunya lita yangi yangipi dupanya baanya yapao nyepae endakali dupa nyoo elyambu pitami. Kini yuu lita dokonya pituu yuu lita yangi-kaita tuu lao nyoo elyambu pitamina,” lea.
“Nyakamame piki ita dupanya makande doko masalapape. Mange dupa kanga latala yoko ŋaŋa pyakalyilyamo doko kandatala nyakamame aiyuu kana palyanya pilyamona lao masingima.
Dokotekee joo pitamo dutupa pitaka nyakamame kandatala yuu etalanya tengesa petelyamona lao masalapape.
Nambame nyakama kiningi langilyo, endakali indupa palelyamino dupa kumao etapala nayataminopa dutupa pitaka pita.
Yuupi kaitipi dupa kapa pao alu pitamoaka doko, nambanya pii dupa kapa pao alu napitana,” Jisasame lea.
“Endakali mendaipi mendeme yuu etenge gii doko andukupa ipatape, kiloko gii andukunya ipatape lao masala naengema. Enjele kaiti-kisa katenge dupame masala naengema. Ikiningi dokome apata masala naengeaka. Takange dokome iki masingi.
Wamba akali Noa kateamo gii dokopa endakali dupame pyoo kateaminoliaka pyoo katataminopa Endakalinya Ikiningi doko dee ipata.
Wamba endaki andake doko ipatala nayamopa endakali dupame neepi endakipi dupa nao katao, akali dupa enda lanyoo, enda dupa akali pao Noa endakinya paenge sipi dokonya kolandeamo gii dokonya tuu leami-pyaa.
Dupame aipa pitape lao masala nayawaka kateaminopa endaki andake dokome ipupala dokaita pitaka pyao soo pea-pyaana, tenda Endakalinya Ikiningi doko ipatamopa dopaka pita.
Gii dokopa endakali lapoma eenya katatambino dolaponya mende enjele dupame lanyepala mende yakinatami.
Dee enda lapomame palawa wasalanya wiisa dii takyoo indyuu pititambino dolaponya mende dupame lanyepala mende yakinatami.
Dopana, nyakamanya Kamongo doko andukupa ipatape lao masala naelyamino dokonya lenge tao kalyepape.
Nyakamame dake masalapape: akali anda tange dokome pake nenge akali mende kuka dokonya gii ongopa ipapomo lao wambao masetali kandao doko, baa lenge tao katapala baanya anda doko kaluina lao kayala nayatali.
Dopana, Endakalinya Ikiningi doko naipapomo lao masetami gii mendenyaka ipatana, nyakama apata depa latae kalyepape!” lea.
“Lelyamoli pyoo kalai pyakamaingi mona palenge akali kendemane doko apipi? Baa kamongo dokome baanya kendemane waka dupa isoo nee napenge gii dii lao makosoo maiyoo katena lenge kendemane doko daape.
Baame kalai auu pyoaka pyoo katatamopa baanya kamongo doko andaka pilyoo ipatamo kandao doko, baa mona yaepata.
Nambame nyakama kiningi langilyo, kamongo dokome baanya oapi dupa pitaka baanya kendemane dokome isakao katena lata.
Dopaka doko, baa kendemane koo tamo kandao baanya moname, ‘Nambanya kamongo doko yasoo waka ipatana,’ lao masetala, baame baanya kendemane yango dupa pyapapu waene nao kyakao paenge dupa-pipa neepi waenepi awapa nao katata.
<range>
Dopa pyoo katao baanya kamongo doko naipapomo lao masoo ambe lao katatamo gii dokopaka ipata.
Ipupala kamongo dokome baa pyao etete indyepala minakasingi endakali dupa-pipa awapa katena lao katata. Dopa petatamopa baa dokonya katao ee lao yamataka lao nenge gilyoo katatana,” Jisasame dopa lea.
“Endakalinya Ikiningi doko dee ipatamopa Kaitinya Katenge dokome isetamo doko, enda mapuakae kingi ita mende peteamino dupame akali enda kelyapala ipatamo doko kandanyemana latala, nyakamanya lama dupa kaiyoo minao peamino dopale jeta.
Enda dupanya yuungi masala naenge. Dee yuungi masepae.
Enda masala naenge dutupame nyakamanya lama minao pao pituu olipi ipange kamuoo namandeami-pyaa.
Dopaka doko, enda masepae dutupame nyakamanya lama dupa minao penge dupanya olipi ipange kamuoo mandyuu peami-pyaa.
Pupala akali doko enda kelyapala yapa naepeamosa, enda dokaita pitaka lemongati kayapala paleami-pyaa.
“Dokopa kuka andatombe dokonya wii mende epeamo dokome, ‘Akali enda kelyalamo doko olo epelyamona, nyakamame kandanyalapale pupa!’ lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa enda mapuakae dutupa pitaka sakatatala nyakamanya lama dupa depa leami-pyaa.
Dokopa enda masala naenge dutupame enda masepae dutupa lamaiyoo, ‘Naimanya lama datupa konjalanya pilyamona nyakamanya olipi ipange dupanya mendatupa naima dyepa,’ leami-pyaa.
Dopa leaminoaka doko, enda masepae dutupame dolotupanya pii yanu pyakamaiyoo lao pituu, ‘Olipi ipange atupame naimapi nyakamapi pitaka kapa napyapome lamona, sisoa andaka pupala nyakamanya waka sambatamino doko kapana,’ leami-pyaa.
Dopa leaminopa dokaitame sisoa andaka sambala pateaminopa enda keleamo akali doko epea-pyaa. Epeamopa enda depa latae peteamino dutupa baa-pipa enda watapae dokonya nee nalanya andaka kolandateaminopa kaitini pai lea-pyaa.
“Maitakao enda mapuakae mendatupa dutupame ipupala lao pituu, ‘Akali Andake! Akali Andake! Naima ipumana kaitini lumba!’ leami-pyaa.
Dopa leaminoaka doko, baame dokaitanya pii yanu pyao, ‘Nambame nayakama etete masala naelyona,’ lea-pyaa.
Dopa lea-pyaana, nyakamame yuu giipi kilokopi andukunya ipatape lao masala naelyaminona, lenge tao kalyepape,” Jisasame lea.
“Kaitinya Katenge dokome isetamo doko, akali mende baa yuu tependa mendakaita katama paanya pituu baame baanya kendemane dupa epena latala baanya oapi dupa pitaka isekena lao maiyamo dopale jeta.
Baame baanya kendemane dupa kandakondape petala, dupanya kalai pipenge jiamoli pyoo dupa mendai mendai lao muni mokosoo maiya-pyaa. Mende muni kina taosene yuungi maitala, mende taosene lapoma maitala, dee mende taosene mendai maiya-pyaa. Dopa petala baa paanya piamo dokonya pea-pyaa.
Pateamo dokopa muni taosene yuungi nyiamo akali dokome pupae lao pao muni dutupame pisinisa kalai petala dee taosene yuungiaka konda pyoo nyia-pyaa.
Mendai dopaka pyoo muni taosene lapoma nyiamo akali dokome pisinisa kalai petala taosene lapomaka konda pyoo nyia-pyaa.
Dopaka doko, muni taosene mendai nyiamo akali dokome pao yuli tombapala baanya kamongo dokonya muni dutupa yuli pia-pyaa.
“Yuu longo pateamopa, maitakao kendemane dokaitanya kamongo doko dee pilyoo ipupala, muni maiyamo dokonya dutupa-pipa pii lao wasalanya pia-pyaa.
Dopa piamopa muni taosene yuungi nyiamo akali dokome taosene yuungi dee konda pyoo minao ipupala lao pituu, ‘Akali Andake, embame namba muni taosene yuungi diino doko, nambame taosene yuungiaka potopesa nyiona, kanda,’ lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa baanya kamongo dokome baa lamaiyoo, ‘Kalai yaka pyekee lamo! Emba kendemane epe dokome auu pii lamo. Embame kalai kuki dutupa nambame leoli pyoo auu pyoo isii lamo dokonya nambame emba longo dupa isoo kata latoo. Embapa nambapa mona yaepao katambana ipu,’ lea-pyaa.
“Dokopa akali muni taosene lapoma nyiamo dokome apata ipupala lao pituu, ‘Akali Andake, embame namba muni taosene lapoma diino doko, nambame taosene lapomaka potopesa nyiona, kanda,’ lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa baanya kamongo dokome baa lamaiyoo, ‘Kalai yaka pyekee lamo! Emba kendemane epe dokome auu pii lamo. Embame kalai kuki dutupa nambame leoli pyoo auu pyoo isii lamo dokonya nambame emba longo dupa isoo kata latoo. Embapa nambapa mona yaepao katambana ipu,’ lea-pyaa.
“Dokopa muni taosene mendai nyiamo akali dokome apata ipupala lao pituu, ‘Akali Andake, emba akali tomba neleno nambame kandenge. Embame eenya waingi pokala naeleno dupanya yukuoo nao, dee waingi lyandala naeleno dupanya mandyuu nao pingi kandapi.
Dopa pingi dokonya nambame paka kayapala embanya muni dutupa pao yuli piona, embanya muni datupa ae silyamo, kanda,’ lea-pyaa.
“Dopa leamopa baanya kamongo dokome baa lamaiyoo, ‘Emba akali koo maka kayapae lamo! Nambame eenya waingi pokala naelyo dupanya yukuoo nao, waingi lyandala naelyo dupanya mandyuu nelyopi dupa embame kandenge lumu doko, nambanya muni dupa potopesa mandenge beŋe mendenya pyasekeeli kandao doko, namba dee pilyoo ipupala nambanya muni dutupa-pipa potopesa mendatupa apata nyipuli.
<range>
Dopana, nyakamame muni taosene mendai doko yukuoo nyepala taosene kingi ita mendai minilyamo akali doko maiyepa.
Doko aipuma? Opale singi endakali dupa pitaka nambame mendatupa apata konda pyoo maitopa dupa-kisa longo seta. Dopaka doko, opale nasingi endakali doko-kisa setamo dolapo nyokonyoto.
Dopana, nyakamame kendemane koo dake yuu etete iminjetae koo dokonya soo pyale laapa! Dokonya katao baa ee lao yamataka lao nenge gilyoo katatana,’ kamongo dokome dopa lea-pyaana,” Jisasame lea.
“Tenda Endakalinya Ikiningi doko baanya tii pipae dokonya tambetambe enjele dupa pitaka-pipa awapa ipupala, baa etete kamongao kiŋi petenge toko dokonya pitita.
Pititamo dokonya endakali paliuu pelyamo dupa pitaka baanya enombasa nyoo limbatami. Dopa pitaminopa mena sipisipi setao katenge akali mendeme sipisipipi memepi wakale mokosingili pyoo baame endakali dupa mokoseta.
Mokosoo pituu baame mena sipisipi jepae dupa baanya kingi tolae-kaita katena latala meme jepae dupa kingi koya-kaita katena lata.
“Dokopa kiŋi dokome kingi tolae-kaita katatamino dupa lamaiyoo lao pituu, ‘Nyakama nambanya Takangeme auu piseteana ipupa! Yuupi kaitipi tee piamo dokopa baame isingi panda doko nyakamanyana lao depa lanya setekeamo dokona nyala ipupa.
Wamba namba lopo kayopa nyakamame nee diami. Endaki nanu kayopa kamuoo diami. Opone joo epeopa lanyiami.
Yambale napyoo kateopa diami. Yaina siopa kanja epeami. Anjetae paleopa kanja epeamiakana,’ kiŋi dokome dopa lata.
Dopa latamopa endakali tolatae dupame yanu pyao: ‘Akali Andake, naimame andukupa emba lopo kayenopa kandatala nee diamape? Andukupa endaki nanu kayenopa kamuoo diamape?
Andukupa opone joo epeenopa kandatala lanyiamape? Andukupa yambale napyoo kateenopa diamape?
Andukupa naimame emba yaina siinopapi anjetae paleenopapi kandatala kanja epeamape?’ latami.
Dopa lataminopa kiŋi dokome dokaita lamaiyoo dapa lata: ‘Nambame nyakama kiningi langilyona, nambanya kaiminingi datupanya koo mende nisiamino dokome, namba nisiamiakana,’ lata.
“Dopa latala baame kingi koya-kaita katatamino dupa lamaiyoo lao pituu, ‘Nyakama watao pyataena namba yakinatala pupa! Goteme Satanepi Satanenya enjele koopi dupanya lao itate konjala naenge setakamaiyamo dokonya nyakama pupa!
Wamba namba lopo kayopa nyakamame nee nandiami. Endaki nanu kayopa kamuoo nandiami.
Opone joo epeopa lanyala nayami. Yambale napyoo kateopa nandiami. Yaina siopapi anjetae paleopapi kanja naepeamina,’ lata.
Dopa latamopa dokaitame apata yanu pyao, ‘Akali Andake, andukupa naimame emba lopo kayenopapi, endaki nanu kayenopapi, opone joo epeenopapi, yambale napyoo kateenopapi, yaina siinopapi, anjetae paleenopapi kandatala nisala nayamape?’ latami.
Dopa lataminopa kiŋi dokome dokaita lamaiyoo, ‘Nambame nyakama kiningi langilyona, nyakamame endakali datupanya koo mende nisala nayamino dokome, namba nisala nayamiakana,’ lata.
Dopa latala Goteme endakali dokaita yanu nyetamopa tanda nao etete katatami. Dopaka doko, endakali tolatae dupa lete etete katatamina,” Jisasame dopa lea.
Jisasame pii manapi dokaita pitaka lamaiyoo etapala, baanya disaipele dupa lamaiyoo, “Koto lapoma sepatamopa Napinya Kayamo Gii ipata doko nyakamame masilyamino. Dokopa endakali mendapuame Endakalinya Ikiningi doko ita pokonya pyao yukuina lao akali mendeme dokaitanya kingilyaka maitana,” lea.
<range>
Gii undinaka pitisa mupapi Jutamanya isingi akalipi dupa, pitisa mupa Kayapasa lenge dokonya andaka kambu piami-pyaa.
Dopa petala dokaitame waa katao Jisasa anjetala pyao kumasemana lao kambuiyami-pyaa.
Dopa piaminoaka doko, dee dupame lao pituu, “Aopyoo latala endakali dupame pyao pilya pyana pitamina, gii epe dokonya dopa napimanalena,” leami-pyaa.
Jisasa baa yuu taono Betani dokonya akali kopetali Saimone lenge dokonya andaka petea.
Dokopa enda mendeme wele penge yakane mendenya wele tunduma pipaeme tumbatae muni longome sambenge mende minao Jisasa peteasa epea. Dopa petala baame wele doko aiyombanya kai lao kai pyakamaiya.
Dopa piamo doko disaipele dupame kandatala imbu kayao, “Aipuma wele dake mee maa yangelya kanjemape!
Wele dake endakalimi sambapiminopa yole andake nyepala endakali tipya dupa maipenge jipyalina,” leami.
Dopa leamino doko Jisasame sepala dokaita lamaiyoo, “Aipuma nyakamame enda dake kenda pisilyamipi? Baame namba-kisa kalai epe wakane mende pyakalamo.
Endakali tipya dupa koteaka lao nyakama-pipa katengemaka doko, namba nyakama-pipa koteaka lao nakatatama.
Enda dakeme wele dake nambanya yongenya kai lao kai pyakalamo dokome namba malu pina lao depa lalamo.
Nambame nyakama kiningi langilyona, Wai Pii Epe doko yuu dupa pitakanya lamaitaminoli pyoo, endakali dupame enda dake masina lao baame pyomo doko lao tayatamiakana,” Jisasame lea.
Gii dokopa disaipele kingi ita mende-kisa dee lapoma dupanya mende Jutasa Isaketiote lenge doko pitisa mupa dupa kateamisa pupala baame dokaita pisoo, “Nambame Jisasa nyakama laitaka pitoo nyakamame namba aki mende ditamipi?” lea-pyaa. Dokopa dokaitame baa muni silipa kingi ita tepoma maiyami-pyaa.
<range>
Gii dokopa tee pyao baame Jisasa dokaita laitaka pyaanya kaitini mende kutao katea-pyaa.
Betesanya iisa napalyoo nenge gii mupa dokonya disaipele dupame Jisasa kateasa ipupala baa lamaiyoo, “Napinya Kayamo Nee doko emba natale andusa naimame depa lakamili lao masilipi?” leami.
Dopa leaminopa baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame yuu taono Jetusaleme dokonya pupala akali mende kanjaminona doko dapa lamaiyepape: ‘Mana Lenge Akali dokome, “Nambanya gii doko tengesa petelyamona,” laamo. “Napinya Kayamo Nee doko nambame nambanya disaipele dupa-pipa embanya andaka natoo,” laamona,’ lao lamaiyepape,” lea.
Dokopa disaipele dupame Jisasame leamoli petala Napinya Kayamo Nee doko depa leami.
Yuu kualanya piamopa Jisasa baa disaipele kingi ita-kisa dee lapoma dutupa-pipa nee nao peteami.
Nao pituu baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakamanya mendeme namba enge nyipimina yandapipi dupa laitaka pyaaminona lao nyakama kiningi langilyona,” lea.
Dopa leamopa dokaitame mona etete kenda kayapala mendai mendai lawame baa pisoo, “Kamongo, embame leeno doko, namba kandao leepe?” laa laa peami.
Dopa leaminopa Jisasame yanu pyao, “Nambapa disanya nee poyao nyilyambano akali dokome namba yandapipi dupa laitaka pyaapomo.
Kini, Endakalinya Ikiningi dokonya lao Gotenya pii pepa pyapae singi dokonya lapae silyamoli pyoo, baa kumalapomo. Dopaka doko, Endakalinya Ikiningi doko enge nyilyamo akali doko koyata iki lamo! Akali doko endangimi manja nayali kandao baa yaka jipyalina,” lea.
Dopa leamopa baa enge nyiamo akali Jutasa dokome yanu pyao, “Mana Lenge Akali, embame leeno doko, nambame lao leepe?” lea. Dopa leamopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Emba tangeme latelenona,” lea.
Dupa-pipa nee nao pituu Jisasame betesa mende nyepala Gote lao yaka pilino latala konjia. Konjepala baanya disaipele dupa maiyoo pituu, “Dake nambanya yonge dokona, nyoo nalapa,” lea.
Dee baame kapo penge mende nyepala yaka pilino latala dokaita maiyoo pituu, “Nyakama pitakame nyoo nalapa.
Dake nambanya taiyoko dokona, koo dupa kunanya nepakalanya kai lekelyo dokome endakali dupa pitakanya Goteme pii lao seteamo doko angi injisilyamo.
Dee nambame nyakama langilyona, indupa pituu nambame getepe ipange dake nala nayawaka katao tenda nambanya Takangeme isingi dokonya, nyakama-pipa awapa getepe ipange enenge doko natamano gii dokonya tuu latona,” Jisasame lea.
Dopa lateamopa dokaitame wee mende latao pituu kamanda pyakalyetala Olipimanda dokonya peami.
Dokopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Indupa kuka gii dakepa nyakama pitakame namba yakinatala lombapae salamino. Doko, Gotenya pii pepa pyapae singi dokonya, ‘Sipisipi setao katenge doko nambame pyatopa, sipisipi ambo doko polao wakale puu puu pyoo patamina,’ lapae silyamo.
Dopaka doko, Goteme namba dee sakatasetatamopa nyakama nyoo maita pyatala Galili yuu dokonya wambatona,” lea.
Dokopa Pitame Jisasa lamaiyoo, “Yangi dupa pitakame emba yakinatala lombapae setamino kandao, nambame dopa napyaapo etete daana,” lea.
Dopa leamopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Nambame emba kiningi langilyona, indupa kuka gii dakenya yaka pauli pii ene laanya pitamopa, paa tepomasa embame namba nakandengena laapenona,” lea.
Dee Pitame yanu pyao, “Namba embapa awapa kumatambano doko kapakana, nambame emba nakandengena etete laa nayalapona,” lea. Dopa leamopa disaipele dupa pitakame dopaka leami.
Dokopa Jisasa baanya disaipele dupa-pipa yuu Gesemani lenge dokonya peami. Pupala baame dupa lamaiyoo, “Namba omosa loma sala pelyona nyakama asa pilyepa,” lea.
Dopa latala baame Pitapi Sepete ikiningi dolapopi laminao pea. Pupala baa mona etete kenda kayapala dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nambanya mona doko etete kenda petala kumapenge julumuna, nyakama asa kandao katamana kalyepape!” lea-pyaa.
<range>
Dopa latala baa kuki umbisale pao yuunya tombauli sepala loma soo pituu, “Nambanya Takange, embame namba-kisa kenda pipae silyamo dake nyoo nepakapenge jia kandeno doko, nyoo nepakape! Dopaka doko, nambame masilyoli napinya, embame masetenoli pipi,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa lao loma setala ipao disaipele tepoma dutupa kandeamopa luu palyasiamisa baame Pita lamaiyoo, “Anematupa, aipa petala gii kuki iki dutupanya nyakamame namba-pipa kapa pao kandao isoo nakatalamipi?
Makande pingi dupanya nyakama pao koyatamane lao kandao isoo loma soo kalyepape. Moname pyuani kaelyamoaka doko, yongeme papa tambuingina,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa latala Jisasame dee paa lapo pyoo pao loma soo pituu, “Nambanya Takange, nambame kenda pipae dake kayala nayao nyepengeaka jia kandeno doko, embame masetenoli pipi,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa latala dee ipao disaipele dutupa kandeamopa lemongati kayapala luu paliuu kateami-pyaa.
Jisasame dutupa yakinatala dee paa tepo pyoo loma sala pupala pii wamba leamo dutupaka lao loma sia-pyaa.
Loma setala baame ipao disaipele dutupa lamaiyoo, “Nyakama mee luaka paliuu koto nyilyamipi? Kandeleno! Gii doko ipatelyamo. Akali mendeme Endakalinya Ikiningi doko koo pingi endakali dupa laitaka pyaapomona, mona nyakama sakatalapa. Namba enge nyipumu akali doko ipatelyamona, kanjepa!” lea-pyaa.
<range>
Jisasame dopa lao kateamopaka baanya disaipele kingi ita-kisa dee lapoma dutupanya mende Jutasa lenge doko epea. Baa-pipa awapa endakali kambu andake mendeme konjuapi kolyepepi dupa minao, pitisa mupapi Jutamanya isingi akalipi dupame pena leaminopa epeami.
Jisasa enge nyiamo akali dokome endakali kambu doko wambao lamaiyoo, “Nambame akali mende nunu pio kondeno doko, baana, nyakamame minalapape!” lea-pyaa.
Dopa lamaitala ipao baa Jisasa kateasa tolao pupala, “Mana Lenge Akali, emba asa katalepe?” latala baa nunu pia.
Dopa piamopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Kaimia, embame angi pyaanya ipate doko yapa pii!” lea. Dokopa dokaitame ipao baa minatala anjiami.
Dopa piaminopa Jisasa-pipa awapa kateamino dupanya mendeme baanya konjua doko kolanyetala, pitisa mupa dokonya kendemane mendenya kale doko taka lanya nepea.
Dopa piamopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Embanya konjua doko palenge andanda dokonya mandi! Konjua minao yanda pingi dupa pitaka, konjuameaka kumingi.
Nambame nambanya Takangeme namba nisina lao wii lapupa baame gii dokopaka enjele tata kingi ita-kisa dee lapoma ita minao etete longo epena lapyalina lao embame masala naelepe?
Dopaka doko, nambame dopa pipuli kandao, Gotenya pii pepa pyapae singi dokonya dopaka pitana lapae silyamo doko aipa petala angi jipyalipi?” Jisasame lea.
Dopa latala dokopa baame endakali kambu doko lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame akali pake nao makongao paenge mende anjala epele lao konjuapi kolyepepi dupa minao namba anjala epelyamipi? Nambame koteaka lao losuu anda andake dokonya endakali dupa mana lamaiyoo kateo dokopa nyakamame namba anjala nayami.
Dopaka doko, potopesa dupame pii pepa piami dupa angi jina lao dutupa pitaka pilyamona,” lea. Dokopa disaipele dupa pitakame Jisasa yakinatala paka peami.
Jisasa anjiamino akali dupame baa laminao pitisa mupa Kayapasa kateasa peaminopa, mana setapae masingi akalipi isingi akalipi dupa ipao dokonya kambu piami-pyaa.
Dokopa Pitame Jisasa watao tependale joo pea-pyaa. Pupala pitisa mupa dokonya anda kamapisa kolamatala aipa pilyamipi lao kandatoo latala lome kambu isoo katenge dupa-pipa petea-pyaa.
Pitisa mupapi kanjole dupa pitakapimi Jisasa pyao kumasemana latala akali mendapuame baa-kisa sambo pii setao kosimi lena lao kutiami-pyaa.
Dokopa akali longo ipupala Jisasa-kisa sambo pii setao kosimi leami-pyaa. Dopa piaminopaka doko, baa pyao kumasepenge tenge mende kandao nanyiami-pyaa. Dee ete pyoo akali lapoma ipupala lao pituu, “Akali dakeme dapa lea: ‘Gotenya losuu anda andake doko kapa pao lakyepala, yuu gii tepoma pito,’ leana,” leambi-pyaa.
<range>
Dokopa pitisa mupa dokome toya katapala Jisasa lamaiyoo, “Pii emba kandao lelyambino dake embame yanu napilino doko, aipa pyoo lelyambipi?” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamoaka doko, Jisasa ema napia-pyaa. Dokopa pitisa mupa dokome dee baa lamaiyoo, “Nambame emba pii mende pisilyona embame Gote lete katenge doko lao masetala angi langipi. Emba Gote Ikiningi, Kataisa dokope?” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Embame lateleno. Dopaka doko, nambame nyakama dapa langilyo: indupa pituu tenda tuu lao Endakalinya Ikiningi doko Gote etete pupu lapae dokonya kingi tolae dokonya katao kaitinya kopa ketae dokonya ipatamo nyakamame kandatamina,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamosa pitisa mupa dokome baa tangenya yonge pee dupa minao lapyepala lao pituu, “Baame Gote kilya kandao lelyamo. Aipuma naimame endakali mendapuanya pii deaka nyetamape? Epapu baame Gote kilya kandao pii lelyamo doko nyakamame sepelyamino!
Sepala nyakamame aipa lao masilyamipi?” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa dupame baanya pii yanu pyakamaiyoo, “Pyao kumasepenge julumuna,” leami-pyaa.
Dopa latala dupame baanya lengelyaapinya sopakalimi pyapala kii momangame piami-pyaa. Dee mendapuame baa pyao pituu, “Kataisa, akali dokome pilyamo lao embame laa!” leami-pyaa.
<range>
Pita anda kamapisa peteamopa pitisa mupa dokonya kalai pyakamaiyoo petenge enda dupanya mendeme baa peteamo dosa ipupala lao pituu, “Emba apata akali Galili tange Jisasa dokopa awapa katengembana,” lea-pyaa.
Dopaka doko, Pitame endakali dupa pitakanya enombasa tanga lao lao pituu, “Embame leeno doko namba nakandengena,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa latala baa pao lome kambu dosa peteamopa dee kalai pingi enda waka mendeme kandatala endakali dosa kateami dupa lamaiyoo, “Baa Nasatete tange Jisasa dokopa awapa katengembana,” lea-pyaa.
Dokopa Pitame deaka tanga lao, “Namba akali doko etete nakandenge mauwana,” lea-pyaa.
Dee kuki maitakawale akali dosa kateami dupame ipupala Pita kandao, “Embanya pii dokome panalumuna, kiningi etete emba akali dupanya mendeaka lamona,” leami-pyaa.
Dopa lateaminopa Pitame lao pituu, “Namba akali doko nakandenge mauwana, sambo lato kandao doko, Goteme namba pinana,” lea-pyaa. Dopa lalu piamopa yaka pauli pii mende lea-pyaa.
Wamba Jisasame Pita kandao, “Yaka pauli pii ene laanya pitamopa embame paa tepomasa namba nakandengena laapeno,” leamo doko Pitame masia-pyaa. Masetala kamaka pao ee lao yamataka lea-pyaa.
Dokopa pitisa mupa dupapi Jutamanya isingi akali dupapi dupa pitakame Jisasa pyao kumasepenge dokonya lao yongama wamba kambuiyami-pyaa.
Dopa petala dupame Jisasa kendeme anjetala anjoo soo pao kapomane andake Pailate maiyami-pyaa.
Jisasa enge nyiamo akali Jutasa dokome kandeamopa dupame baa pyao kumasemana leaminosa, baa mona kenda kayapala muni silipa kingi ita tepoma nyiamo dutupa pitisa mupapi Jutamanya isingi akalipi dupa kateamisa yukuoo minakamaiyoo pea-pyaa.
Dopa petala baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Akali mana koopi naminingi mende nambame koo pyoo enge nyio dokonya baa kumata lamona,” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamoaka doko, dokaitame lao pituu, “Doko naimanya kalaipi? Daa, embanya kalaina,” leami-pyaa.
Dokopa baame muni dutupa losuu anda andake dokonya kainanya pyale latala pea-pyaa. Pupala baame baa tange kende katatala yukuotae katea-pyaa.
Pitisa mupa dupame muni dutupa yapao nyepala lao pituu, “Endakali pyao kumasalanya muni datupame enge nyepae dokonya, losuu anda andakenya muni singi dokonya setala nayapengena,” leami-pyaa.
Dokonya dupame pii wasoo latala, endakali waka kumatami dupa malu pipengena lao, akali titopene penge akipi yuumi wasingi dokonya yuu doko muni dutupame sambeami-pyaa.
Tenge dokonya endakali dupame yuu doko kandao kenge Taiyokopausa leami doko indupa mee lelyaminoaka.
Dopa piamino dokome pii mende wamba Goteme potopesa Jetamaya lungu piamopa baame dapa leamo doko etete angi jia-pyaa: “Isataele endakali dupame pii lao wasetala muni silipa kingi ita tepoma baapa kapana lateamino muni dutupa nyepala, Kamongo dokome namba langiamoli pyoo titopene akipi wasingi akali dokonya yuu doko sambeamina,” lea-pyaa.
<range>
Jisasa baa kapomane andake dokonya enombasa kateamopa kapomane andake dokome baa pisoo, “Emba Jutamanya kiŋi dokope?” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa Jisasame yanu pyao, “Embame latelenona,” lea-pyaa.
Dokopa pitisa mupapi Jutamanya isingi akalipi dupame baa-kisa tenge seteaminopa, baame yanu pyao mende nalea-pyaa.
Dopa piamopa Pailateme baa lamaiyoo, “Emba-kisa tenge longo setao pii lelyamino dupa embame nasilipi?” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa Jisasame pii leamino dupanya mendaipi mende yanu pyao baa lamaiya naya-pyaa. Dopa piamopa kapomane andake doko etete mona andea-pyaa.
Ee kana dii lao Napinya Kayamo Gii epe doko epelyali pyoo, kapomane andake dokome endakali anjetae palelyami dupanya mendai mende endakali dupame mokekena lelyamili pyoo mokata pyakamaingi-pyaa.
Dee akali Batapasa lenge mendeme pundu nyilyamosa kenge singi mende anjiami doko gii dokopa anjetae palea-pyaa.
Dokonya endakali dupa ipao kambu pyateaminopa Pailateme dokaita pisoo, “Nambame nyakamanya api mokakapili lao masilyamipi? Batapasa dokope, pande Kataisa lengema Jisasa dokope?” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamo doko, dupame Jisasa tilya maitala baa maiyamino doko masetala dopa lea-pyaa.
Pailate baa kosa lao petenge toko dokonya peteamopa, baanya etanengeme, “Embame akali tolatae doko mende napipi. Nambame kuka kombeame baa kandao neame kumalona,” lanya pea-pyaa.
Dopaka doko, pitisa mupapi isingi akalipi dupame endakali kambu piamino dupa lamaiyoo, “Batapasa mokatala Jisasa pyao kumasina Pailate lamaiyepa,” lao lungu piami-pyaa.
Dopa piaminopa kapomane andake dokome dokaita pisoo, “Nambame akali lapoma dolaponya anduku nyakamanya mokakapili lao masilyamipi?” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa dokaitame yanu pyao, “Batapasana,” leami-pyaa.
Dokopa Pailateme lao pituu, “Dopa tamo doko, nambame Kataisa lengema Jisasa doko aipa pyuape?” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa dokaita pitakame lao pituu, “Ita pokonya pyao yuka!” leami-pyaa.
Dopa leaminoaka doko, baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Baame koo aki mende piape?” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa dokaitame eteteaka puu lao lao, “Baa pyao yuka!” leami-pyaa.
Dokopa Pailateme dokaitanya pii doko nyoo isa palyala nayatopa pyao pyaamini lamo lao kandatala, endaki mendalapo nyoo endakali dupanya enombasa baanya kingi kaimbu pyao pituu, “Akali dake taiyoko nyilyamino dokonya tenge doko namba-kisa nasilyamo. Doko nyakamanya kalaina,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa endakali dupa pitakame yanu pyao, “Dokonya tenge doko naimapi naimanya wane dupa-kisa sinana!” leami-pyaa.
Dokopa Pailateme Batapasa doko mokatakamaitala, Jisasa konjamepyapala pyao yukuina lao yanda singi dupa maiya-pyaa.
Dokopa kapomane andake dokonya yanda singi dupame Jisasa laminao kapomane andake petenge anda dokonya kolandatala, yanda singi tata doko pitaka epena latala Jisasa kateasa kambu piami-pyaa.
Dopa petala dupame baanya yonge pee pingi dupa lyokao nyepala kate pyapaele ketae pingi mendeme baa yapu neami-pyaa.
Dee dupame ikililyambu mendapua nyoo langapu pipala Jisasanya aiyombanya petakamaitala, kyoo konja mende baanya kingi tolae-kaita minasakamaiyami-pyaa. Dopa petala dupame baa kandao minakasoo luma lakao lamba lao lao pituu, “Jutamanya Kiŋi, emba auu pyoo katape!” leami-pyaa.
Dee dupame baa sopakalimi pyapa kyoo konja doko nyepala baanya aiyombanya pyapa piami-pyaa.
Dupame baa minakasoo etapala dokopa yonge pee wamba pyakamaiyamino doko lyokao nyepala, baanya dupa tange petakamaitala baa pyao yukualanya laminao peami-pyaa.
Paon kamalyatena pyakamatala akali Saitini tange Saimone lenge mende kandanyetala yanda singi dupame Jisasanya ita poko doko sakamaina leami.
Dokopa dupame yuu Golokota lenge dokonya pao pyakameami. Kenge Golokota dokonya tenge doko Matenakulimanda lengema.
Yuu Golokota dokonya pyakamatala yanda singi dupame matasini etete kaa pipae mendapuame pyasilya pyasena petala waene mende baa maiyaminopa nakande setala kaya.
Dokopa yanda singi dupame baa ita pokonya pyao yukuotala, kana yakane dupa pyasoo male pyooita miniamino akali dupame Jisasanya yonge pee dupa mokosoo nyiami.
Dopa petala dupame Jisasa isoo dosa peteami.
Jisasa-kisa tenge seteami pepa pyapae doko baanya aiyomba sia ketae dosa yukuiyami. Pepa dokonya, “Dake Jisasa, Jutamanya Kiŋi dokona,” latae katea.
Dokopa pake nao makongao paenge akali lapoma Jisasa-pipa awapa pyao yukuiyami. Mende doko baanya kingi tolae-kaita, mende doko koya-kaita yukuiyami.
Jisasa pyao yukuotae kateamo dokonya-kaita endakali payamino dupame Jisasa kilya kandao aiyomba ema-ema pyoo dapa leami: “‘Losuu anda andake doko lakyepala yuu gii tepoma pitona,’ leeno akali dake! Emba Gotenya Ikiningi tamo kandao doko, emba tangeme pupu latala ita poko doko yakinatala isa ipu!” leami.
<range>
Mendai dopaka pyoo, pitisa mupapi, mana setapae masingi akalipi, Jutamanya isingi akalipi dupame Jisasa kandao dapa lao lamba leamiaka: “Baame endakali waka dupa nisiamoaka doko, baa tange kapa pao nisala naelyamo. Kini, baa naima Isataele dupanya Kiŋi tamo kandao doko, naimame baa lao masoo minamana, epapu ita poko doko yakinatala isa epena.
<range>
Baame Gote masokondape pingi daape. Dee baame baa Gotenya Ikiningina lenge. Dopana, Goteme baa auu kayatamo kandao doko, epapu baa pyoo nyinana,” leami.
Akali pake nao makongao paenge baa-pipa awapa pyao yukuotae kateamino dolapome apata mendai dopaka pyoo baa kandao pii koo leambi.
Kotaka andawai pungupungu dokonya pituu, yuu doko pitaka kuiyatala kuiyatayaka katao pao alemandi kiloko tepo lea.
Kiloko tepopi mendenya Jisasame etete puu lao lao, “Eli, Eli, lema sapakatani!” lea. Dopa leamo doko kapilyoo, “Nambanya Gote, nambanya Gote, embame namba aipuma yakinelepe?” lea.
Dopa leamo doko endakali dosa kateamino dupanya mendapuame sepala lao pituu, “Ilainja lao wii lelyamona,” leami.
Dopa latala dupanya mendeme alo pyao pao koma jepaemende waene kaa pipae mendenya poyatala itakali mendenya tuku petala Jisasa nena lao makapusakamaiya.
Dopaka doko, yangi dupame lao pituu, “Ilainjame baa pyoo nyala epelyape lao kandamana maliseta!” leami.
Dokopa Jisasame deaka etete puu lao ae latala kumia.
Dokopa losuu anda andake dokonya lapalapa pyatu doko ketae ulusa pituu kanguoo yuunya tuu latala lapo pyoloo pia-pyaa. Dee yuu doko titiwali minao, kana yale dupa longapae buu minao, endakali malu dupanya kaitini dupa lumbao, Gotenya endakali isa palipiami dupanya longo mendapua sakatasoo pia-pyaa.
<range>
Dupame nyakamanya malu dupa yakinatala, maitakao Jisasa sakateamo dokopa yuu taono etete epe Jetusaleme dokonya peaminopa endakali longo dupame kandeami.
Yanda singi amii isingi dokopi baa-pipa awapa Jisasa isoo kateamino dupapimi titiwali miniapi piamo dupa pitakapi kandao etete pakame kumapala lao pituu, “Kiningi etete akali dake Gote Ikiningi lamona,” leami.
Enda longo mendapua Galili pituu Jisasa nisoo awapa epeamino dupame kuki tependale pituu dokonya piamo dupa kandatae peteami.
Enda peteamino dupanya mendatupa Matia Makatala tange dokopi, Jemesa Josepepanya endangi Matia dokopi, Sepete ikiningi dolaponya endangi dokopi dutupa dokonya peteami.
Yuu alemanjeteamopa akali Atimatia tange kamongo Josepe lenge mende epea. Baa Jisasanya disaipele joo katengeaka.
Akali dokome Pailate peteasa pupala Jisasa dina lao tee lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa yanda singi dupame kondao nyoo maina lea-pyaa.
Dokopa Josepeme Jisasa nyoo lapalapa kyoto epe mendeme ambo pyapala malu pipenge kananda enenge mende baanya tumbinya setea dokonya setea-pyaa. Setapala kana andake mende kapilya mina-mina pyoo minao pao malu kambu doko piti petala baa pea-pyaa.
<range>
Dopa piamo dosa enda Matia Makatala tange dokopa dee Matia lenge waka mende dokopame kandamatae peteambi-pyaa.
Sambasanya opale depa lenge kalai yuungi doko pateamopa taita dopa pyoo pitisa mupapi Patasipi dupame Pailate peteasa ipao kambu pyatala lao pituu, “Akali Andake, pii mende sambo lenge akali dokome mee katao pituu, ‘Koto teponya namba dee sakatatona,’ lea doko naimame masilyamano.
<range>
Dopa leana aopyoo latala baanya disaipele dupame pao baa nyoo yalo petala endakali dupa lamaiyoo, ‘Baa sakatapyana,’ latamina, malu doko isokondape pyoo isoo katao koto tepo dokonya tuu lena lape. Dopa pitamino kandao doko, wamba sambo leamo doko maitakao sambo dokome ita minatana,” leami-pyaa.
Dopa leaminopa Pailateme dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame yanda singi mendatupa nyoo pupala malu doko pyokondape pyoo petae katena lao pipenge jetali pyoo pyepape,” lea-pyaa.
Dokopa dupame pupala malu doko pingili petae katelyape lao kandapengena latala, kongali pyoo wakaiya kateami-pyaa. Dopa petala yanda singi dupame isokondape pyoo katena leami-pyaa.
Sambasa gii doko pateamopa Sandeenya yongama niki pyakayalanya pia-kaita Matia Makatala tange dokopa Matia mende dokopa dolapome malu doko kanja peambi-pyaa.
Peambinopa, pupae lao titiwali andake mende miniamopa Gotenya enjele mende kaitinya katao isa ipupala pao kana doko kapilya mina-mina pyoo nyoo kapya latala dokonya ketae petea-pyaa.
Baanya lengelyaapi doko polepole pyoo, yonge pee doko kyoo lao pakenana timbokopaele jia-pyaa.
Dopa piamopa malu isetae kateamino dupa pakame kumao etete walu latala kumapae jiami-pyaa.
Dokopa enjele dokome enda dolapo lamaiyoo, “Nyalambo paka nakayalapape. Nyalambome Jisasa ita pokonya pyao yukuiyamino doko kutilyambino lao nambame masilyo.
Baa angenya nasilyamo. Wamba baame leamoli pyoo sakatatalamona baa seteamino dakenya kanja ipupa.
Kandatala, yapa pao baanya disaipele dupa dapa lamaiyepape: ‘Baa malunya sakatatala Galili yuu dokonya wambao pame lamo, nyakamame baa yuu dokonya kandatamina,’ nambame nyalambo langitilyo doko masalapape!” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa enda dolapome malu doko yapa yakinatala paka kayao pituaka doko, mona etete yaepatala baanya disaipele dupa lamaiyakamaiyanya alo piambi-pyaa.
Alo pyao peambinopa Jisasame kaitinisa kandanyetala, “Wanalapo, anja paanya epelyambipi?” lea-pyaa. Dokopa dolapome tengesa ipao luma lakapala baanya mokonya minao baa tama piambi-pyaa.
Dopa piambinopa Jisasame enda dolapo lamaiyoo, “Paka nakaenya, nambanya kaiminingi dupa katatamisa pupala Galili pena lamaiyepape. Dupame namba dokonya kandatamina,” lea-pyaa.
Enda dolapo peambinopa, malu isetae kateamino yanda singi dupanya mendapuame yuu taono dokonya pupala piamo dupa pitaka pitisa mupa dupa lamaiyami-pyaa.
Dokopa pitisa mupapi isingi akalipi dupa-pipa pii lao kambuatala muni longo mendapua yanda singi dupa maiyami-pyaa.
Maitala dapa lena leami-pyaa: “‘Naima luu palipamanopa Jisasanya disaipele dupame kuka ipupala baa nyoo pamini lamona,’ laapape.
Dee kapomane andake dokome pii dake setamo kandao doko, naimame mende lata-lata pitamanopa nyakama-kisa pundu nasetana,” leami-pyaa.
Dopa lateaminopa yanda singi dupame muni dutupa nyepala dupame pina leamiliaka piami-pyaa. Dopa piamino dokonya atome doko Juta endakali dupa-kisa tayateamopa dupame lawaka katao indupa tuu lelyamino.
Disaipele kingi ita-kisa dee mendai dutupa wamba Jisasame Galili yuu dokonya manda mendenya patamina leamo dokonya peami.
Dokonya pao Jisasa kandatala baa lao luma lakapala tama piami. Dopa piaminoaka doko, mendapuame mona lapo paleami.
Dokopa Jisasa baa tengesa ipupala dokaita lamaiyoo pituu, “Yuupi kaitipi dupa isepenge pupu lapae doko pitaka Goteme namba ditilyamo.
Dopana nyakama pupala endakali paliuu pelyamo dupa pitaka nambanya disaipele injisalapape. Dopa pyoo pituu, Takange dokopi, Ikiningi dokopi, Oli Sipitisa dokopi dutupanya kenge doko lao kaimbu pyakamaiyepape.
Dee piipi manapi nambame nyakama langio kandeno, dupa pitaka minina lao lamaiyepape. Namba nyakama-pipa koteaka lao awapaka katao yuu etatamo gii doko kandao nyetona, masalapape!” Jisasame dopa lea.
Jisasa Kataisa Gotenya Ikiningi doko kandao Wai Pii Epe tee piamo doko.
Potopesa Aisayanya buku dokonya dapa lao pyatae silyamo: “Kandeleno! Nambame nambanya wai minao paenge akali doko embanya wambao pekena latopa embanya kaita doko depa lanya setakata.
Endakali napalenge yuu dokonya akali mendeme katapala wii lao, ‘Kamongonya kaitini doko depa lanya setakamaiyepape! Baanya kaitini dupa tolasakamaiyepape,’ lea-pyaana,” lapae silyamo.
Dopaka pyoo Jone Kaimbu Pingi dokome endakali napalenge yuu dokonya ipao katapala, “Endakali dupanya koo dupa kunanya nepekena lao nyakama mona kapilyetala kaimbu nyalapape,” lao lamaiyoo katea-pyaa.
Dopa piamopa Jutia yuu doko pitakanya tangepi Jetusaleme tange dupa pitakapi baa kateamo dokonya ipupala nyakamanya koo pingi dupa lao panata piaminopa, baame endaki Jotane dokonya dupanya kaimbu pyata pyakamaiya-pyaa.
Jone baa yonge pee piamo doko mena kamele itimi wasepae pyoo, matapu mena pulumakao yanungimi wasepae pyoo katea-pyaa. Nee neamo dupa pauyombopi ambulya kakasa lingi dupapi dupa nao katea-pyaa.
Baame endakali dupa pii lamaiyoo pituu dapa lea-pyaa: “Akali etete pupu lapae namba ita minao doko maita pyao epelyamo. Nambame pongatala baanya moko pee pingi kende dolapo tata lakamaipenge namba epe daa.
Nambame nyakamanya kaimbu endakimi pyekelyona, baame Oli Sipitisa dokome nyakamanya kaimbu pyakatana,” lea-pyaa.
Gii dokopa Jisasa baa Galili yuu dokonya Nasatete katao epeamopa Joneme endaki Jotane dokonya kaimbu pyakamaiya-pyaa.
Kaimbu pyatakamaiyamopa baame endaki doko yakinatala ketae pyakalyulu petala kandeamopa kaiti doko saa papa laloo petala Oli Sipitisa doko yaka maileo joo baa-kisa epea-pyaa.
Kaiti-kisa katao pii mende lea dokome, “Emba nambanya Ikiningi etete mona setenge dokona, embame nambanya mona epe palisekelenona,” lea-pyaa.
Dokopa Oli Sipitisa dokome endakali napalenge mendasa baa pena lao pyasia-pyaa.
Baa endakali napalenge yuu dokonya kote kingi ita kitomende kateamopa, Sataneme baa minao makande pia-pyaa. Baa mena yakapi kapua dupa-pipa tole kateamopa enjele dupame baa nisiami-pyaa.
Jone anjeteamino dokopa Jisasame Galili yuu dokonya ipupala Gotenya Wai Pii Epe doko lamaiya-pyaa.
Baame lao pituu, “Yuu gii doko indupa etete ipatelyamo. Goteme isingi doko tengesa petelyamona, nyakama mona kapilyetala Wai Pii Epe doko masoo minalapa!” lea-pyaa.
Jisasa baa endaki Galili pete lemba dokonya pao pituu Saimonepa Saimone kaiminingi Endutupame wapaka nyingi mandi mende endaki pete dokonya pyandao wapaka nyoo kateambino kandea-pyaa. Akali dolapome wapaka nyoo pisinisa pingimba-pyaa.
Jisasame dolapo lamaiyoo, “Nambame nyilyambo endakali lanyingi akali injisotona, nyilyambome namba watao ipupa,” lea-pyaa.
Gii dokopaka akali dolapome wapaka nyingi dupa yakinatala baa watao peambi-pyaa.
Baa dee kuki ulipisale pupala akali Sepete ikiningi Jemesa dokopa baanya kaiminingi Jone dokopa dolapome sipinya pituu nyilyambonya wapaka nyingi mandi dupa wasoo peteambino kandea-pyaa.
Kandatala baame dolapo epena lea-pyaa. Dokopa dolapome nyilyambonya takange Sepete doko kalai akali dupa-pipa sipi dokonya yakinatala baa watao peambi-pyaa.
Dupa yuu taono Kapaneame dokonya peami-pyaa. Pao pyakamatala baame Sambasa gii dokonya losuu anda dokonya kolandatala endakali dupa mana lamaiya-pyaa.
Baame mana leamo dupa sepala endakali dupa walu lao paka kayami-pyaa. Doko mana setapae masingi akali dupame mana lengemali pyoo baame mana laa naenya, baa-kisa pupu lapae singi joo mana lea-pyaa.
Gii dokopa nyakamanya losuu anda dokonya akali enjele koo paleta mende peteamo dokome ae lao lao pituu, “Nasatete tange Jisasa, emba Gotenya akali epe etete doko kalyeno nambame kandengena, embame naima aipa pyaa epepe? Embame naima minao koyasala epepe?” lea-pyaa.
<range>
Dokopa Jisasame baa pyalanya lao, “Embame embanya nengekaita lyokatala akali dake yakinatala puu!” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa enjele koo dokome akali doko minao walu lasia-pyaa. Dopa petala ae andake mende latala akali doko yakinatala pea-pyaa.
Dopa piamopa endakali dupa pitakame mona andapala mende lamai lamai pyoo, “Doko aipa pilya kanjemape? Doko mana enenge mende lamo! Mana doko pupu lapae singi mende lamo! Baame enjele koo dupame mende pina lelyamopa lelyali pingima lamona,” leami-pyaa.
Dokopa Jisasanya lao pii atome doko Galili yuu doko pitakanya taya-pyaa.
Jisasa Saimone Endutu Jemesa Jonepi akali dutupame losuu anda doko yakinatala Saimone Endutupanya andaka peami-pyaa.
Pao pyakamalu piamino dokopa endakali dupame Saimonenya enda imange doko yonge itaita piamosa yaina siamo doko Jisasa lamaiyami-pyaa.
Lamaitiaminopa baame enda doko siasa pupala baanya kinginya minatala sakatasia-pyaa. Dokopa yonge itaita piamo doko mee jeteamopa enda dokome dokaitanya nee yangakamaiya-pyaa.
Yuu kualanya niki landa piamopa endakali mendapuame endakali yaina pyapae dupa pitakapi dee enjele koo paletapi dupa laminao baa kateasa epeami-pyaa.
Endakali yuu taono doko tange dupa pitaka anda kambu dokonya kapatae kateami-pyaa.
Endakali yaina tata wakale wakaleme pyapae longo dupa baame mee injisakamaiya-pyaa. Dee baame enjele koo longo dupa watao pyakamaiya-pyaa. Enjele koo dupame baa kandengema dokonyana dupame pii mende lena lao kayala naya-pyaa.
Yongama yuu yongalanya iminjetae kateamopa Jisasa baa sakatao kamanda pyakalyetala endakali napalenge yuu mendenya pupala dokonya loma soo katea-pyaa.
Dokopa Saimone mauwapi dee baa-pipe awapa kateami dupame baa kutao peami-pyaa.
Pao kandatala baa lamaiyoo, “Endakali pitakame emba kutilyaminona,” leami-pyaa.
Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nambame yuu taono yakane tengesa silyamo dokaitanya apata pii lamaitoo dupanya mendakaita muaa. Namba tenge dokonyaka epeona,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa latala baame Galili yuu doko pitakanya pao nyakamanya losuu anda kateamo dupanya pii lamaiya-pyaa. Dee enjele koo dupa watao pyakamaiyaka-pyaa.
Akali kopetali mende Jisasa kateasa ipao luma lakapala baa lamaiyoo, “Embame nambanya kopetali doko mee jakatoo lao maseteno kandao doko, kapa pao mee jakalapenona,” lea-pyaa.
Dokopa Jisasame akali doko kondo kayapala kingimi watandatala baa lamaiyoo, “Nambame emba mee jipili lao masilyona, emba mee jaa!” lea-pyaa.
Dopa lalu piamopa akali dokonya kopetali yaina doko mee jia-pyaa.
Dokopa Jisasame kyoto joo baa lamaiyoo, “Kandeleno! Embame endakali mendaipi mende lamaiya naenya, pitisa dokome emba kandena puu! Dopa petala emba mee jilino doko dokaitame kandena laitaka pyoo wamba Moseseme mana seteamoli pyoo opale mende Gote lao kundi maiyalena,” lea-pyaa.
<range>
Jisasame dopa leamoaka doko, baame pupala pii dokonya longo lao lao taya-pyaa. Dopa piamo dokonya Jisasame yuu taono mendenya kapa pao panao dee napea-pyaa. Baa endakali napalenge yuu dupanya katea-pyaa. Dopa piamopa yuu dupa pitakanya katao endakali dupa baa kateasa ipata piami-pyaa.
Gii mendatupa pateamopa maitakao Jisasame baa yuu taono Kapaneame dokonya dee pilyia-pyaa. Dokopa baa andaka kalyamo lapae doko siami-pyaa.
Sepala dokopa endakali longo ipao kapeaminosa panda nasia-pyaa. Anda kamapi dupanya apata panda nasiaka-pyaa. Dopa piamopa baame dokaita pii lamaiya-pyaa.
Baa kateamo dokonya akali papa tambotae mende akali kitomendeme soo epeami-pyaa.
Panda tumbiamosa dupame akali doko Jisasa kateamo dosa soo ipupenge nanjia-pyaa. Dopa pianya Jisasa kateamo dosa anda doko tungupala akali papa tambotae doko lapa tokonya paleta isa pyandeami-pyaa.
Dokopa Jisasame akali kitomende dokaitanya masoo miniamino doko kandatala, akali papa tambotae doko lamaiyoo, “Wane, embanya koo dupa kunanya nepekelyona,” lea-pyaa.
Dokonya mana setapae masingi akali mendapua peteamino dupame nyakamanya mona koko masoo pituu, “Baame aipuma dopa lelya kanjemape? Baame Gote kilya kandao lelyamo. Apimi kapa pao koo dupa kunao nepakamailyona latape? Goteme iki kapa pao koo dupa kunao nepakamailyona lapengena,” lao masiami-pyaa.
<range>
Dopa lao masiamino dokopaka masiamino doko Jisasa baanya moname masetala dokaita lamaiyoo, “Aipuma nyakamame nyakamanya moname dopa lao masilyamipi?
Akali papa tambotae dake kandao anduku laa nayapengepe? Akali dakenya koo dupa kunao nepakamailyona lapenge dokope, pande baa sakatatala baanya lapa toko doko nyoo soo kaita pena lapenge dokope?
Dopaka doko, Endakalinya Ikiningi dokome isa yuu dakenya katao endakali dupanya koo dupa kunanya nepenge pupu lapae doko baa-kisa singi lamo lao kanjepalena,” lea-pyaa. Dopa latala baame akali papa tambotae dapa lamaiya-pyaa.
“Emba sakata! Sakatatala embanya lapa toko doko nyoo soo andaka puu lelyona,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamo dokopa akali dokome pupae sakatatala endakali dupa pitakanya enomba dokonya baanya lapa toko doko nyoo soo kamanda pea-pyaa. Dopa piamosa endakali dupa pitakame doko kandao mona andapala Gote lao lalyoo, “Wamba naimame opale mende etete nakandeamana,” leami-pyaa.
Jisasa baa endaki pete lemba dokonya deaka pea-pyaa. Dokopa endakali kambu doko pitaka baa kateamo dokonya epeaminopa baame dokaita mana lamaiya-pyaa.
Lamaitala baa kaita pao pituu Aopiasa ikiningi Lipai lenge doko takisa nyingi anda dokonya peteamo kandatala baa lamaiyoo, “Embame namba watao ipu,” lea-pyaa. Dokopa baa sakatatala Jisasa watao pea-pyaa.
Maitakao Jisasa baa Lipainya andaka nee nao peteamo dokonya takisa nyingi akalipi mana koo minao paenge longo mendapuame Jisasapi baanya disaipelepi dupa-pipa awapa nee nao peteami-pyaa. Doko, dokaita longome baa watao peami-pyaa.
Patasi dupanya mana setapae masingi akali dupame kandeaminopa mana koo minao paenge endakalipi takisa nyingi akalipi dupa-pipa baame nee nao peteanya baanya disaipele dupa pisoo, “Baame takisa nyingi akalipi mana koo minao paenge endakalipi dupa-pipa nee nao pituu kalyamo doko aipuma pilyape?” leami-pyaa.
Dopa leamino doko Jisasame sepala dokaita lamaiyoo, “Endakali yaina napingi dupa dokosaa katatasa pupenge nanjilyamo. Endakali yaina pyapae dupa pupenge jilyamo. Nambame endakali tolatae dupa epena laanya naepeo. Endakali mana koo minao paenge dupa epena laanya epeona,” lea-pyaa.
Jonenya disaipele dupapi akali Patasi dupapi dupame Gote lao masalanya nee nanenya kayapala mee kateami-pyaa. Dopa piaminopa endakali dupame ipao Jisasa pisoo, “Jonenya disaipele dupapi Patasi dupanya disaipele dupapi dupame nee nanenya kayapala mee kalyamino doko, aipuma embanya disaipele dupame nee nanenya kayala naelyamipi?” leami-pyaa.
Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Akali mendeme enda kelyapala watapae pyao baanya kaita miningi dupa-pipa awapa kalyamo gii dokopa baanya kaita miningi dupame nee dokonya nanenya kapa pao kaengemape? Daa, enda kelelyamo akali doko dupa-pipa kalyamo dokopa dupame nee nanenya kapa pao kayala naengema.
Dopaka doko, yuu gii mende ipatamo dokopa enda kelenge akali doko dupanya kainanya nyokonyetatamopa dupame nee nanao katatamina,” lea-pyaa.
“Endakali mendaipi mendeme lapalapa kangupae enenge mendeme yonge pee wambatae mendenya tii telya dokonya kii pimbala naenge. Endakali mendeme dopa pitamo kandao doko, enenge doko inungunyetala wambatae doko kangutamopa tii andake tata.
Dee endakali mendaipi mendeme waene enenge doko mena meme yanungimi penge wasepae wambatae dupanya kambuoo pisala naenge. Mendeme dopa pitamo kandao doko, waene dokome bolo lapala penge dupa polata. Dopa pitamopa waenepa pengepa lapota koyata. Dopaka doko, waene enenge doko penge enengenyaka pisepengena,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
Jisasa baa Sambasa gii mendenya wiisa ee kaina mendenya kaita peamopa, baanya disaipele dupame baa-pipa awapa pao pituu wiisa dii dupa kii lao nyepa nyepapyoo peami-pyaa.
Dopa piaminopa, Patasi dupame baa lamaiyoo, “Kanau! Sambasa gii dokonya daa latae singi mana doko aipuma akali dakaitame minilyamipi?” leami-pyaa.
Dokopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Dapitimi piamo doko nyakamame pepanya itaki napiamipi? Wamba akali Apayata doko pitisa mupa joo kateamo dokopa Dapitipi baa-pipa awapa kateamino akali dupapi nee daa jiamosa lopo kayapala Dapitimi Gotenya losuu anda dokonya kolandatala betesa Gotenya lao setapae pitisa dupame iki napenge dupa nyepala baa-pipa awapa kateamino dupa maiyoo nea-pyaana,” lea-pyaa.
<range>
Dopa latala baame dokaita dee lamaiyoo, “Goteme endakali lao masetala Sambasa gii doko setea-pyaa. Sambasa gii doko lao masetala endakali wapuala naya-pyaa.
Tenge dokonya, Endakalinya Ikiningi dokome Sambasa gii doko apata isoo kalyamoakana,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
Yuu mende Jisasa baa Jutamanya losuu anda dokonya deaka peamopa akali kingi kumapae mende dokonya petea-pyaa.
Endakali mendapuame baa kosimi lamana latala baame akali doko Sambasa gii dokonya mee injisilyape lao isokondape pyoo peteami-pyaa.
Jisasame akali kingi kumapae doko lamaiyoo, “Emba sakatatala kaina angenya ipao kata,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa latala baame endakali dupa lamaiyoo, “Sambasa gii dokonya koo pipenge doko kapa pelyape, pande epe pipenge doko kapa pelyape? Dee endakali pyao kumasepenge doko kapa pelyape, pande pyoo nyepenge doko kapa pelyape? lea-pyaa. Dopaka doko, dokaita ema napiami-pyaa.
Baame dokaita kandayoko lao kandatala imbu kaya-pyaa. Dokaitame nyakamanya mona kana jiaminosa baame dokaita kandao mona kenda kaya-pyaa. Dopa petala akali kingi kumapae doko lamaiyoo, “Embanya kingi tinoka,” lea-pyaa. Baanya kingi doko tinokateamopa dee auu pia-pyaa.
Dopa piamopa Patasi dupame pupae kamanda pupala Kiŋi Etote tata dupa-pipa Jisasa aipa petala pyao kumasemape lao kambuiyami-pyaa.
Jisasapi baanya disaipele dupapi endaki pete dokonya peami-pyaa. Galili tange kambu longo mendeme baa watao peami-pyaa. Dee Jutia tangepi, Jetusaleme tangepi, Itumia tangepi, endaki Jotane yangitena tangepi, Taya tangepi, Saitone tangepi dupame baame pilyamo lapae dupa sepala baa kateamo dokonya kambu longo dupa epeami-pyaa.
<range>
Dopa piaminosa endakali kambu dokome baa katao tambukinatamini latala sipi yakane mende baanya disaipele dupame depa lanya setekena lea-pyaa.
Baame endakali yaina pyapae longo mee injisiamo dokonya endakali yaina pyapae dupa pitakame baa watandamana latala tuu tuu lao epeaminosa lea-pyaa.
Enjele koo dupame baa kandatala, baa kateamo dosa tombauli sepala puu lao ae lao, “Emba Gote Ikiningina,” lata piami-pyaa.
Dokopa baame kyoto joo dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame namba lao panala nayalapape eteteaka daana,” lea-pyaa.
Jisasa baa yuu manda mendenya pea-pyaa. Pupala akali mendapua baame yapao nyotoo lao masiamo dupa epena leamopa dupa baa kateamo dokonya epeami-pyaa.
Epeaminopa baame akali kingi ita mende-kisa dee lapoma baa-pipa tole katamana lao makande pia-pyaa. Dee akali dutupame pii lamaiya pena latona lao makande pia-pyaa.
Baame dupa pupu lapae maitopa enjele koo dupa watao pyatamina lao masetala dopa pia-pyaa.
Baame akali kingi ita mende-kisa dee lapoma dutupa makande petala Saimone kandao kenge Pita lea-pyaa.
Dee baame Sepete ikiningi Jemesapa Jonepa dolapo kandao kenge Boanesisa lea-pyaa. Dokonya tenge doko dolapo kaiti toka lelyamo dokonya ikiningi.
Baame Endutupi, Pilipapi, Batolomyupi, Matyupi, Tomasapi, Aopiasa ikiningi Jemesa dokopi, Tatiasapi, Saimonekenge mende Kenanayosa lengema dokopi, Jisasa enge nyiamo akali Jutasa Isaketiote dokopi dutupa makande pia-pyaa.
<range>
Dopa petala Jisasa baa andaka epea-pyaa. Dokopa endakali kambu mende deaka ipao kambu piaminosa Jisasa baa baanya disaipele dupa-pipa nee napenge nanjia-pyaa.
Dopa pilyamo lapae doko baanya palu dupame sepala baa kii minao nyala epeami-pyaa. Doko, endakali dupame, “Baa kyekelyamona,” leaminosa dopa piami-pyaa.
Mana setapae masingi akali Jetusaleme katao lanao epeamino dupame lao pituu, “Belesapulu doko baa-kisa palelyamo. Dee enjele koo dupa isingi doko mambele baame enjele koo dupa watao pilyamona,” leami-pyaa.
Dopa leaminopa baame dokaita epena latala kongali mendapua dapa lamaiya-pyaa. “Sataneme Satane tange aipa petala kapa pao watao pyatape?
Yuu dupanya kiŋi mendeme isingi tata mende wakale pyoloo petala yanda pitambino kandao doko, tata doko kapa pao auu pyoo nakatata.
Anda mendenya palu dupa wakale pyoloo petala yanda pitamino kandao doko, anda doko kapa pao auu pyoo nakatata.
Dee Satane dokome baa tangeaka wakale pyoloo petala yanda pitamo kandao doko, baa kapa pao kalya nayata. Daa, baa etata.
“Dopaka doko, endakali mendeme akali pupu lapae dokonya andaka kolandatala baanya pinju dupa kapa pao pyao nanyeta. Dopa pyaanya tamo kandao doko, wambao akali pupu lapae doko kendeme yaki pinya setapala dokopa baanya andaka pinju setamo dupa pyao nyeta.
Kiningi nambame nyakama langilyona, endakali dupanya koo dupa pitakapi Gote kandao lamba lenge dupa pitakapi dupa Goteme kunanya nepakamaita.
Dopaka doko, endakali mendeme Oli Sipitisa kandao lamba latamo kandao doko, tendapi baanya koo doko baa-kisa etete seta. Baanya koo doko tenda tendapi soaka patana,” lea-pyaa.
Baa-kisa enjele koo mende palelyamona leamino dokonya baame dopa lea-pyaa.
Jisasanya endangi kaiminingipi dupa ipao kamanda katapala baa kamanda epena lao mendapuame lanyala pena leami-pyaa.
Endakali baa kakopao peteamino dupame Jisasa lamaiyoo, “Yaa, embanya endangi kaiminingipi dupa ipao kamanda katapala emba kutilyaminona,” leami-pyaa.
Jisasame yanu pyao, “Nambanya endangi doko apipi? Nambanya kaiminingi dupa apitupape?” lea-pyaa.
Jisasame baa kakopao peteamino dupa kandayoko lao kandatala, “Datupa nambanya endangipi kaiminingipina, kanjepape.
Goteme masingili pingima endakali dupa nambanya kaiminingipi, pimalengepi, endangipina,” lea-pyaa.
Paa mendepa deaka Jisasame endaki pete singi dosa endakali dupa mana lamaiyoo katea-pyaa. Endakali eteteaka longo mendapua ipao baa kateamo dosa kambu piami-pyaa. Dopa piaminosa baa sipi mendenya pyakalyetala ongonya peteamopa sipi doko endakinya sia-pyaa. Dopa piamopa endakali doko pitaka endaki pete lemba dokonya kateami-pyaa.
Dokopa baame kongali lao endakali dupa mana longo lao dapa lamaiya-pyaa:
“Nyakamame salapape! Akali mendeme ee wai lyandala pea-pyaa.
Pupala lyandeamopa yangi kaitininya pea-pyaa. Peamo dupa yaka dupame ipupala nao eteami-pyaa.
Yangi kana-kisa yuu epao napalengenya pea-pyaa. Yuu epao napalenge dokonyana wai dupa pupae langa lea-pyaa.
Langa leamoaka doko, niki teamo dokome pyao nea-pyaa. Dupa pingi pyalakao napiamosa sapuiya-pyaa.
Yangi lyiki tenge palengenya pea-pyaa. Lyiki dupa andapala ee wai dupa kuii pyambea-pyaa. Dopa piamopa dii namandea-pyaa.
Dopaka doko, yangi lyandeamo dupa yuu epenya pupala langa lao andapala dii mandea-pyaa. Yangimi kingi ita tepoma, yangimi kingi ita tokange, yangimi andate mendai lao mandea-pyaana,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa latala baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakama kalekaita singi dupame pii doko salapapena!” lea-pyaa.
Maitakao Jisasa baa iki kateamopa akali kingi ita-kisa dee lapoma dupapi dee endakali baa-pipa tole kateamino dupapimi kongali pii dupanya baa pisiami-pyaa.
Dokopa baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Goteme baanya isingi dokonya yalo petae doko nyakama laitaka petelyamo. Dopaka doko, netesa endakali dupame dupa pitaka kongaliaka silyamino.
Dupame kandokondape pitamiaka doko, angi doko nakandena lawapi, dupame sokondape pitamiaka doko, angi doko masala naena lawapi, dupame mona kapilyetaminopa Goteme nyakamanya koo pingi dupa kunanya nepakamaitone latala dopa pilyamona,” lea-pyaa.
Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame kongali pii dake masala naelyamino doko, aipa petala kongali pii waka dupa pitaka masetamipi?
Ee wai lyandala peamo akali dokome Gotenya pii doko lyandelyamo.
Endakali mendapua wai yangi kaitininya peamo dopalema. Endakali dopale dupame pii doko sepelyamino gii dokopaka Sataneme ipupala pii nyakama-kisa ee wai joo lyandatae silyamo doko nyoo nepenge.
Dopaka pyoo endakali yangi dupa ee wai kana palenge yuunya peamo dopalema. Dupame pii doko sepala mona yaepao lee mendai nyingima.
Dopaka doko, dupame moname auu pyoo masala nayao gii kuki iki katengema. Dupame pii doko watao minilyaminosa, dupa minao kenda pisowapi watao pyawapi pingima. Dopa pilyaminopa yapa yakinengema.
Dee endakali yangi mendapua ee wai lyiki tenge palengenya peamo dopalema dupame pii doko singima.
Singimaka doko, isa yuunya auu pyoo katapu laka lao nea kaenge dupapi, munipi oapi dupa auu kaengepi, dee opale waka nyipu laka lao masingi dupapi dupame pii doko pyalya minilyamo dokopa endakali dupame kapa pao dii namandengema.
Dopaka doko, endakali yangi dupa ee wai yuu epenya peamo dopalema. Dupame pii doko sepala nyoo minatala dii mandengema. Yangimi kingi ita tepoma, yangimi kingi ita tokange, yangimi andate mendai lao mandengemana,” Jisasame dopa lea-pyaa.
Dopa latala baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Endakali mendeme lama kaiyepae mende titopene penge kokopi palenge toko pundipundipi dupanya setalanya minao epengepe? Daa, setapenge panda dokonya setalanya minao epenge.
Doko, opale yalo petae silyamo dupa panatae seta. Opale sanga pyatae silyamo dupa lopalyetae seta.
Nyakama kalekaita singi tamo kandao doko, pii doko salapapena!” lea-pyaa.
Dopa latala dee baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame pii silyamino doko masokondape pyepape. Nyakamame endakali mende-kisa mana minataminoli pyoaka Goteme nyakama-kisa minata. Dee mana mendapua baame waipa soo minataka.
Opale singi endakali doko konda pyoo maita. Opale nasingi endakali doko-kisa setamo dolapo nyokonyetana,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa latala dee baame dapa lea-pyaa: “Goteme isingi doko akali mendeme ee wai yuunya lyandenge dopale.
Baame lyandatala kuka luu palipa yuu yongelyamopa sakatata pilyamopa ee wai doko langa latala andenge. Dopa pilyamopa baame aipa petala langa lao andelyape lao nakandenge.
Wambao yoko pingi. Dopa petala mange pyakalyingi. Mange ongonya dii lyoo wambu pingi.
Wambu petala napenge gii doko epelyamopa akali dokome uaa pepo dokome lyingina,” lea-pyaa.
Jisasame dokaita dapa lao pisia-pyaa. “Naimame Goteme isingi doko aipalena lamape? Aki mendepa makande pyoo kongali lamape?
Doko masetedii dopale. Endakali mendeme masete wai doko yuunya lyandenge. Isa yuu dakenya ee wai waka dupa pitakame ita minao masete dii doko etete yakane mende.
Dii doko lyandataesa langa latala andao ee wai waka eenya pokatae dupa pitaka ita miningi. Dokonya wangya dupa andake jilyamopa luu lelya dupanya yaka dupame kapa pao anda pingimana,” lea-pyaa.
Baame kongali pii dopale dupa longo lao endakali dupame sepenge jiali pyoo lamaiyoo katea-pyaa.
Baame pii mende mee lamaiya nayao kongali lawaka lamaiya-pyaa. Dopa petala baanya disaipele dupa iki kateamino dokopa kongali dupa pitakanya tenge dupa lamaita pia-pyaa.
Gii dokondinaka alemandi Jisasame baanya disaipele dupa lamaiyoo, “Naima endaki pete dakenya omotena muaa,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa dupame endakali kambu doko yakinatala Jisasa sipi peteamo dokonya peteta laminao peami-pyaa. Dee sipi waka mendatupa apata tole peamiaka-pyaa.
Peaminopa poo andake mende leamopa endaki buli piamo dokome tandyuu sipi dokonya kolandea-pyaa. Dopa petala sipi doko endakimi tumbalanya pia-pyaa.
Jisasa baa sipi ongonya maitakaita sanda mendenya aiyomba setapala palipia-pyaa. Palipiamopa dupame baa pyale tatala, “Mana Lenge Akali, naima kumalanya pilyamano doko embame angi mende daana lao masilipi?” leami-pyaa.
Dokopa baame sakatatala poo doko kaena lea-pyaa. Endaki pete doko lamaiyoo, “Emba yatu laa! Ema napinya mee saa!” lea-pyaa. Dokopa poo doko yatu leamopa endaki kuki emapi mende napia-pyaa.
Dokopa baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Aipuma nyakama paka kaelyamipi? Nyakamame masoo minatala naelyamipi?” lea-pyaa.
Akali dupa etete paka kayapala nyakamalapo lao pituu, “Poopa endakipa dolapome pii sakamaingimba lamo doko akali dake api laa kanjemape?” leami-pyaa.
Dokopa dokaita endaki pete dokonya omotena pupala Getasa tangemanya yuu dokonya peami-pyaa.
Jisasa baa sipi doko yakinatala peamopa akali enjele koo paleta mendeme endakali malu kananda dupanya katao ipao baa kandanyulu pia-pyaa.
Baa endakali malu dupanya palenge-pyaa. Endakali mendaipi mendeme kapa pao baa anjala naengema-pyaa. Nili kendepi kapa daaka-pyaa.
Paa longosa dupame baa kingipi mokopi dupa ŋili kendepi anengapupi dupame anjeta pilyaminopa anengapu dupa pindanya nepatala ŋili kende dupa takyoo nepenge-pyaa. Dopa pilyamopa endakali mendaipi mendeme kapa pao baa minao tambo lasapenge nanjingi-pyaa.
Kuka kotakapi koteaka lao baa endakali malupi yuu mandapi dupanyaka paliuu katenge-pyaa. Baame puu lao ae lao katao baanya yonge doko tange kaname konjeta pingi-pyaa.
Jisasa londatili kateamopa baame kandatala alo pyao ipupala baa kateamo dosa luma lakea-pyaa.
Dopa petala baame puu lao ae latala, “Jisasa emba Gote Etete Ketae Katenge dokonya Ikiningi, embame namba aipa pitipi? Nambame Gotenya kenge doko lao embame namba tanda andake nandipoko,” lea-pyaa.
Doko, Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Enjele koo, embame akali dake yakinatala kamanda ipu,” leamosa dopa lea-pyaa.
Dokopa Jisasame baa pisoo, “Emba kenge apipi?” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa akali dokome yanu pyao, “Naima longo dokonya nambanya kenge Longo lengena,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa latala Jisasame enjele koo dutupame yuu dake yakinatala pena laa naena lao baame kongo lea-pyaa.
Mena elyambu mende yuu manda kilikili dokonya nao kateami-pyaa.
Dokopa enjele koo dupame Jisasa kandao, “Naima mena dupanya koko landa pyamana dupa kalyamino dokonya pupa lapoko,” leami-pyaa.
Dopa leaminopa Jisasame pena kaya-pyaa. Dokopa enjele koo dupame akali doko yakinatala mena dupa-kisa pao landa piami-pyaa. Dopa peteaminopa mena elyambu doko alo pyao pao papatale mendenya pyakatala endaki pete dokonya tumbitambi napala kumiami-pyaa. Mena dupa taosene lapoma jowapi mende-pyaa.
Dopa piamopa mena setao katenge akali dupa paka pupala yuu taono dokonyapi mee yuupi dupanya pao lamaiyami-pyaa. Dokopa endakali dupame piamo doko kanja epeami-pyaa.
Dupa Jisasa kateamo dokonya ipupala kandeaminopa wamba enjele koo longo paleta katenge akali doko indupa yonge pee dupa pyoo mona paliuu peteamo kandatala paka kayami-pyaa.
Piamo doko lengeme kandeamino endakali dupame enjele koo paleta akali doko-kisa piamo dokonya lawapi dee mena dupanya lawapi endakali epeamino dupa lamaiyami-pyaa.
Dokopa dupame Jisasa baa nyakamanya yuu doko yakinatala pena lao kongo leami-pyaa.
Dopa leaminopa baa sipi ongonya pyakalyiamopa wamba enjele koo paleta kateamo dokome baa apata buaako lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa Jisasame ongonya ŋee nalea-pyaa. Nee nalenya baa lamaiyoo, “Embame embanya andaka emba palu dupa katatamisa puu. Pupala Kamongo dokome embanya pyakalamo dupapi dee emba kondo kayalamo dokopi dutupa dupa lamaipina,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa akali dokome pupala baa-kisa Jisasame piamo dupa pitaka Dekapolisa yuu dokonya panao lamaiya-pyaa. Dopa piamopa endakali dupa pitakame sepala mona andeami-pyaa.
Jisasa baa sipi dokonya pituu endaki pete dokonya yangitena dee pilyia-pyaa. Endaki pete lemba dokonya endakali kambu andake mendeme ipao baa kateasa limbiami-pyaa.
Dokopa Jutamanya losuu anda isingi akali dupanya mende Jaitasa lenge doko epea-pyaa. Ipao Jisasa kandatala baanya moko kateamo dosa tombauli sepala, kyoto joo dapa lao Jisasa-kisa tee lea-pyaa: “Nambanya wanenge doko kumalanya pilyamona, baa mee jetala saka pena embame ipao baa kingimi watandatalena,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa Jisasa baa-pipa awapa peambi-pyaa.
Dopa piaminopa endakali longome baa watao pupala katao tambukiniami-pyaa.
Enda mende ee kana kingi ita mende-kisa dee lapoma dupanya andaka nao paliti-paliti singi mende katea-pyaa.
Enda dokome dokosaa longo dupa-kisa tanda longo nao muni akipi dupa pitaka nepeamoaka doko, kuki yaka nanjoo etete koyamopa petea-pyaa.
Enda dokome Jisasanya lao pii doko sepala endakali kambu dokonya Jisasanya maita-kaita ipupala baanya yonge pee dokonya kingimi watandea-pyaa.
Enda dokome, “Nambame baanya yonge peenya iki watandato kandao doko, nambanya yaina doko mee jakalapomona,” lao masetala dopa pia-pyaa.
Kinina dokopa lee mendai enda dokonya andaka nao paliti-paliti singi doko yatu lea-pyaa. Dopa piamopa enda dokome baanya yaina doko etalumu lao masia-pyaa.
Dokopa awapa Jisasame baanya pupu lapae mendapua puumu lao sepala endakali kambu kateamino dupa kandapilyetala, “Apimi nambanya yonge peenya kingimi watandelyape?” lea-pyaa.
Baanya disaipele dupame yanu pyao, “Emba katao tambukinelyamino endakali kambu doko emba tangeme kandao pituu embame, ‘Apimi namba kingimi watandelyape?’ leepe?” leami-pyaa.
Dopa leaminopa apimi pyaape lao kanjanya Jisasame kandayoko lea-pyaa.
Dopa piamopa enda dokome baa-kisa piamo dutupa pitaka masetala paka kayao walu lao ipao Jisasanya moko kateamo dosa tombauli sepala baame piamo dupa pitaka panao baa lamaiya-pyaa.
Dokopa baame enda doko lamaiyoo, “Wanaku, embame masoo minapino dokome emba mee injisetelyamo. Embanya yaina doko mee jilyamona emba mona yaepatala puu,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa lao kateamopa Jutamanya losuu anda isingi akali dokonya andaka katao akali mendapuame ipupala, “Embanya wanaku doko kumatalamona, aipa lao Mana Lenge Akali doko minao dee kenda pisetepe?” leami-pyaa.
Dopa leamino doko Jisasame soo nasili petala losuu anda isingi akali doko lamaiyoo, “Embame paka nakaenya masoo minao katape,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa latala baame endakali pitaka baa watao naepena latala Pitapi, Jemesapi, Jemesa kaiminingi Jonepi dutupa-pipa iki peami-pyaa.
Pao losuu anda isingi akali dokonya andaka kolandeami-pyaa. Jisasame kandeamopa endakali dupame pii longo lao ee lao yako lao kateamino kandea-pyaa.
Dopa petala baame andaka kolandatala dokaita lamaiyoo, “Aipuma nyakama pii longo lao ee lao kalyamipi? Wanaku doko kumala nayalamo. Baa luu palelyamona,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa endakali dupame baa kilya kandao gii kayami-pyaa. Dopaka doko, baame dokaita pitaka watao kamanda pyalyetala wanaku dokonya endangi takangepapi dee baa-pipa tole payamino dutupapi dutupa-pipa iki wanaku kumapae doko siamo palo dokonya peami-pyaa.
Pupala wanaku dokonya kinginya minatala baa lamaiyoo, “Talita kumu,” lea-pyaa. Pii doko kapilyoo, “Wanaku, emba nambame sakata lelyona,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamo dokopa wanaku doko sakatatala paya-pyaa. Dopa piamopa dupame doko kandatala etete walu lao mona andeami-pyaa. Wanaku doko ee kana kingi ita mende-kisa dee lapoma patae-pyaa.
Dokopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Endakali mendeme doko setana lamaiya nayalapape,” lao etete kyoto joo lamaiya-pyaa. Dopa latala, “Nyakamame nee mendapua nena maiyepa,” lea-pyaa.
Jisasame yuu doko yakinatala baa tangenya yuu tenge dokonya pea-pyaa.
Pupala Sambasa gii doko epeamopa baame Jutamanya losuu anda dokonya mana lamaiya-pyaa. Lamaiyamopa pii siamino endakali longo dupame walu latala lao pituu, “Baame mana datupa anjatae nyia laape? Masepae baa maiya lamo doko aipale laa kanjemape? Baame kalai pupu lapae dopale dupa aipa petala pilya kanjemape?
Akali dake akali kamonda kalai pingi doko daa kandamuape? Baa enda Matia ikiningi, Jemesapi, Josisapi, Jutasapi, Saimonepi dutupanya kaiminingi daape? Baanya pimalenge dupa ae naima-pipa awapa napilyamape?” leami-pyaa. Dopa latala dupame Jisasa kandao mona koo palyiami-pyaa.
Dokopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Yuu dupa pitakanya potopesa mende andanda semaingimaka doko, baanya yuu tengepi, baa tatapi, baa palupi dupame iki baa andanda semaiya naengemana,” lea-pyaa.
Dokopa baame kalai pupu lapae mende yuu doo kapa pao napia-pyaa. Dopaka doko, baame endakali yaina pyapae kuki mendatupa-kisa iki kingi setapa pyoo mee injisia-pyaa.
Endakali dupame masoo minala nayaminosa baa mona andea-pyaa. Maitakao Jisasa baa yuu taono yakane soo peamo dupanya pao endakali dupa mana lamaiya-pyaa.
Jisasame akali disaipele kingi ita mende-kisa dee lapoma dutupa epena latala enjele koo dupa watao pina lao pupu lasetala dupa lapo lapo lao pena lea-pyaa.
Pena lao pituu dapa pyepape lea-pyaa: “Nyakama kaita patamino dokonya mende naminao pangali iki minao pupape. Nee mende manja nayalapape. Nokaina mandipenge mende manja nayalapape. Muni mende manja nayalapape.
Dopaka doko, nyakama moko pee pyoo pupape. Yonge pee lapoma lao pyoo napupape,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa latala dee baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakama anda mendenya kolandeami kandeno doko, yuu dokonya katataminoli pyoo anda dokonyaka kalyepape.
Yuu mendenya tange endakali dupame nyakama taeme ipamini lamo lao lanyala nayawapi nyakamanya pii doko nasowapi piami kandeno doko, nyakamame yuu doko yakinatala pupape. Pao pituu dupame kandatala masina lao nyakamanya mokonya kuni kungumapi patatamo dupa lyanda lanya nepalapapena,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa dupame pupala endakali dupa mona kapilyina lao pii lamaiyami-pyaa.
Pii lamaiyoo pituu enjele koo longo mendapua watao piami-pyaa. Dee endakali yaina pyapae longo mendapuanya olipi ipange kai latakamaitala yaina dupa mee injisiami-pyaa.
Jisasanya kenge doko yuu dupa pitakanya taya-pyaa. Dopa piamopa Kiŋi Etote dokome Jisasanya lao pii doko sia-pyaa. Dupame lao pituu, “Jone Kaimbu Pingi doko malunya sakatatala kalai pupu lapae dupa pyoo kalyamona,” leami-pyaa.
Yangi dupame lao pituu, “Baa Ilainjana,” leami-pyaa. Yangi dupame, “Baa potopesa kateamino dopale potopesa mendena,” leami-pyaa.
Etoteme pii doko sepala lao pituu, “Wamba nambame mange kepeo Jone doko sakatapyana,” lea-pyaa.
Wamba akali Etote dokome baanya kaiminingi Pilipa etanenge Etotiasa lenge doko tondao nyia-pyaa. Dopa piamopa, Joneme Etote lamaiyoo, “Embame embanya kaimininginya etanenge tondao nyilino doko kopeta pilinona,” lea-pyaa. Dopa lati siamosa Etoteme enda Etotiasa doko lao masetala baameaka yanda singi mendapuame Jone doko anjina latala anjingi andaka ŋili kendeme anjinya palyia-pyaa.
<range>
