Pii wamba pepa pyanya seteamino dupanya kiningi pii dupa embame masokondape pipi lao nambame kandeamino endakali dutupa deaka pisoo sepa sepa petala pii mendenya pali pali pitame latala tolasakatoo lao embanya pepa dake pyakondape pyoo pyekelyo.
<range>
Jutia yuu dokonya akali Etote lenge mende katea-pyaa. Baa akali andake kiŋi joo kateamo gii dokopa, pitisa Sakataya lenge mende katea-pyaa. Baa pitisa tata Apaisa lenge dokonya mende-pyaa. Baanya etanenge Ilisapeta lenge dokonya yumbange takangepi dupa pitisaka katengema-pyaa.
Dolapome Gotenya mana setapae dupa tolao minao pitipala mana tolatae dupa pitaka watao minao pii mendaipi mende yalala nayao payambinopa Kamongo dokome kapana lao masia-pyaa.
Enda Ilisapeta doko ingi pyakilyiamosa dolapome wane mende namandyuu pituu wambake jiambi-pyaa.
Yuu mende Sakatayanya kalai pingi gii doko epeamopa, Gote lao tama pyoo pitisa kalai doko pyaanya katea-pyaa.
Kateamopa pitisa dupame makande pingili pyoo petala baa yapao nyepeaminopa Sakatayame Gote tama pyoo ita dii tunduma pipae mendapua tunduma pina lao Kamongo dokonya losuu anda andake dokonya yangala pea-pyaa.
Sakatayame ita dii dupa tunduma pina lao Gote lao yangengeli pyoo yangeamo gii dokopa endakali kamanda kambu pyao kateamino dupa pitakame loma soo kateami-pyaa.
Sakatayame kandeamopa Kamongonya enjele mende ipupala tunduma pingi yangenge olata toko kingi tolae-kaita singi dokonya ipao katea-pyaa.
Kateamopa Sakatayame baa kandatala walu lao etete paka kaya-pyaa.
Dokopa enjele dokome baa lamaiyoo, “Sakataya, emba paka nakayape! Embame mende Gote-kisa tee lao loma sipino doko baame sepelyamona, embanya enda Ilisapeta dokome wane ane mende manjakatana, embame wane doko kenge Jone lape.
Emba mona yaepao eteke kayao katate. Wane doko mandipatamopa, endakali longo dupame mona yaepatamiaka.
Baa Kamongonya enomba dokonya andake joo katata. Baa bia akipi waenepi dupa etete nanao katata. Baa endanginya ingiandaka pititamopa Oli Sipitisa doko tee pyao baa-kisa tumbasalanya ipata.
Dopa pitamopa baame Isataele endakali longo dupanya mona sakatasakamaitamopa dupame nyakamanya Kamongo Gote doko lao masetami.
Oli Sipitisa dokome Ilainja-kisa pupu lao epeamoli pyoo baa-kisa ipatamopa baame Kamongo doko ipatana lao baa wambata. Wambatala baame wanepi takangepi waka joo katenge dupa nyoo pyaseta. Baame Gotenya pii watao minala naenge dupame mana tolao minao paenge endakali dupame masingimali pyoo masina lao minao kapilyeta. Baame endakali dupa depa lakamaitamopa dokaitame Kamongo dokonya depa latae endakali joo katatamina,” enjele dokome dopa lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa Sakatayame enjele doko lamaiyoo, “Embanya pii leeno doko aipa petala nambame kiningina lao masotope? Namba akali wambake. Nambanya enda dokonya ee kana longo dupa patayakana,” lea-pyaa.
Dokopa enjele dokome baa lamaiyoo, “Namba Gepetiele lenge! Namba Gotepa awapa katenge! Gote tangeme embanya pii wai epe dake nambame minakao langya puu lapumosa epelyo.
Dopana, embame nambanya pii doko kiningi lamo lao masala nayaleno dokonya emba pii laa nayao nengekaita lyokatae katao pii lalo dutupa kiningi jetamo gii doko kandao nyete. Pii dutupanya gii doko ipatamopa angi jetana,” enjele dokome dopa lea-pyaa.
Endakali kateamino dupame Sakataya malisoo kateami-pyaa. Sakataya baa losuu anda andake dokonya aki mendeme minanjipumosa yapa naepelyape lao longo lao masiami-pyaa.
Maitakao Sakataya kamanda epeamopa baanya nengekaita lyokeamosa endakali dupame baa losuu anda andake dokonya mendita mende kandalame lamo lao masiami-pyaa. Dokopa baame pii mende nalenya nengekaita lyokatae katao kingimiaka makande pia-pyaa.
Dokopa losuu anda andake dokonya Sakatayanya kalai pingi gii doko etapeamopa baa andaka pilyia-pyaa.
Pilyeteamopa maitakao baanya enda Ilisapeta dokonya inginya wane tee piamopa kana yuungi dupanya andaka yalo petae pitipala pii dapa lea-pyaa:
“Namba wane namandipala endakali dupanya enombanya elya nyingi doko Goteme koe pyekeana,” Ilisapetame lea-pyaa.
Ilisapeta doko wane tongata pituu kana tokange pateamopa Goteme enjele Gepetiele doko Galili yuu dokonya yuu taono Nasatete lenge dokonya pena lea-pyaa.
Yuu dokonya enda mapuakae mende akali Josepe lenge dokonya nyetana latae doko pii lamaiya pena lea-pyaa. Josepe doko Kiŋi Dapiti lenge dokonya tatanya mandipae-pyaa. Enda mapuakae doko kenge Matia lenge-pyaa.
Enjele Gepetiele dokome Matia peteamo andaka dokonya kolandatala baa lamaiyoo, “Emba mona yaepao pitipi! Kamongo dokome emba kandao mona epe palyetelyamo. Baa embapa awapa kalyambinona,” lea-pyaa.
Enjele dokome Matianya mona epe palisoo pii dutupa leamopa, Matiame mona andao etete walu lao pii doko aipale mende langilyape lao masia-pyaa.
Dokopa enjele dokome baa lamaiyoo, “Matia, emba paka nakayape! Goteme emba kandao mona epe palyetelyamo.
Kandeleno, embanya inginya wane ane mende palitamopa mandipala embame baa kenge Jisasa late.
Baa kenge soo katata. Baanya kenge doko Etete Ketae Katenge dokonya Ikiningina latami. Kamongo Goteme wane dokonya yumbange Dapitinya isingi kalai doko wane doko maita.
Baame kiŋi joo Jekope tata doko koteaka lao tanga tangapi isoo katata. Isoaka katao kayala nayatana,” enjele dokome dopa lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa Matiame enjele doko lamaiyoo, “Namba akali mendepa tole napilyo doko embame pii leeno doko aipa petala kiningi jetape?” lea-pyaa.
Dokopa enjele dokome Matia lamaiyoo, “Oli Sipitisa doko emba-ketae ipata. Etete Ketae Katenge pupu lapae dokome emba isoo katata. Goteme wane epe etete doko embanya inginya palyetakatamopa, embame manditino doko kandao kenge Gote Ikiningi latami.
Embanya kaiingi Ilisapeta lenge enda wambake kandapino dokonya inginya wane ane mende pilyamo. Wamba ingi pyakilyetae wane namandipengena lengema kandapino doko indupa wane tongata pitipumopa kana tokange patelyamo.
Goteme kalai mendaipi mende pyanya kokala naenge daape!” enjele dokome dopa lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa Matiame baa lamaiyoo, “Namba Kamongo dokonya kendemane endana, embame pii leeno doko namba-kisa epekena kapa lumuna,” lea-pyaa. Dopa lateamopa enjele dokome Matia yakinatala baa pea-pyaa.
Maitakao Matia sakatatala Jutia yuu dokonya yuu manda singi dupanya taono mendenya yapa pea-pyaa.
Pao pyakamatala baa Sakatayanya andaka kolandatala baanya kaiingi Ilisapeta kandao, “Auu pyoo petelepe?” lao pisia-pyaa.
Matiame baa pisiamo doko Ilisapetame siamo gii dokopaka Ilisapetanya ingi dokonya wane peteamo doko ema pia-pyaa. Dokopa Oli Sipitisa dokome ipao Ilisapetanya mona sakatasoo tumbalu pia-pyaa.
Dokopa Ilisapetame pii mende puu lao dapa lea-pyaa: “Goteme emba auu pisipumosa embame enda dupa pitaka ita minilino. Embanya inginya wane tee pilyamo doko Gotenya auu pipae.
Namba enda epe api kaita nambanya Kamongo dokonya endangi dokome namba kanja epepe?
Embame namba kandao pii lapino doko kaleme sipupa nambanya wane inginya pitipumu dokome mona etete yaepao ema pyuu petelyamo.
Kamongonya pii emba-kisa epeamo dupa tenda kiningi jetana lao masoo minapino dokonya emba mona yaepao pilyenona,” Ilisapetame dopa lea-pyaa.
Dokop Matiame lao pituu, “Nambanya moname Kamongo doko lao tama pilyo. Goteme namba pyoo nyilyamo doko lao masetala mona etete yaepelyo.
<range>
Namba baanya kendemane enda kenge nasingi doko kondo kaya. Indupapi tangapi endakalinya mandipaenya mandipae dupa pitakame namba Goteme mona yaepasiana latami.
Gote etete pupu lapae dokome namba-kisa kalai andake doko piana baa eteteaka epe.
Endakalinya mandipaenya mandipae baa andanda semaiyoo paliuu pelyami dupa baame kondo kayao katenge.
Baa pupu lapae dokome kalai andake mende pia. Nyakama tangeme alyasale joo kalyamano lao masingi endakali dupa baame watao nepa nepa pia-pyaa.
Baame kiŋi pupu lapae dupa isa pyandatala, kenge nasingi endakali dupa minalyia.
Opale daa jilya endakali dupa epeme kapa pisetala, opale longo silya endakali dupa mee pena lao watao pingi.
Baame naimanya yumbange dupapi, Apotakame dokopi, Apotakamenya mandipaenya mandipae palitami dupa pitakapi dupa nisotona leamoli pyoo, baanya kondo kaenge mana doko kame sala nayao kalai akali Isataele dupa nisoo kateana,” lao Matiame wee joo lea-pyaa.
<range>
Dopa latala baa Ilisapetapa kana tepomapi mende pitipala baanya andaka pilyia-pyaa.
Indupa enda Ilisapetanya wane mandipenge gii doko epeamopa, wane ane mende mandea-pyaa.
Enda dokonya makisa katengepi palupi dupame wane doko manjomo lapae sepala Kamongo dokome baa etete kondo kayalame lumu lao Ilisapeta mona yaepeamoliaka piami-pyaa.
Koto kalange pateamopa koto tukulapo dokonya wane ŋaŋa dokonya elya pingi kambu kepakamaipenge gii doko epea-pyaa. Dokopa endakali dupame limbatala wane doko baanya takangenya kenge lengeli pyoo, “Sakataya lamana.” leami-pyaa.
Dopa leaminoaka doko, endangi dokome dokaita lamaiyoo, “Daa, wane doko kenge Jone lamanana!” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa dokaitame baa lamaiyoo, “Embanya apangepi kaiingipi kenge doko lenge mende nakatengena,” leami-pyaa.
Dopa latala kingimiaka makande pyoo takange doko pisoo pituu, “Embame wane doko kenge api lakamili lao masilipi?” leami-pyaa.
Dopa leaminopa takange dokome pepa pingi selesa mende peena lao kingimi makande pia-pyaa. Selesa mende maitiaminopa pepa pyao pituu, “Wane dokonya kenge Jonena,” lao baame pepa pia-pyaa. Dopa lao pepa piamopa endakali dupame kandatala mona andeami-pyaa.
Gii dokopaka pupae lao Sakatayanya nengekaita dee lumbiamopa baame Gote lao tama pia-pyaa.
Dokopa baanya makisa katenge endakali dupame paka kayami-pyaa. Jutia yuu manda dupanya katenge endakali pitakame Sakatayapi enda wanepi dutupanya lao pii longo lao tayami-pyaa.
Lao tayamino doko siamino endakali dupa pitakame dapa lao masiami-pyaa: Kamongo dokome wane doko pupu lao nisoo katapalumuna lao masetala lao pituu, “Tenda wane doko aipale joo katata lusilyamape?” leami-pyaa.
Oli Sipitisa doko ipao wane dokonya takange doko-kisa tumbiamopa, baame potopesa joo dapa lea-pyaa:
“Naimame Isataele dupanya Kamongo Gote doko lao tama pyoo katamana. Baanya endakali dupa kii tamao pyoo nyalanya epea.
Baame baanya potopesa etete epe tee pyao kateamino dupa lungu piamopa leamoli pyoo, naimanya Pyoo Nyingi Akali pupu lapae doko katena lea. Akali doko Gotenya kalai akali Dapiti tata dokonya katena lea.
<range>
Akali ongome naimanya yandapipi dupapi naima etete auu nakaenge dupapi dupanya kingilyaka naima pyoo nyia.
Baame naimanya yumbange dupa kondo kayapala pii etete epe lao seteamo doko masetayaka katea-pyaa.
Baame naimanya yumbange Apotakame doko-kisa pii lalu lao lelyona leamoli pyoo naima-kisa pitoo lao pilyamo.
Baame naima indupa paka nakayao baanya kalai pyakalapale lao yandapipi dupanya kinginya naima pyoo nyilyamo.
Naima katatamano gii doko pitaka etete epe tolatae joo baanya enombasa katao baame leamoli pyoo pyoo katatama.
Wane, emba Gote Etete Ketae Katenge dokonya potopesana latami. Emba wambao pupala Kamongo doko epena lao kaitini dupa depa lakamaiti.
Dopa pitinopa Kamongo dokome baanya endakali dupanya koo dupa kunanya nepao pyoo nyingina lao embame endakali dupa mana lamaiti.
Naimanya Gote dokome endakali eteteaka kondo kaelyamo dokonya-kaita Kamongo dokome endakali pyoo nyingi. Dee naimanya Gote dokome endakali eteteaka kondo kaelyamo dokonya-kaita yuu yongasingi bui dokome naima tii piseta.
Goteme naima mona lyuu lao kalyepape lao bui dokome naima iminjetaenya petenge kumapenge endakali dupa tii pisala ipata,” Sakatayame dopa lea-pyaa.
Dokopa Sakatayanya ikiningi doko andao angi joo mona kyoto jia-pyaa. Dopa pyoo katao Isataele endakali dupame kandapenge gii doko naepeamopa, wambao endakali napalenge yuu mendasa malisoo katea-pyaa.
Akali Okasatasa lenge doko Loma yuu dokonya Kapomanenya Isingi Mupa katao baame yuu pitakanya endakali dupa kenge pepanya setena lao baame pii doko yuu pitakanya wai lao taya-pyaa.
Akali Saitiniasa lenge doko Sitia yuu dokonya kapomane andake kateamo gii dokopa, endakali dupanya kenge pepanya kandasoo piami-pyaa.
Kenge pepanya setena lao yuu wakale katenge endakali mendai mendai lao dupa nyakama tangenya yuu taono dupanya peami-pyaa.
Dokopa Josepe baa Dapiti tatanya mandipae dokonyana Galili yuu dokonya taono Nasatete katao, Jutia yuu dokonya Dapitinya taono Beteleme lenge dokonya pea-pyaa.
Enda Matia doko Josepenya nyetana latae peteamo dokonya awapa kenge setambana lao peambi-pyaa. Enda doko wane tongata peteamopa awapa peambi-pyaa.
Pao pyakamatala peteambinopa Matia wane maita pia-pyaa.
Dokopa Matiame baanya wane mupa ane doko mandea-pyaa. Mandipala lapalapame ambo pyapala mena pulumakawanya nee nenge tapoko mendenya setapala isoo petea-pyaa. Endakali opone palenge anda dokonya palipenge panda nasiamosa dopa pia-pyaa.
Kuka dokonya yuu dosale mena sipisipi setao katenge akali mendapuame nyakamanya mena sipisipi dupa pau mendenya setao kateami-pyaa.
Kateaminopa Kamongonya enjele mende ipupala akali dupa-pipa kalyu pia-pyaa. Kamongonya tii pipae dokome dokaita-kisa tii piyoko leamopa, akali dupame kandatala etete pakame kumiami-pyaa.
Dopa piaminopa enjele dokome dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakama paka nakayalapape! Nambame wai pii epe mende minao nyakama langya epelyona salapape! Wai pii epe dokome endakali pitakanya mona etete yaepaseta.
Indupa kuka gii dakepa enda mendeme Dapitinya taono dokonya nyakamanya Pyoo Nyingi Akali doko mandipilyamo. Baa Kataisa. Baa Kamongo doko.
Wane doko dapa petae silyamona, nyakamame kandatala baa lamo lao masalamino. Endangi dokome wane doko lapalapa mendeme ambo pyapala mena pulumakawanya nee nenge tapoko mendenya palelyamona kutao pao kanjaminona,” lea-pyaa.
Enjele dokome dopa lateamopa dee kaitinya enjele kambu etete andake mendeme yapa ipao baa-pipa tole katapala dokaitame dapa lao Gote tama pyoo wee leami-pyaa:
“Gote kaitinya katenge doko lao tama pilyamanona pyepape! Baame isa endakali dupa etete auu kayao masilyamona, nyakama mona lyuu lao kalyepape!” lao wee leami-pyaa.
Dopa latala kaiti-kisa pateaminopa, sipisipi setao katenge akali dupame lao pituu, “Mende pyomo lao Kamongome naima langyomo doko Beteleme dokonya yapa kanja muaa,” lao mende lamai lamai piami-pyaa.
Dopa petala dupame Beteleme dokonya yapa pupala Matia Josepepa dolapopi dee wane doko mena pulumakawanya nee nenge tapoko mendenya siamo dokopi dutupa kutao pao kandeami-pyaa.
Dupame kandatala enjele dokome wane dokonya lao pii lamaiyamo siamino dupa lao paneami-pyaa.
Lao paneaminopa pii doko siamino endakali dupa pitaka mona andeami-pyaa.
Dopaka doko, Matiame sepala pii dutupa pitaka baanya monanya nene yapao masoo petea-pyaa.
Wamba enjele dokome akali mena sipisipi setao katenge dutupa kandao lamaiyamoli pyoo angi kandatala siamino dupapi kandeamino dupapi dutupa pitaka lao masetala Gote lao lalyoo tama pyoo pilyiami-pyaa.
Koto gii tukulapo dokonya wane dokonya elya pingi kambu kepakamaipenge gii doko epea-pyaa. Dokopa wane dokonya elya pingi kambu kepatakamaitala wane doko kenge Jisasa leami-pyaa. Wamba Matianya inginya wane napeteamopa enjele mendeme kenge lena leamo dokoaka leami-pyaa.
Kamongonya mana setapae dupanya dapa lao pepa pyapae singi-pyaa: “Enda mendeme wane mupa doko ane mende mandea kandeno doko, Kamongo dokonyana lao manjepape!” latae singi-pyaa. Dopa lapae singili pyoo Jisasanya endangi takangepame Kamongome mana setapae Mosese maiyamo dupa watao minao wane endangipa dolaponya kaimala pipae walya pyao nepala pupenge gii doko epeamopa, dolapome wane Jisasa doko Kamongo doko maiyanya mandyuu Jetusaleme yuu dokonya peambi-pyaa.
<range>
Dee Kamongonya mana setapae dupanya dapa lapae singi-pyaa: “Yaka imi lapoma maiyepape! Daa tamo kandao doko, yaka maileo yakane mendalapo maiyepape!” lapae singi-pyaa. Dopa lapae singiliaka pyoo dolapome Kamongo lao tama pyoo epe mendalapo kundi joo maiyanyaka peambi-pyaa.
Gii dokopa akali Simione lenge mende Jetusaleme yuu dokonya katea-pyaa. Baa akali epe tolatae joo katao Gote lao tama pyoo katenge-pyaa. Akali mendeme Isataele endakali dupa mona yaepasoo kii tamao nyala ipatana lao malisoo katelyamopa Oli Sipitisa doko baa-kisa katenge-pyaa.
Oli Sipitisa dokome wambao Simione doko kandao dapa lamaiya-pyaa: “Emba yapa kumala nayate. Kamongo dokonya Kataisa doko kandatala kumatena,” lea-pyaa.
Yuu mende Oli Sipitisa dokome akali Simione dokonya mona sakatasiamopa baa losuu anda andake dokonya pea-pyaa. Gii dokopa Jisasanya endangi takangepame Kamongonya mana seteamoli pyoo losuu anda andake dokonya wane doko mandyuu peambiaka-pyaa.
Peambinopa Simione dokome wane doko kopyoo nyepala Gote lao tama pyoo dapa lea-pyaa:
“Kamongo, embame leenoli pilino doko namba embanya kendemane doko mona lyuu lasetala yakinape.
Naima pyoo nyetamo doko nambanya lengeme kandatelyo.
Pyoo nyingi doko endakali pitakanya enombanya panateleno.
Baa tii pipae dokome endakali tata waka dupa tii pisoo emba tata Isataele dupa kamongaseta.” Simioneme wane doko lao masetala pii dutupa lao Gote tama pia-pyaa.
Baame pii dutupa lateamopa wane dokonya endangi takangepa dolapome sepala moname longo lao masoo peteambi-pyaa.
Dokopa Simioneme wane Jisasapi endangi takangepi dutupa Goteme auu pisina lao loma setakamaitala, Jisasanya endangi Matia doko lamaiyoo, “Kandeleno, Isataele endakali longo dupa wane dake-kisa kapa pao lombapae setaminopa dee longo dupame sakatatamina lao Goteme baa panasetelyamo. Dokonya endakali longo dupame nyakamanya masingi yalo petae katenge dupa panasoo tanga lataminopa, itate mendeme embanya mona doko yangatana,” Simioneme lea-pyaa.
<range>
Gii mendai dokopaka potopesa enda Ana lenge mende petea-pyaa. Baa Asaa tata akali Panyuele dokonya wanenge enda wambake etete mende-pyaa. Baa wamba mapuakaesa akali nyepala akalingipa awapa ee kana kalange pitipiambinopa akalingi kumia-pyaa.
Akalingi kumapeamopa baa walyakae ee kana kingi ita tukulapo-kisa dee kitomende pituu, losuu anda andake doko yakinala nayao petenge-pyaa. Kuka kotakapi baame Gotenya kalai pyakamaiyoo loma soaka pituu nee nanenge gii epelyali pyoo nanao petenge-pyaa.
Matiapi, Josepepi, wane dokopi losuu anda andake dokonya kateamino gii dokopaka baa dutupa kateamino tengesa dosa ipupala Gote lao tama pima-pima pia-pyaa. Jetusaleme dokonya Pyoo Nyingi Akali doko malisoo kateamino endakali dutupa pitaka enda Aname wane dokonya lao pii lamaiya-pyaa.
Endangi takangepa dolapome Kamongo dokome pii lao seteamo mana dupa pitaka minao etapala, Galili dokonya pao nyilyambonya yuu taono Nasatete lenge dokonya andaka pilyiambi-pyaa.
Dokonya katao wane doko andapala angi jia-pyaa. Baame manapi masingipi longo lao nyoo kateamopa Goteme baa auu kaya-pyaa.
Ee kana dii lao Jisasanya endangi takangepa dolapome Napinya Kayamo Gii epe dokonya Jetusaleme yuu dokonya pengembali pyoo, Jisasa baa ee kana kingi ita mende-kisa dee lapoma katapeamopa gii epe dokonya Jetusaleme pengemali pyoo awapa peami-pyaa.
<range>
Maitakao Napinya Kayamo Gii doko etapeamopa wane Jisasa doko Jetusaleme dokonya mee katea-pyaa. Baanya endangi takangepame wane doko Jetusaleme mee kalyamona lao masala nayao andaka pilyoo peambi-pyaa.
Dolapome wane doko endakali dupa-pipa awapa pao pimina lao masiambi-pyaa. Dopa lao masoo pupala alemandi dokonya nyilyambonya palupi kaita miningipi dupa-pipa wane doko awapa pao kalyamipi lao kutiambi-pyaa.
Kutao kayapala Jetusaleme dokonya kutala pilyiambi-pyaa.
Yuu gii tepo dokonya dolapome losuu anda andake kame dokonya kolamatala, baame mana lenge akali dupanya kainanya pituu dupanya pii dupa sepapu piseta pyoo peteamo kandeambi-pyaa.
Akali dupa pitakame baanya masepaepi pii yanu piapi dupa sepala moname longo lao masiami-pyaa.
Endangi takangepame walu lao baa kandeambi-pyaa. Kandatala endangi dokome Jisasa lamaiyoo, “Wane, embame aipuma nalimba kandao dopa pyepe? Embanya takangepa nalimbame mona etete kenda kayao emba kutao katapumbana,” lea-pyaa.
Dokopa Jisasame dolapo lamaiyoo, “Aipa lao masetala namba kutao katambipi? Nambame nambanya Takangenya anda dakenya pititina lao nyilyambome masala nayapimbipi?” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa dolapome baanya pii leamo dokonya tenge masala nayambi-pyaa.
Dokopa baa dolapo-pipa andaka pupala dolaponya pii watao minao katea-pyaa. Dopa piamopa Matiame Jisasanya piipi manapi dutupa pitaka monanya nene yapao masoo petea-pyaa.
Jisasa baanya masingi epepi yongepi lapotanya andama-andama pyoo katea-pyaa. Dopa pyoo katao Gotepi endakalipinya enombasa baa koteaka lao akali epe doko katea-pyaa.
Wamba Kapomane Isingi Akali Mupa Taipitiasa lenge dokome Loma yuu doko pitaka ee kana kingi ita mende-kisa dee yuungi dupa isoo kateamopa, akali Pondiasa Pailate lenge doko yuu Jutia dokonya kapomane andake katea-pyaa. Gii dokopaka akali Etote lenge dokome yuu potopinja yakane Galili dokonya kapomanenya isingi akali katea-pyaa. Etotenya kaiminingi Pilipa lenge dokome yuu potopinja yakane Itutiapa Tekonaitasapa dolapo isoo katea-pyaa. Akali Laisaniasa lenge dokome yuu potopinja yakane Apilini doko isoo katea-pyaa.
Akali Anasa lenge dokopa Kayapasa lenge dokopa dolapo pitisa mupa kateambiaka-pyaa. Gii dokopa akali Sakataya ikiningi Jone lenge doko endakali napalenge yuu mendasa katea-pyaa. Baame pii lao katena lao Goteme baa pupu lasiamopa, Joneme endaki Jotane duu dokonya yuu singi dupa pitakanya pupala endakali dupa lamaiyoo, “Goteme nyakamanya koo pingi yanu dupa kunanya nepekena lao nyakama mona kapilyetala kaimbu nyalapape!” lao lamaiyoo katea-pyaa.
<range>
Dopa lao katatana lao potopesa Aisayame baanya pepa dokonya dapa lao pyaanya setea-pyaa: “Endakali napalenge yuu mendasa akali mendeme katapala wii lao, ‘Kamongonya kaitini doko depa lanya setakamaiyepape! Baanya kaitini dupa tolasakamaiyepape!
Yuu manda andakepi yakanepi dupa amao tanapala yuu yuli dupa kitumalapa! Kaitini uanga pipae dupa pitaka tolasetala kana nengenenge katapae singi kaitini dupa pyoo wasalapa!
Dokopa Goteme endakali dupa pyoo nyalanya kalai pingi doko endakali pitakame kandatamina,’” dopa lao pepa pyapae sia-pyaa.
Dokonya endakali tata longo dupa Joneme kaimbu pyekena lao ipata piaminopa, baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakama kanopato pambeanya mandipae dupa, apimi nyakama Goteme kapa pao imbu kayata doko langipumosa paka kayao wandyalanya epelyamipi?
Nyakama mona kapilyetala endakali mona kapilyetae dupame mana miningimali pyoo minalapape! Nyakamame nyakama tangenya mona dokome, ‘Apotakame naimanya takangena,’ lao masala nayalapape. Kana silyamo datupa Goteme kapa pao Apotakamenya wane jina lapyalina lao nambame nyakama langilyo.
Uaa doko ita tengenya depa latae sepelyamo. Dii epe manja naenge ita doko pitaka pokanya setapala itatenya soo yangatana,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa endakali limbatae peteamino dupame lao pituu, “Dopa tamo doko naimame aipa piamape?” lao piseta piami-pyaa.
Pisiaminopa baame dokaitanya pii yanu pyakamaiyoo, “Endakali mende yonge pee lapoma pyoo katatamopa endakali mende napyoo katatamo kandao doko, pyoo katatamo dokome mende maina! Endakali mende nee nao katatamopa, mende nanao katatamo doko mainakana!” lea-pyaa.
Dee takisa nyingi akali mendapua kaimbu pyekena lao ipupala dupame baa lamaiyoo, “Mana Lenge Akali, naimame aipa pimape?” leami-pyaa.
Dopa leaminopa baame dupa lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame takisa doko kapomaneme mana seteamoli pyoo nyepala dee mendapua konda pyoo nyala nayalapape!” lea-pyaa.
Dee yanda singi amii mendapuame ipupala baa pisoo, “Naimame aipa pimape?” leamiaka-pyaa. Dopa leaminopa baame dupa lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame endakali dupa pyalanya pyoo oapi dupa pake joo nyakamaiya nayalapape! Nyakamame endakali mendenya munipi oapi mende nyakamaiyanya sambo kosa lao paka pisala nayalapape! Dee nyakamame nyakamanya yole nyingi dupa kapana lao masalapapena,” lea-pyaa.
Joneme dopa lao kateamopa endakali dupa pitakame longo lao masetala Jone doko Kataisa taa aipape lao masiami-pyaa.
Dopa lao masiaminopa Joneme dupa pitaka lamaiyoo, “Nambame nyakama endakimi kaimbu pyekelyoaka doko, akali mende epelyamo dokonya pupu lapae dokome nambanya pupu lapae doko ita miningi. Baanya moko pee pingi kende dolapo tata lakamaipenge namba epe daa. Baame ipupala Oli Sipitisapa itatepa dolapome nyakamanya kaimbu pyakatana,” lea-pyaa.
“Baame baanya yati doko minao wiisa angi imbupi pyasoo silyamo dupa pitaka yapapala angi dupa baanya nee setenge anda dokonya setata. Imbu dupa ita konjala naenge dokonya soo yangatana,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa latala endakali dupa mona sakatasakamaiyanya Wai Pii Epe tenge longo dupa waipa soo lamaiyoo katea-pyaa.
Yuu mende yuu potopinja yakane isingi akali Etote lenge dokome baanya kaimininginya etanenge Etotiasa lenge doko tondao nyepala mana koo waka mendapua miniamosa Joneme endakali dupa lamaiyoo, “Baame kopeta pilyamona,” lao mana lamaiya-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa Etoteme baanya mana koo miniamo dupa pitakanya waipa soo Jone doko anjingi anda dokonya anjetae palena lea-pyaa.
Yuu mende Joneme endakali epeamino dupa pitakanya kaimbu doko pyakamaiyoo pituu, Jisasanya kaimbu pyakamaiyaka-pyaa. Jisasame kaimbu doko nyepala loma soo katemopa kaiti doko saa papa laloo pia-pyaa.
Dopa piamopa Oli Sipitisa doko yaka maileo joo Jisasa-kisa epeamopa, pii mende kaitinya katao leamo dokome lao pituu, “Emba nambanya Ikiningi mona setenge dokona, nambame emba kandao mona epe palyingina,” lea-pyaa.
Jisasa baa ee kana kingi ita tepomapi mende katapala baanya kalai tee pyao pyaanya pia-pyaa. Dokopa endakali dupame baa kandao Josepe ikiningina lao masiami-pyaa. Josepe baa Ilai ikiningi.
Ilai baa Matate ikiningi. Matate baa Lipai ikiningi. Lipai baa Melekai ikiningi. Melekai baa Janai ikiningi. Janai baa Josepe ikiningi.
Josepe baa Matatayasa ikiningi. Matatayasa baa Emosa ikiningi. Emosa baa Neame ikiningi. Neame baa Esalai ikiningi. Esalai baa Nakai ikiningi.
Nakai baa Meata ikiningi. Meata baa Matatayasa ikiningi. Matatayasa baa Semene ikiningi. Semene baa Joseke ikiningi. Joseke baa Jota ikiningi.
Jota baa Joanane ikiningi. Joanane baa Lesa ikiningi. Lesa baa Setapapele ikiningi. Setapapele baa Siatiele ikiningi. Siatiele baa Netai ikiningi.
Netai baa Melekai ikiningi. Melekai baa Atai ikiningi. Atai baa Kosame ikiningi. Kosame baa Elemetame ikiningi. Elemetame baa Ea ikiningi.
Ea baa Josua ikiningi. Josua baa Eliase ikiningi. Eliase baa Jotimi ikiningi. Jotimi baa Matate ikiningi. Matate baa Lipai ikiningi.
Lipai baa Simione ikiningi. Simione baa Juta ikiningi. Juta baa Josepe ikiningi. Josepe baa Joname ikiningi. Joname baa Elayakimi ikiningi.
Elayakimi baa Melia ikiningi. Melia baa Mena ikiningi. Mena baa Matata ikiningi. Matata baa Netane ikiningi. Netane baa Dapiti ikiningi.
Dapiti baa Jesi ikiningi. Jesi baa Opeta ikiningi. Opeta baa Boasa ikiningi. Boasa baa Sila ikiningi. Sila baa Nasone ikiningi.
Nasone baa Aminatape ikiningi. Aminatape baa Atamina ikiningi. Atamina baa Ani ikiningi. Ani baa Esotone ikiningi. Esotone baa Petesa ikiningi. Petesa baa Juta ikiningi.
Juta baa Jekope ikiningi. Jekope baa Aisake ikiningi. Aisake baa Apotakame ikiningi. Apotakame baa Teta ikiningi. Teta baa Neo ikiningi.
Neo baa Setaka ikiningi. Setaka baa Liu ikiningi. Liu baa Peleke ikiningi. Peleke baa Ipa ikiningi. Ipa baa Sila ikiningi.
Sila baa Kenana ikiningi. Kenana baa Apasata ikiningi. Apasata baa Sema ikiningi. Sema baa Noa ikiningi. Noa baa Lemeke ikiningi.
Lemeke baa Metusala ikiningi. Metusala baa Inoko ikiningi. Inoko baa Jeteta ikiningi. Jeteta baa Malalili ikiningi. Malalili baa Kenana ikiningi.
Kenana baa Inosa ikiningi. Inosa baa Sete ikiningi. Sete baa Atame ikiningi. Atame baa Gote ikiningi.
Joneme baanya kaimbu doko pyatakamaiyamopa Jisasame endaki Jotane doko yakinea-pyaa. Dokopa Oli Sipitisa dokome baa-kisa tumbatala laminao endakali napalenge yuu mendasa pea-pyaa.
Yuu gii kingi ita kitomende endakali napalenge yuu dosa kateamopa, Sataneme baa minao makande peta pia-pyaa. Gii dutupa Jisasa baa nee mendaipi mende nanao katapala lopo kaya-pyaa.
Dokopa Sataneme baa lamaiyoo, “Emba Gote Ikiningi tamo kandao doko, embame kana dake kapilyetala nee jina laa!” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa Jisasame baanya pii yanu pyakamaiyoo, “‘Endakali mende nee nenge tenge dokonya iki saka nakatengena,’ lao pepa pyapae silyamona,” lea-pyaa.
Dokopa Sataneme baa kaiti ketaele laminao pyakalyetala isa yuu dake pitaka lee mendai kandena lao laitaka pia-pyaa.
Laitaka petala Sataneme Jisasa lamaiyoo, “Dupanya isepenge kalaipi dee kalai dupanya kenge singipi dupa pitaka namba-kisa sepelyamona emba ditoana, nambame masingili pyoo mokosepenge.
Dopana, embame namba lao tama pyoo luma lakatenopa, kalaipi oapi dupa pitaka embanya joo setana,” lea-pyaa.
Dokopa Jisasame baanya pii doko yanu pyakamaiyoo, “Pii mende dapa lao pepa pyapae silyamo: ‘Embame embanya Kamongo Gote doko tama pyoo baanya iki kalai pyakamaiyoo katape!’ lapae silyamona,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa lateamopa Sataneme Jisasa laminao Jetusaleme pupala losuu anda andake kame etete ketae dokonya katena lea-pyaa. Dopa latala baame Jisasa lamaiyoo, “Pii mende dapa lao pepa pyapae silyamo: ‘Goteme baanya enjele dupame emba isokondape pina laapomona,’ dee ‘Aopyoo latala kaname embanya mokopi mende koyatame lao enjele dupame emba kopyoo nyalamino.’ Dopana, emba Gote Ikiningi tamo kandao doko, ketae dokonya katao isa manga!” lea-pyaa.
<range>
<range>
Dopa leamopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “‘Embame embanya Kamongo Gote doko minao makande napipi!’ lapae silyamona,” lea-pyaa.
Dokopa Sataneme baanya makande dupa pitaka pyoo etapala gii waka mendepa baa makande pyaanya malisoo Jisasa yakinea-pyaa.
Dokopa Oli Sipitisa dokome Jisasa pupu lasoo kateamopa, Galili yuu dokonya pilyoo pea-pyaa. Dokome baanya lao pii lapae mende Galili yuu doko pitakanya taya-pyaa.
Baame nyakamanya losuu anda dupanya mana lamaiyamopa endakali pitakame baa lao tama piami-pyaa.
Dokopa endangi takangepame baa wane kolesa wambao isiambino yuu Nasatete dokonya dee pilyia-pyaa. Pilyetala koto Sambasa dii lao Jutamanya losuu andaka pengeli pyoo baame losuu anda dokonya pao kolandatala Gotenya pii dupa itaki pyao lamaiyanya toya katea-pyaa.
Dokopa dokaitame potopesa Aisayanya pepa pyapae doko baa maiyaminopa baame pepa doko tata lapala pii dokonya mende kutao kandatala dapa lao itaki pia-pyaa:
“Kamongo dokonya Oli Sipitisa dokome namba isilyamo. Nambame endakali tipya dupa Wai Pii Epe doko lamaipi lao baame yapao nyia. Baame namba puu lao pituu: ‘Endakali anjetae palenge dupa Goteme mokao nyepelyamona, endakali lenge koo dupa Goteme lenge tasetekelyamona lao pii lamaiya puu lea. Dee endakali kenda pipaenya anjetae joo katenge dupa nambame mokao nyala puu lea.
Kamongo dokome baanya endakali dupa pyoo nyotona lao gii seteamo doko lao panala puu leana,’” lao Jisasame itaki pia-pyaa.
Itaki pyatala pepa doko lakao yaki petala isingi akali doko maiya-pyaa. Maitala peteamopa endakali losuu andaka peteamino dupa pitakame baa iki kandokondape piami-pyaa.
Dokopa baame pii waipa soo dupa lamaiyoo, “Nambame pii itaki pyao lapupa salamino gii dakepa pii doko kiningi jetelyamona,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa baanya pii tende pipae dupa soo mona andapala baanya iki lakamaiyoo, “Akali dake Josepenyaka ikiningi daa kandamuape?” leami-pyaa.
Dokopa baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame namba kandao pii mana dapa lao kapa pao laapimino: ‘Dokosaa, embame emba tangenya yaina doko mee injisepe,’ laapimino. Dee nyakamame Kapaneame yuu dokonya kalai tata wamba sakateamo dupanya atome pii dupa sepala namba kandao, ‘Dopaka pyoo embanya yuu tenge dakenya pipi!’ latamina,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa latala baame lao pituu, “Nambame nyakama kiningi langilyona, potopesa mendeme baanya yuu tenge dokonya katao pii lao panelyamopa dokaitame baa lanyala naengema.
Nambame kiningi etete nyakama langilyona, wamba akali Ilainja kateamo gii dokopa Isataele yuu dupa pitakanya ee kana tepoma-kisa dee kana tokange dupanya aiyuu naipao painaka piamopa lopo andake mende sia-pyaa. Yuu dokonya enda walyakae longo peteami-pyaa.
Peteaminoaka doko, Goteme akali Ilainja doko enda dupanya mendaipi mende-kisa pena laa naya-pyaa. Goteme baa Saitone yuu yakane Satepata yuu dokonya enda walyakae mende peteamo dokonya pena lea-pyaa.
Dee potopesa Ilaisa kateamo gii dokopaka Isataele yuu dokonya endakali kopetali longo kateamino dupanya mendaipi mendenya kopetali doko mee nanjiamopa, Sitia tange akali Nemane lenge dokonya yonge doko iki Goteme mee injisia-pyaana,” Jisasame dopa lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa losuu anda dokonya endakali peteamino dupa pitakame pii dutupa sepala moname imbumi kumiami-pyaa.
Imbu kayao, sakatatala yuu taono dokonya Jisasa watao netesa nepalanya soo tuu lao peami-pyaa. Yuu taono doko yuu manda mendenya siamopa dokonya nete papatale menda-kaita laminao pao soo pyale lamana lao masiami-pyaa.
Dopa lao masiaminoaka doko, Jisasame dupanya kainanya langate petala pea-pyaa.
Jisasa Galili yuu dokonya taono Kapaneame lenge dokonya pupala, Sambasa gii dupanya baame endakali dupa mana lamaiyoo katea-pyaa.
Jisasame mana lamaiyamo dupa endakali dupame sepala, baanya pii doko pupu lapae joo leamosa walu lao paka kayami-pyaa.
Dokopa akali enjele koo paleta mende losuu andaka peteamo dokome puu lao ae lao dapa lea-pyaa:
“Kanau, Nasatete tange Jisasa, emba Gotenya akali epe etete doko kalyeno nambame kandengena, embame naima aipa pyaa epepe? Embame naima minao koyasala epepe?” lea-pyaa.
Dokopa Jisasame baa pyalanya lao, “Embame embanya nengekaita lyokatala akali dake yakinatala puu!” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa enjele koo dokome endakali kateamino kaina dokonya akali doko lombanya setapala baa pateamopa akali doko koyala naya-pyaa.
Dokopa endakali pitakame mona andapala mende lamai lamai pyoo, “Baame enjele koo palenge dupa isoo pii pupu lao pena lamailyamoli pyoo dokaitame endakali dupa yakinatala pengema lamo doko baanya pii dake aipale mende laa kanjemape?” leami-pyaa.
Baame dopa piamo dokonya atome pii doko yuu dosa tange dupa pitakame siami-pyaa.
Dokopa Jisasame losuu anda doko yakinatala akali Saimonenya andaka pea-pyaa. Saimonenya enda imange doko yaina nyepala yonge etete itaita koo piamo siamopa, “Jisasa, embame enda doko nisetepe?” lao endakali dupame pisiami-pyaa.
Dokopa Jisasame enda doko siamo tengesa dosa ipao katapala, yaina itaita piamo doko kandao pii puu lao, “Mee jaa!” leamopa enda dokonya yaina doko mee jia-pyaa. Gii dokopaka enda dokome yapa sakatatala dokaitanya nee yangakamaiya-pyaa.
Niki landa pyalanya piamopa endakali dupa pitakame nyakamanya palu dupanya yaina tata wakale wakale paleta dupa laminao epeaminopa baame baanya kingi doko endakali dokaita pitaka-kisa setapa piamopa dokaita pitaka auu pipae jeta piami-pyaa.
Dopaka pyoo enjele koo endakali longo mendapua-kisa palenge dupame endakali dupa yakinatala pao pituu, ae lalya lana pyoo, “Emba Gote Ikiningina,” leami-pyaa. Enjele koo dokaitame baa Kataisa dokona lao masetala panala naena lao baame kyoto joo dokaita lamaiyoo, “Pii kayalapa!” lea-pyaa.
Yuu yongatala niki pyakayamopa Jisasa kamanda ipupala endakali napalenge yuu mendenya pea-pyaa. Dokopa endakali dupame baa kutao ipupala baa mendasa patame latala kaita lyokalanya pyoo kateami-pyaa.
Dopa pyoo kateaminoaka doko, baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Goteme isilyamona lapae Wai Pii Epe dake nambame yuu taono waka tange dupa apata lamaipengeaka. Tenge dokonya baame namba puu leana,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa latala baame Jutia yuu dokonya losuu anda dupanya pii lamaita pyoo katea-pyaa.
Koto mendepa Jisasame endaki Genesatete pete lemba dokonya katapala endakali longo dupame Gotenya pii doko salanya tuu tuu lao epeami-pyaa.
Dokopa baame sipi lapoma endaki lemba dokonya siamo kandea-pyaa. Wapaka nyingi akali dupame sipi dolapo yakinatala wapaka nyingi mandi dupanya kuni pateamo dupa kaimbu pyao nepao kateami-pyaa.
Dokopa Jisasame Saimonenya sipi dokonya pyakalyetala baa lamaiyoo, “Embame sipi tuu lanya endakinya kuki omosale pyasa!” lea-pyaa. Dokopa baame sipi dokonya katao endakali dupa mana lamaiya-pyaa.
Mana lamaiyoo etapala baame Saimone lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame nyakamanya wapaka nyingi mandi dupa endaki lumu omosale pyandatala wapaka nyalapale mona, sipi dake tuu laa!” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa Saimoneme baanya pii yanu pyakamaiyoo, “Naimame kuka gii doko luu napaliuu wapaka kutawaka katao etete lekeleke tapala wapaka mende nanyalamanokana, Akali Andake, embame leenoli pyoo wapaka mandi dupa dee pyandatowana,” lea-pyaa.
Dokopa dokaitame Jisasame leamoli piaminopa wapaka etete longo mandinya ipao palea-pyaa. Dokopa mandi dupa lapyalanya pia-pyaa.
Dopa piamopa nyakamanya kalai awapa pyoo paenge akali sipi mendenya peteamino dupame, “Naima nisala ipupa!” lao kiango piami-pyaa. Dopa piaminopa akali dutupame ipupala sipi dolaponya wapaka mandipiaminopa sipi dolapo endakinya landa pyalanya pia-pyaa.
Dokopa Saimonepi, akali Sepete ikiningi Saimone-pipa awapa kalai piambino Jemesapi Jonepi, dee endakali baa-pipa awapa kateamino dupa pitakapimi wapaka nyiamino doko kandatala pakame kumiami-pyaa. Dokopa Jisasame moko kateamo dosa Saimone Pitame tombauli sepala lao pituu, “Namba akali koo pingina, Kamongo, embame namba kayapala puu!” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa Jisasame Saimone lamaiyoo, “Emba paka nakayape! Indupa pituu tee pyao embame endakali dupa lete katena lao nyoo katatena,” lea-pyaa.
<range>
<range>
Dopa lateamopa dokaitanya sipi dolapo pyalya lao nyoo endaki lemba kee dokonya setapala oapi dupa pitaka yakinatala baa watao peami-pyaa.
Jisasa yuu taono mendenya kateamopa akali kopetalimi etete koyapae mendeme Jisasa kandatala baa kateamo dosa tombauli sepala dapa lao tee lea-pyaa: “Akali Andake, embame nambanya kopetali doko mee jakatoo lao maseteno kandao doko, kapa pao mee jakalapenona,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa lateamopa Jisasame akali doko kingimi watandatala lao pituu, “Nambame emba mee jipili lao masilyona, emba mee jaa!” lea-pyaa. Dopa lalu piamo gii dokopaka akali dokonya kopetali yaina doko mee jia-pyaa.
Mee jeteamopa Jisasame akali doko kyoto joo lamaiyoo, “Embame dake endakali mendaipi mende etete lamaiya naenya, pitisa dokome emba kandena puu! Dopa petala emba mee jilino doko dokaitame kandena laitaka pyoo wamba Moseseme mana seteamoli pyoo opale mende Gote lao kundi maiyalena,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamoaka doko, baanya kalai piamo dokonya pii doko tayamosa endakali kambu longo mendapuame Jisasanya pii doko sala ipao pituu nyakamanya yaina paleta dupa baame mee jekena lao ipata piami-pyaa.
Dokopa baame koteaka lao endakali napalenge yuu dupanya pao loma seta pingi-pyaa.
Koto mende Jisasame endakali dupa mana lamaiyoo kateamopa Patasi mendapuapi mana setapae dupanya lao mana lenge akali mendapuapi dupa ipao peteami-pyaa. Dokaita Galili yuu dokonya taono wakale wakale dupanyapi yuu Jutiapi Jetusalemepi dupanya katao ipupala peteami-pyaa. Kamongo dokome baa pupu lasiamopa baame endakali yaina pyapae dupa kapa pao mee jakamaipenge jia-pyaa.
Dopa piamopa akali mendapuame akali papa tambotae mende lapa tokonya soo epeami-pyaa. Dokaitame akali doko soo Jisasa andaka kateamo tengesa dosa setamana lao masoo soo tuu lao kolandao makande piami-pyaa.
Makande piaminoaka doko, endakali longome tumbatae kateamino dokome andaka kolandapenge nanjia-pyaa. Dopa piamosa soo anda-ketae pyakalyetala anda doko tunguiyami-pyaa. Dopa petala baanya lapa toko doko kende katatala baa lapa toko doko-pipa endakali peteamino kaina dokonya Jisasanya enomba-kaita pyandeami-pyaa.
Dokopa Jisasame dokaitanya masoo miningi dupa kandatala lao pituu, “Wane, embanya koo dupa kunanya nepekelyona,” lea-pyaa.
Pii leamo doko sepala mana setapae masingi akalipi dee Patasipi dupame nyakamalapo lao pituu, “Gote ikimi koo dupa kapa pao kunanya nepakamaipenge jilyamona, akali dake apimi Gote kilya kandao lelya kanjemape?” leami-pyaa.
Dopa lelyamino lao Jisasame kandatala dokaita lamaiyoo, “Aipuma nyakamame moname dopa lao masilyamipi?
Anduku laa nayapengepe? Akali dakenya koo dupa kunanya nepakamailyona lapenge dokope, pande baa sakatatala kaita paena lapenge dokope?
Dopaka doko, Endakalinya Ikiningi dokome isa yuu dakenya katao endakali dupanya koo dupa kunanya nepenge pupu lapae doko baa-kisa singi lamo lao kanjepalena,” lea-pyaa. Dopa latala baame akali papa tambotae doko lamaiyoo, “Emba sakata! Sakatatala embanya lapa toko doko nyoo soo andaka puu lelyona,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamo dokopaka akali dokome dokaitanya enombasa sakatatala baanya lapa toko doko nyepala soo baanya andaka pea-pyaa. Pao pituu Gote lao lalyema pea-pyaa.
Dopa piamopa endakali dupa pitaka walu lao mona andao paka kayapala Gote lao lalyoo pituu, “Indupa gii dakenya naimame angi waka mendapua kanjemanona,” leami-pyaa.
Dopa petala Jisasame kamaka pyakalyetala pao pituu muni takisa nyingi akali Lipai lenge mende takisa nyingi anda ongonya peteamo doko kandatala lamaiyoo, “Embame namba watao ipu!” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa akali doko sakatatala baanya oapi dupa pitaka yakinatala Jisasa watao pea-pyaa.
Akali Lipai dokome baanya andaka Jisasanya nee longo yangakamaiyamopa takisa nyingi akalipi endakali wakapi longo dupa awapa dolapo-pipa nee nao peteami-pyaa.
Peteaminopa akali Patasipi dupanya mana setapae masingi akalipi dupame pii mumu longo lao Jisasanya disaipele dupa lamaiyoo, “Aipuma nyakama akali takisa nyingipi mana koo minao paenge endakali dupa-pipa neepi endakipi awapa nao pilyamipi?” leami-pyaa.
Dokopa Jisasame dokaitanya pii sepala yanu pyakamaiyoo, “Endakali yaina napingi dupa dokosaa katatasa pupenge nanjilyamo. Yaina pyapae dupa pupenge jilyamo.
Nambame endakali epe tolatae dupa mona kapilyina lao epena laanya naepeo. Endakali mana koo minao paenge dupa mona kapilyina lao epena laanya epeona,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa akali mendapuame baa lamaiyoo, “Akali Jonenya disaipele dupame yuu gii longole nee nanao loma seta pilyamino. Patasi dupanya disaipele dupame dopaka pingima. Dopaka doko, embanya disaipele dupame neepi endakipi dupa nawaka kalyaminona,” leami-pyaa.
Dokopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Akali mendeme enda kelyapala watapae pyao baanya kaita miningi dupa-pipa awapa kalyamo gii dokopa, dokaitame nee nanena lao nyakamame kaita lyokapimilipi? Etete kapa pao kaita lyokala nayapimili!
Dopaka doko, yuu gii mende ipatamo dokopa enda kelenge akali doko dupanya kainanya nyokonyetatamopa dupame nee nanao katatamina,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa latala baame kongali pii mende dokaita lamaiyaka-pyaa: “Endakali mendaipi mendeme yonge pee enenge mendenya kanguoo nyepala yonge pee wambatae tii telya mendenya kii pimbala naenge. Baame dopa pitamo kandao doko, yonge pee enenge doko koyasetatamopa yonge pee wambatae doko enenge dokopa mendai dopaleaka nanjeta.
Dee endakali mendaipi mendeme waene enenge doko mena meme yanungimi penge wasepae wambatae dupanya kambuoo pisala naenge. Mendeme dopa pitamo kandao doko, waene enenge dokome bolo lapala penge doko polapala kai laa yuunya patamopa penge dupa apata koyataka.
Dopaka doko, waene enenge doko penge enengenyaka pisepenge.
Dee endakali mendeme waene wambatae doko nakande soo sepala waene enenge mende nawani nakaenge. Baame waene wambatae doko iki auu pipaena lenge daape!” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
Sambasa gii mendenya Jisasame wiisa ee kaina mendenya kaita peamopa, baanya disaipele dupame wiisa dii mendapua kii lao nyepapu kuka pinya nepata napapyoo peami-pyaa.
Dopa piaminopa Patasi mendapuame lao pituu, “Aipuma nyakamame mana setapae dupa nepao Sambasa gii dokonya daa latae singi mana doko minilyamipi?” leami-pyaa.
Jisasame pii doko yanu pyao, “Nyakamame Dapitimi piamo doko pepanya itaki pyala nayamipi? Baapi baa-pipa awapa kateamino akali dupapimi lopo kayapala Gotenya losuu anda dokonya kolandatala betesa Gotenyana lao setapae pitisa dupame iki napenge dupa nyepala baa-pipa awapa kateamino dupa maiyoo nea-pyaana,” lea-pyaa.
<range>
Dopa latala Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Endakalinya Ikiningi dokome Sambasa gii doko isoo kalyamona,” lea-pyaa.
Dee Sambasa gii mendenya Jisasame Jutamanya losuu anda mendenya kolandatala endakali dupa mana lamaiyoo kateamopa, akali kingi tolae-kaita kumapae mende petea-pyaa.
Peteamopa mana setapae masingi akalipi dee Patasipi dupame Jisasa kosimi lamana lao masetala baame endakali yaina pyapae mende Sambasa gii dokonya mee injisilyape daape lao baa isokondape pyoo peteami-pyaa.
Dopa lao masoo peteamino doko kandatala Jisasame akali kingi kumapae doko lamaiyoo, “Emba sakatatala ipao kaina dakenya toya kata!” lea-pyaa. Akali doko sakatatala toya katea-pyaa.
Dokopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nambame nyakama pii mende pisilyo. Mana setapae dupame naima langyoo aipa lelyape? Sambasa gii dokonya koo pipenge doko kapa pelyape, pande epe pipenge doko kapa pelyape? Endakali mende pyao kumasepenge doko kapa pelyape, pande pyoo nyepenge doko kapa pelyape?” lea-pyaa.
Dopa latala baame endakali pitaka kandayoko lao kandatala akali doko lamaiyoo, “Embanya kingi doko tinoka!” lea-pyaa. Akali dokome Jisasame leamoli piamopa kingi doko dee auu pia-pyaa.
Dopaka doko, Patasipi mana setapae masingi akalipi dupame etete imbumi kumapala lao pituu, “Naimame Jisasa doko aipa pimape?” lao nyakamalapo leami-pyaa.
Gii dokopa Jisasame manda mendenya loma salanya pyakalyia-pyaa. Pyakalyetala Gote lao loma soo katao yuu kuisetala yongasia-pyaa.
Yuu yongateamopa baame baanya disaipele dupa epena latala akali kingi ita-kisa dee lapoma dutupa yapao nyia-pyaa.
Akali Saimone doko Jisasame kenge mende Pita leamo dokopi, Saimonenya kaiminingi Endutu dokopi, Jemesapi, Jonepi, Pilipapi, Batolomyupi, Matyupi, Tomasapi, Jemesa lenge Aopiasa ikiningi dokopi, Saimonekenge mende Selote lenge dokopi, Jutasa lenge Jemesa ikiningi dokopi, Jutasa Isaketiote lenge Jisasa enge nyiamo akali dokopi dutupa yapao nyepala kenge aposele lea-pyaa.
<range>
<range>
Jisasame akali dutupa-pipa yuu lama mendasa lanao ipupala baanya disaipele longopi, Jutia yuu doko pitakanya endakali etete longo epeamino dupapi, Jetusaleme tangepi, solowata pete andake dokonya lembanya yuu singi Taya tangepi, Saitone tangepi dupa awapa kateamiaka-pyaa.
Dokaitame Jisasanya pii doko salanya ipao pituu dee baame nyakamanya yaina dupa mee injisekena lao epamiaka-pyaa. Enjele koo dupame endakali kenda pisiamo dupa epeaminopa Jisasame dupanya enjele koo paleamo dupa watao nepakamaiyoo mee injisakamaiya-pyaa.
Jisasanya pupu lapae dokome endakali auu pisiamosa endakali pitakame baa kingimi watandalanya ipata piami-pyaa.
Dokopa Jisasame baanya disaipele dupa kandatala lao pituu, “Nyakama endakali tipya dupa Goteme isoo kalyamona lao mona yaepao kalyamino.
Nyakama indupa lopo kayao katenge endakali dupa tiaka kayao katatamana lao mona yaepao kalyamino. Nyakama ee lao katenge endakali dupa gii kayao katatamana lao mona yaepao kalyamino.
“Endakali dupame nyakama kandao imbu kaengyowapi dee nyakama maka kayapala pii koo lawaka nyakamanya lao nambonambo pyowapi pitaminopa, dokaitame Endakalinya Ikiningi doko daa lao masetala dopa pilyaminona lao nyakama mona yaepao katatami.
Endakali dupame nyakama kandao dopa lataminopa, nyakamame nyakamanya yole etete andake kaiti-kisa silyame lamona lao masoo mona yaepao lyoo katatami. Dupanya yumbange dupame potopesa dupa kandao dopaka piami daape!
“Dopaka doko, nyakama oapi longo setelyamino dupanya mona yaepasingi tenge dupa indupa etapelyamona koyatami iki lamo!
Dee indupa nyakama nee napala tiaka kaelyamino dupame tenda lopo kayao koyatami iki lamo! Dee indupa nyakama mona yaepatala gii kayao kalyamino dupame tenda mona kenda kayapala ee lao koyatami iki lamo!
Wamba dokaitanya yumbange dupame sambo potopesa dupanya kenge minalyiaminoli pyoo endakali pitakame nyakamanya kenge minalyetamino kandao doko, nyakama koyatami iki lamo!
“Dopana, nyakama nambanya pii silyamino dupa dapa lao langilyo: nyakamame nyakamanya yandapipi dupa-pipa auu kayao kalyepape. Nyakama kandao imbu kaengelyamino endakali dupa nyakamame mana epe lamaiyepape.
Nyakama koyasalanya pii lelyamino endakali dupa auu pyoo katena lao Gote lao loma sakamaiyepape! Dee nyakama minakasoo kenda pisilyamino endakali dupa lao masetala Goteme kondo kaena lao loma salapape!
Akali mendeme embanya wakena yangi takyoo pia kandeno dokopa, embame kapilyetala yangi etete pina lapeaka. Akali mendeme embanya yonge pee pingi kisa doko nyia kandeno doko, isa pingi doko awapa daa laa naenya nyina kayapeaka.
Endakali dupame oapi mende emba-kisa tee latamino doko embame maipi. Akali mendeme embanya oapi mende nyia kandeno doko, embame yanu pyekena laa nayape.
Endakali dupame nyakamanya pyakapimili lao masetamili pyoaka nyakamame dupanya pyakamaiyepape.
“Nyakamame endakali nyakama auu kayatamino dupa iki auu kayatamino kandao doko, apimi nyakamanya mana doko ‘Yaka minilyaminona,’ lakatape? Endakali koo mana minao paenge dupame dokaita auu kayatamino endakali dupaka auu kaengema daape.
Endakali nyakama auu pisingima dupa iki itingi auu pisatamino kandao doko, apimi nyakamanya mana doko ‘Yaka minilyaminona,’ lakatape? Endakali koo mana minao paenge dupame dokaita auu kayamailyamino endakali dupaka auu kayamaingima daape.
Nyakamame nyakamanya oapi mende yanu pyapenge endakali dupa iki maitamino kandao doko, apimi nyakamanya mana doko ‘Yaka minilyaminona,’ lakatape? Mana koo minao paenge endakali dupame dopale yango dupa oapi maitala dopaka pyoo yanu nyemana lao masingima daape.
Dopana, nyakamame nyakamanya endakali yandapipi dupa auu kayalapape! Nyakamame dupa auu kayao oapi mende maitala yanu pyakatamina lao masala nayalapape. Nyakamame dopa pitaminopa etete epe mende nyakama-kisa seta. Dee nyakama Etete Ketae Katenge dokonya ikiningi katatamiaka. Epe nyilyamino dupanya tange doko lao masala naenge endakali dupapi koo pingi endakali dupapi dupa kandao Goteme kondo kaenge.
Nyakamanya Takange kaitinya katenge dokome nyakama kondo kaengeli pyoo nyakamame endakali dupa kondo kayalapape.
“Nyakamame endakali mende koo epe lao yapala nayalapape! Dokopa Goteme nyakama koo epe lao yapala nayataka. Nyakamame endakali mende-kisa tenge setamopa kenda pisala nayalapape! Dokopa Goteme nyakama kenda pisala nayataka. Nyakamame dokaitanya koo pingi yanu dupa kayalapape! Dokopa Goteme nyakamanya koo dupa kunanya nepakata.
Nyakamame nyakamanya epe dupa endakali dupa maiyepape. Dopa pitaminopa Goteme epe dupa nyakama dita. Baame eteteaka longo dupa dyoo tumbasetala minao lyanda lyanda lao tuu lanya pyandatamopa eteteaka tumbao kai lala pupenge jeta. Dopa pyoo Goteme nyakama oapi dupa sanga pyata. Nyakamame endakali dupa maitaminoliaka pyoo Goteme nyakama ditana,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa latala Jisasame pii dokonya waipa soo dee kongali mende dokaita lamaiyoo, “Akali lenge koo mendeme lenge koo yango mende kapa pao kaitini laitaka pitape, pande lapota yuli mendenya pyakatambipi? Dolapo yulinya pyakatambi daape!
Dee disaipele mendeme baa mana lamaingi dokonya alyasale joo nakatenge. Dopaka doko, baa mana nyoo etapala baa mana lamaingi dopale jeta.
“Aipuma embame emba tangenya lenge dokonya ita waiyepae andake silyamo doko nakandenya embanya endakali yango mendenya lengenya kuni silyamo doko kandakamaiyoo kalyepe?
Embame emba tangenya lenge dokonya ita waiyepae andake silyamo doko kandala naeleno doko aipa pyoo embanya endakali yango doko kandao, ‘Kaimia, embanya lengenya kuni silyamona nyakatoo,’ latepe? Emba sambo akali epe jili pyoo kalyeno! Wambao embanya lengenya ita waiyepae andake silyamo doko nyoo nepao embanya lenge takondape petala endakali yango mendenya lenge kuni silyamo doko kapa pao nyoo nepakamaitina,” lea-pyaa.
“Ita epe dupame dii koo namandenge. Ita koo dupame dii epe namandengeaka.
Ita mendenya dii mandelyamo dupa endakali dupame wambao kandatala ita angi doko dopale lamo lao masingima. Endakali mendeme makua ita mendenya kapa pao anga lyao nanyingi. Dee ikililyambu kende mendenya kopi lyao nanyingiaka daape.
Endakali epe mendeme baanya monanya mana epe palelyamo dokoaka miningi. Dee endakali koo mendeme baanya monanya mana koo palelyamo dokoaka miningi. Endakali monanya palelyali pyoo kambunya pyakalyingina,” lea-pyaa.
“Nyakamame namba kandao, ‘Kamongo, Kamongo,’ lelyaminoaka doko, aipuma nambanya pii doko watao minala naelyamipi?
Akali mende namba-kisa ipao nambanya pii soo latoli pitamo akali doko dapalena lao langilyona salapape!
Akali dokome baanya anda pyaanya muku minapala yuu kyoto mendasa anda pia-pyaa. Dopa peteamopa maitakao endaki andake lyiamopa anda doko takyalanya piamoaka doko, baame anda doko kyoto joo piamo dokonya emapi mende napia-pyaa.
Dopaka doko, endakali mendeme nambanya pii doko sepala watao minala naenge akali doko dapale: baame baanya anda piamo doko muku minala naenya mee yuunya piamosa maitakao endaki lyepala anda doko yapa takyepala etete koya-pyaana,” lea-pyaa.
Jisasame endakali dupa pii lamaiyoo etapala baa yuu taono Kapaneame lenge dokonya pea-pyaa.
Peamopa yanda singi amii isingi akali mende yuu dokonya katea-pyaa. Akali dokonya kendemane baa tange mona setenge mende kateamo doko yaina nyepala etete kumapenge joo sia-pyaa.
Dokopa yanda singi isingi dokome Jisasa doko kalyamo lapae sepala Jutamanya isingi akali mendapuame Jisasa tee lao lanyakala pena lao pituu, “Nambanya kendemane doko nisekena laminao ipupape,” lea-pyaa.
Dokaitame Jisasa kateamo dokonya pupala kyoto joo dapa lao tee leami-pyaa: “Amii isingi dokome naima nisoo naimanya losuu anda doko pyekeana, baa akali auu pipaena, embame baanya pii doko sakamaiyoo nisakapili yakana,” leami-pyaa.
<range>
Dopa leaminopa Jisasa baa dokaita-pipa ipupala yanda singi isingi akali dokonya andalyaasa joo epeaminopa, yanda singi isingi dokonya kaita miningi mendapuame baanya wai minao pupala Jisasa lamaiyoo, “Akali Andake, emba maka kayatena naipupi! Emba nambanya andaka kapa pao ipupenge namba akali epe, daa.
Namba akali koo doko emba-kisa ipupuli doko kapa najipyalina lao masilyo. Dopaka doko, embame piimi iki latenopa nambanya kendemane doko saka paapomo.
Namba apata akali kenge singi mendenya pundipundi katenge. Dee yanda singi mendapua nambanya pundipundi katengemaka. Dupanya mende pena lelyopa, baa penge. Mende epena lelyopa, baa epenge. Dee nambanya kendemane mendeme mende pina lelyopa, baame pingina,” lelyamona lao baanya wai minao epeamino akali dupame leami-pyaa.
Dopa leaminopa Jisasame sepala akali doko kandao longo lao masia-pyaa. Dopa petala endakali longo baa watao epeamino dupa kandapilyetala lamaiyoo, “Nambame Isataele endakali dupanya masoo miningi akali dopale mende etete nakandapuna lao nyakama langilyona,” lea-pyaa.
Dokopa yanda singi amii isingi dokome pena leamopa epeamino akali dupa pilyoo andaka peaminopa, kendemane doko mee katengeli petae kateamo pao kandeami-pyaa.
Taita dopa pyoo Jisasa yuu taono Nena lenge dokonya pea-pyaa. Baanya disaipele dupapi endakali kambu longo mendapua-pipa awapa peami-pyaa.
Yuu taono dokonya lome kambu tengesa dosa peaminopa akali mendapuame akali kumapae mende malu pyaanya soo epeami-pyaa. Akali kumiamo dokonya endangi dokome wane mendai doko iki mandipiamopa enda dokonya akalingi doko wamba kumia-pyaa. Yuu taono dokonya tange endakali longo dupa enda doko-pipa awapa epeami-pyaa.
Kamongo dokome enda doko kandatala kondo kayapao pituu, “Emba ee kaya,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa latala baame tengesa pupala kingimi akali kumapae soo epeamino lapa toko dokonya watandeamopa, akali soo epeamino dupame mee sakatae kateami-pyaa. Dokopa Jisasame lao pituu, “Wane! Emba sakata lelyona, sakata!” lea-pyaa.
Dokopa wane kumapae doko sakatatala dee pii lao peteamopa, Jisasame baa endangi dokopa awapa pena lea-pyaa.
Dopa piamopa endakali dupa pitakame paka kayapala Gote lao tama pyoo, “Potopesa andake mende naimanya kainanya ipao katapelyamo! Goteme baanya endakali dupa kondo lao nisala ipatelyamona,” leami-pyaa.
Jisasanya lao pii dupa Jutia yuupi yuu waka dupa pitakanyapi lao tayami-pyaa.
Jisasanya lao pii doko lao tayaminopa Jonenya disaipele dupame pii dupa pitaka sepala Jone lamaiyami-pyaa. Lamaitiaminopa baame baanya disaipele lapoma epena latala Kamongo doko kateasa pii dapa lao pisala pena lea-pyaa: “Emba akali mende ‘Ipatana’ latae dokope, pande naimame akali waka mende malisemape?” lao pisala pena lea-pyaa.
<range>
Dopa lateamopa dolapome Jisasa kateamo dokonya pao tuu latala baa lamaiyoo, “Jone Kaimbu Pingi dokome nalimba emba katapisa pupa lao pituu, ‘Emba akali mende “Ipatana” latae dokope, pande waka mende malisemape lao pisala pupa,’ lamona,” leambi-pyaa.
Gii dokopa Jisasame endakali yaina tata tatame pyapae dupapi enjele koo paleta dupapi dupa auu pisakamaiyoo, endakali lenge koo dupa dee lenge tasakamaita pyoo katea-pyaa.
Dokopa Jisasame Jonenya disaipele dolapo lamaiyoo, “Nyilyambome pilyetala kandelyambino dupapi silyambino dupapi Jone lamaiyepape. Lenge koo dupa dee lenge telyamino. Moko koo dupa kaita paelyamino. Kopetali dupa mee jilyamino. Kaleketa dupame pii silyamino. Endakali kumapae dupa dee lenge tao kalyamino. Endakali tipya dupame Wai Pii Epe doko silyamino.
Dee akali mendeme namba maka kayapala mona lapo palyala naenge doko mona yaepasetae kalyamona, pii dutupa Jone lamaiyepape,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
Dokopa Jonenya pii minao epeambino dolapome Jisasanya pii doko sepala pilyeteambinopa, Jisasame endakali kambu pyao kateamino dupa Jonenya lao pii dapa lamaiya-pyaa: “Wamba nyakamame endakali napalenge yuu dokonya aki mende kanja peamipi? Kembo maitangepi mende poome ema-ema pyoo kateamo kanja peamipi?
Pande akali mende yonge pee epe tambo lapae yati pipae mende pyoo kateamo kanja peamipi? Yonge pee epe yati pipae pyoo opale apalepi epe longo setengema dupa yuu isingi kiŋi dupanya andaka katengema.
Kiniaka doko, nyakamame aki mende kanja peamipi? Potopesa mende kanja peamipi? Kini, baa potopesa kateamo kandeaminoaka doko, baa mee potopesa mende daana lelyo.
Akali doko kandao dapa lao pepa pyapae silyamo: ‘Kaneleno! Nambame nambanya wai minao paenge akali doko embanya wambao pekena latopa embanya kaita doko depa lanya setakatana,’ lapae silyamo.
Yuunya endakali dupa pitaka Joneme ita minao kalyamona lao nambame nyakama langilyo. Kiniaka doko, endakali mende Goteme isilyamo endakali dupanya etete anasale joo katenge dokome Jone ita miningi.
“Wamba Jonenya pii doko siamino endakali dupa pitakapi takisa nyingi akali dupapi dupame Jonenya kaimbu nyiamino dokome Gotenya pii nyakama-kisa siamo doko tolataena lao lao paneami.
Dopaka doko, akali Patasipi mana setapae masingi akalipi wamba Jonenya kaimbu nanyiamino dupame Goteme nyakamanya epe pyakamaitona lao masiamo doko maita maiyami.
“Dopana nambame endakali indupa kalyamino dupa aki mendepa makande pyuape? Dokaita aipa pipaema laa kanjemape?
Wane kole dupame kamapi dupanya kambu lapoma pyao pitipala pii dapa lao yanu pyaloo pyoo lengema: ‘Naimame nyakamanya pulupapulatakalamanoaka doko, nyakama lyala nayalamino! Nyakama kondo kayao ee latalamanoaka doko, nyakamame itingi laa nayalamino!’ Wane dupame opa lao katengemana, nyakama dopalema lamona,” lea-pyaa.
“Jone Kaimbu Pingi doko ipupala nee endakipi epe mende nanao katapumopa nyakamame baa kandao, ‘Enjele koo mendeme baa minao kyakasilyamona,’ lelyamino.
Indupa Endakalinya Ikiningi doko ipupala nee endakipi epe nao katamopa nyakamame baa kandao, ‘Nee endakipi tuu lao nawaka katao takisa nyingi akalipi koo mana minao paenge endakali dupa-pipa kaita minao kalyamona,’ lelyamino.
Dopaka pyoo endakali dupame Gotenya masepae doko watao minatala dokopa, baanya masepae doko tolataena lao panasingimana,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
Akali Patasi mendeme Jisasa baanya andaka nee nambana epena leamopa Jisasa pao andaka kolandatala nee nalanya petea-pyaa.
Dokopa yuu taono dokonya enda mana koo minao paenge mendeme, ‘Jisasa baa Patasi dokonya andaka nee nalanya ipao pilyamona,’ lapae sia-pyaa. Sepala enda dokome wele penge yakane mendenya wele tunduma pipae peteta mende minao epea-pyaa.
Ipupala Jisasanya moko seteamo dosa pitipala ee leamosa ee ipange epeamo dokome Jisasanya moko tombe lea-pyaa. Dokopa enda dokonya asili iti dokome kunanya nepakamaiyoo baame Jisasa lao tama pyoo baanya moko dolapo nunu longo pyoo wele kai lao kai pyakamaiya-pyaa.
Dokopa Jisasa epena leamo akali Patasi dokome kandatala dapa lao masia-pyaa: “Akali dake kini potopesa mende pili kandao doko, enda dokome baa watandelyamo dokopa baa mana koo minao paengena lao masipyalina,” lao masia-pyaa.
Dopa lao masiamopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Saimone, emba nambame pii mende langitoo,” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa Saimoneme baa lamaiyoo, “Mana Lenge Akali, embame pii doko laa,” lea-pyaa.
Dokopa Jisasame lao pituu, “Akali mendenya saandi lapoma akali lapoma-kisa sia. Mende doko-kisa muni kina andate yuungi siamopa, mende doko-kisa kina kingi ita yuungi siana,” lea-pyaa.
Akali dolapome saandi dolapo kapa pao yanu pyatambili nanjiamo kandatala akali saandi tange dokome dolapo kandao yanu napyakatambina latala kayalakao kaya-pyaa. Dopana, dolaponya andukumi baa etete auu kaya lusilyamape?” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa Saimoneme pii yanu pyao, “Akali saandi andake siamo dokome etete auu kaya lumuna,” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Embame auu pyoo masoo leenona,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa latala baame enda doko enomba maitae katao Saimone lamaiyoo, “Embame enda dake kandelepe? Namba embanya andaka ipupupa, embame nambanya moko kaimbu pyatale lao endaki nanjenoaka doko, enda dakeme baanya lengenya ee ipange dokome nambanya moko tombe latakala baanya asili iti dokome kunanya nepakalamo.
Embame namba andaka lanyoo nunu napyenoaka doko, enda dakeme namba andaka kolandalo dokopa namba tama pyoo nambanya moko dolapo nunu pyoaka pituu yapa kayala naelyamo.
Embame nambanya aiyombanya olipi ipangeme kai napyakalenoaka doko, enda dakeme nambanya moko dolapo wele tunduma pipaeme kai pyakalamo.
Enda dakeme etete auu kayapumu dokome baanya koo longo dupa kunao nepatekelyamo lao laitaka pilyamo. Dopaka doko, endakali mendeme baa tangenya koo kunao nepatae dupa kuki lamona lao masilyamo dokome Gote kukiaka auu kaengena lao emba langilyona,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa latala Jisasame enda doko lamaiyoo, “Embanya koo dupa etapelyamona,” lea-pyaa.
Dokopa akali baa-pipa awapa tokonya nee nao peteamino dupame nyakamalapo lao pituu, “Akali dake apimi koo dupa, ‘Etapelyamona,’ lelya kanjemape?” leami-pyaa.
Dopa leaminopa Jisasame enda doko lamaiyoo, “Embame masoo minapino dokome emba pyoo nyepelyamona, mona yaepatala puu,” lea-pyaa.
Maitakao Jisasame yuu taonopi mee yuupi dupanya payao Gotenya isingi dokonya lao Wai Pii Epe doko endakali dupa panao lamaiya-pyaa. Baanya disaipele kingi ita-kisa dee lapoma dutupa awapa payami-pyaa.
Enda mendapua wamba Jisasame enjele koo paleamopa watao nepakamaiyoo yaina pyapae mendapua nisiamo dupa baa-pipa awapa payamiaka-pyaa. Enda dokonya mende kenge Matia Makatala tange lengema doko-kisa wamba enjele koo kalange paleamopa Jisasame watao pyakamaiyamo dokopi, Etotenya anda isakamaingi akali Susa lenge mendenya etanenge Joana lenge dokopi, enda Susana lenge dokopi, dee enda waka longo mendapua awapaka baa-pipa peami-pyaa. Enda dutupame Jisasapi baanya disaipele dutupapi dupa munipi oapi dupame niseta pyoo payami-pyaa.
<range>
Endakali longo dupa taono dupanya katao ipupala Jisasa kateamo dokonya kapata kapata piami-pyaa. Dokopa Jisasame kongali pii dake dokaita lamaiya-pyaa:
“Akali mendeme baanya ee wai lyandala pea-pyaa. Pupala lyandeamopa wai yangi kaitinisa peamopa, endakali peami dupame moko kateami-pyaa. Yaka dupame ipao nao eteami-pyaa.
Yangi lyandeamo dupa kana palenge yuunya pea-pyaa. Peamo dupa langa lateamoaka doko, yuu ipange napaleamosa buu tao kumia-pyaa.
Yangi lyandeamo dupa lyiki tenge palengenya peamosa lyiki dupa awapa langa lao andapala ee wai dupa kuii pyambea-pyaa.
Wai yangi dupa yuu epenya pao langa latala dii andate mendai lawaka mandea-pyaana,” lea-pyaa. Jisasame pii dutupa latala puu lao, “Nyakama kalekaita singi dupame pii doko salapapena!” lea-pyaa.
Jisasanya disaipele dupame, “Kongali pii dokonya tenge doko akipi?” lao baa pisiami-pyaa.
Dokopa baame pii yanu pyao, “Goteme baanya isingi dokonya yalo petae dupa nyakama laitaka petelyamo. Dopaka doko, endakali waka dupame lengeme kandatala angi doko nakandena lao, dokaitame pii sepala masala naena lao kongaliaka silyaminona,” lea-pyaa.
“Ee wai lyandeana lao kongali lalo dokonya tenge doko dapa petae silyamo: ee wai doko Gotenya pii doko.
Ee wai mendapua kaitininya peamo dokaita joo endakali mendapuame Gotenya pii silyaminoaka doko, masoo minataminopa Goteme pyoo nyetame latala Sataneme ipupala monanya pii masingi doko nyoo nepenge.
Ee wai mendapua kana palenge yuunya peamo dokaita joo endakali mendapuame Gotenya pii doko auu kayao kaleme silyaminoaka doko, moname auu pyoo masala naengema. Dupame gii kuki masoo minilyaminoaka doko, makande pingi mendeme pilyamo gii dokopa pii doko yapa yakinengema.
Ee wai mendapua lyiki tenge palengenya peamo dokaita joo endakali mendapuame Gotenya pii doko sepala kalyaminoaka doko, auu pyoo katapu laka lao nea kaenge dupapi, muni akipi, dee mona yaepasingi tata tata dupapi dupame awapa pyalya minilyamopa ee wai dupa auu pyoo andao dii namandenge.
Dopaka doko, ee wai mendapua yuu epenya peamo dokaita doko endakali mendapuame Gotenya pii doko sepala mona epe paliuu pii doko yakinala nayao yapa maka nakayao dii mandengemana,” lea-pyaa.
“Endakali mendeme lama mende kaiyepala titopene penge mendeme sanga napingi. Palenge toko mendenya pundipundi setala naengeaka. Endakali andaka kolandatamino dupa tii pisina lao setapenge panda mendenya setenge daape.
Yalo petae silyamo dupa tenda Goteme panaseta. Sanga pyatae silyamo dupa tenda Goteme panasetamopa endakali dupame kandatamina,” lea-pyaa.
“Opale singi endakali doko konda pyoo maita. Dopaka doko, opale nasingi endakali mendeme silyamona lao masilyamo dolapo nyokonyetana, nyakamame pii aipa pyoo silyamape lao kandao soo kalyepape!” lea-pyaa.
Gii dokopa Jisasanya endangipi kaiminingipi dupa baa kateamo dokonya epeami-pyaa. Epeaminoaka doko, endakali longo limbiamino dokome dutupa baa kateamo dosa ipupenge nanjia-pyaa.
Endakali mendapuame Jisasa lamaiyoo, “Embanya endangipi kaiminingipi dupa kamanda katao emba kandapumali lao masilyaminona,” leami-pyaa.
Dokopa baame dokaitanya pii yanu pyao, “Gotenya pii doko soo watao minilyamino endakali dupa nambanya endangipi kaiminingipina,” lea-pyaa.
Koto mende Jisasapi baanya disaipele dupapi sipi mendenya pyakalyetala, baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Naima endaki pete lemba yangi-kaita muaa,” lea-pyaa. Dopa latala sipinya pituu peami-pyaa.
Pao pituu Jisasa baa sipi dokonya luu palea-pyaa. Palipiamopa poo andake mende endaki pete dokonya lao ipupala sipi doko endakimi tumbatala nyoo landa pyalanya piamopa endakali dupa koyapenge jia-pyaa.
Dokopa dokaitame Jisasa pyale tatala, “Akali Andake! Akali Andake! Naima indupa kumalanya pilyamanona kanda!” leami-pyaa. Dokopa baame sakatatala poopa endaki buli piamo dokopa dolapo kaena leamopa poo doko yatu leamopa endaki doko ema napia-pyaa.
Dopa piamopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakamanya masoo miningi doko aipimipi?” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa dokaitame etete paka kayapala mona andao mende lamai lamai pyoo, “Baame poopa endakipa dolapo kaena lapumopa dolapome baanya pii sakamaingimba lamo doko akali dake api laa kanjemape?” leami-pyaa.
Maitakao dokaitame sipinya pituu Getasa tangemanya yuu dokaita pao pyakameami-pyaa. Galili yuu doko endaki lemba yangi-kaita silyamopa Getasa tangemanya yuu doko lemba yangi-kaita singi-pyaa.
Jisasame sipi doko yakinatala lembatena pyakameamopa akali yuu taono dokonya tange enjele koo mendapua paleta mendeme ipao baa kandanyia-pyaa. Akali doko lapalapa yonge peepi wamba waka napyoo papataka katea doko mee katenge-pyaa. Baa anda mendenya palya nayao endakali malu kananda dupanyaka katenge-pyaa.
Akali dokome Jisasa kandatala baanya moko kateamo dosa tombauli sepala puu lao ae lao dapa lea-pyaa: “Emba Gote Etete Ketae Katenge dokonya Ikiningi Jisasa, embame namba aipa pitipi? Embame namba tanda andake nandipoko!” lea-pyaa.
Jisasame akali doko-kisa enjele koo paleamo doko kandao akali doko yakinatala pena leamosa akali dokome pii dopa lea-pyaa. Wamba enjele koo dokome paa longosa akali doko minanjetae kateamosa endakali dupame akali doko isoo katao kingipi mokopi dupa ŋili kendepi anengapupi dupame anjetala pilyaminoaka doko, baame dupa pindao nepata pingi-pyaa. Enjele koo mendeme akali doko lungu piseta pilyamosa baa endakali napalenge yuu dupanya pata pingi-pyaa.
Mana dopale dupa minao katenge doko Jisasame pisoo, “Emba kenge apipi?” lea-pyaa. Baame Jisasanya pii yanu pyao, “Namba kenge Longo lengena,” lea-pyaa. Enjele koo longo baa-kisa paleamino tenge dokonya kenge Longona lea-pyaa.
Dopa lateamopa enjele koo dokaitame Jisasa lamaiyoo, “Embame naima watao yuli koo etete koko dokonya pyandala nayape!” lao kongo leami-pyaa.
Nyakama kateami manda dokonya mena elyambu mende nao kateaminopa enjele koo dokaitame puu lao Jisasa kandao, “Naima mena dupanya koko landa pyamanalena, embame naimanya kaita lyokala nayapoko!” leami-pyaa. Dokopa Jisasame kaita lyokala naenya pena kaya-pyaa.
Pena kayateamopa enjele koo dupame akali doko yakinatala mena dupa-kisa pao landa pyateaminopa mena elyambu doko alo pyao pao papatale mendenya pyakatala endaki pete dokonya tumbitambi napala kumiami-pyaa.
Mena setao katenge akali dupame piamo doko kandatala yuu taono dokonya dee mee yuupi dupanya paka pupala piamo doko endakali dupa lamaiyami-pyaa.
Dokopa endakali dupame piamo doko kanjanya Jisasa kateamo dokonya epeami-pyaa. Ipupala enjele koo dupame yakinateamino akali dokome yonge pee petala mona paliuu Jisasanya moko kateamo dosa tengesa peteamopa dokaitame kandatala paka kayami-pyaa.
Piamo doko lengeme wambao kandeamino endakali dupame enjele koo paleamo akali doko Jisasame dopa pyoo auu pisalamona lao dokaita lamaiyami-pyaa.
Dokopa Getasa yuu doko pitakanya endakali dupame etete paka kayapala Jisasa lamaiyoo, “Embame naima yakinatala puu!” leami-pyaa. Dopa leaminopa Jisasa sipi dokonya pyakalyetala pilyoo paanya pea-pyaa.
Enjele koo dupame yakineamino akali dokome Jisasa lamaiyoo, “Namba embapa awapa katambana buaako!” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa Jisasame baa pena latala lamaiyoo, “Emba kayapala pilyoo embanya andaka puu! Pupala Goteme emba-kisa pyakalamo dupa pitaka lao tayape!” lea-pyaa. Dokopa akali dokome baanya yuu taono dokonya pupala Jisasame baanya pyakamaiyamo dupa endakali dupa pitaka panao lamaiya-pyaa.
<range>
Jisasa baa endaki pete dokonya lemba yangi-kaita katao pilyoo epeamopa endakali baa malisoo kateamino dupa pitakame yaka ipakalene lamo lao lanyiami-pyaa.
Dokopa Jutamanya losuu anda isingi akali Jaitasa lenge mende ipupala Jisasanya moko kateamo dosa tombauli sia-pyaa. Baanya wanaku mendai iki doko ee kana kingi ita-kisa dee lapomapi mende pitipiamopa kumalanya tengesa pianya baame Jisasa lamaiyoo, “Emba nambanya andaka buaako!” lea-pyaa. Dokopa Jisasa Jaitasanya andaka dokonya panya piamopa endakali longo dupame kaina kaina pyoo tambukinao peami-pyaa.
<range>
Gii dokopa enda mende petea-pyaa. Enda doko ee kana kingi ita-kisa dee lapoma dupanya koteaka lao andaka nao paliti-paliti silyamopa mendeme kapa pao mee injisakamaiya naengema-pyaa.
Enda doko Jisasanya maitakaita ipupala Jisasanya yonge pee ketae pingi londe dokonya puna dosa watandea-pyaa. Dopa piamopa enda dokonya andaka nao paliti singi doko pupae lao yatu latala mee injia-pyaa.
Dokopa Jisasame lao pituu, “Apimi namba kingimi watandelyape?” lao pisia-pyaa. Dopa lao pisiamopa dokaita pitakame lao, “Namba daa! Namba daaka!” leami-pyaa. Dee Pitame lao pituu, “Akali Andake, emba endakali longome katao kakopao etete tambukinilyaminona,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamoaka doko, Jisasame lao pituu, “Nambanya pupu lapae mendapua pupumosa dokonya endakali mendeme namba kingimi watandelyamona lao masilyona,” lea-pyaa.
Enda dokome nambame pyoo dupa Jisasame kandatalame lumu lao masetala baa walu lao Jisasa kateamo dosa tengesa ipao yuunya tombauli sia-pyaa. Dopa petala baame Jisasanya yonge pee puna dokonya kingimi watandeamo tenge dokopa dee baanya yaina doko pupae eteamo dokopa dolapo endakali pitakanya enombasa panao lea-pyaa.
Dokopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Wanaku, embame masoo minapino dokome emba mee injisilyamona, emba mona yaepao puu!” lea-pyaa.
Jisasame pii dopa lao kateamopa Jutamanya losuu anda isingi akali Jaitasa dokonya andaka katenge akali mendeme ipupala Jaitasa lamaiyoo, “Embanya wanaku doko kumatalamona, Mana Lenge Akali doko deaka embame kenda pisala nayape!” lea-pyaa.
Dokopa Jisasame pii doko sepe sepalaka doko, baame Jaitasa lamaiyoo, “Embame paka nakaenya masoo minao katape! Dokopa embanya wanaku doko saka pakalapomona,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa latala baa isingi akali dokonya andaka pupala baame endakali waka dupa andakote, “Kolandala nayalapape!” daana latala, “Pitapi, Jonepi, Jemesapi, wanaku dokonya endangi takangepa dolapopi dutupa namba-pipa andakote kolandamana,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa latala dutupa kolandateaminopa endakali andaka peteamino dupa pitakame wanaku doko lao eaka lao yamataka lao kateami-pyaa. Dokopa Jisasame dupa lamaiyoo, “Nyakama ee kayalapa! Wanaku dake kumala nayalamo. Baa luu palelyamona,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa dokaitame wanaku doko kumatalamona lao masetala baa kilya kandao gii kayami-pyaa.
Dopaka doko, Jisasame wanaku dokonya kinginya minatala puu lao, “Wanaku! Emba sakata!” lea-pyaa.
Dokopa wanaku doko dee lenge tatala baa pupae sakatea-pyaa. Sakateamopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame nee mendapua baa maiyepa!” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa wanaku dokonya endangi takangepa dolapome etete mona andeambi-pyaa. Dopaka doko, Jisasame dolapo lamaiyoo, “Pilyamo dake nyilyambome endakali mende lamaiya nayalapape!” lea-pyaa.
Dokopa Jisasame disaipele kingi ita-kisa dee lapoma dutupa epena lao nyoo kambu pyatala kalai mendapua isina lao dokaita pupu lasia-pyaa. Pupu lasetala enjele koo tata tata dupa watao pyapengepi yaina dupa mee jakamaipengepi kalai dupa dokaita maiya-pyaa.
Maitala dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame Gotenya isingi dokonya lao pii lamaiyoo, yaina nyepae dupa mee jakamaiya pupape!
Paanya pituu pangalipi mende naminao nokainapi, neepi, munipi opale mende manja nayao yonge pee pingi mendai iki pyoo pupape.
Pataminopa endakali mendeme nyakama andaka lanyia kandeno doko, anda dokonyaka kalyepape. Dee paanya pituu, anda doko yakinalapape.
Endakali mendapuame nyakama taeme ipamini lamo lao lanyala nayami kandeno doko, nyakamame yuu taono doko yakinatala pao pituu, dupame kandatala masina lao nyakamanya mokonya kuni kungumapi patatamo dupa lyanda lanya nepalapape!” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
Dopa lateamopa dokaitame pupala taono yakane dupa pitakanya payao Wai Pii Epe doko lamaiyoo yaina pyapae dupa pitaka mee jakamaiyami-pyaa.
Jisasame piamo dupa pitakanya atome pii dupa yuu yakane isingi akali Etote dokome sia-pyaa. Endakali mendapuame, “Jone Kaimbu Pingi doko malunya sakatapyana,” leami-pyaa. Mendapuame, “Akali Ilainja doko sakatapya lamona,” leami-pyaa. Dee mendapuame, “Potopesa wamba kateamino dupanya mende malunya dee sakatapya lamona,” leamiaka-pyaa. Dopa leamino doko sepala Etote mona andea-pyaa.
<range>
Dopa pyoo katao Etoteme lao pituu, “Nambame Jonenya mange kepatewaka doko, pii longo silyo akali doko api lusilyamape?” lea-pyaa. Baame Jisasa kandapu laka lao masoo kutao katea-pyaa.
Maitakao aposele dupa pilyoo ipupala nyakamame kalai wakale wakale piamino dupa pitaka Jisasa lamaiyami-pyaa. Dokopa baame dokaita laminao pupala yuu taono Betesaita lenge dokonya dutupa-pipa iki kateami-pyaa.
Dopaka doko, endakali dupame, “Jisasa yuu Betesaita dokonya kalyamona,” lapae sepala baa watao epeami-pyaa. Epeaminopa Jisasame dupa lanyepala Gotenya isingi dokonya lao pii lamaiyoo, dee endakali mendapua yaina paleta kateamino dupa kandatala mee jakamaiyoo pia-pyaa.
Yuu alemanjiamopa, akali kingi ita-kisa dee lapoma dutupa pilyoo Jisasa kateasa ipupala baa lamaiyoo, “Yuu dakenya endakali napalengema lamona, endakali dokaitame yuu taono yakanepi mee anda yuupi soo pelyamo dupanya nee natamipi luu palitamipi pima pena laa!” leami-pyaa.
Dopa leaminoaka doko, Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakamameaka dokaita nee maiyepa!” lea-pyaa. Dopa lateamopa dokaitame lao pituu, “Endakali dupa pitakame nee nena lao naimame sambakamaiya napatamano kandao doko, naimanya betesa yuungi wapaka lapoma pyoo iki silyamona, kapa napapomo,” leami-pyaa.
Akali peteamino dupa taosene yuungi joo peteami-pyaa. Dokopa Jisasame baanya disaipele dupa lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame endakali dupa kingi ita yuungi yuungi lao wakale limbao petena lamaiyepa,” lea-pyaa.
Leamoli pyoo baanya disaipele dupame lamaitiaminopa endakali pitaka isa peteami-pyaa.
Dokopa Jisasame betesa yuungi wapaka lapoma pyoo siamo dutupa nyepala kaiti-kisa kandalyetae katao yaka pilino lao loma setala nee dutupa konjia-pyaa. Konjepala baanya disaipele dupame mokosoo endakali dupa maina lao maiya-pyaa.
Nyepala maiyaminopa dokaita pitakame nao tiaka kayapala kakana sina kayamino dupa disaipele dupame nyoo baseketa mandi kingi ita-kisa dee lapomanya mandyuu tumbasiami-pyaa.
Koto mende Jisasa iki loma soo kateamopa, disaipele dupa baa kateamo dokonya epeami-pyaa. Epeaminopa baame dokaita pisoo, “Endakali kambu dupame namba kandao apina lengemape?” lea-pyaa.
Dokopa dokaitame pii yanu pyao, “Endakali yangimi emba kandao Jone Kaimbu Pingi dokona lengema. Yangimi Ilainjana lengema. Dee yangimi potopesa wamba kateamino dupanya mende dee malunya sakatapyana lengemana,” leami-pyaa.
Dokopa baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Doko nyakamame namba kandao apina lengemape?” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa Pitame pii yanu pyao, “Emba Gotenya Kataisa dokona,” lea-pyaa.
Pitame dopa leamopa Jisasame pii kyoto joo dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame Pitame pii lelyamo doko endakali mendaipi mende lamaiya nayalapape!” lea-pyaa.
Dopa latala baame pii mende lao pituu, “Endakalinya Ikiningi dokome tanda longo lao napenge. Isingi akalipi, pitisa mupapi, mana setapae masingi akalipi dupame baa daa latala pyao kumasetami. Dopa petataminopa koto teponya Goteme baa dee sakatasetana,” lea-pyaa.
Dokopa baame endakali dupa pitaka lamaiyoo, “Endakali mendeme namba watao payatoo lao masetamo kandao doko, baame baa tange kame setala yuu yongata dii lao baanya ita poko doko nyoo soo namba watao paena.
Endakali mendeme baa tange isoo auu pyoo katapu laka lao masetamo kandao doko, baa alu pita. Dopaka doko, endakali mendeme namba lao masetala baa tange kame setamo kandao doko, baa auu pyoo katata.
Doko, endakali mendeme yuunya oapi dupa pitaka nyoo setao katapala baa koyatamo kandao doko, oapi dupa pitakame aipa petala baa nisetape?
Endakali mendeme nambapi nambanya piipi dupanya elya kayatamo kandao doko, Endakalinya Ikiningi tii pipae doko baanya Takangepi enjele epe etete dupa-pipa awapa tii pyoo ipao pituu baame endakali doko kandao elya kayata.
Nambame nyakama kiningi langilyona, endakali ae kalyamino datupanya mendapua kumala nayataminopa Gotenya isingi doko kandatamina,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
Jisasame pii dutupa latala maitakao koto tukulapopi mende pateamopa, baame Pitapi, Jonepi, Jemesapi utupa laminao yuu manda mendenya loma sala pea-pyaa.
Pupala baame loma soo kateamopa baanya lengelyaapi doko waka jia-pyaa. Baanya yonge pee doko etete kyoo lao lenge lipilipi pia-pyaa.
Dopa piamopa akali lapoma Mosesepa Ilainjapa lee mendai ipao baa kateasa kalyu petala pii lao kateami-pyaa.
Akali dolapo kaitinya tii pipae doko-pipa katao ipupala Jisasame maitakao Jetusaleme pupala kalai etasalanya pitamo dupapi kumatamo dupapi dupanya lao pii leami-pyaa.
Pitapi, Jonepi, Jemesapi dutupa lenge luu kayaminoaka doko, luu palya nayami-pyaa. Dokaitame Jisasa baa tii pipae jiamo doko kandao pituu akali lapoma baa-pipa kateambino dolapo kandeamiaka-pyaa.
Akali lapoma dolapome Jisasa yakinatala paanya piambinopa, Pitame Jisasa lamaiyoo, “Akali Andake, naima dakenya katapumanopa auu pilyamona, aiyaa anda tepoma pimana! Mende embanya, mende Mosesenya, mende Ilainjanyana,” lea-pyaa. Pitame pii leamo dutupanya tenge mende masala nayao mee ambe lea-pyaa.
Baame pii dutupa lao kateamopa kopa mendeme ipupala nyakama sanga piamopa akali dutupame paka kayami-pyaa.
Dokopa kopa dokonya pii mende tambetambe ipupala lao pituu, “Doo kalyamo doko nambanya Ikiningi, baa nambanya yapao nyepae dokona, nyakame baanya pii doko sakamaiyepape!” lea-pyaa.
Pii doko lalu peteamopa dokaitame Jisasa iki kateamo kandeami-pyaa. Gii dokopa dokaitame nengekaita lyokatala kandeamino dupanya mendaipi mende endakali mende lamaiya nayami-pyaa.
Taita dopa pyoo dokaitame yuu manda doko yakinatala peaminopa endakali kambu longo mendeme Jisasa kaitinisa kandanyiami-pyaa.
Dokopa akali dupanya mendeme endakali kaina dokonya katao kyoto joo ee lao, “Mana Lenge Akali! Embame nambanya wane dake nisakape! Nambanya wane mendai dake iki-kaita embame nisakatale lao ee lelyo.
