Enjele koo mendeme wane dake minatae soo walu lasilyamopa baa ae lao kambu apupuaka mandyuu singi. Dopa pyoo silyamopa enjele koo dokome yonge dupa koyasoaka katao yapa yakinala naenge.
Dopa pingi dokonya nambame embanya disaipele dupame enjele koo doko watao pyakamaina laloaka doko, dokaitame kapa pao watao pyakamaiya nayalaminona,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa Jisasame lao pituu, “Kanau! Masoo minala naengema uanga pyoo paengema endakali nyakama! Oo koto koto ongo namba nyakama-pipaka tole katatama laape? Nyakamame nambaka nenge nyoo katatami laape?” lea-pyaa. Dopa latala baame akali doko lamaiyoo, “Embanya wane doko laminao asa ipu!” lea-pyaa.
Laminao epeamopa enjele koo dokome wane doko lombanya setapala minao walu lasia-pyaa. Dokopa Jisasame enjele koo doko pyalanya leamosa wane doko mee jia-pyaa. Dokopa Jisasame wane doko takange doko tange maiyakamaiya-pyaa.
Dokopa endakali dupa pitakame Gotenya kalai andake piamo dupa kandatala mona andeami-pyaa. Koteaka lao baame piamo dupa pitaka kandatala endakali dupame baa lalyoo kateaminopa Jisasame baanya disaipele dupa dapa lamaiya-pyaa:
“Nyakamame pii datupa sepala kame nasalapape. Akali mendeme Endakalinya Ikiningi doko endakali dupa laitaka pyaanya enge nyalanya pilyamona,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamoaka doko, pii dokonya tenge doko masala naena lao yalo petae siamosa disaipele dupame masala nayami-pyaa. Dee dokaitame pii dokonya tenge doko baa-kisa pisalanya paka kayami-pyaa.
Dokopa disaipele dupame, “Naimanya mende api alyasale joo kalyamape?” lao pii yanda pyoloo piami-pyaa.
Dokopa Jisasame dokaitanya masiamino dupa kandatala baame wane koo mende kii minao nyepala baanya patalisa-kaita katasia-pyaa.
Dopa petala dokaita lamaiyoo, “Endakali mendeme namba lao masetala wane koo dake lanyilyamo dokome namba lanyingiaka. Endakali mendeme namba lanyilyamo dokome namba puu leamo doko lanyingiaka. Dopana, nyakama pitakanya pundipundi joo katenge endakali doko alyasalena,” lea-pyaa.
Dokopa Joneme baa lamaiyoo, “Akali Andake, akali mendeme embanya kenge doko lao enjele koo dupa watao pyapumopa naimame kandatala baa naima watao napaenge dokonyana kaena lapumana,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame baanya kalai doko kaena lao daa nalalapape! Endakali mendeme nyakama yandapipi nanjoo kalyamo doko nyakama tata joo katengena,” lea-pyaa.
Goteme Jisasa kaiti-kisa lanyetona lao masiamo gii doko tengesa pia-pyaa. Dopa piamopa Jisasame Jetusaleme paanya mona mendai palyetala sakatao pea-pyaa.
Kaitinisa pao pituu baame baanya wai minakamaiyoo paenge akali mendapua wambao pena lea-pyaa. Dokopa akali dutupame Samatia tangemanya yuu mendasa pupala Jisasa ipapomo lao baanya kaitinipi andapi dupa depa lakamaiyanya masoo kateami-pyaa.
Dopaka doko, Jisasa baa Jetusalemeaka paapomona lao masetala Samatia tange dupame baa nyakamanya yuusa lanyala nayami-pyaa.
Dokopa disaipele Jemesapa Jonepame mana doko kandatala Jisasa lamaiyoo, “Kamongo, nalimbame kaitinya itate kaiyepae mende epena lao wii latala endakali dokaita tao mulyina lambape?” lao pisiambi-pyaa.
Dopa lao pisiambinosa Jisasame kapilyetala dolapo kandao pyalanya lea-pyaa.
Dokopa dokaitame yuu doko kayapala mendasa peami-pyaa.
Dokaita kaitinisa peaminopa akali mendeme ipupala Jisasa lamaiyoo, “Emba payateli pyoo nambame emba watao payatoana,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Yana kapua dupanya palenge yuli kombe dupa singi. Dee yaka dupanya palenge panda singiaka doko, Endakalinya Ikiningi dokonya imambu soo aiyomba setenge panda mende nasingina,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa latala dee baame akali waka mende lamaiyoo, “Embame namba watao ipu!” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamoaka doko, akali dokome baa lamaiyoo, “Akali Andake, wambao nambame nambanya takange doko malu petala puu lapoko!” lea-pyaa.
Dokopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Endakali kumapae joo katengema dupame kumapae yango dupa tange malu pina kayapala embame Gotenya isingi dokonya lao pii lao tayala puu!” lea-pyaa.
Dopa lateamopa akali waka mendeme Jisasa lamaiyoo, “Akali Andake, nambame emba watao payatowakana, wambao nambame nambanya tata dupa lasa latala puu lapoko!” lea-pyaa.
Dokopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Endakali mendeme wambao kalai mende pyaanya elyaka kayao sakatatala maitakao mona kapilyetala kayata pyoo katatamo kandao doko, Goteme baa isala nayatamopa baame kalai mende kapa pao napitana,” lea-pyaa.
Maitakao Kamongo dokome akali mendatupa dee yapao nyiaka-pyaa. Baame akali kingi itaka kalange-kisa dee lapoma yapao nyepala akali dutupa lapo lapo lao tole pyatala yuu taonopi endakali kuki palenge yuu dupa pitakanyapi wambao pena lea-pyaa. Baa tange yuu dutupanyaka maitakao watao patona lao masia-pyaa.
Dopa lao masetala baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Indupa eenya nee longo wambu petelyamoaka doko, mandyuu mau pyapenge endakali longo nakalyamino. Dopana, ee tange dokome baanya nee mandyuu mau pyakamaitami endakali mendapua pena lape lao nyakamame loma salapape.
Kandeleno! Nambame nyakama mena sipisipi ŋaŋa jepae dupa yana kapua jepae dupanya kainanya pupa lelyona masetala pupape!
Nyakamame kaitini payao pituu munipi, nokainapi, moko peepi dupanya mende namandyuu pupa. Nyakamame endakali kaitinisa kandanyetamino dupanya mendaipi mende-pipa pii laloo napyepape.
Nyakamame pao anda mendenya kolandatamili pyoo wambao dapa laapape: ‘Anda dakenya palenge endakali dupa mona lyuu lao pilyepape!’ lao lamaiyepape.
Anda dokonya endakali dupame pii doko nasetaminopa mona lyuu lasakamaipenge nanjia kandeno doko, mona lyuu lasingi pii doko dokaita-kisa nasoo nyakama tange-kisa dee pilyeta. Anda dokonya palenge endakali mende mona lyuu lasakamaipenge jetamo kandao doko, nyakamanya mona lyuu lasingi pii doko baa-kisa kapa pao seta.
Nyakamame anda mendenya puu puu napinya, nyakama lanyetamino anda dokonyaka kalyepape. Kalai akali mendeme baanya kalai dokopa kapa pao yole nyingili pyoo nyakamame neepi endakipi anda tange dokome ditamoli pyoo nalapape.
“Dee nyakamame yuu taono mendenya pataminopa dokaitame nyakama lanyiami kandeno doko, endakali dokaitame nee mokosoo ditamili pyoo nalapape.
Nyakamame yuu dokonya tange endakali yaina pyapae dupa mee injisakamaiyepape. Dopa petakamaitala dokaita kandao, ‘Goteme nyakama isala ipatelyamona,’ lao pii lamaiyepape.
Dee nyakama yuu taono mendenya pataminopa endakali dupame nyakama lanyala nayami kandeno doko, nyakama yuu taono dokonya kaitini dupanya awali lao pupala dapa laapape:
‘Nyakamanya yuu taono dakenya kuni kungumapi dupame naimanya mokonya pateta silyamo dokonya tenge nyakama-kisa silyamona lao lyanda lanya pisilyamano. Dopana, Goteme yuu dake isala ipatelyamona lao masina,’ lao lamaiyepape.
Goteme endakali mokosetamo gii dokopa yuu taono dokonya kenda pipae ipatamo dokome Sotoma yuu dokonya kenda pipae ipatamo doko ita minatana lao nambame nyakama langilyona,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
“Taono Kotasina tange dupa koyatami iki lamo! Taono Betesaita tange dupa koyatami ikiaka lamo! Dupame kalai pupu lapae dupa nyakamanya yuu dolaponya kandeami dupa wamba Taya yuupa Saitone yuupa dolaponya endakali dupame kandeamili kandao doko, dokaitame kenai lumbanya aiyombanya pyalyetala mena kende matapu pyoo yuu wamba waka mona kapilyiamili.
Goteme endakali mokosetamo gii dokopa yuu dolaponya kenda pipae ipatamo dokome Taya yuupa Saitone yuupa dolaponya kenda pipae doko ita minata.
Dee nyakama taono Kapaneame tange dupanya kenge doko kaiti-kisa kapa pao seta laape? Daa, Goteme nyakama yuu koo dokonya pyandatana,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
Dopa latala baame baanya disaipele dupa lamaiyoo, “Endakali mendeme nyakamanya pii silyamo dokome nambanya pii doko silyamoaka. Endakali mendeme nyakama maita dilyamo dokome namba maita dilyamoaka. Dee namba puu leamo Gote doko maita mailyamoakana,” lea-pyaa.
Maitakao akali kingi ita kalange-kisa dee lapoma dupa pilyoo ipao pituu mona yaepeami-pyaa. Dokaitame lao pituu, “Kamongo, embame naima kalai pyepape leenoli pyoo pipumanopa, enjele koo dupame naimanya pii sakapimiakana,” leami-pyaa.
Dokopa baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nambame Satane doko kaiti-kisa yuu wapaka pili lao yapa pyakao mangeamo kandeo.
Nyakamame kanopatopi pupusalyowapi dupa-kisa moko katao kaita payao dee nyakamame yandapipi dokonya pupu lapae dupa pitaka ita minao isoo kalyepape lateo. Dopana, dutupanya mendaipi mendeme nyakama kapa pao koyasala nayatana masalapape.
Dopaka doko, enjele koo dupame nyakamanya pii sekelyaminona lao mona yaepala naenya, Goteme nyakamanya kenge dupa kaitinya setakao kalyamo dokonya mona yaepalapape,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
Gii dokopaka Oli Sipitisa dokome Jisasanya mona etete yaepasiamopa, Jisasame lao pituu, “Apane, emba yuupi kaitipi dupa pitakanya Kamongo kalyeno! Embame mana longo kandenge endakalipi masepae endakalipi dupame nakandena lao yalo piino dupa endakali wane ŋaŋa joo katengema dupame kandena lao panasiino dokonya nambame emba lao tama pilyo. Kini, Apane, embame pitona lao auu pyoo masiinoli pyoo petee-pyaana,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa latala baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nambanya Takangeme dupa pitaka nambame isepe lao namba-kisa setea. Endakali mendaipi mendeme Ikiningi doko masala naenge. Takangeme iki masingi. Dee endakali mendaipi mendeme Takange doko masala naengemaka doko, Ikiningimi iki masingi. Dee Ikiningi dokome Takange doko endakali mende laitaka pitoo lao masetala petelyamopa endakali dokome Takange doko lao masingiakana,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
Dopa latala baame kapilyetala baanya disaipele awapa peamino dupa iki lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame lengeme kandelyamino dupanya lao mona yaepasetae kalyamino.
Wamba potopesapi kiŋipi longo dupame indupa nyakamame kandelyamino dupa kandapuma laka lao masiaminoaka doko, nakandeami. Pii nyakamame silyamino dupa sipuma laka lao masiaminoaka doko, nasiamina lao nambame nyakama langilyona,” lea-pyaa.
Dokopa mana setapae masingi akali mendeme ipupala Jisasa makande pyoo dapa lea-pyaa: “Mana Lenge Akali, nambame aipa petala lete etete katatope?” lea-pyaa.
Dokopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Mana setapae dupanya aipa lao pepa pyapae silyape? Embame tenge aipale mende palipumu itaki pilipi?” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa baame pii yanu pyao, “‘Embame embanya Kamongo Gote doko auu kayao katao, embanya monapi, imambupi, pupu lapaepi, masingipi dutupa pitakame Gote baa maitae katape.’ ‘Embame emba tange auu kaengeli pyoo embanya endakali yango doko auu kayao katape,’ lapae silyamona,” lea-pyaa.
Dokopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Embame pii auu pyoo yanu pilinona, dopaka pyoo katapala lete etete katatena,” lea-pyaa.
Jisasame dopa leamopa mana setapae masingi akali dokome endakalinya lengelyaapi dupanya baa akali tolatae katapu laka lao masetala Jisasa pisoo, “Nambanya endakali yango doko apipi?” lea-pyaa.
Dokopa Jisasame baanya pii doko sepala yanu pyao, “Yuu mendepa akali mende Jetusaleme katao Jeteko paanya lanao pea-pyaa. Peamopa akali makongapae koo mendapuame kaitinisa minao mangotala baa pyao indinya kumapenge joo setapala baanya yonge peepi oapi dupa nyoo peami-pyaa.
Pateaminopa pitisa mende kaitini dokonya epeamo dokome akali pyapae doko kandatala lemba pyatala pea-pyaa.
Maitakao akali Lipai tata mende epeamo dokome dopaka pyoo akali pyapae doko kandatala lemba pyatalaka pea-pyaa.
Dee enakao akali Samatia mendeme kaitini dokonya pao pituu akali doko kandatala kondo kaya-pyaa.
Baame akali pyapae siamo dosa tengesa pupala olipi ipangepi waenepi mendapua pyapae dupanya katatakamaitala yaki pyakamaiya-pyaa. Dopa petala baame akali pyapae siamo doko kopinya baanya mena dongi maita dokonya setapala mandyuu pao endakali opone palenge anda mendenya palena latala baa setao palea-pyaa.
Yongama baame anda isoo katenge akali doko muni kina lapo joo maitala baa lamaiyoo, ‘Embame akali dake isokondape pyakape. Embanya muni mendapua apata akali dake-kisa nepate pitamo kandao dutupa namba pilyoo ae ipato ongopa yanu pyakatona,’ lea-pyaana,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
Dopa latala Jisasame akali doko pisoo, “Akali mendapuame akali doko pyao indipala pateaminopa, dee akali tepoma kaitini dokonya epeamino dupanya apimi akali pyapae siamo dokonya yango joo nisiana lao masilipi?” lea-pyaa.
Dokopa mana setapae masingi akali dokome lao pituu, “Akali kondo kayapala nisia lumu dokoaka lumuna,” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Dopana, embame pupala dopaka pyoo katape,” lea-pyaa.
Jisasapi baanya disaipele dupa-pipa kaitini pao yuu taono yakane mendenya pyakameaminopa, enda Mata lenge mendeme Jisasa baanya andaka lanyia-pyaa.
Dokopa Matanya kakingi Matia lenge dokome Kamongo Jisasanya mana nyotoo lao baa peteamo dokonya ipao baanya pii doko soo petea-pyaa.
Dopa pyoo peteamopa Matame nee akipi depa lao kalai longo piamosa mona tambea-pyaa. Dopa piamopa baame ipao Jisasa lamaiyoo, “Nambanya kakingi dokome nambame iki nee depa laale lao kingi nandilyamo doko, Kamongo, embame nakandalepe? Baame namba nisina lamai!” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa Kamongo dokome baanya pii yanu pyakamaiyoo, “Mata, Mata, embame longo dupa moname masoo nea kayao pilino.
Dopaka doko, mendai iki mende nea kayapenge jilyamo. Matiame epe doko moname yapao nyepala pilyamona doko mendeme kapa pao nyoo nepakamaiya nayatana,” lea-pyaa.
Koto mendepa Jisasame mendasa loma soo kateamo doko soo etapeamopa, baanya disaipele dupanya mende epea-pyaa. Ipupala Jisasa lamaiyoo, “Kamongo, wamba Joneme baanya disaipele dupa mana lamaiyamoli pyoo embame loma singi mana doko naima langi,” lea-pyaa.
Dokopa baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame loma setaminoli pyoo dapa lao loma salapape: Apane, embanya kenge doko auu pyoaka sina lape. Embame naima isoo ipao katape.
Koteaka lao embame naima nee natamanoli pyoo dipi.
Embame naimanya koo pingi dupa kunanya nepakape. Endakali dupame naima koo pingilyamino dupanya yanu dupa kaelyamanoaka. Koo pyepa lao makande pingi dupanya embame naima laminao napupi. Dopa lao loma salapape,” lea-pyaa.
Dee baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakamanya akali mendeme baanya kaita miningi mendenya andaka kuka andatombe pupala baa-kisa tee lao, ‘Kaimia, yanu pyakatona, embame betesa tepoma namba dii.
Nambanya kaiminingi mende kaitaka payapala nambanya andaka ipumopa, nee maipenge mende nasilyamona,’ lao tee latamo kandao doko, akali andakote palitamo dokome baa lamaiyoo, ‘Nambame anda kaita pai latala nambanya wane dupa-pipa palipilyona, dee sakatatala kapa pao emba nandyapo lumuna, embame namba maka pisala nayape!’ lata.
<range>
Dee anda tange dokome akali tee latamo doko kaiminingina lao masala naenya nisala naipatamoaka doko, akali tee latamo dokome kayala nayao teaka lao katatamosa anda tange dokome sakatatala akali dokonya daa jetamo dupa pitaka maitana lao nambame nyakama langilyo.
Dee nambame nyakama dapa langilyo: nyakamame tee laapape! Kapa pao nyetami. Kutalapape! Kapa pao kandatami. Anda kaita watawata pyepape! Kapa pao lumbakata.
Tee lelyamino endakali dupa pitakame nyingima. Kutilyamino endakali dupa pitakame kandengema. Anda kaita watawata pilyamino endakali dupa pitakanya kaita lumbakamaingi.
“Nyakamanya wane mendeme wapaka mende tee latamopa, nyakama takange dupanya mendeme kanopato koo nanenge mende maitamipi? Daa, namaitami.
Dee, ‘Yaka tuku mende dii,’ latamopa, pupusalyoo mende maitamipi? Daa, namaitami.
Dopana, nyakama takange koo dupame nyakamanya wane dupa oapi epe dupa maingima tamo kandao doko, Takange kaitinya katenge dokome nyakamanya wane mailyamino doko etete ita minao baa-kisa tee lelyamino endakali dupa Oli Sipitisa doko maingina,” lea-pyaa.
Koto mendepa enjele pii laa naenge koo mende akali mende-kisa paleamo doko Jisasame watao pyatakamaiyamopa akali dokome dee pii lea-pyaa. Dokopa endakali kambu piamino dupa mona andeami-pyaa.
Dee endakali yangimi lao pituu, “Baame enjele koo dupanya isingi Belesapulu lenge doko mambele enjele koo dupa watao pilyamona,” leami-pyaa.
Endakali mendapuame baa minao makande pyoo, “Baame kaitinya-tae kongali mende pina,” leami-pyaa.
Dopa lao kateaminoaka doko, baame dokaitanya masiamino doko kandatala dapa lea-pyaa: “Yuu dupanya kiŋi mendeme isingi tata dupanya mende wakale pyoloo petala yanda pitaminopa tata doko koyata. Dee anda mendenya palu dupa wakale pyoloo petala yanda pitaminopa koyataka.
Dokaita joo Satane baa tangeme wakale pyoloo petala yanda pitamo kandao doko, baame isilyamo tata doko aipa petala katatape? Nyakamame namba kandao Belesapulu mambele nambame enjele koo dupa watao pilino lelyamino.
Kiningi, nambame Belesapulu mambele enjele koo dupa watao pyapuli kandao doko, nyakamanya mana nyingi dupame api mambele enjele koo dupa watao pyapimilipi? Dokonya dokaitame, ‘Nyakamame kopeta leami lamona,’ latami.
Goteme namba kingi ditamopa nambame enjele koo dupa watao pyato kandao doko, Goteme nyakama isala ipatamosana,” lea-pyaa.
“Akali pupu lapae mendeme yanda yandatepi minatae katao baanya anda doko tange isilyamopa baanya oapi dupa auu pyoo singi.
Baame yanda yandatepi dupame baa nisetana lao masetamoaka doko, akali etete pupu lapae mendeme ipao baa yanda pimaitala ita minata. Dokopa akali etete pupu lapae dokome yanda yandatepi dupa nyoo nepatala baanya oapi dupa pitaka endakali waka dupa mokosoo maitana,” lea-pyaa.
“Endakali mende namba tata joo nakalyamo doko nambanya yandapipi lamo. Dee endakali mendeme namba-pipa endakali nyoo limbala naelyamo dokome endakali dupa saa lasingina,” lea-pyaa.
“Enjele koo mendeme endakali mende yakinatala dokopa, baa mendasa koto nyoo kalyanya yuu sapu dupanya paelya paena pyoo panda kutingi. Kutao kayapala baame lao pituu, ‘Nambame anda wamba yakineo dokonya dee pilyoo patoo,’ lenge.
Dopa latala baame anda dokonya pao kandelyamopa, potoma polao yati petae kalyamo kandenge.
Dopa petae kalya silyasa baame pupala enjele etete koo mendapua lanyepala anda dokonya dee pilyoo ipao katengema. Dokopa akali doko wamba kopeta kateamoaka doko, indupa etete kopeta katengena,” lea-pyaa.
Jisasame pii lao kateamo gii dokopaka endakali longo kambu piamino dupanya enda mendeme puu lao dapa lea-pyaa: “Wamba emba mandipala andu diamo enda doko mona yaepao pituu pilyamona,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa lateamopa Jisasame endakali dupa lamaiyoo, “Dopaka doko, Gotenya pii doko soo watao minilyamino endakali dupa kiningi mona yaepao pilyaminona,” lea-pyaa.
Dee endakali kambu longo dupame Jisasa kateamo dokonya ipao kapata-kapata piaminopa, Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Endakali indupa palelyamino dupa kooma lamo. Dupame kongali mende kandamana lelyaminoaka doko, nambame kongali waka mende pyakala nayatoana, Goteme akali Jonaa-kisa kongali piamo dokoaka makande petae seta.
Wamba akali Jonaa dokome Gotenya makande petae joo katao yuu Nenepa tange dupame kandeamino dopaka pyoo Endakalinya Ikiningi doko Gotenya makande petae katatamopa endakali indupa kalyamino dupame kandatami.
Wamba Isingi Enda Kuini mendeme yuu Sauta-kaita pituu masingi akali Solomone lenge doko kanjanya kaita etete londe mendenya epea-pyaa. Epeamoaka doko, indupa akali mendeme Solomone etete ita minao ae kalyamo. Tenge dokonya Goteme endakali mokosetamo gii dokopa, Isingi Enda Kuina dokome sakatatala nyakama kosimi latana lao masalapape!
Wamba akali Jonaa dokome yuu Nenepa tange dupa pii panao lamaiyamopa dokaitame sepala mona kapilyiaminoaka doko, indupa Jonaa doko ita miningi akali doko ae kalyamo. Tenge dokonya Goteme endakali mokosetamo gii dokopa, Nenepa tange dupame sakatatala nyakama kosimi latamina,” lea-pyaa.
“Endakali mendeme lama mende kaiyepala yalo pipenge panda mendenyapi titopene penge nenge lanao setapae mendenyapi setala naenya, endakali andaka kolandatamino dupame tii pitamopa kandao kolandena lao baame lama doko setenge toko ketae dokonya setenge daape!
Embanya lenge doko embanya yongenya kia joo telyamo. Embanya lenge doko auu pyoo tao payateno kandao doko, emba tii pita. Dopaka doko, embanya lenge lapo tao payateno kandao doko, emba iminjeta.
Aopyoo latala emba-kisa tii pipae silyamo doko iminjetae jetana kandao isoo katape!
Embanya yonge dokonya mendasa iminjalapi nayao tii iki pyoo payateno doko lama kaiyepaeme emba tii pisingili pyoo embanya yonge doko pitaka etete tii pipae payatena,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
Jisasame pii dutupa lao etapeamopa akali Patasi mendeme baanya andaka Jisasa nee nala bona epena lea-pyaa. Dopa lateamopa baame andaka kolandatala nee nalanya petea-pyaa.
Pitipala Jisasame nee nalanya kingi kaimbu napinya nee mee neamopa, Patasi dokome kandatala moname longo lao masia-pyaa.
Dopa lao masiamopa Kamongo dokome Patasi doko lamaiyoo, “Nyakama Patasi dupame kapopi pelesapi dupanya ketae-kaita iki kaimbu pyao kalyamino. Dopaka doko, nyakamanya kokotena pake nengepi koo manapi dupame tumbatae kalyamona, nyakama akali kyakaengema lamo! Goteme penge iki wasepala pengenya angi mende wasala nayape?
<range>
Dopana, nyakamame daa jingi endakali dupa nyakamanya angi doko maiyepape. Dopa pitaminopa nyakamanya oapi dupa pitaka auu pipae setana,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
“Nyakama Patasi dupame taluanga takae kambyakomapi dupa paa kingi ita lao mokosepala mende doko Gote maiyaminoaka doko, nyakamame endakali waka dupa-kisa mana tolatae minao pituu dee Gote mona maiya naelyaminoaka. Nyakamame mendatupa dutupa yakinala nayao pituu angi datupa watao miningima pyali, yaka jipyalina, minala naelyamino dokonya nyakama koyatami iki lamo!
“Endakali dupame nyakama Patasi dupa Jutamanya losuu anda dupanya petenge toko enomba nyoo dupa dina lao masilyamino. Dee kamapi dupanya endakali dupame nyakama lasa lapimi laka lao auu kaelyamino dokonya nyakama koyatami iki lamo!
Endakali dupame endakali malu petae kakopala naenge dupanya ketae ambe lao moko katao paelyaminopa, maludupame dokaita koyasingimali pyoo nyakama malu petae dopalema lamo, dokonya nyakama koyatami iki lamona!” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa mana setapae masingi akali dupanya mendeme baanya pii yanu pyao, “Mana Lenge Akali, embame naima pii lamba lao imbu pisilinoakana,” lea-pyaa.
Dokopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakama mana setapae masingi akali dupame endakali waka dupa-kisa kenda pipae setaminosa dupame etete lekeleke tao paelyamino. Dopa pyoo paelyaminoaka doko, nyakama tangeme kenda pipae doko dupa-kisa setapala yuu mendaipi mende kuki kingi maiya naelyamino dokonya nyakama koyatami iki lamo!
Potopesa pyao kumasetae dupanya malu petae dupa nyakamame yati pyoo kalyamino dokonya nyakama koyatami iki lamo! Nyakamanya yumbange dupame potopesa dupa pyao kumasiamino doko nyakamame yumbangenya mana doko yaka piamina lao panasoo potopesa pyao kumasetae dupanya malu dupa yati pyoo kalyamino.
<range>
“Tenge dokonyaka Gote masepae epe dokome dapa lea-pyaa: ‘Tenda nambame endakali dupa-kisa potopesapi aposelepi dupa pena latopa endakali dokaitame mendapua watao pyatala mendapua pyao kumasetamina,’ lea-pyaa.
Dopana, akali wamba kateamino dupame potopesa dupa pyao kumasoaka kateamino dupa pitakanya koo tenge wambatae waka doko endakali indupa kalyamino dupa-kisa silyamo.
Mana doko wamba akali Epolo lenge doko pyao kumasiamo dokonya pituu tee pyatala akali Sakataya lenge doko losuu anda andake dokopa olata toko dokopa dolaponya kainanya pyanya seteamino dokonya ipao tuu lea-pyaa. Kini, nambame nyakama langilyona, tenge dutupa pitakanya yanu doko Goteme endakali indupa kalyamino dupa-kisa nyeta.
“Nyakama mana setapae masingi akali dupame mana nyepenge kaita doko lyokatala nyakama tange mana nyala nayao dee endakali waka dupame nyala naenaka lao dupanya kaita lyokakamailyaminona koyatami iki lamo!” lea-pyaa.
Dopa latala Jisasame anda doko yakinatala kamaka pyakalyiamopa mana setapae masingi akalipi Patasipi dupame baa kandao pyalanya leami-pyaa. Jisasame pii mende latatamopa naimame kapa pao kosimi latamana lao masetala makande pili lao baa pisetaka pyoo isokondape pyoo isoo kateami-pyaa.
<range>
Endakali taosene longo dupa tuu tuu lao epeami-pyaa. Dokopa endakali dupame yango mende panda maipenge nanjoo endakali mendenya moko angoo lakakamaipenge jia-pyaa. Gii dokopa Jisasame wambao baanya disaipele dutupa dapa lamaiya-pyaa: “Nyakame Patasi dupanya sambo mana iisa jepae doko kandao isoo kalyepape. Sambo epe jili pyoo paenge mana doko betesa andasingi iisa dopale lamo.
Naima pitaka-kisa tenge yalo petae silyamo dupa tanga panata. Mana sanga pyatae silyamo dupa pitaka tanga lopalyeta.
Nyakamame kuka iminjetaenya pii yalo pyoo lelyamino dupa pitaka kotaka niki tatamopa endakali pitakame setami. Dee nyakamame andakote pituu pii kakate lao lelyamino dupa tanga endakalimi puu lao wii lenge dopale joo endakali pitaka-kisa tayatana,” lea-pyaa.
“Nambanya mona setenge paluma! Endakali mendapuame nyakama pyao kumasetaminopa nyakamame dokaita paka nakayalapape! Dokaitame nyakama pyapala mendita mende waipa soo kapa napitamina lao nambame nyakama langilyo.
Dopana, nyakamame paka kayapenge tenge angi doko nambame nyakama panao langitoo: Gote baa paka kayalapape! Baame endakali dupa pyao kumasetala yuu koo dokonya kapa pao soo pyandatana, nyakamame baa lao paka kayalapape lao kiningi langilyo.
“Endakali mendapuame muni toya lapomame yaka pimbinakae yuungi kapa pao sambengemaka doko, Goteme yaka yakane dutupanya mendaipi mende kame sala naenge.
Dee baame nyakamanya iti apata itaki pyatelyamona paka nakayalapape! Nyakamame yaka longo dupa ita minao alyasale joo kalyaminona,” lea-pyaa.
“Endakali mendeme, ‘Namba Kataisanyana,’ lao endakali dupa-kisa lao panatamo kandao doko, Endakalinya Ikiningi dokome Gotenya enjele dupa-kisa endakali doko, ‘Nambanyana,’ lao lao panasetaka.
Dopaka doko, endakali mendeme namba kandao endakali dupa-kisa, ‘Baa nambanya daana,’ latamo kandao doko, Endakalinya Ikiningi dokome Gotenya enjele dupa-kisa, ‘Baa nambanya daana,’ latakana lao nambame nyakama langilyona,” lea-pyaa.
“Endakali mendeme Endakalinya Ikiningi doko daa latamo kandao doko, Goteme baanya koo doko kunanya nepakamaita. Dee endakali mendeme Oli Sipitisa doko kandao lamba latamo kandao doko, Goteme baanya koo doko kunanya nepakamaiya nayata.
“Endakali dupame nyakama kosimi laanya laminao nyakamanya losuu andapi, kapomanenya kanjole limbingipi, isingi akalipi dupanya pataminopa, nyakamame pii aipa lao yanu pyamanape aki pii mende lamanape lao nea nakayalapape!
Oli Sipitisa dokome pii lapenge dupa gii dokopaka nyakama ditana,” lea-pyaa.
Endakali longo kambu pyao peteamino dupanya akali mendeme Jisasa lamaiyoo, “Mana Lenge Akali, embame nambanya kaiminingi doko lamaiyoo, ‘Nalimbanya takangenya moya dupa baame mokosetala yangi namba dina,’ lamaiyakape,” lea-pyaa.
Dokopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Doko aipuma lee? Apimi namba nyalambonya pii tolasoo oapi mokosingi akali joo kata leape?” lea-pyaa.
Dopa latala baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Endakali mendenya oapi longo setenge dupame baa auu pyoo katena lao nisala naenge dokonya nyakamame oapi putiti kaenge dupanya mendeme koyasetana kandao wandyuu kalyepape,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa latala baame kongali pii mende dokaita dapa lao lamaiya-pyaa: “Wamba oapi longo setenge akali mende kateamo dokonya ee dokonya nee longo andea-pyaa.
Andeamopa baanya moname dapa lao masia-pyaa: ‘Nambanya nee dupa nyoo setapenge panda nasilyamo doko aipa pito laape?’ lao masowaka katea-pyaa.
Dopa lao masetala, ‘Nambame dapa pitoo: indupa nambame nambanya nee setenge anda dupa lakyepala dee andake pyoo petapeta pitoo. Dopa petala nambanya wiisa dupa pitakapi oapi epe dupapi anda dutupanya nyoo setatona,’ lao masia-pyaa.
Dopa lao masetala baame baa tange lamaiyoo, ‘Nambanya oapi epe longo dupa ee kana longo dupa-pipa kapa lao silyamo. Namba mee koto katapapu neepi endakipi dupa nao mona yaepao katatoana,’ lea-pyaa.
Oapi longo setenge akali dokome dopa leamoaka doko, Goteme baa lamaiyoo, ‘Emba akali mona napalenge lamo! Indupa kuka gii dakenya emba kapa pao kumalapeno. Dokopa oapi embanya nyoo limbateleno dupa pitaka apinya jetape?’ lea-pyaa.
Dee nyakamame oapi longo nyoo tangenyaka limbao katao Gotenyana lao epe dupa setakamaiya nayataminopa, makande dopale dupa nyakama-kisa kapa pao ipatana,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
Dokopa Jisasame baanya disaipele dutupa lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame nyakama tange auu pyoo katapenge dupanya lao masetala, ‘Naima nee aki nao katatama laa kanjemape?’ dee ‘Yonge yati akimi pitamape?’ lao nea kayala nayalapape!
Endakali auu pyoo katenge tenge doko neepi, endakipi, yonge yati pingipi dupa mambele daa!
Nyakamame yaka wayamu dupa masalapape. Dupame ee pokala naengema. Dupame nee mandyuu ipao nee setenge anda andakepi yakanepi mendenya mau pyala naengemaka doko, Goteme dupa nee maingina, nyakamame yaka dupa etete ita minao kalyamino.
Nyakamanya endakali mendeme baa gii longo lao katapu laka lao nea kayapala baa tangeme baanya katapenge gii dupanya ee kana mendapua waipa setape?
Nyakamame gii mendatupa apata kalyanya gii etete kukipi mende waipa sala nayapenge tamo kandao doko, aipuma opale waka dupa nea kaelyamipi?” lea-pyaa.
“Nyakamame mee tanu dupanya dii yati pipae dupa masalapape. Dupame elyoko ita pyao nuu yambalepi mende napingimaka doko, wamba akali Solomoneme baa tangenya yati tata dupa pitaka petala tanu dupanya dii yati pipae epe dopale mendeme yati pyoo nakateana lao nyakama langilyo.
Mee tanu dupa indupa iki katapelyamopa taita pokanya setapala itateme tata yangengemaka doko, Goteme tanu dopale dupa dii yati pipaeme yati pisingi! Dokaita joo baame nyakama yonge yati pingi dupa etete auu pyoo dingina, nyakama kuki iki masoo miningima lamo!
Dopana, nyakama nee aki natamape, endaki aki natamape lao masetala nea nea kayao makandala nayalapape.
Isa yuu dakenya kamalya katenge endakali dupame dopale dupa iki lao masetala nea kayao putiti kaelyamino. Dopaka doko, nyakama daa jilyamo dupa nyakamanya Takange dokome masoo kalyamo.
Dopana, Goteme isina lao katapenge doko nyakamame kutao nyalapape! Dopa pitaminopa baame oapi dupa nyakama ditakana,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
“Nyakama tata yakane dupa! Nyakamanya Takange dokome nyakamanya Kamongo Kiŋi katatona lao mona mendai palyetelyamona, paka nakayalapape.
Nyakamanya oapi dupame muni sambao nyepala, muni dupa endakali tipya dupa nisoo maiyepape. Nyakamanya muni setapenge pausa yapa lapyoo koyala naenge mende kutao nyalapape. Nyakamanya muni angi dupa alu napitana kaitinya setalapape. Kaitinya setapae dupa pake nenge endakali dupame pake nyala nayapenge. Dee kokalyapi opale mendeme nao koyasala naengeaka.
Nyakamanya oapi epe dupa setenge panda dokonyaka nyakamanya mona yukuoo setengema daape!” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
“Nyakamame nyakamanya yambale dupa lakao matapunya muu pyoo mandyuu lama kaiyepala titili petae pilyepape.
Nyakamame kendemane endakali dupanya kamongo dokome enda kelyatamo dokonya nee nao pituu ipapomona lao malisoo petengemali pyoo pilyepape. Baa ipupala kaita watawata pitamo dokopa kendemane dokaitame yapa kaita lumbamana lao malisoo petengema.
Kamongo doko ipupala kendemane depa latae pititamino dupa kandatamopa dokaitame mona yaepao pititami. Kiningi nambame nyakama langilyo. Kamongo dokome yambale lakao matapunya muu pyoo mandipala dokaita nee nao tokonya petena latala baa tangeme ipao nee setakamaita.
Baa kuka andatombe tamopi yuu yongalanya yaka pauli pii tee pyao latamopa tamopi mende ipupala kandatamopa kendemane dupa luu palya nayatamino kandao doko, mona yaepao pititamina,” lea-pyaa.
“Dee nyakamame dake masalapape: akali anda tange dokome pake nenge akali mende gii ongopa ipapomo lao wambao masetali kandao doko, baame pake nenge akali dokome anda kalupala andaka kolandena lao kayala nayatali.
Dopaka pyoo Endakalinya Ikiningi doko naipapomo lao masetami gii mendenyaka ipatana, nyakama depa latae kalyepape!” lea-pyaa.
Dokopa Pitame baa lamaiyoo, “Kamongo, embame kongali pii doko naima iki kandao leepe, pande endakali pitaka kandao leepe?” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa Kamongo dokome lao pituu, “Lelyamoli pyoo kalai pyakamaingi mona palenge kendemane doko apipi? Baa kamongo dokome baanya kendemane waka dupa isoo nee napenge gii dii lao mokosoo maiyoo katena lenge kendemane doko daape.
Baame kalai auu pyoaka pyoo katatamopa baanya kamongo doko andaka pilyoo ipatamopa, baa mona yaepata.
Nambame nyakama kiningi langilyo, kamongo dokome baanya oapi dupa pitaka baanya kendemane dokome isoo katena lata.
Dopaka doko, kendemane dokome nambanya kamongo doko yapa naipapomona lao masetala, awapa kalai pingi kendemane enda akalipi dupa pyapapu neepi waenepi dupa longo nao kyakao katatamo kandao doko, baanya kamongo doko naipapomo lao masoo ambe lao katatamo gii dokopaka ipata. Ipupala baame kendemane doko etete pyao indyepala pii tanga lenge endakali dupa-pipa kalya pena latana,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
<range>
“Kendemane mendeme baanya kamongo dokome mende pipyali lao masetamo doko kandatala, watao naminao baa tangepi kalaipi dupa depa laa nayatamopa kamongo dokome baa longo lao konjame pyata.
Dopaka doko, kendemane mendeme baanya kamongo dokome mende pipyalina lao masetamo doko nakandao mana koo minatala kenda pipae nyepenge jetamoaka doko, isingi dokome baa konjame kuki pyata. Endakali mendeme oapi epepi mana epepi longo lao endakali mende-kisa nyepala tange longo lawaka yanu pyakamaingi. Dee endakali mendeme oapi mendapua endakali mende-kisa longo setapala mendapua apata konda pyoo yanu pyekena lengena,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
“Nambame isa yuu dake tena lao ita lelya pyaanya palyala epeona yapa tapapya laka lao masilyo.
Nambanya kaimbu mende pyakapenge doko pyakatamino gii dokonya tuu lao mona kenda kayao kalyo.
Nambame endakali dupa pitaka mona mendai paliuu katena lao epe yuu yongasala epeepe lao masilyamipi? Daa, nambame endakali dupa tale pisala epeona lao nyakama langilyo.
Indupapi tendapi anda mendenya endakali yuungi palitamino dupa wakale pyoloo petala tepomame lapoma dolapo kandao yandapipi jetami. Dee lapomame tepoma dutupa kandao yandapipi jetambiaka.
Ikiningi takangepa wakale pyoloo pitambi. Endangi wanengepa wakale pyoloo pitambi. Dee ayangepa wakale pyoloo pitambiakana,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
Baame endakali dupa dapa lamaiyaka-pyaa: “Nyakamame niki landa pingisa-kaita kopa silyamo kanju petala gii dokopaka aiyuu ipame lamona lengema. Kini, dopaka pyoo aiyuu epenge.
Nyakamame poo pupu lapae mende mendakaita-kaita lao epelyamopa, kandatala indupa paina pyapome lamona lengema. Dokopa kiningi paina pingi daape!
Nyakama sambo mana miningi akali dupame yuunya makandepi kaitinya makandepi dupa kandatala yapengemaka doko, aipuma indupa gii dakepa makande silyamo dake masokondape napilyamipi?” lea-pyaa.
“Aipuma nyakama tangeme masokondape napyoo mana tolatae doko yapao nyala naelyamipi?
Akali mendeme emba kosimi laanya pitamopa nyilyambo katinisa patambino gii dokopaka baa-pipa pii doko lao tolasalapape. Aopyoo latala baame emba laminao pao pii tolasingi akali jasa doko maitamopa akali dokome emba yanda singi doko maita. Maitamopa yanda singi dokome emba anjingi anda dokonya pyandata.
Dopa pitamopa emba dokonya anjetayaka paliuu saandi andakepi yakanepi dupa pitaka yanu pyao etatena lao nambame emba kiningi langilyona,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
Gii dokopaka akali kateamino dupanya mendapuame atome pii mende Jisasa lamaiyoo, “Wamba Galili tange mendapuame Gote lao kundi maiyoo kateaminopa akali Pailateme dokaita pyao kumasiana,” leami-pyaa.
Dokopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame Galili tange dutupanya koo pingi dokome Galili tange waka dupanya koo pingi doko ita miniamosa tenge dokonya kenda pipae doko dokaita-kisa epeana lao masilyamipi?
Dokonya etete daana lao nambame nyakama langilyo. Dee nyakama pitaka mona kapilyala nayatamino kandao doko, dopaka pyoo alu pitamiaka.
Wamba endaki Silomenya pete sina lao kana anda londe ketae pyoo petae mende takyepala endakali kingi itaka-kisa dee tukulapo piamo dokonya tenge doko endakali dutupanya koo pingi mana dokome Jetusaleme tange waka dupa pitakanya koo pingi mana doko ita miniamosa dokonya piana lao masilyamipi?
Dokonya etete daana lao nambame nyakama langilyo. Dee nyakama pitaka mona kapilyala nayatamino kandao doko, dopaka pyoo alu pitamina,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
Dokopa Jisasame kongali pii mende dapa lea-pyaa: “Akali mendeme baanya getepe ee dokonya piki ita mende pokeamo dokome maitakao dii mandyuu pilyamona lao kanja epeamoaka doko, dii namandea-pyaa.
Dokopa baame baanya ee pokakamaingi akali doko lamaiyoo, ‘Kanau! Nambame ee kana tepoma dutupanya piki ita dakenya dii lyao nyalanya epewaka doko dii manja naelyamo doko, aipuma ita dakeme mee ee yuu lyakama pyao katatape? Embame pokanya nepape!’ lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa ee pokakamaingi akali dokome baanya pii yanu pyao, ‘Akali Andake, embame ee kana mendai ange apata malisa! Dokopa nambame ita tenge dokonya amapapu kunguma mandyuu setato.
Dopa pitopa kapa pao dii mandelyape lao kandatamba. Namanditamo kandao doko, embame pokanya nepatena,’ lea-pyaana,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
Sambasa gii mendenya Jisasame Jutamanya losuu anda mendenya katao endakali dupa mana lamaiya-pyaa.
Dokopa enda enjele koo paleta mende dokonya petea-pyaa. Enjele koo dokome enda doko yaina maiyamo dokonya pituu ee kana kingi ita-kisa dee tukulapo jia-pyaa. Dopa piamopa enda dokonya maita doko pongao sai pimbilyamosa baa kapa pao too katapenge etete nanjingi-pyaa.
Dopa petae enda doko Jisasame kandatala epena lea-pyaa. Ipateamopa baame enda doko lamaiyoo, “Enda, embanya yaina doko mee jekelyamona,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa latala baame enda doko-kisa kingi setapeamopa enda doko pupae lao tolao katea-pyaa. Dopa petala enda dokome Gote lao lalyia-pyaa.
Dopa piamoaka doko, losuu anda isingi akali dokome Sambasa dokonya Jisasame enda doko auu pisilyamona lao mona koo palyia-pyaa. Dopa petala baame endakali dupa lamaiyoo, “Yuu gii tokange dutupanya iki naimanya kalai pipenge silyamona, nyakamame nyakamanya yaina mende auu pyekena lao masiami kandeno doko, kalai gii dupanya ipupape. Sambasa dokonya dapa pyoo naipupape!” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa Kamongo dokome baanya pii yanu pyakamaiyoo, “Nyakamame endakali enombanya sambo epe jili lao paelyamino! Sambasa dupanya nyakama pitakame nyakamanya mena pulumakao anda dupanya pupala mena pulumakawapi mena dongipi dupa liangao minao endaki nena lao napengemape?
Kini, pengemaka doko, enda dake Apotakame wanenge mende Sataneme baa ee kana kingi ita-kisa dee tukulapo dupa yaina dokome anjinya palyiamo doko Sambasa giinya mokala nayapengena lao masilyamipi?” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa sepala baa kandao yandapipi jingima akali losuu andaka awapa peteamino dupa pitaka elya kayami-pyaa. Gii dokopaka endakali waka awapa peteamino dupa pitakame kalai angi Jisasame piamo dupa kandatala mona yaepeami-pyaa.
Dokopa Jisasame dapa lea-pyaa: “Gotenya isingi doko aki yalepe? Nambame aki mendepa makande pyuape?
Doko masetewaingi dopale lamo. Endakali mendeme masete waingi mende nyepala baanya ee dokonya lyandea-pyaa. Maitakao masete dupa andao ita jiamopa wangya dupanya yaka dupame ipao anda piami-pyaana,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
Dopa latala baame lao pituu, “Nambame Gotenya isingi doko dee aki mendepa makande pyuape?
Doko enda mendeme iisa mendalapo nyoo palawa longo-pipa kapilya mina-mina pilyamopa, iisa dokome palawa doko pitakanya tayapala andasingi dopalena,” lea-pyaa.
Jisasame Jetusaleme paanya pao pituu yuu taono andakepi yakanepi dupanya endakali dupa mana lamaita pyoo pea-pyaa.
Dokopa akali mendeme baa pisoo pituu, “Kamongo, tenda Goteme endakali kuki iki pyoo nyeta laape?” lea-pyaa. Dokopa Jisasame endakali dokaita dapa lamaiya-pyaa.
“Endakali longo dupame anda kambu tambukinatae dokonya kolandalanya makande pitaminoaka doko, kapa napata. Dopana, nyakamame puu lao makande pyoo kolandao kanjepape langilyo.
“Dee akali anda tange dokome sakatatala wambao kaita pai latatamopa nyakama ipao kamaka katapala anda kaita doko watawata pyoo dapa latami: ‘Kamongo, embame naimanya kaita lumbaka!’ latami. Dopa lataminopa baame nyakamanya pii yanu pyao, ‘Nyakama anja tangepe lao masala naelyona,’ lata.
Dopa latatamopa nyakamame anda tange doko lamaiyoo, ‘Wamba naima emba-pipa neepi endakipi awapa naneamape? Embame naimanya yuu taono dupanya katao mana leeno doko akipi?’ latami.
Dopa lataminopa anda tange dokome nyakamanya pii doko yanu pyakao, ‘Nyakama anja tangepe lao nambame masala naelyo. Nyakama pitaka koo pingi endakali kalyaminona namba kalyosa naepenya pupa!’ anda tange dokome dopa latana,” lao Jisasame lea-pyaa.
Tenda Goteme nyakama watao pyatatamopa kamaka katao Apotakame Aisake Jekopepi dee potopesa dupa pitakapi Gotenya isingi panda dokonya katatamino kandatala nyakama ee lao yamataka lao nenge gilyoo katatami.
Gii dokopa endakali yuu yangi yangipi tange dupa Gotenya isingi panda dokonya pituu nee andake nao pititami.
Indupa maitasa kalyamino endakali dupa tenda enomba nyoo katatami. Dee indupa enomba nyoo kalyamino endakali dupa tenda maitasa katatamina,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
Gii dokopaka Patasi mendapuame ipupala baa lamaiyoo, “Akali Etoteme emba pyalanya pilyamona, yuu ange yakinatala waka mendasa puu!” leami-pyaa.
Dopa leaminopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame akali yana kapua joo waa katenge doko dapa lamaiyepape: ‘Indupa taitapa nambame enjele koo dupa watao pyao, yaina paleta dupa auu pisoo katapala gii tepo dokonya nambanya kalai doko pyoo etatona lelyamo,’ lao lamaiyepape.
Endakali dupame potopesa mende yuu waka dupanya pyao kumasala naenya, Jetusaleme dokonyaka pyao kumasepenge jipumosa nambame indupapi, taitapi, dumapi dutupanya kaitini pao katapenge jilyamona, patowana,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa latala Jisasame dapa lea-pyaa: “Kanau! Kanau! Jetusaleme tange! Nyakamame potopesa dupa pyao kumasoo dee Goteme epena latae akali dupa kaname pyao kumasoaka katengema. Gii longo paka nambame nyakama nyoo limbatala yaka matakaimi yakane dupa papa pundipundi yapu nengeli pitoo lao masoo kalyoaka doko, nyakamame tanga lelyamino.
Dokopa nambame nyakamanya anda doko yakinatekelyona, doko mee katakata. Indupa pituu nyakamame namba nakandao katao tenda ipatopa, ‘Akali epelyamo dake auu pisetaena, Kamongo Goteme epena lapumopa epelyamona,’ latamina lao kiningi langilyona!” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
Sambasa gii mendenya Jisasame Patasi dupanya isingi akali mendenya andaka nee nala epeamopa, Jisasame aipa pilyape lao akali dupame isokondape piami-pyaa.
Gii dokopaka akali yonge andao koyapae mende Jisasa peteamo tengesa dosa sia-pyaa.
Dokopa Jisasame mana setapae masingi akalipi Patasipi dupa pisoo, “Sambasa dupanya endakali yaina pyapae dupa mee injisemape, pande sina kayamape? Naimanya mana setapae dupanya aipa lapae silyape lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa dokaita nengekaita piti piaminopa Jisasame akali doko minatala mee injisetala baa pena lea-pyaa.
Pena latala Jisasame dokaita pisoo pituu, “Sambasa mendenya nyakamanya akali mendenya wane tamopi mena pulumakao tamopi mende endaki yuli tombapae mendenya pyakatamopa akali tange dokome pupae pyalya lao ketae nanyetape?” lea-pyaa.
Dokopa dokaitame pii doko kapa pao yanu napiami-pyaa.
Patasi dokonya andaka nee nala epena leamo dupame panda enomba nyoo dupanyaka pitimana lao masiaminosa Jisasame kandatala kongali pii mende dokaita lamaiya-pyaa:
“Akali mendeme enda lanyepala watapae pyao nee andake yawata mendenya nee nala ipu lao wii latamopa embame panda enomba nyoo dupanya napitipi. Aopyoo latala akali andake emba ita minao mende apata wii latala baame laminao ipao pituu emba langyoo, ‘Emba pilyeno dosa akali dake petena panda mai!’ latamopa emba elya andake kayapala etete maita-kaita pao pititi.
<range>
Embame dopa napitina akali mendeme, ‘Nee nambana ipu,’ lao wii latamopa pee kandeno doko, emba pao etete maita-kaita joo pitipi. Embame dopa pitinopa akali emba wii latamo dokome ipupala emba langyoo, ‘Kaimia, emba tengesa dasa pitipoko,’ lata. Baame dopa latamopa endakali nee nao pitatamino dupa pitakanya enombasa embanya kenge andake seta.
Dokaita joo endakali mende baa tangeme alyasale joo katatamo doko, anasale joo katena lata. Dee endakali mende baa tangeme anasale joo katatamo doko, alyasale joo katena latana,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa latala Jisasame baa nee nala epena leamo akali doko lamaiyoo, “Aopyoo latala embanya kaita miningipi, kaiminingipi, emba tatapi, makisa katenge kamongopi dupanya nee mende yawatakamaitala nala epena lao pituu dokaitame nee itingi yawatala emba wii lao lanyepala yanu pyakatamina lao masoo wii laa nayape.
Embame nee andake mende yawatakamaitala dokopa endakali tipyapi, papa tambotaepi, moko koyapaepi, lenge mondapi dupame nala epena lao wii lape.
Dokaitame kapa pao embanya nee itingi yanu pyakala nayataminopa emba mona yaepao katate. Tenda Goteme endakali tolatae dupa malunya sakatasetamo gii dokopa baame yole angi doko emba ditana,” lea-pyaa.
Akali mende nee dokonya awapa nao petea mendeme pii dutupa sepala Jisasa lamaiyoo, “Gotenya isingi panda dokonya katao nee nao katatamino endakali dupa mona yaepao katena,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Gii mendepa akali mendeme nee andake mende endakali dupanya yawakamaitopa latala wambao nee natamino endakali longo dupa epena lea-pyaa.
Nee napenge gii doko epeamopa baanya kendemane mendeme endakali wamba epena lateamo dupa lamaiyakala pena lao pituu, ‘Embame dapa lape,’ lea-pyaa. ‘Dupa pitaka depa latae sepelyamona nee nala epena lamaipi,’ lea-pyaa.
Leamoli pyoo kendemane dokome pao endakali dokaita lamaitiamopa dokaita pitakame pii mendai dopaleaka lao, ‘Kapa napumana lumuna,’ leami-pyaa. Mendeme kendemane doko lamaiyoo, ‘Nambame yuu mende sambapuna doko kanja patoo, naipapo lumuna pipitana maka nakayape,’ lea-pyaa.
Dee mendeme baa lamaiyoo, ‘Nambame mena pulumakao kalai pipenge kingi ita mende sambapuna dutupame kalai pina lao makande pyaa patoo, naipapo lumuna pipitana maka nakayape,’ lea-pyaa.
Dee mendeme baa lamaiyoo, ‘Enda mende nambanya lanyipu dokome kapa naipapo lumuna,’ lea-pyaa.
“Dokopa kendemane dokome baanya kamongo doko lamaiya pea-pyaa. Lamaitiamopa anda tange dokome imbu kayapala kendemane doko lamaiyoo, ‘Embame alo pyao yuu taono dakenya kaitini andakepi yakanepi dupanya pupala endakali tipyapi, papa tambotaepi, lenge mondapi, moko koyapaepi dupa nambanya andaka laminao ipupi!’ lea-pyaa.
Dopa lateamopa kendemane dokome leamoli petala kamongo doko lamaiyoo, ‘Embame lapinoli petapupaka doko, andaka pitipenge panda mendapua mee silyamoakana,’ lea-pyaa.
“Dokopa kamongo dokome kendemane doko lamaiyoo, ‘Embame yuu taono dake yakinatala kaitini andakepi ee kame kilikilipi dupanya pupala endakali dupanya katatami dupa nambanya anda dake tumbinalena longo lao laminao ipupi!
Wamba epena lateo akali dutupanya mendaipi mendeme nee depa lakamaiyo dakenya naa nasetana lao nambame nyakama langilyo,’ lea-pyaana,” lao Jisasame lea-pyaa.
Endakali longo dupa Jisasa baa-pipa awapa pao pituu, baame kandapilyetala dokaita lamaiyoo, “Endakali mendeme namba watao payala ipanya baanya endangi takangepi, enda wanepi, kaiminingi pimalengepi, dee baa tange nea kaengepi dupa yandapipili joo wakale nakatenge doko nambanya disaipele joo kapa pao nakatenge.
<range>
Endakali mendeme baanya ita poko doko nyoo soo namba watao napaenge doko baa kapa pao nambanya disaipele nanjingina,” lea-pyaa.
“Dee nyakamanya akali mendeme anda londe mende pyoo ketae pyakalyetoo lao masetamo kandao doko, wambao baa isa pitipala anda doko pipenge muni yaka silyape lao masokondape pipenge daape!
Aopyoo latala baame muku minao tee pyao petala malatae sina kayatamopa, endakali dupame kandatala akali doko kandao dapa lao lamba latami:
‘Akali dokome anda dake tee pyao petala baame kapa pao pyoo etasala nayana,’ latami.
“Dee akali kiŋi mendeme kiŋi waka mende yanda pimaiya paanya pituu, nambanya yanda singi taosene kingi ita mende kalyamino dupame kiŋi waka mendenya yanda singi taosene kingi ita lapoma katatamo dupa kapa pao watao pyapala ita minatamape aipa pitamape lao auu pyoo wambao tolasepenge daape!
Baame masilyamopa kapa nanjilyamo kandao doko, baanya akali yanda pipili doko kalyasa tengesa naipao ene pilyamopa yanda doko kayambana lao akali mendapuame akema lao wii lakala pena lenge daape!
Dokaita joo endakali nyakamanya mendeme baanya oapi dupa pitaka maita maiya naenge dokome kapa pao nambanya disaipele nanjingiakana,” lea-pyaa.
“Aipi doko epe. Epeaka doko, tende napitamo kandao doko, aipa petala dee tende pisepengepe? Aipi tata dopale dupa kunguma-pipa ee yuu dupa auu pisoo tamuina lao setalapi naenya mee nepatala kaenge. Nyakama kale-kaita singi dupame pii doko salapapena!” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
<range>
Gii mendepa muni takisa nyingi akalipi koo mana minao paenge endakalipi dupa pitakame Jisasa kateamo dosa baanya pii sala epeami-pyaa.
Dopa piaminopa akali Patasipi mana setapae masingi akalipi dupame Jisasa kandao waipi lao dapa leami-pyaa: “Akali dakeme endakali mana koo minao paenge dupa nyoo kapao nee nao pituu kalyamona,” leami-pyaa.
Dokopa Jisasame kongali pii dake dokaita lamaiya-pyaa:
“Akali nyakamanya mendenya mena sipisipi andate mendai katatamo kandao doko, dutupanya mendai mende alu pitamopa akali sipisipi tange dokome aipa pitape? Baame sipisipi kingi ita mange mendai wakyoo-kisa dee mange mendai wakyoo dutupa pau yuu mendenya katena latala mendai alu pitamo doko kutawaka pao mendasa katatamo kandatala nyepalaka kayata daape!
Nyepala dokopa baame mona etete yaepao lataiyanya setapala soo pao andaka lai petala baanya kaita miningi endakalipi makisa katengepi dupa kambu pyamana epena lata. Dopa latala baame dokaita lamaiyoo, ‘Nambanya mena sipisipi mende alu pipumu doko kutapala kandao nyepelyona, nyakama namba-pipa mona yaepamana!’ lata.
<range>
Dopaka pyoo kaitinya katenge dupame endakali kingi ita mange mendai wakyoo-kisa dee mange mendai wakyoo dupa epe tolatae injetala mona kapilyepenge nanjoo kalyamino dupa kandao mona yaepengema. Dopa pingimaka doko, koo mana minao paenge endakali mendeme mona kapilyilyamo doko kandatala mona etete yaepengemana lao nambame nyakama langilyona,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
Dopa latala dee waipa soo Jisasame dapa lea-pyaa: “Dee enda mendenya muni konde kingi ita mendai setamo dokonya mendai mende alu pitamopa baame aipa pitape? Baame lama mende kaiyepala andaka kunguma dupa polao kutakondape nyoo kutawaka pituu mendasa nyepala kayapyali daape!
Nyepala dokopa baame baanya kaita miningipi makisa katengepi dupa kambu pyamana epena lao wii latala baame dokaita lamaiyoo, ‘Nambanya muni konde mende alu pipumuaka doko, indupa kutapala kandao nyepelyona nyakama namba-pipa mona yaepamana,’ enda dokome dopa lata.
Dokaita joo mana koo minao paenge endakali mendai mende mona kapilyilyamo dokopa Gotenya enjele dupame mona etete yaepengemana lao nambame nyakama langilyona,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
Dee Jisasame pii mende lao pituu, “Akali mendeme wane lapoma mandea-pyaana,” lea-pyaa.
“Wane laponge dokome takange lamaiyoo, ‘Apane, embanya munipi oapi moya nyepenge dupa waima minao nalimbanya mokosakate dokopa namba diti mendatupa indupa dii!’ lea-pyaa. Dokopa takange dokome baanya oapi dupa wane dolaponya mokosoloo pyakamaiya-pyaa.
Dopa peteamopa wane laponge dokome gii kuki katapala baanya oapi dupa pitakame muni nyepala baa yuu tependa mendasa patala katea-pyaa. Baame yuu dokonya katao mona napaliuu luingi mana koo dupa minao baanya muni dupa nepa nepa pia-pyaa.
Baanya munipi oapi dupa pitaka nepao etapeamopa baa kateamo yuu dokonya lopo andake mende siamopa baa neepi oapi etete daa joo mee katea-pyaa.
Dokopa baa akali yuu dokonya tange mendenya kalai mende pyakamaitoo lao pea-pyaa. Peamopa akali yuu tange dokome baanya menadupa pau yuu mendenya setakao kalya pena lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa pupala baame mena dupa setakamaiyoo katea-pyaa.
Kateamopa mena dupanya nee setakamaiyamino dupa mename nao kateaminopa baame kandatala dupanya mendapua napu laka lao masiamoaka doko, endakali mendeme baa mende namaiyami-pyaa.
Dopa petala baanya masingi tolatala dapa lao masia-pyaa: ‘Nambanya takangenya kalai akali dupa pitakame nee kakana setao nao kataminopa namba angenya katao lopome kumilyona, indupa nambame yuu dake yakinatala nambanya takange kalyamo ongonya patoo. Pupala nambame baa lamaiyoo, ‘Apane, nambame emba-kisapi Gote-kisapi koo petapu.
<range>
Indupa namba akali epepi mende embame kapa pao embanya ikiningina dee late daana, namba embanya kalai akali joo kata lape,’ latonana lao masia-pyaa.
Dopa lao masetala sakatao baanya takange kateasa pea-pyaa. “Tependale mendasa epeamopa takange dokome kandatala kondo kaya-pyaa. Kondo kayapala baame alo pyao pao mangenya kopyetae sepala wane doko nunu pia-pyaa.
Dokopa wane dokome takange lamaiyoo, ‘Apane, nambame emba-kisapi Gote-kisapi koo petapu. Namba akali epepi mende embame kapa pao embanya ikiningi dee lapenge daana,’ lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamoaka doko, takange dokome baanya kendemane dupa lamaiyoo, ‘Nambanya wane dake kumia jiamo doko indupa ipame lamo. Baa alu peteamo doko indupa dee kandelyamano. Tenge dokonya nyakamame pupae lao nambanya yonge pee enomba nyoo pingi londe doko nyoo ipao baanya pyakamaiyepa! Dee kinginya pisingi liŋi doko pisakamaiyepa! Dee moko pee pingi mendalapo pyakamaiyepa! Dee mendapuame mena pulumakao yakane andapae doko nyoo ipupala pyalapa! Naimame nee nao mona yaepao pitimana,’ lea-pyaa. Dopa lateamopa dokaitame sakatatala mona yaepenge mana dupa miniami-pyaa.
<range>
<range>
“Dopa pyoo kateaminopa akali dokonya ikiningi mupa doko eesa katao andalyaasa ipao pituu siamopa musiki tata tata dupa lao mali lyoo kapao kalyuiyamino sia-pyaa.
Sepala baame kalai akali mende epena latala doko pisoo, ‘Dupa aipa pyoo kalyamipi?’ lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa kalai akali dokome baa lamaiyoo, ‘Embanya kaiminingi doko ipatapumopa embanya takaneme wane doko auu pyoo katapya lamo latala mena pulumakao yakane andapae doko pyalamona,’ lea-pyaa.
Dokopa wane mupa dokome imbutongo mandipala andaka peteamino dokonya etete napatoo lao masetala kamaka katea-pyaa. Dokopa takange dokome kamaka pyakalyetala baa andiki andiki pisoo, ‘Wane emba andaka ipupoko!’ lea-pyaa.
Dopa lateamopa wane dokome takangenya pii yanu pyao, ‘Nambame ee kana longo embanya kendemane joo katao yuu mendaipi mende tanga nalao embanya kalai pyaka leenoli pyoo pyekenge. Dopa pilyopa embame mena meme yakanepi mende nambanya kaita miningi dupa-pipa mona yaepao pyao nalapa lao etete dyaa naenge kandapi!
Dopaka doko, embanya ikini dakeme embanya oapi dupa pitaka enda akali nyele-nyele paenge dupa-kisa etasetakala pilyoo ipumopa embame mena pulumakao yakane andapae doko baanya lao pyakamaiyene lamona!’ lea-pyaa.
“Dokopa takange dokome baa lamaiyoo, ‘Wane, embapa nalimba koteaka lao awapa katenge. Nambanya oapi dupa pitaka embanyaka silyamo.
Dee embanya kaiminingi dake kumia jiamo doko indupa dee ipame lamo. Baa pao alu peteamo doko indupa dee kandalamano. tenge dokonya minao naimame mona yaepenge mana dupa minapenge etete jipyanya minilyamanona,’ Takange dokome dopa lea-pyaana,” lao Jisasame lea-pyaa.
Jisasame baanya disaipele dupa kandao pii mende dapa lamaiya-pyaa: “Akali kamongo mendenya oapi dupa akali mendeme isakamaiyoo katea-pyaa. Dokopa akali mendapuame ipupala kamongo doko-kisa nambonambo pyoo, ‘Embanya oapi isekenge akali dokome embanya munipi oapi dupa nepa nepa pyekelyamona,’ lamaiyami-pyaa.
Dopa leaminopa kamongo dokome baanya oapi isakamaingi akali doko epena latala doko lamaiyoo, ‘Nambame sipupa emba kandao pii lelyamino dake aipa pipae mende lelyamipi? Nambanya oapi emba-kisa setamo dupa utupa silyamona lao pepa mendenya pyao depa lakala puu! Embame oapi dupa kapa pao dee isakao nakatalapenona,’ lea-pyaa.
“Dopa leamopa oapi isakamaingi akali dokome dapa lao masia-pyaa: ‘Nambanya kamongo dokome baanya oapi isakamailyo kalai dokonya namba watao pyalapomona, namba aipa pitowape? Nambame yati minao kalai pupu lao kapa napilyo. Dee nambame mende-kisa neepi mende tee laanya elya kayato lumu.
Dopaka doko, kamongo dokome namba kandao kalai doko dee isala naenya kaya latamopa endakali mendapuame namba nyoo laminao nyakamanya andaka pena lao nambame mana minatoo mende masetelyona,’ lao masia-pyaa.
Dopa lao masetala baame kamongo dokonya yanu singi akali dupa pitaka epena lea-pyaa. Akali wambao epea mende pisoo, ‘Nambanya kamongo dokonya yanu akitupa emba-kisa silyape?’ lea-pyaa.
Dopa lateamopa akali dokome lao pituu, ‘Namba-kisa olipi ipange peteta jatamu penge andate mendai yanu silyamona,’ lea-pyaa. Dopa lateamopa oapi isakamaingi akali dokome baa lamaiyoo, ‘Indupa embanya yanu singi pepa dake nyepala isa pituu emba-kisa yanu kingi itaka yuungi silyamo lao yapa pepa pyaa!’ lea-pyaa.
Dee akali mende epeamo doko pisoo, ‘Emba-kisa yanu akitupa silyape?’ lea-pyaa. Akali dokome lao pituu, ‘Namba-kisa wiisa mandipae beke nuu andake taosene mendai yanu silyamona,’ lea-pyaa. Dokopa oapi isakamaingi akali dokome baa lamaiyoo, ‘Embanya yanu singi pepa dake nyepala emba-kisa yanu andate tukulapo silyamona lao pepa pyaa!’ lea-pyaa.
“Dopa lateamopa akali kamongo dokome baanya oapi kopeta isakamaingi akali dokome waa katalamona lao kenge minalyia-pyaa. Yuu dakenya oapi indupa silyamo dupa iki lao masingi endakali dupame kaitinya epe dupa lao masingi endakali dupa ita minao endakali yango dupa-pipa waa katao kaita miningima.
“Dee nambame mende nyakama langilyona, nyakamame muni pake joo nyilyamino dokome endakali dupa kaita minalapape. Dopa pyoo katao kumataminopa kaitinya katenge dupame nyakama anda koyala naenge dokonya lanyetamina,” lea-pyaa.
“Endakali mendeme endakali mendenya opale yakane mende isokondape pyakamaitamo kandao doko, baame andake mende isokondape pyakamaitaka. Dee endakali mendeme endakali mendenya opale yakane mende isokondape napyakamaitamo kandao doko, baame opale andake mende isokondape napyakamaitaka.
Dopana, nyakamame yuu dakenya-tae muni doko auu pyoo isokondape napitamino kandao doko, apimi nyakama muni angi doko isokondape pyakatamina lao masetala ditape?
Dee nyakamame endakali waka mendenya opale mende auu pyoo isokondape napyakamaitamino kandao doko, nyakama tangenya opale mende apimi ditape?” lea-pyaa.
“Kalai akali mendeme kamongo lapomanya kalai pakao pyakamaipenge nanjilyamo. Dopa pitoo lao masetamo kandao doko, tenda baame mende doko auu kayapala mende doko auu nakayata. Dee baame mende doko mona setapala mende doko maka kayata. Dopana, nyakamame Gotepa munipa lapota mona setapenge nanjetana,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
Jisasame pii leamo dutupa pitaka Patasi dupame sepala muni putiti kaengema dokonyana baa kilya kandao gii kayami-pyaa.
Dopa piaminopa baame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakame nyakamanya mana dupa endakalimi kandatala nyakama tolataena lao lalyina lao mana minilyaminoaka doko, Goteme nyakamanya mona andaka dupa kandelyamo. Endakalimi tama pilyamino dopale dupa Goteme kilya kandenge.
“Wamba mana setapae pii dupapi potopesa dupanya pii dupapi dupa soo ipao Jone Kaimbu Pingi doko kateamo dokonya tuu lea-pyaa. Indupa Goteme isoo kalyamona lao Wai Pii Epe doko yuu pitakanya tayapumopa endakali pitaka Goteme isina lao konga lelyamino.
Ketae kaiti yuupi dee isa yuupi dupa lekeleke tao alu pitamo kandao doko, mana setapae dupanya pii etete kukipi mende alu pyanya etete lekeleke tapenge jeta.
“Akali mendeme baanya enda wambatae doko watao pyatala waka mende lanyilyamo dokome kepo kolenge. Dee akali mendeme akali mendenya enda watao pyatae mende lanyilyamo dokome kepoaka kolengena,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa latala Jisasame pii mende lao pituu, “Wamba kamongo mende katea-pyaa. Akali dokome koteaka lao yonge pee muni longome sambapae epe epe dupa pyoo mona yaepao nee epe longo dupa nao katea-pyaa.
Dee akali tipya amungi longo pingi Lasatasa lenge doko koteaka lao kamongo dokonya anda kambusa paliuu sepa pingi-pyaa.
Kamongo dokonya nee neamo dupanya tuu pyapae mendapua toko pundipundi kopo leamo dupa natoo lao masoo paliuu sepa pingi-pyaa. Dopa pilyamopa yana dupa awapa ipata petapu baanya amungi dupa pendo peta pyakamaingima-pyaa.
“Yuu mende tipya doko kumateamopa enjele dupame baa nyoo pupala Apotakamepa awapa katena lao katasiami-pyaa. Maitakao kamongo doko kumiamopa malu piami-pyaa.
Malu peteaminopa baa yuu koo dokonya pupala tanda andake nao katea-pyaa. Dokonya katao kandalyiamopa Lasatasa Apotakamepa yuu londati mendenya kateambino kandea-pyaa.
Kandatala baame dapa lao ae lao wii lea-pyaa: ‘Apane Apotakame, namba itate angenya etete tanda nelyo. Embame namba kondo kayapala, Lasatasanya kingi konde dokome endaki mendalapo poyanyetala nambanya keke ange kuki manda tasetakala epena lapoko!’ lea-pyaa.
Apotakameme baanya pii doko yanu pyao, ‘Wane atuku, embame masoo katape! Wamba emba yuunya kateeno dokopa oapi epe dupa pitaka emba-kisa siamopa Lasatasa-kisa koo dupa siamo doko indupa yuu dakenya Goteme baanya mona yaepasakamaipumopa, emba tanda koo neleno, kanda!
Dee tenge mende silyamo: naima kalyamano panda dakepa nyakama kalyamino panda dokopa dolaponya kainanya nangale andake mende nyia-pyaa. Naimame nangale doko kapa pao yalatala nyakama kalyamino dokonya naipupenge. Dee nyakamame nangale doko yalatala naima kalyamano dakenya naipupengeakana,’ Apotakameme lea-pyaa.
“Dopa leamopa baame lao pituu, ‘Doko tamo kandao, apane, embame Lasatasa baa nambanya takangenya andaka pena lapoko!
Nambanya kaiminingi yuungi kalyamino dupame aopyoo latala namba tanda nao kalyo dakenya ipao tanda natamina baame dupa pii kyoto joo lamaiyakala pena laa!’ lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa Apotakameme baa lamaiyoo, ‘Dupame Mosese mauwapi potopesapi dupanya pii lapae nyakama-kisa silyamo dupanya sinana,’ lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa baame lao pituu, ‘Apane Apotakame, ongo kapa daa! Endakali kumapae mende malunya sakatala dupa-kisa patamopa dupame mona kapilyetamina,’ lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamoaka doko, Apotakameme baa lamaiyoo, ‘Mosese mauwapi potopesapi dupanya pii lapae dupa soo masala naelyamino doko, akali mendeme malunya sakatatala pii lamaitamo doko aipa petala soo masetamipi?’ Apotakameme lea-pyaana,” lao Jisasame lea-pyaa.
Dokopa Jisasame baanya disaipele dupa lamaiyoo, “Koo pyepale lao mapisingi makande tata tata dupa kiningi etete kapa pao ipata. Ipatamoaka doko, endakali mendeme nyakama koo pyepale lao mapisetamo endakali doko koyata iki lamo!
Aopyoo latala endakali mendeme wane koo datupanya mendeme koo pina lao mapisetamo doko kana andake mendeme mapisingi endakali dokonya mangenya anjetala baa solowata pete andake dokonya soo pyandataminopa auu pita.
Nyakamame nyakama tange kandao isoo kalyepape! “Embanya endakali yango mendeme koo pitamo kandao doko, embame baa pyalanya lape. Dee baa mona kapilyetamo kandao doko, embame baanya koo pingi yanu dupa kayape!
Dee baame emba-kisa yuu gii undinaka paa kalangesa koo pitamo kandao doko, petala paa kalangesaka ipao emba langyoo, ‘Nambame koo petala mona kapilyetelyona,’ lea kandeno doko, embame baanya koo pingi yanu dupa paa kalangesaka kayape!” lea-pyaa.
Aposele dupame Kamongo doko lamaiyoo, “Embame naimanya masoo miningi doko andasakape,” leami-pyaa.
Dopa leaminopa Kamongo dokome lao pituu, “Nyakamame awa wainginya dii palenge dopale joo masoo minapimili kandao doko, nyakamame diiwi ita dake lamaiyoo, ‘Emba tangeme embanya pingi dupa yukuopala pao solowata pete andake kaina dokonya pokatae kata!’ laminopa laminoli pipyalina,” lea-pyaa.
“Akali nyakamanya mendenya kendemane mendeme mendasa ee kalai pyoo katao tamopi dee mena sipisipi setao katao tamopi maitakao andaka ipatamopa embame baa lamaiyoo, ‘Emba yapa ipao pitipala nee naa,’ latepe?
Daa, dopa nalenya embame kendemane doko lamaiyoo, ‘Emba nee endakipi tenda natale namba wambao natoo depa latakala emba lapalapa epe mende nyoo ketae petala nee natoli pyoo minakao ipu!’ late daape.
Kendemane dokome embanya pii latenoli pyoo pitamosa embame baa lalyetepe? Daa, lalyala nayate.
Dopaka pyoo Goteme nyakama kandao, ‘Pyepa!’ latamo dupa pitaka petala dokopa nyakamame dapa laapape: ‘Naima kendemane endakaliaka dupame naimanya isingi akalimi kalai pyepape leamo dutupa ikiaka petelyamanona,’ laapape,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
Jisasame Jetusaleme paanya yuu Samatiapa Galilipanya kaina dokonya kaita pea-pyaa.
Baa pao yuu taono endakali kuki palenge mendenya pyakameamopa, akali kopetali kingi ita mendeme kaitinisa baa kandeami-pyaa. Dokaitame tengesa naipao omosale katao baa kandao puu lao wii latala, “Isingi Akali Jisasa! Embame naima kondo kayape!” leami-pyaa.
<range>
Dopa leaminopa Jisasame kandatala dokaita lamaiyoo, “Pitisa dupame nyakama kandena pupa,” lea-pyaa. Dopa lateamopa, kaitinisa peaminopa nyakamanya yonge koyapae dupa mee jia-pyaa.
Dokopa akali dutupanya mendeme baanya yonge dee auu piamo doko kandatala pii puu lao lao Gote tama pyoo Jisasa kateamo dokonya pilyia-pyaa.
Pilyoo ipupala Jisasanya moko seteamo dosa tombauli soo Jisasa kandao, “Yaka pyene lamona!” lea-pyaa. Akali doko Samatia-pyaa.
Dokopa Jisasame lao pituu, “Akali kingi ita mendenya yonge koyapae dupa mee joo pilyamoaka doko, dutupanya akali tata waka mendai dakeme Gote lao tama pyaanya pilyalame lamo doko, akali mange mendai wakyoo dutupa anja kalyamipi?” lea-pyaa.
<range>
Dopa latala Jisasame akali doko lamaiyoo, “Embame masoo minapino dokome emba mee injisetekelyamona, sakatatala puu,” lea-pyaa.
Dokopa akali Patasi mendapuame Jisasa pisoo, “Goteme endakali dupa isetamo gii doko andukupa ipatape?” leami-pyaa. Dopa leaminopa Jisasame pii yanu pyao, “Goteme endakali isala epenge doko endakali lengeme kapa pao nakandapenge.
Dee endakali mendeme kapa pao, ‘Gotenya isingi doko omosa silyamo kanjepa! Amasa silyamo kanjepa!’ lapenge daaka. Baame nyakamanya mona andaka ipao katapala isilyamona masalapape,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa latala baame baanya disaipele dupa lamaiyoo, “Tenda nyakamame Endakalinya Ikiningi dokome isetamo gii dupanya mendai iki mende wambao kandamana ipupya laka lao masetamiaka doko, nyakame nakandatami.
Tenda endakali mendapuame nyakama langyoo, ‘Omo kanjepa!’ ‘Ama kanjepa!’ latamiaka doko, nyakamame mendasa kutao kanja napenya mee kalyepape.
Kaitinya yangi-kaita pituu yuu wapaka pilyamopa kaiti pitakanya tii piyoko lelyamoli pyoo Endalinya Ikiningi doko ipatamo gii dokopa dopaka pita.
Dopaka doko, baa wambao tanda longo nata. Dee endakali indupa kalyamino dupame baa daa lao maita maitamiakana,” lea-pyaa.
“Wamba akali Noa kateamo gii dokopa endakali dupame piaminoli pyoo tenda katataminopa Endakalinya Ikiningi doko dee ipata.
Wamba endakali dupame neepi endakipi nao katao, wane dupanya enda lanyakamaiyoo wanaku dupa akali pena lata pyoo kateami-pyaa. Dopa pyoo katao Noa endakinya paenge sipi dokonya kolandeamo gii dokonya tuu leami-pyaa. Dokopa endaki andake dokome ipao dokaita pitaka pyao kumasia-pyaa.
Dee dokaita joo akali Lote kateamo gii dokopa endakali dupame neepi endakipi nao, oapi dupa sambao aloo pilya pyana pyoo ee pokata anda peta pyoo kateami-pyaa.
Dopa piaminopa Loteme Sotoma yuu doko yakinatala pateamo gii dokopaka kaiti-kisa aiyuu epele pyoo itate-pipa kana tao alupaedupa ipupala endakali pitaka pia-pyaa.
Tenda Endakalinya Ikiningi doko panao ipatamopa dopaka pita.
“Tenda gii dokopa endakali mendeme baanya anda patakisa katatamo dokome baanya oapi andakote setamo dupa nyalanya kolandala nayapenge. Dee endakali mende eesa katatamo dokome andaka pilyala nayapengeaka jeta.
Nyakamame Lotenya enda doko masalapape!
Endakali mendeme baa tange nea kaenge dupanya iki watao minao katatamo kandao doko, baa tangemeaka alu pita. Dee endakali mendeme baa tange nea kaenge dupa yakinatamo kandao doko, tange pyoo nyoo niseta.
“Dee nambame nyakama langilyona, Endakalinya Ikiningi doko kuka gii mendenya ipatamopa endakali lapoma toko mendainya palitambino dolaponya mende baame lanyepala mende yakinata.
Dee enda lapomame palawa wasalanya wiisa dii takyoo indyuu pititambinopa, mende doko baame lanyepala mende yakinata.
[Dee akali lapomame ee kalai pyoo katatambinopa, mende doko baame lanyepala mende yakinatana,]” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa disaipele dupame pii dutupa sepala lao pituu, “Kamongo, andusa dopa pitape?” leami-pyaa. Dokopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Opale mende kumapae silya mendasa yaka lakepame dupa ipao kambu pingimana,” lea-pyaa.
Dee Jisasame baanya disaipele dupame maka nakaenya koteaka lao loma soaka katena lao baame kongali pii mende dapa lamaiya-pyaa:
“Yuu taono mendenya pii tolasingi akali jasa mende katea-pyaa. Akali dokome Gote paka nakayao endakali dupa masala nayawaka pingi-pyaa.
Dee enda walyakae mendeme yuu dokonyaka pituu koteaka lao jasa doko kateamo dokonya ipatapu baa lamaiyoo, ‘Endakali mendeme namba pundu nyoo diana embame namba nisoo pundu doko lao tolasakape!’ lata pingi-pyaa.
Koto longo jasa dokome enda dokonya pundu doko tolasakamaitoo lao masala nayamoaka doko, maitakao baame dapa lao masia-pyaa: ‘Nambame Gote paka nakayao, endakali dupa masala naelyoaka doko, enda walyakae dakeme namba maka pisoo koteaka lao ipao pii lati-lati setamopa tenda namba etete maka pisetana, nambame baanya pundu doko tolasakamaitoo,’ lao masia-pyaana,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
<range>
Dopa latala Kamongo dokome pii dokonya waipa soo lao pituu, “Nyakamame jasa koo dokome enda doko lao masetala tolasakamaitoo leamo doko masalapape.
Dopaka pyoo Gotenya yapao nyepae endakali dupame kuka kotakapi Gote lao ee lao loma setaminopa baame dupanya pii tolasakamaiyanya koto longo malisoo mee katatape?
Daa, baame dupanya pii yapa tolasakamaitana langilyo. Goteme dokaita nisoo pii yapa tolasakamaitamoaka doko, Endakalinya Ikiningi doko ipatamo gii dokopa masoo miningi endakali mende yuu dakenya katatamino baame kandata laape?” lea-pyaa.
Yuu mendepa endakali yangimi nyakama tange tolataena lao masetala waka dupa kilya kandao kateaminosa Jisasame dokaita kandao kongali pii mende dapa lea-pyaa:
“Akali Patasi mendepa muni takisa nyingi akali mendepa losuu anda andake dokonya loma sala peambi-pyaa.
Pupala Patasi dokome toya katao dapa lao moname loma sia-pyaa: ‘Endakali waka dupa pitakame oapi putiti kayao, mana setapae dupa nepao kepo kolao paengemali pyoo nambame napaengena, Gote emba lao yaka pilino lelyo. Dee namba muni takisa nyingi akali dapale joo nakalyo dokonya emba lao etete yaka pilino lelyoaka.
Satete dii lao kote lapoma nambame emba lao masoo nee nanenya katenge. Munipi oapi nambame nyilyo dupa pitakanya kingi ita mende lao konjepala konjepae dokonya mende losuu andaka setengena,’ dopa lao loma soo katea-pyaa.
Dopaka doko, takisa nyingi akali dokome lembasa waka yuu kandanatae katao kingi tukyoo dapa lao loma sia-pyaa: ‘Nambame mana koo miningina, Gote embame namba kondo kayape!’ lao loma sia-pyaa.
Dopa piambi-pyaana nambame nyakama dapa langilyo: akali dolapome losuu anda andake doko yakinateambinopa, takisa nyingi akali doko Gotenya enombasa tolatae joo andaka pea-pyaa. Akali mende doko daa. Endakali mende tangeme alyasale joo katenge dupa Goteme minanya isa palyeta. Dee endakali mende tangeme anasala joo katenge dupa baame kenge minalyetana,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
Yuu mendepa endakali mendapuame wane wanakupi ŋaŋa dupa Jisasame watandena lao mandyuu epeami-pyaa. Dopaka doko, disaipele dupame dokaita kandatala pyalanya leami-pyaa.
Pyalanya leaminopa Jisasame wane wanakupi koo dupa epena latala lao pituu, “Wane wanakupi koo dupa epekena kaita lyokala nayakalapa! Goteme wane wanakupi dapale joo kalyamino endakali dupa isoo kalyamo.
Nambame nyakama kiningi langilyona, wane wanakupi koo dupame nyakama Goteme isina lao katengemali pyoo endakali mende nakatatamo kandao doko, baa kapa pao Goteme isina lao nakatatana,” lea-pyaa.
Yuu mendepa Jutamanya isingi akali mendeme Jisasa kandao, “Emba mana lenge akali epe. Tenda namba lete etete katatopa lao aipa pyuape?” lao pisia-pyaa.
Dokopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Aipuma embame namba kandao epena leepe? Endakali mendaipi mende epe daa. Gote baa iki epe.
Embame mana setapae datupa masilino: ‘Embame kepo kolala nayape. Embame endakali pyao kumasala nayape. Embame pake nala nayape. Embame endakali mende minakasalanya sambo laa nayape. Embanya endangi takangepa dolapo andanda semaiyoo katapena,’ lapae silyamo dutupa masilino,” lea-pyaa.
Dokopa isingi akali dokome lao pituu, “Wamba namba wane kolesa katao mana setapae dutupa watao minio doko mee minawaka kalyona,” lea-pyaa.
Jisasame pii doko sepala baa lamaiyoo, “Embame mendai iki mende napilinona, embame embanya oapi dupa pitakame muni nyepala endakali tipya dupa mokosoo maipi. Dopa pitinopa embanya epe etete dupa kaitinya setakatana, embame namba watao ipu,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa isingi akali dokome sepala baanya oapi etete longo setenge dupa lao masetala mona etete kenda kaya-pyaa.
Kenda kayamo doko Jisasame kandatala dapa lea-pyaa: “Kamongo dupa nyakama Goteme isina lao kalyanya etete lekeleke tenge.
Mena kamele mendeme lekeleke tapala kepo tii mendenya kolandapyaliaka doko, endakali oapi longo setenge kamongo mendeme baa Goteme isina lao kalyanya etete lekeleke tapenge jetana,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa endakali dupame sepala baa pisoo, “Dopa tamo kandao doko, api kapa pao pyoo nyepae katatape?” leami-pyaa.
Dopa leaminopa Jisasame yanu pyao, “Endakalimi kapa pao napipenge dupa Goteme pingina,” lea-pyaa.
Dokopa Pitame lao pituu, “Kandeleno! Naimame oapi dupa yakinatala emba watao paelyamanona,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa lateamopa Jisasame dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nambame nyakama kiningi langilyona, akali mendeme baa Goteme isinaka lao auu kayapala baanya anda tamopi, enda tamopi, kaiminingi tamopi, endangi tamopi, takange tamopi, wane tamopi dupa yakineamo dokome indupa gii dakepa baanya yanu etete longo waa palyoo nyepala, dee tenda auu pyoo lete etete katatana,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
<range>
Jisasame baanya disaipele kingi ita-kisa dee lapoma dutupa lanyepala dutupa lamaiyoo, “Kandeleno! Naima indupa Jetusaleme pelyamano. Pupala katatamanopa potopesa dupame Endakalinya Ikiningi dokonya lao pepa wamba piamino dupa pitaka angi jalapomo.
Akali doko endakali waka dupanya kingilyaka katatamopa dokaitame baa lamba lao sopakalimi pyao koyasetami.
Dee baa konjame pyapala angi pyao kumasetataminopa koto teponya dee sakatatana,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamoaka doko, baanya disaipele dupame baanya pii dupanya kukipi mende masala nayami-pyaa. Jisasame pii leamo dupanya tenge doko yalo piamosa dokaitame baanya pii lyaa doko nasiami-pyaa.
Maitakao Jisasa yuu taono Jeteko dokonya tengesa epeamopa, akali lenge monda mende kaitinisa pitipala endakali dupame munipi oapi mende dyepa lao tee lao petea-pyaa.
Dopa lao pituu baame endakali longo kaita ipao puiyamino sepala pisoo pituu, “Upa aipa pilyamipi?” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa dokaitame baa lamaiyoo, “Nasatete tange Jisasa doko ipao pelyamona,” leami-pyaa.
Dopa leamino sepala baame puu lao, “Jisasa! Emba Dapiti Yumbange! Embame namba kondo kayape!” lea-pyaa.
Dopa lateamopa endakali wamba epeamino dupame baa pii kaena lao pyalanya leami-pyaa. Dopa leaminoaka doko, baame etete puu lao ae lao, “Dapiti Yumbange! Embame namba kondo kayape!” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa Jisasame ipao katapala dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame baa laminao namba kalyo dasa ipupa,” lea-pyaa. Dokopa dokaitame baa tengesa laminao ipateaminopa Jisasame baa pisoo, “Nambame embanya aipa pyakapili lao masilipi?” lea-pyaa. Dokopa akali lenge monda dokome baa lamaiyoo, “Kamongo, namba lenge dee tapuli lao masilyona,” lea-pyaa.
<range>
Dokopa Jisasame baa lamaiyoo, “Emba lenge taa! Embame masoo minapino dokome auu pisekelyamona,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamo gii dokopaka akali dokonya lenge dee talu pia-pyaa. Dokopa baame Jisasa watao pao pituu Gote lao lalyoo pea-pyaa. Dopa pyoo peamopa endakali awapa peamino dupa pitakame kandatala Gote lao lalyiami-pyaa.
Dopa petala Jisasa yuu taono Jeteko dokonya pyakamatala taono dokonya-kaita pea-pyaa.
Dokopa akali muni takisa nyingi dupanya isingi akali Sakiasa lenge mende yuu dokonya katea-pyaa. Baa akali kamongo mende-pyaa.
Baame Jisasa doko aipalepe lao kandapu laka lao masiamoaka doko, endakali longome Jisasa kakopao peaminosa Sakiasa baa akali muu dokonyana baame kapa pao Jisasa kandapenge nanjia-pyaa.
Dokopa baame Jisasa kanjanya baa ipatamo kaita dokonya alo pyao wambatala ita sikamo wangya mendenya pyakalyia-pyaa.
Pyakalyetala ita wangya dokonya paleamopa, Jisasame paleamo dosa ipao pituu kandalyetala baa lamaiyoo, “Sakiasa, indupa namba embanya andaka pitimbanalena, emba yapa isa pyakana,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa lateamopa baame pupae lao isa pyakanatala mona yaepao Jisasa laminao andaka pea-pyaa.
Dokopa endakali pitakame kandatala mona koo palyoo lao pituu, “Jisasame akali mana koo minao paenge dokonya andaka pilya pelyamona,” lao waipi leami-pyaa.
Dokopa Sakiasame toya katapala Kamongo doko lamaiyoo, “Nambame dapa pitoana, Akali Andake, embame sepe! Nambanya oapi dupa kapa kapa lao mokosetala endakali tipya dupa yangi maito. Dee wamba nambame endakali mendapuanya oapi sambo lao pake nyakamaito kandao doko, nambame waa palyoo kitomende lawame yanu pyata pyakamaito,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa Jisasame lao pituu, “Baa Apotakame tatanya mandipayaka dokonya anda dake pyoo nyepae katapelyamo.
Endakalinya Ikiningi dokome endakali alu petae dupa kutao pyoo nyala epeana,” Jisasame lea-pyaa.
Dokaitame pii doko sepala Jisasa Jetusaleme tengesa dokonya ipatelyamo. Gotenya isingi doko indupaka panalapomona lao masiaminosa Jisasame kongali pii mende apata dapa lamaiya-pyaa:
“Akali kenge singi mendeme yuu tependa mendakakaita pao kiŋi jetala pilyetona lao masia-pyaa.
Dopa lao masetala baame baanya kendemane kingi ita mende epena latala mendai mendai lao muni kina kingi ita lapoma lao mokosoo maiya-pyaa. Maitala baame dokaita lamaiyoo, ‘Nyakamame muni atupa minao namba mendakaita pao katato gii dutupanya pisinisa pyakao kalyepape,’ latala pea-pyaa.
Dopaka doko, baanya tata dokaitame baa kandao mona etete auu nakayapala akali mendapuame baa watao pena leami-pyaa. Pupala, ‘Akali dakeme naimanya kiŋi joo naima isoo nakatapyali lao masilyamanona,’ lao baa peamo yuu dokaita tange dupa lamaina leami-pyaa.
“Dopa leaminoaka doko, baame yuu tependa dokonya katao kiŋi jetala dee pilyoo epea-pyaa. Ipupala pupae lao wamba baanya kendemane muni maiyamo dutupa epena latala akali mendai mendai lawame, ‘Nambanya muni utupanya potopesa akipate nyekeamipi lao kandatoo,’ lea-pyaa.
Dokopa akali wambao epea mendeme lao pituu, ‘Akali Andake, embanya muni kina kingi ita lapo dolapo nambame minao pisinisa petakala potopesa andate lapoma nyekeona,’ lea-pyaa.
Dokopa kiŋi dokome baa lamaiyoo, ‘Kalai yaka pyekee lamo! Emba kendemane epe! Embame kalai kuki dutupa nambame leoli pyoo auu pyoo isoo pii lamo dokonya embame nambanya yuu taono dupanya kingi ita mende isatale lao nambame emba-kisa setelyona,’ lea-pyaa.
Dopa lateamopa kendemane lapo pyoo epea dokome lao pituu, ‘Akali Andake, nambame embanya muni kina kingi ita lapo dolapo minao pisinisa petakala potopesa andate mendai nyekeona,’ lea-pyaa.
Dokopa kiŋi dokome baa lamaiyoo, ‘Embame nambanya yuu taono dupanya yuungi isatale lao nambame emba-kisa setelyona,’ lea-pyaa.
Dee kendemane mendeme ipupala lao pituu, ‘Akali Andake, emba akali tomba neleno nambame kandenge. Akali waka mendeme opale mende setao kalyamo ongo embame nyingi kandapi. Akali waka mendeme nee pokelyamo ongonya embame yukuoo nyingi kandapi. Tenge ongonya nambame emba paka kayapala embanya muni kina kingi ita lapo dolapo kotale dakeme yaki petala setakao kateona, ae silyamo kanda,’ lea-pyaa.
<range>
“Dopa lateamopa kiŋi dokome akali doko lamaiyoo, ‘Kiningi, nambame tomba napala akali waka mendenya oapi silyamo dupa nyoo ee mendenya nee pokatae dupa yukuoo nyoo pingina lao embame masoo leeno. Dopa lao masetala embame namba andaka pilyoo ipato dokopa muni potopesa mendapua nyetena lao nambanya muni datupa aipuma potopesa mandenge beŋe mendenya setakala naekeepe? Emba tangeme pii leleno dutupanya nambame emba-kisa tenge setapala emba akali koo lamo lelyona,’ lea-pyaa.
<range>
Dopa latala baame endakali tengesa kateami dupa lamaiyoo, ‘Nambame muni kina kingi ita lapo akali doko maiyo dolapo nyakamame yukuoo nyepala muni kina andate lapoma setenge kendemane dake maiyepa!’ lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa dokaitame kiŋi doko lamaiyoo, ‘Akali Andake, embame akali maiyepa leeno dokonya muni kina andate lapoma sepelyamona,’ leami-pyaa.
Dopa leaminoaka doko, kiŋi dokome dokaita lamaiyoo, ‘Opale singi endakali dupa pitaka konda pyoo maito. Dopaka doko, opale nasingi endakali doko-kisa setamo dolapo nyokonyoto.
Dopana, namba kandao yandapipi jingima dupame wamba nambame nyakama isatale lao auu kayala nayamino dokonya nyakamame dokaita angenya laminao ipao nambanya enombasa pyao kumasalapape!’ lea-pyaana,” lao Jisasame lea-pyaa.
Jisasame pii dutupa lao etapala baanya disaipele dupa nyoo maita pyatala Jetusaleme paanya pea-pyaa.
Pao Olipimanda yuu dokonya taono Betepasipa Betanipanya tengesa pyakamatala baame baanya disaipele dupanya lapoma wambao pena lea-pyaa.
Baame akali dolapo lamaiyoo, “Nyilyambome yuu taono yakane omo silyamo ongonya pupala mena dongi yakane wamba endakali mende napetea mende anjetae katatamo kanjambinona, doko liangao minao ipupape.
