Jopa yuu doko Lita yuu dokonya tengesale joo siamosa masoo miningi endakali dupame Pita baa Lita yuu dokonya kalyamo lapae sepala akali lapomame Pita pii kyoto joo lamaiya pena lao lao pituu, “‘Embame malisala nayao naimanya yuu dakenya yapa ipupi,’ lena,” leami-pyaa.
Pita sakatatala dolapo-pipa awapa peami-pyaa. Pao yuu dokonya pyakaneaminopa dupame baa nyakamanya anda namba pyoo petae palo kisa dokonya laminao kolandeami-pyaa. Dokopa enda walyakae pitakame ee lao pituu lapalapapi kolosapi dupa enda Dokasa lenge dokome nyakama-pipa pituu wasakamaiyamo dupa Pita kandena lao minao malandao kakopeami-pyaa.
Kakopeaminopa Pitame dupa pitaka kamaka pena latala lumame pitipala loma sia-pyaa. Loma setala kapilyetala enda kumapae siamo doko lamaiyoo, “Tapita, emba sakata,” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa enda doko lenge tea-pyaa. Baame Pita kandatala sakatao petea-pyaa.
Pitame kinginya minao toya katasetala Gotenya endakali dupapi enda walyakae dupapi dupa epena latala enda sakateamo doko dupame kandena lao laitaka pia-pyaa.
Pitame piamo doko Jopa tange endakali pitakame sepala dupanya longo dupame Kamongo lao masoo miniami-pyaa.
Pita Jopa yuu dokonya gii longo katao mena tata dupanya yanonge tapalyepae wasingi akali Saimone lenge doko-pipa awapa kateambi-pyaa.
Sisatia yuu ongonya akali Koniliasa lenge mende katea-pyaa. Baame yanda singi amii andate mende isoo katenge-pyaa. Baa amii tata Itali tange lenge dokonya isingi akali mende-pyaa.
Baame Gote minao katenge-pyaa. Baapi baanya andaka awapa palenge dupa pitakapimi Gote lao paka kaengema-pyaa. Baame Juta endakali daa jepae dupa oapi longo lao maiyoo Gote lao loma soaka katea-pyaa.
Gii mendepa yuu alemanjalanya piamopa Koniliasame lee manimanimi joo Gotenya enjele mende epeamo doko kanjakao kandea-pyaa. Enjele dokome Koniliasa peteamo anda ongonya ipupala, “Koniliasa,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa Koniliasame kanjakao kandatala paka kayao, “Akali Andake, embame aipa laanya leepe?” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa enjele dokome baa lamaiyoo, “Embanya loma singipi daa jingi endakali dupa oapi maingipi dupa Goteme kandatala masetae kalyamo.
Embame akali mendatupa Jopa yuu dokonya pena latala akali Saimone baanya kenge mende Pita lenge doko epena lape.
Pita baa mena tata dupanya yanonge tapalyepae wasingi akali Saimoneaka lenge mendepa tole kalyambino. Baanya anda doko solowata lemba dokonya katengena,” lea-pyaa.
Enjele dokome dopa latala pateamopa Koniliasame baanya kalai akali lapoma-pipa dee baanya awapa katenge Gote minao katenge yanda singi amii mendepi akali tepoma dutupa epena lea-pyaa.
Ipateaminopa pii pitaka panao lamaitala baame akali dutupa Jopa yuu dokonya pena lea-pyaa.
Taita dopa pyoo akali tepoma dutupa yuu taono Jopa dokonya tengesa joo epeaminopa kotaka andawai pungupungu dokonya Pita baa loma sala anda-kisapyakalyia-pyaa.
Dopa petala baa lopo kayapala nee napuli lao masia-pyaa. Nee depa leaminopa Goteme Pitanya mona minao aloo pisiamopa baame lee manimanimi joo kaiti doko saa papa laloo piamo kandea-pyaa. Kandeamopa mendita mende isa epea-pyaa. Epeamo doko lapalapa jepae andake mende denge kitomende dupanya mendeme minatae katao pyandama-pyandama pyoo pyandea-pyaa.
<range>
Dokonya moko kitomende katenge tata dupapi, kanopato tata dupapi, yaka tata dupapi tata tata dupa pitaka palepeta pyandeamo doko baame kandea-pyaa.
Dokopa pii mende epeamo dokome lao pituu, “Pita, embame sakatatala pyao naa!” lea-pyaa.
Pitame lao pituu, “Kamongo, namba etete daa! Paa mendaipi mende nambame nee kaimala pipae daa lao nee nyetae dupa nanengena,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa dee lapo pyoo pii mende epeamo dokome lao pituu, “Goteme auu pinya setatamo dupa kandao embame kaimala pipaena nalape,” lea-pyaa.
Dopaka pyoo paa tepomasa pyandatala dokopa lapalapa jepae doko yapa kaitinya nyokonyia-pyaa.
Pitame lee manimanimi joo kandeamo dokonya tenge doko aipalepe lao masoaka peteamopa Koniliasame pena leamo akali dutupame ipao Saimonenya anda doko kutao kandatala anda kambusa kateami-pyaa.
Katapala dupame pisoo pituu, “Anda dakenya akali opone Saimone Pita lenge doko pilyape?” leami-pyaa.
Pitame lee manimanimi kandeamo doko masoo mee peteamopa Sipitisa dokome Pita lamaiyoo, “Wane! Akali tepomame emba kutilyaminona, emba sakatatala isa pyakana. Akali dutupa nambame epena lapusa epelyaminona, embame mona lapo napaliuu, akali dutupa-pipa awapa pupale puu,” lea-pyaa.
<range>
Pita isa pyakanatala akali dutupa lamaiyoo, “Anematupa! Nyakamame kutilyamino akali doko nambana, tenge aipuma kutao ipamipi?” lea-pyaa.
Akali dutupame baa lamaiyoo, “Yanda singi amii isoo katenge akali Koniliasa dokome naima pupa lapya. Akali doko etete tolatae mende. Baame Gote lao paka kayao kalyamopa Juta dupa pitakame baa kandao akali epena lengema. Gotenya enjele mendeme baa lamaiyoo, ‘Koniliasame Pita emba baanya andaka ipupi latala pii lateno dupa setana,’ lapya-pyaana,” leami-pyaa.
Dopa lao lamaitiaminopa Pitame akali dutupa andaka epena latala kuka dokonya awapa paleami-pyaa. Yongama sakatatala Pita awapa peami-pyaa. Jopa tange masoo miningi kaiminingi mendapua-pipa awapa peamiaka-pyaa.
Pao kaitinisa palipala taita dopa pyoo Sisatia yuu dokonya pyakameami-pyaa. Dokopa Koniliasame baanya palu mendai dupapi kaita miningi dupapi dupa nyoo limbatala dupa-pipa malisoo kateami-pyaa.
Dopa pyoo kateamino dokonya Pita pao pyakamateamopa Koniliasame kandatala pao baanya moko kateamo dosa tombauli sepala baa tama pia-pyaa.
Dopaka doko, Pitame Koniliasa sakatasoo pituu, “Namba endakaliakana emba sakata,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa latala pii lama-lama pyoo andaka kolandeambi-pyaa. Kolandatala endakali longo limbao peteamino dupa Pitame kandea-pyaa.
Kandatala baame dupa lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame kandeami kandee. Juta mendeme tata waka dupa-pipa awapa limbala nayapenge. Tata waka kalyamino dupanya kanja napupengeakana daa latae silyamo. Dopaka doko, Goteme namba laitaka pyoo pituu nambame endakali mende kandao baa kaimala pipae lamo koo paleta lamo laa nayape lapya.
Goteme dopa lapumopa nambame tanga nalao nyakamame namba ipu laminoli pyoo epelyona, aipuma namba ipu lamipi?” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa Koniliasame baa lamaiyoo, “Alembolya alemandi indupa naima pilyamano kiloko tepo gii dakepaleaka namba andaka loma soo peteopa akali yonge pee etete kyoo lapae pingi mende lee mendai ipao nambanya enombasa kateamo kandeo.
Dokome namba kandao, ‘Koniliasa, embanya loma singipi daa jingi endakali dupa oapi maingipi dupa Goteme kandatala masetae kalyamo.
Dopana, embame akali mendatupa Jopa yuu dokonya pena latala Saimone Pita lenge doko epena lape. Saimone Pita baa mena yanonge tapalyepae wasingi akali Saimoneaka lenge mendepa tole kalyambino. Baanya anda doko solowata lembanya katengena,’ enjele dokome dopa lea.
Dopa lalu piamopa nambame emba ipupi leona emba yaka epeleno. Indupa Goteme lape leamoli pyoo embame pii latenopa naima pitakame Gotenya enomba dokonya pitipala pii semanana,” Koniliasame dopa lea-pyaa.
Dokopa Pitame lao pituu, “Indupa nambame kini kandatelyo. Goteme endakalinya lengelyaapi kandao yapala naenge.
Akali tata dupa pitakanya endakali mendeme baa lao paka kayao mana epe minao paenge doko kandao Goteme kapana lenge.
Naima Isataele dupa-kisa Goteme pii epena leamo doko nyakamame masilyamino. Goteme Wai Pii Epe doko lao pituu, Jisasa Kataisame naima Gote baa tangepa mona mendai palisiana lao lao panea. Jisasa doko endakali pitakanya Kamongo. Joneme kaimbu pyalapa lao pii lao kateamo dokonya maitakao Galili yuu dokonya pituu kalai tee pyatala, Jutia yuu doko pitakanya pyoo tayamo dupa nyakamame masilyamino. Nasatete tange Jisasa doko Goteme yapao nyepala Oli Sipitisapa pupu lapaepa baa maiyamo doko nyakamame masilyamino. Gote baa-pipa kateamo tenge dokome baa paelya payana pyoo endakali dupa-kisa mana epe minao Sataneme kenda pisetae endakali dupa pitaka auu pisiamo doko masilyaminoaka.
<range>
<range>
Jetusalemepi Jutia yuu waka dupanyapi katao piamo dupa pitaka kandatala naimame lao panasoo kalyamano. Endakali dupame baa ita pokonya pyao yukotala kumasiami.
Pyao kumasiaminoaka doko, Goteme kote tepo dokonya baa dee sakatasetala panasia.
Panasiamo doko Juta endakali pitakanya enombanya panasala naya. Daa, naima baanya pii doko lao panatamina lao wamba Goteme yapao nyiamo endakali dupa-kisa panasia. Goteme baa malunya sakataseteamopa naima-pipa neepi endakipi awapa neama.
Jisasame naima langyoo, ‘Endakali dupa wai pii doko lamaiyepape,’ lea. Goteme baa iki endakali sakapi kumapaepi dupanya pii lao tolao mokosingi akali joo katena leamo doko lao panalapape leaka.
Jisasa lao masoo minatami dupa pitakanya koo yanu dupa baanya kenge dokome kunanya nepakamaitana lao potopesa dupa pitakame lao paneami-pyaana,” Pitame dopa lea-pyaa.
Pitame dopa leamo gii dokopaka pii siamino endakali dupa pitaka-kisa Oli Sipitisa doko epea-pyaa.
Dokopa Gote lao tama pyoo pii tata waka dupa lao kateamino doko sepala, Juta endakali masoo miningi Pita-pipa epeamino dupame Goteme endakali tata waka dupa Oli Sipitisa mailyamoakana lao masoo mona andeami-pyaa. Dopa piaminopa Pitame dupa lamaiyoo, “Naima Oli Sipitisa nyiamanoli pyoo endakali dokaitame nyilyamino endakali dupanya endakimi kaimbu pyakamaimana, apimi kapa pao daa latape?” lea-pyaa.
<range>
<range>
Dopa latala Pitame dupa kandao, “Nyakamame Jisasa Kataisanya kenge doko lao kaimbu nyalapa,” lea-pyaa. Dokopa dokaitame baa lamaiyoo, “Emba naima-pipa koto mendatupa awapa katamana,” leami-pyaa.
Aposele dupapi masoo miningi kaiminingi Jutia yuu dokonya kateamino dupapi dutupame endakali tata waka dupame apata Gotenya pii lapae doko sepelyamino lapae doko siami-pyaa.
Sepala Pita Jetusaleme peamopa elya pingi kambu kepapengena lao masingi dupame baa pyalanya leami-pyaa.
Dokaitame Pita lamaiyoo, “Embame elya pingi kambu kepala naenge akali peteamino anda dokonya kolandatala dupa-pipa awapa nee napapina,” leami-pyaa.
Dopa leaminopa Pitame dupa kandao baame piamoli pyoo lao panao lao pituu, “Wamba nambame taono Jopa dokonya anda mendenya loma soo kateopa Goteme nambanya mona aloo pisiamopa nambame lee manimanimi joo mendita mende isa epeamo doko kandeo. Doko lapalapa jepae andake mende denge kitomende dupanya mendeme minatae katao kaitinya pyandama-pyandama pyoo namba kateo dosa pyandea.
<range>
Lapalapa pyandeamo dokonya koko nambame aki palelyape lao kandokondape pyoo kandeopa isa yuunya moko kitomende katenge tata dupapi, mena kapua tata dupapi, kanopato tata dupapi, yaka tata dupapi dupa pitaka palea.
Dokopa pii mende namba-kisa dapa lao epeamo sio: ‘Pita, embame sakatatala pyao naa,’ lea.
Dopa leamoaka doko, nambame pii doko yanu pyao pituu, ‘Kamongo, namba etete daa! Yuu gii mendaipi mendenya nambame nee kaimala pipae daa lao nee nyetae dupa nambanya nengekaita paa naengena,’ leo.
Dopa leopa dee lapo pyoo kaiti-kisa katao pii mende yanu pyao epeamo dokome lao pituu, ‘Goteme auu pinya setatamo dupa kandao embame kaimala pipaena nalape!’ lea.
Dopaka pyoo paa tepomasa pyandatala dokopa dutupa pitaka kaiti-kisa dee nyokonyia.
Gii dokopaka akali tepoma namba andaka kateo dokonya ipao kalyu piami. Akali dutupa Sisatia tange mendeme namba kateo dokonya epena lea-pyaa.
Oli Sipitisa dokome namba langyoo, ‘Mona lapo palya nayao dupa-pipa awapa pupape,’ lea. Dokopa masoo miningi kaiminingi tokange datupa namba-pipa awapa pupala akali dokonya andaka kolandeama.
Kolandatala peteamano dokopa Koniliasame baa enjele mendeme baanya andaka ipao katapala pii mende dapa langiana lea: ‘ “Embame akali mendatupa Jopa yuu dokonya pena latala akali Saimone kenge mende Pita lenge doko lanyala pena lape.
Akali dokome emba pii mende langita. Pii dokome Goteme embapi embanya andaka tole katenge dupapi dupa pyoo nyetana,” leana,’ lao Koniliasame lea.
Nambame pii sakatao leo dokopa Oli Sipitisa doko wamba naima-kisa epeamoli pyoo dutupa-kisa epea.
Wamba Kamongo dokome lao pituu, ‘Joneme endakimi endakali dupanya kaimbu pyakamaiyamoaka doko, Takange dokome Oli Sipitisa dokome nyakamanya kaimbu pyakatana,’ leamo doko gii dokopa nambame dee masio.
Naimame Kamongo Jisasa Kataisa lao masoo miniamanopa Goteme epe mende naima mee diamo mendai dopaleaka mende dupa mee maiya. Maiyamopa namba api kaita Gotenya kaita doko lyokakamaitope lao masiona,” Pitame dopa lea-pyaa.
Jetusaleme tange Juta dupame Pitame pii leamo dutupa sepala nyakamanya pii doko kayami-pyaa. Dopa petala, “Endakali tata waka dupa lete etete katenaka lao Goteme mona kapilyakamaiyoaka kalyumuna,” lao tama piami-pyaa.
Sitipena pyao kumaseteaminopa masoo miningi endakali dupa-kisa kenda pipae mende epeamosa dupa tale piami-pyaa. Tale pyoo pao Pinisiapi, Saipotasapi, taono Andiokopi yuu dupanya pupala endakali tata waka dupa pii epe doko lamaiya naenya, Juta endakali dupa iki lamaiyoo kateami-pyaa.
Tale piamino dupanya Saipotasa tangepi Saitini tange akali mendapuapi kateamino dupame Andioko yuu dokonya pupala endakali tata waka dupa Kamongo Jisasanya lao Wai Pii Epe doko lamaiyamiaka-pyaa.
Kamongo dokome pii epe lamaiyamino dupa nisoo kingi maiyamopa endakali longome masoo minao katao Kamongo doko watao minao kateami-pyaa.
Dopa pilyamino lapae doko Jetusaleme tange sosa dokome sepala Banapasa Andioko yuu dokonya pena leami-pyaa.
Banapasame Andioko yuu dokonya pao pyakamatala Goteme mona epe palipala dupa-kisa piamo doko kandatala mona yaepea-pyaa. Endakali dupa pitakame moname Kamongo doko kyoto joo masoo minina lao baame pii lamaiyokondape pyoo lamaiyoo katea-pyaa.
Banapasa baa akali epe mende Oli Sipitisapa masoo miningipa dolapome tumbatae katenge-pyaa. Dokopa Kamongome endakali longo baanya jina lao nyoo konda pia-pyaa.
Maitakao Banapasame Tasasa yuu taono dokonya Solo kutala pea-pyaa.
Kutao kandatala baa laminao Andioko yuu dokonya pilyia-pyaa. Ee kana mende itata akali dolapome Andioko tange sosanya endakali dupa-pipa awapa katao Gotenya pii doko endakali longo dupa mana lamaiyoo kateambi-pyaa. Andioko tange dupame Kataisa lao masoo miniamino endakali dupa kandao kenge Kitisene doko kandasoo leami-pyaa.
Gii dokopa akali potopesa mendapua Jetusaleme katao Andioko yuu dokonya lanao epeami-pyaa.
Potopesa dupanya mende kenge Akapasa lenge dokome toya katapala Sipitisanya pupu lapae dokome pii mende panao lao pituu, “Lopo andake mende yuu dupa pitakanya setana,” lea-pyaa. Maitakao Kolotiasame yuu isoo kateamo gii dokopa Akapasanya pii leamo doko angi jia-pyaa.
Dokopa Andioko tange masoo miniamino dupame, “Naima mendai mendai lawame naima-kisa opale mende setamoli pyoo masoo miningi kaiminingi Jutia yuu dokonya kalyamino dupa nisoo pyasakamaimana,” lao pii wasiami-pyaa.
Pii lao wasiaminoliaka pyoo dupame Banapasapa Solopame Jetusaleme tange isingi akali dupa maiya pena leami-pyaa.
Gii dosa mendasa Kiŋi Etote lenge dokome sosa dokonya endakali mendapua tee pyao minao koyasia-pyaa.
Baame Jone kaiminingi Jemesa konjua mendeme kepao kumasia-pyaa.
Dopa piamo doko Juta dupame auu kayamino kandatala baame Pita anjiaka-pyaa. Betesanya iisa napalyoo nenge gii dokopa dopa pia-pyaa.
Baame Pita anjoo nyepala anjingi anda dokonya pyandea-pyaa. Pyandatala pituu baame kambu kitomende dupanya yanda singi kitomende kitomende lawame Pita kandao katena lea-pyaa. Napinya Kayamo Gii doko ipao patatamopa, endakali dupanya enombanya Pita laminao epena latona lao masia-pyaa.
Dokopa yanda singi dupame Pita anjingi anda dokonya isoo kateami-pyaa. Isoo kateaminoaka doko, Goteme Pita nisina lao sosa dokome loma sokondape pyoo siami-pyaa.
Etoteme Pita taita dopa pyoo kosa laa epena latona lao masiamopa kuka gii dokonya Pita yanda singi lapomanya kaina dokonya ŋili kende lapomame anjetae palea-pyaa. Yanda singi mendatupame anjingi anda kambu dokonya katao isoo kateamiaka-pyaa.
Dokopa pupae lao Kamongonya enjele mendeme Pita paleamo dokonya ipao kalyu pia-pyaa. Dopa piamopa Pita paleamo palo dokonya tii pia-pyaa. Enjele dokome Pitanya patali dokonya minao pyale tasoo, “Emba yapa sakata!” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa ŋili kende Pitanya kingi dolaponya anjetae kateamo dolapo mokala isa kopo lea-pyaa.
Dokopa enjele dokome Pita lamaiyoo, “Embanya matapu petala moko pee pii!” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa Pitame leamoli pia-pyaa. Dopa piamopa enjele dokome Pita lamaiyoo, “Embanya yonge pee ketae pingi londe doko petala namba pelyo angenya watao ipu,” lea-pyaa.
Pita baa paleamo anda palo doko yakinatala enjele doko watao pea-pyaa. Pao pituu enjele dokome piamo doko kiningina lao masala naenya, kombeame pelyona lao masia-pyaa.
Pitapa enjele dokopa peambino doko pao yanda singi enomba nyoo isoo kateamo doko nyoo nepatala lapo pyoo isoo kateamo doko nyoo nepeambiaka-pyaa. Dopa petala taono dokonya paanya penge lome kambu dokonya pyakameambinopa lome kambu aeneme pai latae doko tangeme mee lumbia-pyaa. Dopa piamopa enjele dokopa Pitapa ipao kamanda pyakalyetala kaitini kembo mende nyiambi-pyaa. Dokopa enjele dokome Pita yapa yakinatala pea-pyaa.
Pateamo dokopa Pitame masokondape pyoo masetala, “Kiningi lamona lao masilyo. Kamongome baanya enjele doko epena latala Etotenya kingilyaka dokonyapi Juta dupame Etoteme pitamo kanjanya malisiamino dupa pitakanyapi baame namba nyokonyalame lamona,” lao masia-pyaa.
Dopa lao masetala baa Matianya anda dokonya pea-pyaa. Matia doko Jone Make lenge dokonya endangi-pyaa. Endakali longo dupa anda dokonya limbatala loma soo peteami-pyaa.
Pitame ipao kamaka lome kambu doko watawata piamopa kalai enda Lota lenge dokome lumbala epea-pyaa.
Enda dokome Pita lumu lao sepala baa etete mona auu kayapala kaita doko lumbala naenya, andaka alo pyao kolandatala, “Pita ipao lome kambunya kalyamona!” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa endakali peteamino dupame, “Emba kekeleno,” leami-pyaa. Dopa leaminopa enda dokome kyoto joo, “Etete kiningi baa kalyamona,” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa, “Doko baanya imambu doko kalyumuna!” leami-pyaa.
Pitame lome kambu dokonya watawata pyoaka katea-pyaa. Dopa piamopa kaitini lumbapeaminopa baa kateamo kandatala mona andeami-pyaa.
Dokopa Pitame pii kaena lao kingi pee latala, Kamongome baa anjingi andaka mokao nyepala kamanda laminao peamoli pyoo dupa lamaitala lao pituu, “Nyakamame pii dutupa Jemesapi masoo miningi kaiminingi dupapi dupa lamaiyepape,” lea-pyaa. Dopa latala baa kamanda pupala yuu mendakaita pea-pyaa.
Yuu yongateamopa yanda singi dupame Pita aipa pyape lao walu koo leami-pyaa.
Etoteme Pita doko kutao kayapala yanda singi Pita isoo kateamino dupa kosimi latala pyao kumasina lea-pyaa. Dopa latala Etoteme Jutia yuu doko yakinatala lanao pupala Sisatia yuu taono dokonya pao katea-pyaa.
Etote dokome Taya tangepi Saitone tangepi dupa kandao imbu andake mende kaya-pyaa. Dopa piamosa, dupame lao kambotala Etote kateamo dokonya epeami-pyaa. Ipao kiŋinya anda isoo kateamo akali Balasatasa lenge doko andiki andiki petala Etoteme imbu nakaena lao dupame akema pii epe mendapua leami-pyaa. Yuu dolaponya tange dupame Etotenya yuu dokonya-tae nee sambengema tenge ongonya minao Etoteme imbu nakaena lao dupame andiki pimaiyami-pyaa.
Gii setapae mendenya Etoteme kiŋinya yati pingi doko petala baanya petenge toko dokonya pituu endakali dupa kandao pii andake mende lamaiya-pyaa.
Dokopa endakali dupame puu lao lao pituu, “Akali mendeme nalelyamona, gote mendeme lelyamona,” leami-pyaa.
Etoteme Gote lalyala nayamosa Kamongome baanya enjele mende yapa epena lalu piamo dokome baa pipyame nena leamosa nao kumasia-pyaa.
Dopa piamopa Gotenya pii doko andao tayama-tayama pia-pyaa.
Banapasa Solopa dolapo Jetusaleme yuu dokonya muni akipi maiya pena leamino doko maitala akali Jone Make lenge doko lanyoo pilyiambi-pyaa.
Sosa Andioko kateamo dokonya potopesapi tisaapi mendatupa kateamino dutupanya kenge dupa Banapasa dokopi, Simione kenge mende Pumbuti lenge dokopi, Saitini tange Lusiasa lenge dokopi, Maneyene lenge yuu yakane isingi akali Etotepa nyilyambo wane kolesa anda mendai kateambino dokopi, Solo dokopi akali dutupa kateami-pyaa.
Sosa dupame Kamongo doko lao tama pyoo nee nanengeli pyoo nanao kateaminopa Oli Sipitisa dokome dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nambame Banapasa Solopa dolapome nambanya kalai doko pyekena latelyona, nyakamame dolapo yapao nyalapapena,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa nee nanengeli pyoo nanenya, loma setala dokaitame akali dolapo aiyomba minani petakamaitala kalai dokonya pina leami-pyaa.
Oli Sipitisa dokome Solopa Banapasapa pena leamopa Selusia yuu taono dokonya lanao peambi-pyaa. Yuu doko yakinatala sipi mendenya pituu endaki kainanya yuu singi Saipotasa lenge ongonya peambi-pyaa.
Yuu dokonya ipupala taono Salamisa lenge dokonya Jutamanya losuu anda dupanya Gotenya pii doko lamaiyoo kateambi-pyaa. Dokopa Joneme akali dolapo nisoo kalai awapa pia-pyaa.
Dupame Saipotasa yuu dokonya yangitena pupala yuu taono Peposa lenge dokonya pyakamameami-pyaa. Pyakamatala nemango tata dupa miningi akali sambo potopesa kenge Balanjisasa lenge Juta mende kandeami-pyaa.
Akali doko kapomane andake Sesiasa Polo lenge dokopa awapa katea-pyaa. Sesiasa Polo doko masingi akali mende-pyaa. Baame Gotenya pii doko sipuli lao masetala Banapasapa Solopa dolapo epena lea-pyaa.
Dolapo epeambinopa akali nemango miningi dokome dolaponya kaita lyokao katea-pyaa. Akali dokonya kenge mende Gitiki pii lengeli pyoo Elimasa lenge-pyaa. Baame kapomane andake dokome masoo naminina lao kaita lyokao katea-pyaa.
Dokopa akali Solo kenge mende Polo lenge doko, Oli Sipitisa dokome tumbatae katao baame Elimasa doko kandokondape petala dapa lamaiya-pyaa:
“Emba luingipi minakasingipi mana dupa pitakame tumbatae lamo! Emba Satanenya mandipae lamo! Emba mana epe dupa pitakanya yanda pimaingi akali lamo! Embame Kamongo dokonya kaita tolatae dupa uanga pisoaka katenge.
Kandeleno! Kamongo dokonya kingi pupu lapae doko emba-kisa ipupala embanya lenge dolapo iminjetamopa, niki doko gii mendatupa kapa pao nakanjapenona,” Polome dopa lea-pyaa. Gii ongopaka baanya lenge dolapo kopame sanga pili petala iminjia-pyaa. Lenge iminjeteamopa kaitini laitaka pina lao endakali mende mina kanda kanda soo payao kutia-pyaa.
Dopa piamo doko kapomane andake dokome kandatala Kamongonya pii leambino doko soo masetala kiningi lumu lao walu lao masoo minia-pyaa.
Dokopa Polo baa awapa paenge akali dupa-pipa Peposa yuu taono doko yakinatala sipi mendenya pituu Pambilia yuu dokonya pupala yuu taono Peka lenge dokonya pyakameami-pyaa. Gii dokopa Joneme akali dutupa yakinatala Jetusaleme pilyia-pyaa.
Dutupame Peka yuu doko yakinatala Pisitia yuu taono Andioko dokonya pyakameami-pyaa. Sambasa gii dokopa dupame Jutamanya losuu anda dokonya kolandatala peteami-pyaa.
Dokopa losuu anda isingi akali dupame potopesa dupanya pii mendapuapi mana setapae dupapi itaki pyao etapala dutupa kandao, “Kaimia paluma, nyakamame pii mende endakalipi dupa pupu lasoo lamaipenge jetamo kandao doko, lamaiyepa,” leami-pyaa.
Dopa leaminopa Polome toya katapala kingi pee latala pii dake lamaiya-pyaa. “Nyakama Isataele endakalipi Gote lao paka kayao katenge tata waka dupapi nyakamame salapape.
Isataele tata dakenya Gote dokome naimanya yumbange dupa yapao nyia-pyaa. Dokaitame Isipe yuu dokonya tisa nao kateaminopa baame dupa pee lasetala nyakamanya kenge minalyia-pyaa. Dopa petala baanya pupu lapae dokome dupa lanyepala laminao epea-pyaa.
Dopa petala ee kana kingi ita kitomende dupanya endakali napalenge yuu dokonya luiyaminoaka doko, baame dupa yapa yakinala naya-pyaa.
Enakao baame Kenane yuu dokonya tata kalange kateamino dupa pyao watapala yuu doko nyakamanya tenge jetana lao Isataele endakali dupa maiya-pyaa.
Maitiamopa Isataele dupame ee kana andate kitomende-kisa kingi ita yuungi dupanya yuu doko isoo kateami-pyaa. Maitakao baame dupanya isingi akali mendapua potopesa Samuele katatamo gii dokonya katao tuu lao katena lea-pyaa.
Maitakao dupame kiŋi mende dina lao tee leaminopa Goteme Benjamene tata dokonya akali Kisa ikiningi Solo lenge doko dupa maiya-pyaa. Maitiamopa Solome ee kana kingi ita kitomende kiŋi katea-pyaa.
Dee Solo kaena latala alo pyoo Goteme Dapiti dupanya kiŋi katena lea-pyaa. Goteme Dapitinya lao endakali dupa lamaiyoo lao pituu, ‘Nambame Jesi ikiningi Dapiti doko kutao kandatelyo. Nambame baa auu kaenge. Nambame pina latoli pyoo baame dupa pitaka pitana,’ lea-pyaa.
Wamba Goteme mende pitona leamoli pyoo akali dokonya mandipae mendenya Pyoo Nyingi Akali Jisasa doko Isataele dupa maitia-pyaa.
Joneme wambao Isataele dupa pitaka kandao mona kapilyetala kaimbu nyina lao pii lamaiyoo katea-pyaa.
Joneme kalai pyoo etalanya pituu baame dokaita pisoo, ‘Nyakamame namba kandao apina lao masilyamipi? Namba akali nyakamame malisilyamino doko daana, akali mende namba watao maita pyao epelyamo. Akali dokonya moko pee pingi dolapo namba koo pingi akali dokome lyokakamaipenge daana,’ lea-pyaa.
“Kaimia paluma, nyakama Apotakame tatanya mandipae dupapi dee Gote lao paka kayao katenge tata waka dupapi dupa kandao nambame pii dake langilyo. Goteme naima pyoo nyepeamo dokonya pii dake naima-kisa epena latelyamo.
Jetusaleme kateamino endakali dupapi dupanya isingi akali dupapi dupame Jisasa doko masalakao masala nayami-pyaa. Dee potopesa dupanya pii koto Sambasa dii lao itaki pingima dupa masalakao masala nayamiaka-pyaa. Dupame baa kosimi leamino dokome wamba akali potopesa dupame dopa pitamina leamili piami-pyaa.
Dokaitame baa pyao kumasepenge tenge mende napaleamosa kutao kayapala Pailate dokome Jisasa mee pyao kumasepoko leami-pyaa.
Wamba potopesa dupame baa kandao pii pepa pyanya seteamino dupa pitaka pyoo etapala dokopa dupame baa ita pokonya yukuotae kateamo doko kondao isa nyepala malu piami-pyaa.
Dopaka doko, Goteme Jisasa baa malunya sakatasia-pyaa.
Sakatasiamopa endakali baa-pipa Galili katao Jetusaleme peamino dupame kandena lao kote longo lao baa tange panata piamopa kandeami-pyaa. Kandeamino dupame indupa Isataele dupa kandao baa lao panasingi akali kalyamino.
Wamba Goteme naimanya yumbange dupa lamaiyoo pitona lea pyomo doko indupa Jisasa malunya sakatasiamo dokome naima wane dupa-kisa angi injisetelyamo. Dokonya naimame Wai Pii Epe dake nyakama langilyamano. Losuu Wee laponge dokome pii dokoaka lao pituu, ‘Indupa nambame emba mandipilyona, emba nambanya ikiningina,’ lapae silyamo.
<range>
Dee baame Jisasa malunya sakatasiamo doko baa dee kapa pao malunya pilyetala tamuala nayatana lao dapa lapae silyamo: ‘Nambame etete epe koyala naenge dupa Dapiti maitona leo dupa nyakama ditona,’ lapae silyamo.
Wee mende dapa lapae silyamoaka: ‘Embame embanya akali epe etete doko soo tamuina kayala nayatena,’ lapae silyamo.
Goteme masiamoli pyoo Dapitimi baanya tata doko nisoo kalai pyoo katao kumapala baanya yumbange dupa-pipa awapa malu petae katao tamuiya-pyaa.
Dapiti tamuiyamoaka doko, Goteme akali sakatasiamo doko tamuala naya.
Dopana, kaimia paluma, nyakamame pii dake auu pyoo masalapale lao naimame langilyamano: akali dokome nyakamanya koo dupa kunanya nepatekea. Naimame naimanya koo tata dupa pitakame anjetae kateamanopa Goteme mana setapae Mosese maiyamo dupame naima kapa pao mokao nyala naya. Dopaka doko, akali dokome baa lao masoo miningi endakali dupa pitaka mokao nyilyamo.
<range>
Dopana, aopyoo latala wamba potopesa dupame leaminoli pyoo apale mende nyakama-kisa ipatana, kandao kalyepape:
‘Anematupa! Nyakama namba kilya kandao maita dingi endakali dupa mona andapala koyao alu pyepa! Doko, nambame nyakama kalyamino gii dakepa kalai mende pilyo. Dopa pilyo tenge doko endakali mendeme nyakama langitamopapi, nyakamame kiningina lao masala nayatamina,’ dopa lao pyapae silyamona,” latala Polome pii lao etea-pyaa.
Polopa Banapasapa kamanda paanya peambinopa, dokaitame dolapo lamaiyoo, “Sambasa gii mende ongonya pii dake naima dee langya ipupape,” lao tee leami-pyaa.
Pii latala tale peteaminopa Jutapi Juta joo Gote lao tama pyoo kateamino dupapi longo dupame Polopa Banapasapa dolapo watao peami-pyaa. Dokopa dolapome dupanya mona minao sakatasakamaiyoo, Gotenya mona epe palenge doko masetae katena lao lamaiyoo kateambi-pyaa.
Sambasa gii mende doko ipateamopa taono dokonya tange endakali dupa pitaka jowame Gotenya pii doko salanya limbiami-pyaa.
Pitaka limbiamino kandatala Juta dupame etete tilya nyepala Polome pii leamo doko yanda pimaiyoo pii koo lao lamba leami-pyaa.
Dopa leaminopa Polo Banapasapame paka nakayao dokaita lamaiyoo, “Gotenya pii doko nyakama wamba lamaiyakalapape leamo dokonya langitapumba. Dopaka doko, nyakamame pii doko tanga lao nepelyamino dokome nyakama tangeme lete etete nakatapenge daana latelyamino. Dokonya nalimbame kapilyetala endakali tata waka dupa lamaiya pelyambano, kanjepa.
Dopaka pyepale lao Kamongo dokome naima langyoo, ‘Emba endakali tata waka dupanya tii pisakamaingi akali joo kataseteo. Yuu dupa pitakanya endakali dupa emba-kisa pyoo nyepae katatamina,’ lea-pyaana,” leambi-pyaa.
Endakali tata waka kateamino dupame pii doko sepala mona yaepao Kamongonya pii doko tama piami-pyaa. Wamba Goteme endakali lete etete katatamina lao yapao nyiamo dupame masoo miniami-pyaa.
Dokopa Kamongonya pii doko yuu doko pitakanya taya-pyaa.
Juta dupame Gote lao tama pyoo petenge enda kenge singi dupapi yuu taono dokonya kenge singi akali dupapi dupanya mona minao sakatasetakamaitala Polo Banapasapa dolapo minao koyasina leami-pyaa. Dopa lateaminopa dokaitame dolapo nyakamanya yuu ongonya nakatena lao watao piami-pyaa.
Dopa piaminopa dolapome yuu kuni kungumapi nyalambonya mokonya pateamo dupa tange-kisa lyanda lanya setapakamaitala Aikoniame yuu taono dokonya peambi-pyaa.
Dopa piambinopa Andioko tange masoo miningi dupa mona yaepengepa Oli Sipitisapa dolapome tumbatae kateami-pyaa.
Polo Banapasapa dolapome piambinoli pyoo Aikoniama yuu dokonya Jutamanya losuu anda dokonya kolandeambi-pyaa. Kolandatala dolapome endakali dupa pii auu pyoo lamaiyambinosa Jutapi tata wakapi longo dupame masoo miniami-pyaa.
Dopa piaminoaka doko, Juta masoo minala nayamino dupame endakali tata waka dupanya mona mende pali pali petakamaitala dupame masoo miningi kaiminingi dupa imbu kayamaina leami-pyaa.
Polo Banapasapa dolapo Aikoniame yuu dokonya yuu longo lao katapala Kamongonya kingilyaka katao paka nakayao pii lamaiyoo kateambi-pyaa. Kamongo dokome baanya mona epe palenge doko lao panenge wai pii lapae doko kyoto injisoo, akali dolapo-kisa kongalipi kalai paka pipaepi dupa pia-pyaa.
Dopa piamopa Aikoniame tange dupa wakale pyoloo petala, yangi dupame Juta dupa auu kayami-pyaa. Yangi dupame aposele dolapo auu kayami-pyaa.
Maitakao endakali tata waka dupapi, Juta dupapi, Juta dupanya isingi akali dupapi dupame Polo Banapasapa dolapo mana koo minao kaname pyamana leami-pyaa.
Dopa leamino doko akali olapome sepala Laikonia yuu dokonya paka peambi-pyaa. Laikonia yuu doko taono Lisata dokopa taono Depi dokopa dolaponya yuu tengesa joo siamo dupanyapi paka pao kateambi-pyaa.
Yuu dupanya katao Wai Pii Epe doko lao endakali dupa lamaiyoo kateambi-pyaa.
Lisata yuu dokonya akali moko koo mende petea-pyaa. Baanya endangimi mandeamo gii ongopa moko koyapae mandea-pyaa. Yuu mendaipi mende baa kaitini napaenge-pyaa.
Akali dokome Polome pii lao kateamo doko soo petea-pyaa. Polome akali doko kandokondape petala akali dokonya masoo miniamo dokome baanya moko auu pyaapomona lao masia-pyaa.
Dopa lao masetala Polome puu lao baa lamaiyoo, “Emba sakatatala embanya moko dolapome tolao toya kata!” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa akali dokome yapa sakatao katapala kaita paya-pyaa.
Endakali longo dupame Polome piamo doko kandatala Laikonia tangemanya pii lengeli pyoo puu lao lao, “Naimanya gote dupa endakali jetala naima-ketae epelyaminona,” leami-pyaa.
Dopa latala endakali dupame Banapasa kenge Susa leami-pyaa. Polome enomba nyoo pii lenge dokonya baa kenge Emesa leami-pyaa.
Taono dokonya pyakaenge kaita dosa sambo gote Susa lenge dokonya losuu anda mende katenge-pyaa. Susa dokonya pitisa dokome mena pulumakao ita diimi yati petae mendapua minao lome kambu dokonya ipupala endakali dupa-pipa Susa doko lao kundi maiyanya piami-pyaa.
Dupame dopa pyaanya pilyamino lapae sepala aposele Banapasapa Polopa dolapome nyilyambonya yonge pee pingi dupa kanguopala endakali kateamino dokonya alo pyao epeambi-pyaa. Ipupala puu lao lao pituu, “Anematupa, aipuma dopa pilyamipi? Nalimba nyakama endakali kalyamino dopaleaka. Angi nanjepenge sambo gote datupa kayapala Gote lete katenge doko lao masoo minalapale lao Wai Pii Epe doko nyakama langilyambano. Baame yuupi, kaitipi, endakipi dee dupanya silyamo dupa pitakapi dupa wapuiya-pyaa.
<range>
Wamba yuu gii dupa pitakanya baame endakali tata dupa pitakame masoo kaita payamino dupa paena kaya-pyaa.
Dopaka doko, Goteme baa tange panasoo kalai epe dupa pyoo katenge. Kaiti-kisa katao aiyuu epenge dupapi nee tata dupa epasekenge gii dupapi dupa baame nyakama-kisa epena lekenge. Baame nee epepa mona lyuu lengepa dolapome nyakama tiaka pisekelyamona,” leambi-pyaa.
Dopa leambinoaka doko, dupame nyilyambo lao kundi maiyanya piamino doko kaena lao etete lekeleke koo tao kaita lyokeambi-pyaa.
Andioko dokopa Aikoniame dokopa yuu dolaponya Juta mendapuame ipupala endakali dupanya masingi sakatasiami-pyaa. Dopa piaminopa dokaitame Polo kaname piami-pyaa. Kaname pyapala kumatelyamo lao masetala baa pyalya lao nyoo taono dokonya kamalyatena nepeami-pyaa.
Dokopa masoo miningi endakali dupame ipupala Polo siamo dosa katao kakopeami-pyaa. Dopa piaminopa Polome sakatatala taono dokonya dee pilyia-pyaa. Taita dopa pyoo baa Banapasapa Depi yuu dokonya peambi-pyaa.
Dolapome Wai Pii Epe doko taono Depi dokonya lamaitala nyalambome endakali longo dupa Jisasa lao masoo miningi jina leambi-pyaa. Dopa petala maitakao yuu taono Lisatapi Aikoniamepi Andiokopi dutupanya pilyetala, masoo miniamino endakali dupa pupu lasiambi-pyaa. Nyakamame Jisasa lao masoo minokondape pyoo minalapape lao kyoto joo lamaiyambi-pyaa. Goteme isilyamo dokonya naima patamaka doko, wambao naimame kenda pipae longo silyamo kaitini dokonya payapengena leambi-pyaa.
<range>
Dopa latala dolapome sosa dii lao dupanya isingi akali katena lakamaiyambi-pyaa. Dolapome nee nanengemali pyoo nanao katao Kamongo doko lao loma setala masoo minateamino endakali dupa Kamongo dokome isina lao yakineambi-pyaa.
Dopa petala dolapome Pisitia yuu dokonya-kaita Pambilia yuu dokonya peambi-pyaa.
Pambilia yuu dokonya taono Peka dokonya pupala pii lamaiyambi-pyaa. Lamaitala Atelia yuu dokonya pupala sipi mendenya pituu Andioko yuu dokonya peambi-pyaa.
Yuu dokonya tange sosa dokome akali dolapome kalai pina lao Gotenya mona epe palenge dokonya wamba katasiami-pyaa. Kalai doko pyoo etapala dolapo Andioko yuu dokonyaka pilyiambi-pyaa.
Dolapo ipao Andioko yuu dokonya pyakayatala sosanya endakali dupa nyoo limbiambi-pyaa. Dopa petala, Goteme nyilyambo-pipa awapa kalai piapi baame endakali tata waka dupame masoo minina lao kaita doko lumbatakamaiyapi dupa dopa piana lao lamaiyambi-pyaa.
Andioko yuu dokonya akali dolapo masoo miningi endakali dupa-pipa awapa kote longo lao kateami-pyaa.
Dopa pyoo kateaminopa Juta mendapuame ipupala masoo miningi kaiminingi dupa mana lamaiyoo pituu, “Nyakamame Moseseme mana seteamoli pyoo elya pingi kambu kepala nayatamino kandao doko, Goteme nyakama pyoo nyala nayatana,” lamaiyami-pyaa.
Dopa lao mana lamaiyoo kateaminosa Polo Banapasapame etete imbu kayapala dupa-pipa pii yanda pyoloo piami-pyaa. Dopa piaminopa masoo miniamino dupame Polo Banapasa-pipa dee nyakamanya akali mendatupapi yapao nyepala Jetusaleme yuu dokonya aposelepi isingi akalipi dupa-pipa pii lao tolasala pena leami-pyaa.
Sosa dokome akali dupa pena lateaminopa Pinisiapa Samatiapa yuu dolaponya-kaita peami-pyaa. Pao pituu Goteme endakali tata waka dupanya mona dopa pyoo kapilyakamaiyana lao pii doko lamaiyoaka peami-pyaa. Pii dokome masoo miningi kaiminingi dupanya mona etete yaepasakamaiyami-pyaa.
Dupa Jetusaleme yuu dokonya pao pyakamateaminopa Jetusaleme tange sosa dokopi, aposele dupapi, isingi akali dupapi dupame akali epeamino dupa taeme ipamini lamo lao lanyiami-pyaa. Dopa peteaminopa Polo Banapasapame Goteme nalimba-pipa awapa kalai dupa pitaka piana lao panao lamaiyambi-pyaa.
Dopa lao lamaiyambiaka doko, Patasi dupanya masoo miningi akali mendapuame sakatao lao pituu, “Nyakamame akali dupanya elya pingi kambu kepatakamaitala, Moseseme mana setapae nyiamo dupa watao minina lao lamaipengena,” leami-pyaa.
Dopa leaminosa aposele dupapi isingi akali dupapi dutupame pii dokonya lao wasalanya limbiami-pyaa.
Limbatala pii longo lao yanda pyoloo pyoo peteaminopa, Pitame toya katapala pii mende dupa kandao lao pituu, “Kaimia paluma, wamba Goteme naima-kisa kalai mokosoo pituu, endakali tata waka dupame Wai Pii Epe doko sepala masoo minina lao nambame lamaitinopa lao baame namba yapao nyiamo doko nyakamame masilyamino.
Mona kandenge Gote dokome endakali tata waka dupa lanyetona lao masiamo doko laitaka pyaanya Oli Sipitisa doko naima diamoliaka pyoo dupa maiya.
Goteme naima-kisa mana waka mende minatala, tata waka dupa-kisa mana waka mendeaka pyoo minala naya. Masoo miniamino ongonya baame dupanya koo dupa kunanya nepakamaiya.
Dopana, aipuma nyakamame indupa Gote minao makande pyaanya kenda pipae naimanya yumbange dupapi naimapimi kapa pao nasiamano doko masoo miningi endakali dupa-ketae setamana lao masilyamipi?
Dopaka doko, naimame dapa lao masoo minilyamano: Kamongo Jisasanya mona epe palenge dokome naima pyoo nyepea. Endakali tata waka dupa dopaka peteana,” lea-pyaa.
Pitame dopa lateamopa endakali longo limbiamino dupame pii mende naleami-pyaa. Banapasa Polopame nalimba-kisa endakali tata waka dupanya kainanya Goteme kongalipi kalai paka pipaepi dupa piana lao leambino doko dupame soo peteami-pyaa.
Dokopa Jemesame lao pituu, “Kaimia paluma, nambame pii mende lelyona salapape.
Goteme wambao endakali tata waka dupa-kisa ipupala dupa baanya joo katatamina lao lanyiamo doko Saimoneme panao nyakama langitalamo.
Potopesa dupame pii mendai dokoaka lao pepa piamino doko dapa lao pyapae mee silyamo:
‘ “Maitakao namba pilyetala Dapitinya andalakembatae silyamo doko dee pito. Anda dokonya koyatamo dupa nambame dee wasoo pinya katato.
Dopana, nambanya latae endakali tata waka dupa pitakame namba kutatami.” Wamba waka pitona lao panasetala pilyamo Kamongo dokomeaka dopa lelyamona,’ lao pepa pyapae silyamo.
<range>
“Tenge dokonya minao tata waka dupame Gote lao mona kapilyilyamino endakali dupa kenda pisala nayamana lao nambame masilyo.
Dopa napinya, dupame sambo gote lao kundi maitae nee dupapi, mena yakapi mange minao kaimindokao kumasetae dupapi, taiyoko pyapae dupapi dupanya nala nayao kepo kolenge mana dupa watao napayalapape lao pepa pyasakamaimana.
Doko, wamba waka akali dupame yuu taono dupa pitakanya Sambasa dii lao Jutamanya losuu anda dupanya Mosesenya pii doko itaki pyao lamaiyamino doko lamaiyoaka kalyaminona,” Jemesame dopa lea-pyaa.
Dokopa aposelepi, isingi akalipi, sosanya endakali dupa pitakapimi nyakamanya akali mendapua yapao nyepala Polopa Banapasapa-pipa Andioko yuu taono dokonya pena leami-pyaa. Dupame Sailasapa Jutasa baa kenge mende Basapasa lenge dokopa dolapo pena leami-pyaa. Dolapo masoo miningi kaiminingi dupanya andake joo kateambi-pyaa.
Dolapo-kisa dupame dapa lao u pepa mende pyapala pyasiami-pyaa. “Naima aposelepi isingi akalipi masoo miningi kaiminingi dupame nyakama tata waka masoo miningi kaiminingi Andioko yuu dokopi, Sitia yuu dokopi, Silisia yuu dokopi yuu dutupanya kalyamino dupa nyakama auu pyoo kalyepape lelyamano.
Naimanya akali mendapuame nyakamanya masingi sakatasakao dupanya pii dokome nyakamanya mona koo palisekelyamino leamino pii doko sepeama. Dopaka doko, naimame dopa pina naleama.
Dopana, indupa naimame mona mendai paliuu akali mendalapo yapao nyepala, naimanya auu kaenge Polo Banapasa-pipa awapa nyakama kalyamino ongonya epekena lelyamano.
Polo Banapasapa dolapome naimanya Kamongo Jisasa Kataisanya kenge doko lao minalyoo katao kumingi doko paka nakaengemba.
Dopana, naimame Jutasa Sailasapa dolapo epekena latala dolapome pii datupaka nyakama langina lelyamano:
Naimapi Oli Sipitisa dokopimi nyakama-kisa kenda pipae mende setala nayamana lao masilyamano. Nyakamame mana datupa iki dapa pyoo minalapape:
sambo gote dupa kundi maitae dupapi, taiyoko pyapae dupapi, mena yakapi mange minao kaimindokao kumasetae dupapi dupa nala nayalapape. Kepo kolala nayalapapeaka. Mana koo dupa nepatala wakale katatamino kandao doko, nyakama auu pyoo katatami. Pii utupaka iki lelyamanona,” lao pepa pyasakamaiyami-pyaa.
Dopa lao pepa pyapala minao pena lateaminopa akali dolapome Andioko yuu dokonya pyakanatala sosanya endakali dupa limbina latala pepa doko dupa maiyambi-pyaa.
Maitiambinopa Andioko tange dupame pii auu pipae siamo dupa itaki pyao kandatala mona yaepeami-pyaa.
Jutasa Sailasapa dolapo potopesa joo kateambiaka-pyaa. Dolapome pii longo lao lamaiyoo masoo miningi kaiminingi dupanya mona minao sakatasetakamaitala pupu lasiambi-pyaa.
Dolapo kote mendatupa yuu dokonya katapeambinopa masoo miningi kaiminingi dupame dolapo auu pyoo lasa latala epena leamino endakali dupa kateamino yuu dokonya pilyina leami-pyaa.
[Dopaka doko, Sailasa dokome Andioko yuu dokonya mee katatoakana lao masetala katea-pyaa.]
Polo Banapasapa Andioko yuu dokonya kote mendatupa apata dee kateambiaka-pyaa. Dokopa akali mendapua-pipa awapa katao Kamongonya Wai Pii Epe doko endakali dupa lamaita mana lamaita pyoo kateambi-pyaa.
Kote mendatupa pateamopa Polome Banapasa lamaiyoo, “Nalimba dee pilyetala yuu taono dupa pitakanya Kamongonya pii doko lamaiyambano masoo miningi kaiminingi dupa aipa pyoo kalyamipi lao kanja bonalena,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa Banapasame Jone Make lenge doko apata mona lanyimbuali lao masia-pyaa.
Dopa lao masiamopa Polome akali dokome nalimba Pambilia yuu dokonya yakinatala kalai pyaanya awapa napeamano doko lanyoo patambanopa kapa napatana daa lao masia-pyaa.
Dokonya akali dolapome pii imbu kayao laloo petala tale piambi-pyaa. Tale petala Banapasame Make lanyepala sipi mendenya pituu Saipotasa yuu dokonya pea-pyaa.
Polome Sailasa yapao nyepeamopa masoo miningi kaiminingi dupame Kamongonya mona epe palenge doko emba-pipa awapa pupape lateaminopa pea-pyaa.
Pupala baame Sitiapa Silisiapa yuu dolaponya sosa dupa pupu lasoo paya-pyaa.
Polo baa yuu Depipa Lisatapa dolaponya peaka-pyaa. Lisata yuu dokonya Jisasa masoo miningi akali Timoti lenge mende katea-pyaa. Timoti endangi doko masoo minao petenge Juta enda mende-pyaa. Baanya takange doko Gitiki tange-pyaa.
Yuu Lisatapa Aikoniamepa dolaponya masoo miningi kaiminingi dupame Timoti doko auu pipaena lengema-pyaa.
Polome Timoti lanyoo tole patambana lao masetala baanya elya pingi kambu kepakamaiya-pyaa. Doko, yuu dokonya Juta endakali kateamino dupame Timotinya takange doko Gitiki tangena lao masiamino dokonya dopa pia-pyaa.
Polo, Timoti, Sailasapi dutupame yuu taono dupanya pupala aposelepi isingi akalipi dupame Jetusaleme pii wasoo lanya seteaminoli pyoo endakali dupame pina lao lamaiyami-pyaa.
Dopa piaminopa sosa dupanya masoo miningi doko kyoto jema jema piamopa koteaka lao endakali longo mendapuame sosa dupanya konda peta peta piami-pyaa.
Oli Sipitisa dokome Esia yuu dokonya pii lamaiya napena lao kaita lyokeamopa akali dutupame Pitisiapi Galasiapa yuu dolaponya-kaita peami-pyaa.
Pao Misia yuu dokonya pyakamatala Bitinia yuu dokonya paanya piaminopa Jisasanya Sipitisa dokome napena lao kaita lyokea-pyaa.
Dokopa akali dutupame Misia yuu dokonya-kaita Toasa yuu taono dokonya peami-pyaa.
Pao pyakanatala paleaminopa kuka Polome kombeame Masetonia tange akali mendeme toya katapala wii lao, “Embame aetena naima nisala ipu!” leamo kandea-pyaa.
Kombea piamo dokonya naimame Masetonia yuu dokonya yapa monalena latala kaitini mende kutiama. Doko, Goteme Masetonia tange dupa Wai Pii Epe doko lamaiya pupale lao wii latalame lumu lao masetala naimame dopa piama.
Dopa petala naimame Toasa yuu dokonya katao sipi mendenya pituu Samotesa yuu dokonya tolao peama. Taita dopa pyoo Niapolisa yuu dokonya peama.
Dopa petala naimame sipi doko Niapolisa yuu dokonya yakinatala Pilipae yuu dokonya peama. Taono Pilipae doko Masetonia yuu dokonya potopinja mupa dokonya sia. Loma tange dupame Pilipae yuu dokonya kapomane joo kateami. Naima kote mendatupa Pilipae dokonya kateama.
Sambasa gii dokopa naimame lome kaita dokonya kamalyatena pupala endaki mate mendenya peama. Endaki mate dosa loma singi panda mende singi joo pilyamo lao masiama. Endaki mate dosa pituu enda mendapua ipao limbiamino dupa-pipa pii leama.
Lao peteamanopa Gote lao tama pyoo petenge enda kenge Litia lenge mendeme naimanya pii sia. Baa taono Tayataita tange-pyaa. Baame lapalapa wene pyapaedupame topo nyoo petenge-pyaa. Kamongo dokome enda dokonya mona kapilyakamaiyamopa Polome pii leamo dupa baame sokondape pyoo sia.
Dokopa naimame enda dokopi baanya andaka awapa palenge dupapinya kaimbu pyakamaiyama. Dokopa baame naima langyoo, “Nambame Kamongo doko lao masoo minao pilyeno lao nyakamame masetamino kandao doko, nambanya andaka pitimana ipupa,” lao kongo lea.
Kote mende naimame loma singi panda dokonya paanya peamanopa kendemane wanaku mende kaitinisa kandanyiama. Wanaku enjele koo paleta dokome pyongo pyao tanga pitamo dupapi yalo petae dupapi dupa lao panelyamosa wanaku doko isingi akali dupame dokonya oapi longo nyingima-pyaa.
Wanaku dokome Polopi naimapi watao ipupala puu lao lao pituu, “Akali dutupame Etete Ketae Katenge Gote dokonya kendemane joo katao Gotenya pyoo nyingi kaitini mende nyakama langyoo kalyaminona,” lea.
Kote longo lao dopa lati siamosa maka kayapala Polome kapilyetala enjele koo wanaku doko-kisa paleamo doko kandao lao pituu, “Jisasa Kataisanya kenge doko lao embame wanaku dake yakinatala puu lelyona,” lea. Dopa leamo dokopaka enjele koo dokome wanaku doko yakinatala pea.
Dokopa wanaku doko isingi akali dupame naimanya oapi nyingi kaitini doko etalame lamo lao masetala, Polo Sailasapa dolapo puu lao minatala pyalya lao nyoo endakali limbingi kamapi dokonya peami-pyaa. Laminao pao nyakamanya Loma tange taono isingi akali dupa maitala lao pituu, “Akali Juta dalapome naimanya taono dakenya endakali dupanya mona mende pali pali pyakamaiyambi.
<range>
Akali dalapome mana langilyambino dupa naima Loma tange dupanya daa lapae singina, naimame kapa pao nyoo napitamana,” leami.
Endakali dupa pitakame akali dolapo-kisa pii watambao leami. Dopa leaminopa taono isingi dupame nyakamame akali dolaponya yonge pee pingi dupa puu lao lapinya nepatala kyoo konjame pina leami.
Dopa lateaminopa dupame akali dolapo paa longosa kyoo konjame pyapala anjoo anjingi andaka pyandeami. Pyandatala anjetae isingi akali doko lamaiyoo, “Embame akali dalapo isokondape pyoo isepena,” leami.
Anjingi anda isingi akali dokome pii dopa leamino doko sepala akali dolapo anjingi anda andakote etete palo mendenya anjoo pyandea. Pyandatala endakali moko nyoo anjingi palaŋa ita tumbyepae mendalaponya baame akali dolaponya moko nyoo pyasetala ita dolapo minao keto latala anjoo tambukinea-pyaa.
Dopa piamopa kukuma andatombe dokonya Polo Sailasapame loma soo Gote lao wee lao peteambino doko anjingi anda dokonya paleamino endakali dupame sepala lenge takatae siami-pyaa.
Dokopa titiwali andake mende pupae lao minalu piamo dokome anjingi anda dokonya paka andake dupa ema-ema pia-pyaa. Ema piamo dokome anjingi anda kaita dupa pitaka lumbapae soo endakali anjetae paleamino dupa pitakanya ŋili kende dupa mokapae soaka pia-pyaa.
Titiwali miniamo doko sepala anjingi anda isingi dokome luu paliuu sakatatala anjingi anda kaita dupa lumbapae siamo kandea-pyaa. Kandatala anjetae endakali dupa pitaka pamini lamo lao masia-pyaa. Dopa lao masetala baame baanya konjua doko kolanyetala baa tange pyao kumasalanya pia-pyaa.
Dopa piamopa Polome puu lao, “Embame emba tange koyasala nayape, naima pitaka angenya palelyamanona,” lea-pyaa.
Dokopa anjetae isingi akali dokome kia mende peena latala alo pyao andaka kolandea-pyaa. Kolandatala Polo Sailasapa paleambino dosa paka kayao walu lao tombauli sia-pyaa.
Tombauli soo sakatatala baame akali dolapo laminao kamanda pupala, “Akali andake anelyapo, Goteme namba pyoo nyina lao aipa pyuape?” lea-pyaa.
Dopa leamopa akali dolapome baa lamaiyoo, “Embame Kamongo Jisasa lao masoo minape. Dokonya Goteme emba pyoo nyeta. Baame embanya andaka awapa palenge dupa pyoo nyetakana,” leambi-pyaa.
Dopa latala Polo Sailasapame baapi baanya andaka awapa palenge dupa pitaka Kamongonya lao pii lamaiyambi-pyaa.
Kuka gii dokopaka baame akali dolapo lanyepala pyapae dupa kaimbu pyao nepakamaiya-pyaa. Dopa piamopa dolapome baapi baanya andaka awapa palenge dupa pitaka-pipa Gotenya kaimbu doko pupae pyakamaiyambi-pyaa.
Kaimbu pyatakamaiyambinopa baame akali dolapo laminao palenge anda namba ketae dokonya kolandatala nee yangao maiya-pyaa. Baame Gote lao masoo miniamo dokonya baapi baanya andaka awapa palenge dupapimi mona yaepeami-pyaa.
Yuu yongateamopa taono isingi akali dupame yanda singi mendapuame akali dolapo mokena lao anjetae isingi akali doko lamaiya pena leami-pyaa.
Yanda singi dupame anjetae isingi doko dopa lamaitiaminopa baame Polo lamaiyoo, “Taono isingi akali dupame nyilyambo mokape lao wai peelyamino, dokonya nyilyambo kamaka ipupala mona yaepatala pupa,” lea-pyaa.
Dopaka doko, Polome yanda singi dupa lamaiyoo, “Nalimba Loma tange dolapo dupame kosa mende nalao endakali dupanya enombanya konjame pyapala anjingi andaka mee anjinya palyetala, dee indupa elyakao mokatala pupa lelyamipi? Doko kapa daana, anjiamino akali dupameaka mokao nyala epena kayalapa,” lea-pyaa.
Yanda singi dupame pupala taono isingi akali dupa Polome pii leamo doko lamaiyaminopa akali dolapo Loma tange lumu lao sepala paka kayami-pyaa.
Dokonya dupame ipao akali dolaponya mona auu pisakamaiyoo kamaka lanyiami-pyaa. Dopa petala akali dolapo kandao, “Anelyapo, nyilyambome taono dake yakinatala pupapoko,” leami-pyaa.
Dokopa akali dolapo anjingi anda doko yakinatala enda Litianya andaka peambi-pyaa. Pupala anda dokonya masoo miningi kaiminingi dupa kandatala mona epe palisakamaiyoo pii mendapua lamaiyambi-pyaa. Dopa petala dolapo peambi-pyaa.
Polo Sailasapame Amapipolisapa Apoloniapa yuu dolaponya-kaita pao taono Tesalonaika dokonya pyakameambi-pyaa. Yuu dokonya Jutamanya losuu anda mende katenge-pyaa.
Polome pingiliaka pyoo Juta dupa-pipa awapa anda dokonya kolandatala Sambasa tepoma Gotenya pii pepa pyapae siamo dokonya endakali dupa-pipa pii laloo pyoo katea-pyaa.
Kataisa dokome tanda nao kumatana lapae siamo dokopa malunya sakatatana lapae siamo dokopa dolaponya tenge dupa baame dupa laitaka pyoo lao panao katea-pyaa. Baame dupa lamaiyoo, “Nambame nyakama langyoo, Jisasa dokoaka baa Kataisana,” lea-pyaa.
Dokopa endakali mendatupame masoo minatala Polo Sailasapa tole piami-pyaa. Gote lao tama pyoo katenge Gitiki endakali longo paka dupapi dee yuu dokonya tange akali andake dupanya enda longo mendapuapi dupame Polo Sailasapa tole piami-pyaa.
Dopa piaminopa Juta dupame tilya nyepala endakali limbingi kamapi dokonya akali makongapae mendapua nyoo limbiami-pyaa. Limbatala dee endakali longo mendapua nyoo limbateaminopa dupa pitakame taono dokonya pyao pilya pyana pyoo nimi namu lao limbingi doko minao koyasiami-pyaa. Dupame dopa pyoo akali Jesonenya andaka alo pyao ipao Polo Sailasapa nyoo endakali dupa maiyanya kutiami-pyaa.
Dupame akali dolapo kutao kayapala Jesonepi masoo miningi kaiminingi mendapua-pipa pyalya lao nyoo taono isingi akali dupa kateamisa peami-pyaa. Nyoo pupala ae lao, “Yuu dupa pitaka minao koyasiamino akali dupa dae ipatelyamino.
Jesoneme akali dupa lanyoo baanya andaka pupya. Akali dakaita pitakame Kapomane Isingi Mupa dokonya mana setapae dupa tuu pyoo nepengema. Dupame kiŋi waka Jisasa lenge mende kalyamoaka lengemana,” leami-pyaa.
Dopa leaminopa taono isingi akali dupapi endakali longo kambu piamino dupapimi pii doko sepala mona koo palyiami-pyaa.
Dopa petala taono isingi akali dupame Jesonepi masoo miningi kaiminingi dupapimi muni peena lao nyepala dee dopaka pitamino kandao doko, muni dutupa etete nyetamana latala pena kayami-pyaa.
Dopa peteaminopa masoo miningi kaiminingi dupame Polo Sailasapa Betia yuu dokonya kuakama yapa pena leami-pyaa. Akali dolapo Betia yuu dokonya pyakamatala Jutamanya losuu anda dokonya kolandeambi-pyaa.
Juta endakali Betia kateamino dupame Juta endakali Tesalonaika kateamino dupa ita minao mona palenge akali kateami-pyaa. Dupame Wai Pii Epe doko etete putitimi kumao siami-pyaa. Pii doko Gotenya pii pepa pyapae singi dokonya kiningi dopaka lao pyapae silyape lao koteaka lao kandokondape pyoo kateami-pyaa.
Dopa pyoo katao dupanya longo dupame masoo miniami-pyaa. Gitiki tange kenge singi enda mendapuapi akali longo mendapuapimi masoo miniamiaka-pyaa.
Maitakao Juta endakali Tesalonaika kateamino dupame Polome Betia yuu dokonya Gotenya pii doko lamaitilyamoakana lapae sepala dupa yuu dokonya epeamiaka-pyaa. Ipupala endakali dupa minao kyakasoo mona koo palisakamaiyami-pyaa.
Dopa piaminopa masoo miningi kaiminingi dupame Polo solowata pete singi yuu dokonya yapa pena leami-pyaa. Dokopa Sailasa Timotipa Betia mee kateambi-pyaa.
Polo mapala peamino akali dupame Atenesa yuu taono dokonya mapeami-pyaa. Polome akali dokaita lamaiyoo, “Sailasa Timotipa namba kalyo angenya yapa epena lamaiyepape,” lateamopa pilyiami-pyaa.
Polome Sailasa Timotipa Atenesa yuu dokonya malisoo katao kandeamopa taono dokonya sambo gote wasepe dupame tumbatae kateamo kandatala mona koo palea-pyaa.
Dopa pyoo katao Polo Jutamanya losuu anda dokonya pupala Juta dupapi endakali tata waka Gote lao tama pingi dupa-pipapi pii laloo pia-pyaa. Dee baame koteaka lao makesa singi kamapi dokonya pupala endakali ipao kambu piamino dupa-pipa pii laloo piaka-pyaa.
Epikutianamanya mana nyepae dupapi Setoikimanya mana nyepae dupapi dupanya masingi akali mendapuame ipao Polo-pipa pii yanda pyoloo piami-pyaa. Mendapuame lao pituu, “Kaina pii lao paenge akali dakeme aki masoo maku lelyape?” leami-pyaa. Yangimi lao pituu, “Akali dakeme gote yuu waka tange mendapuanya pii lao katata aipape?” leami-pyaa. Polome Jisasanya lao baa malunya sakateana lao lamaiyoo kateamo dokonya dopa leami-pyaa.
Dupame Polo laminao Ateopakasa kanjole dupa kateamino dokonya peami-pyaa. Pupala lao pituu, “Embame mana enenge lamaingi pyomo doko sipuma laka lao masilyamano.
Naimame embanya pii doko sipumanopa mendepale jipumosa pii dokonya tenge dupa sipuma laka lao masilyamano,” leami-pyaa.
Atenesa tange dupapi tata waka Atenesa ipao tisa nao katenge dupapimi pii enengepi mana enengepi dopale dupaka soani kayao katengema-pyaa.
Polome Ateopakasa kanjole dupanya kaina dokonya toya katapala lao pituu, “Atenesa tange akali nyakama, nambame kandapupa nyakamanya gote dupa lao etete minokondape pyoo miningima lamo.
Nambame payao pituu nyakamame tama pingima lamo dupa kanjo. Dee olata toko mendenya Naimame Nakandenge Gote doko lao pepa pyapae sipumu kanjoaka. Nyakamame nakandao mee tama pingima lamo dokonya lao nambame indupa langitoo.
Yuupi kaitipi dupanya silyamo dupa pitaka wapuiyamo Gote doko yuupi kaitipi dupanya Kamongo kalyamo. Dopana, baa endakali kingimi losuu anda petae dupanya nakatenge.
Baa opale mende daa jala naenge. Dee endakali mendeme baa kingi maipenge nanjingiaka. Baame iki endakali dupa pitaka lete katengepi, imambu singipi, oapi dupa pitaka maingi.
Baame endakali tata dupa pitaka yumbange mendainya pyakalyina latala yuu dupa pitakanya katena lea-pyaa. Wamba baame endakali dupanya gii dupa setakamaiyoo yuu dupa konjoo maitala dopa pia-pyaa.
Dupame mina kanda kanda pyoo Gote baa kutao kandapimi laka lao dopa pia-pyaa. Baa naimanya mendaipi mendepa tependa joo nakatenge.
“Naima baa mambele lete katao kaita payao kalyamano. Wamba nyakamanya wee pepa pingi akali mendapuame dopaka lao lao pituu, ‘Naima apata baanya mandipayakana,’ leami-pyaa.
Naima Gotenya mandipae kalyamano dokonya Gote baa opale endakalimi masetala kingimi etete auu pyoo golopi, silipapi, kanapimi wasingi dopalena lao masala nayapenge.
Wamba endakali dupame masala nayao koo piamino dokopa Goteme kanja naele pyoo kateamoaka doko, indupa baame yuu dupa pitakanya endakali dupa pitaka lamaiyoo, ‘Nyakama mona kapilyalapape,’ lelyamo.
Doko, baame gii seteamo dokonya akali mende yapao nyiamo doko-kisa baame pii lao tolao mana tolatae doko minao endakali dupa pitaka yapata. Baame dopa pitana lao akali doko malunya sakatasiamo dokome endakali dupa pitaka auu pyoo laitaka peteana,” Polome lea-pyaa.
Endakali kumapae malunya sakatenge pii Polome leamo doko sepala endakali yangimi gii kayao kaa kaa leami-pyaa. Endakali yangimi, “Gii mendepa pii dokonya dee setamana,” leami-pyaa.
Dopa leaminopa Polome endakali dupa yakinatala pea-pyaa.
Dopa piamopa yangimi baa tole pyatala masoo miniami-pyaa. Ateopakasa kanjole akali kenge Dayonisiasa lenge dokopi enda kenge Damatisa lenge dokopi dee endakali waka mendatupa-pipame masoo miniami-pyaa.
Maitakao Polome Atenesa yuu doko yakinatala Kotina yuu taono dokonya pea-pyaa.
Pupala baame akali Akuila lenge Juta mendepa baanya etanenge Pitisila lenge dokopa dolapo kandanyia-pyaa. Akali Akuila doko Pondasa tange-pyaa. Loma tange kapomane mupa Kolotiasa lenge dokome Juta endakali dupa pitaka Loma yuu dokonya yakinatala pena leamosa endakalipa dolapome Itali yuu doko kuki wambale yakinatala Kotina yuu dokonya ipao peteambi-pyaa. Peteambino dokonya Polo epea-pyaa.
Ipupala endakalipa dolapome kalai pingi mendai dokaitaka Polome pingi dokonya dolapo-pipa awapa katao kalai pyoo kateami-pyaa. Dutupame sele anda kii pingima-pyaa.
Sambasa dii lao Polome Jutamanya losuu anda dokonya pao Juta endakalipi Gitiki endakalipi dupanya mona minao kapilyakamaiyanya dupa-pipa pii laloo pyoo lamaiyoo katea-pyaa.
Sailasa Timotipa Masetonia katao Kotina epeambi-pyaa. Gii dokopa Polome pii lamaingi kalai doko iki kyoto joo pitoana lao masetala Juta endakali dupa kandao Jisasa baa Kataisana lao etete pupu lao lamaiya-pyaa.
Dopa lamaiyamopa dokaitame baame pii leamo dokonya tanga latala lamba leaminopa Polome baanya yonge pee pingi doko lyanda lanya nepatala dupa kandao, “Nyakama alu pitamino doko, nyakama tange mambele alu pitamina, namba-kisa tenge naseta. Dopana, namba endakali tata waka kalyamino dupanya patoana,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa latala baame dupa yakinatala Gote lao tama pyoo katenge akali Titiasa Jasatasa lenge dokonya andaka pea-pyaa. Anda doko Jutamanya losuu anda makisa dosa katenge-pyaa.
Losuu anda isoo katenge akali Kitisapasa lenge dokopi baanya palu dupapimi Kamongo doko lao masoo miniami-pyaa. Dee Kotina tange endakali waka longo dupame Polome Gotenya pii leamo doko sepala masoo minao kaimbu nyoaka kateami-pyaa.
Kote mendepa kuakama Kamongo dokome kombeame Polo dapa lamaiya-pyaa: “Emba paka kayala naenya pii lamaipi. Namba emba-pipa tole pyao kalyo tenge dokonya minao embame kambu piti napipi. Taono dakenya nambanya endakali longo dupa kalyaminona, mendeme sakatatala emba anguala nayatana,” Kamongo dokome dopa lea-pyaa.
<range>
Dopa lateamopa Polome Kotina yuu dokonya ee kana mendai dee kana tokange pyoo Gotenya pii doko endakali dupa mana lamaiyoo katea-pyaa.
Akali Galio doko Akaya yuu dokonya kapomane andake kateamo gii ongopa Juta endakali dupame masingi mendai palyetala Polo yanda piamaitala anjoo soo kosimi laa peami-pyaa.
Pupala lao pituu, “Akali dakeme mana setapae dupa yakinatala mana waka mende minao Gote lao tama pina lao endakali dupa pyalya lao nyalanya pii lamailyamona,” leami-pyaa.
Dopa leaminopa Polome pii laanya piamopa Galio dokome dokaita kandao, “Kanau, nyakama Juta dupa, akali dakeme kapomanenya mana mende nepatala mana koo andake mende minata pipyali kandao doko, nambame nyakamanya pii doko kapa pao sakapuli.
Dopaka doko, nyakame nyakama tangenya piipi, kengepi, mana setapaepi dupanya mendenya kosimi laa ipatamino kandao doko, nyakamanya kalai. Nambame pii dopale dupa sala nayatoana,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa latala baame dokaita watao pia-pyaa. Watao pyateamopa dokaita pitakame losuu anda isingi akali kenge Sosatenisa lenge doko Galiome kosa siamo makisa dosa minatala piami-pyaa. Dopa piaminoaka doko, Galiome kandele nakandele pia-pyaa.
<range>
Polome Kotina yuu taono dokonya masoo miningi kaiminingi dupa-pipa kote longo lao awapa katapala maitakao Sitia yuu dokonya paanya pituu nyakama kalyepape lao lasa lea-pyaa. Lasa latala sipi mende nyalanya Senekotia yuu taono dokonya pea-pyaa. Pupala Polome dokonya katao pii mende Gote kandao latala etete kiningi lelyona lao baanya iti tokea-pyaa. Dopa petala Pitisilapa Akuilapa dolapo-pipa sipi mendenya pituu Sitia yuu dokonya paanya taono Epesasa-kaita peami-pyaa.
Epesasa yuu dokonya pao pyakamatala Polome endakalipa dolapo dokonya yakinatala baa iki Jutamanya losuu anda dokonya kolandea-pyaa. Kolandatala baame Juta dupa-pipa pii laloo pia-pyaa.
Dokopa dupame, “Emba naima-pipa kote mendatupa awapa katamana,” leaminopa Polome ŋee nalea-pyaa.
Nee nalenya lao pituu, “Goteme yakana lao masetamo kandao doko, namba nyakama kalyamino angenya dee pilyetona,” lea-pyaa. Dopa latala baame dupa kandao lasa latala Epesasa yuu doko yakinea-pyaa.
Dopa petala sipi mendenya pituu taono Sisatia dokonya pea-pyaa. Pupala Jetusaleme pao sosa dokonya endakali kateamino dupa kingi nyia-pyaa. Dopa petala Andioko yuu dokonya pea-pyaa.
Andioko yuu dokonya kote longoleaka katapala Polome yuu doko yakinatala Galasiapa Pitisiapa yuu dolaponya yuu yakane mendai mendai lao dupanya pupala Jisasa masoo miningi endakali dupa pitaka pupu lasia-pyaa.
Akali Apolosa lenge Juta mende Epesasa yuu dokonya ipao katea-pyaa. Baa Alekesandia yuu taono dokonya tange-pyaa. Baame pii auu pyoo lao Gotenya pii pepa pyapae singi dupa masingi-pyaa.
Wamba endakali mendapuame akali Apolosa doko Kamongonya piipi manapi dupanya lao mana lamaiyami-pyaa. Dokopa baame etete kyoto joo pii tolao lao Jisasame piamo dupa endakali dupa mana lamaiya-pyaa. Joneme kaimbu pingi mana doko iki masia-pyaa.
Baame Jutamanya losuu anda dokonya tee pyao paka nakayao pii pupu lao leamo doko sepala Pitisilapa Akuilapa dolapome baa lanyepala Gotenya piipi manapi dupa etete tolasoo mana lamiyambi-pyaa.
Apolosa dokome Akaya yuu dokonya paanya piamosa masoo miningi kaiminingi dupame ongo etete yakana puu latala Akaya tange masoo miningi dupame akali dake lanyalapape lao pepa pyasakamaiyami-pyaa. Apolosa dokome Akaya yuu dokonya pupala baame Gotenya mona epe palenge dokome masoo minao kateamino endakali dupa nisokondape pyoo nisia-pyaa.
Baame endakali dupa pitakanya lengelyaapi dokonya Juta dupame pii kopeta leamino dupa pyanya paliuu tolao pupu lao lamaiyoo katea-pyaa. Apolosa dokome Gotenya pii pepa pyapae singi dokonya Jisasa baa Kataisa dokona lao panao lamaiya-pyaa.
Apolosa Kotina yuu dokonya kateamo gii dokopa Polome yuu manda dupanya-kaita payao ipao Epesasa pyakanatala yuu dokonya Jisasa masoo miningi endakali mendapua kateamino kandea-pyaa.
Kandatala baame dupa lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame masoo miniamino gii dokopa Oli Sipitisa doko nyiamipi?” lao pisia-pyaa. Dupame baa lamaiyoo, “Oli Sipitisa mende kalyamo lapae naimame nasiamana,” leami-pyaa.
Dopa leaminopa Polome dokaita lamaiyoo, “Nyakamame kaimbu aipale mende nyiamipi?” lea-pyaa. Dopa leamopa dupame baa lamaiyoo, “Naimame Jonenya kaimbu doko nyiamana,” leami-pyaa.
Dopa leaminopa Polome dokaita lamaiyoo, “Endakali mona kapilyiamino dupa Joneme kaimbu pyakamaiya. Joneme endakali dupa lamaiyoo, ‘Akali mende namba watao epelyamo doko lao masoo minalapape,’ lea-pyomo doko Jisasa kandao lea-pyaana,” lea-pyaa.
Polome pii leamo doko sepala dupame Kamongo Jisasanya kenge doko lao kaimbu nyiami-pyaa.
Kaimbu nyepeaminopa Polome dupanya aiyomba minani pyakamaiya-pyaa. Dokopa Oli Sipitisa doko dupa-kisa epeamopa dupame Gote lao tama pyoo pii tata waka dupa lao Gotenya pii panao lao kateami-pyaa.
Akali dupa pyasoo kingi ita mende-kisa dee lapomapi mende-pyaa.
Polome kana tepoma Jutamanya losuu anda dokonya kolandata pyoo paka nakayao Gotenya isingi dokonya lao endakali dupanya masingi sakatasakamaiyoo dupa-pipa pii laloo pyoo kateami-pyaa.
Dopa piamoaka doko, yangi dupame nyakamanya ingi monapi dupa kana jetala masoo minala nayami-pyaa. Dupame endakali enomba dupanya Kamongonya pii manapi dupa kandao pii koo leaminosa Polome dupa yakinatala pea-pyaa. Masoo miniamino dupa awapa lanyoo pupala akali Titanasa lenge dokonya mana lenge anda mendenya baame dupa-pipa koteaka lao pii laloo pyoo katea-pyaa.
Baame ee kana lapoma dopa pyoo katea-pyaa. Dopa piamopa Juta endakalipi tata wakapi yuu Esia kateamino dupa pitakame Kamongonya pii doko siami-pyaa.
Polonya kingilyaka dokonya Goteme kalai pupu lapae tata waka mendepale mendapua pia-pyaa.
Endakali dupame Polonya lapalapapi kalai pyaanya yonge pee sanga pyao kisa pingi dopale mendapuapi nyepala, nyoo pao endakali yaina pyapae dupa-kisa setapa piaminopa yaina dupa mee jeta pia-pyaa. Dopa piaminopa enjele koo endakali dupa-kisa paleamo dupame yakinatala peami-pyaa.
Dokopa enjele koo watao pyao paenge Juta mendapua epeami-pyaa. Dupame endakali-kisa enjele koo palenge dupa watao pyalanya Kamongo Jisasanya kenge doko lao makande pyoo dapa lengema-pyaa: “Polome lenge Jisasa dokonya kenge doko lao nambame nyakama pupa lelyona,” lengema-pyaa.
Jutamanya pitisa mupa Sipaa lenge dokonya ikiningi kalange dutupame mana doko minao kateami-pyaa.
Dopa piaminopa enjele koo dokome dokaita kandao, “Nambame Jisasa doko kandenge. Polo doko kandengeakana, nyakama angi apitupape?” lea-pyaa.
Dopa latala enjele koo paleta akali dokome dutupa-kisa pyakala ipupala dutupa pyaanya isa setapala ita minia-pyaa. Dopa pyoo yambale dupa lyokao lapinya nepatakamaiyamopa, dutupame baa yakintala papata too putiputi latae dupa paka pyoo peami-pyaa.
Maitakao Jutapi tata waka Epesasa dokonya kateamino dupapi dupa pitakame piamo doko sepala pakame kumapala dupame Kamongo Jisasanya kenge doko lao lalyoo kateami-pyaa.
Dokopa endakali longo masoo minateamino dupame ipata ipata pyoo nyakamanya mana miningi dupa lao panao tata leami-pyaa.
Topoli mana miningi akali longo dupame nyakamanya buku dupa nyoo elyambu petala endakali dupa pitakanya enombanya soo yangeami-pyaa. Dopa petala buku dupanya muni akipate peape lao itaki piaminopa kina tausene kingi ita yuungi jia-pyaa.
Mana dopale dupanya Kamongonya pii dokome ita minao kyoto joo tayama tayama pyoo taya-pyaa.
Dokopa Polome Masetoniapa Akayapa yuu dolaponya pupala Jetusaleme patoo lao kyoto joo masia-pyaa. Baame lao pituu, “Nambame Jetusaleme pupala dee Loma yuu dokonya patoakana,” lea-pyaa.
Dopa latala baame baanya nisingi akali Timoti Ilasatasapa dolapo Masetonia yuu dokonya wambao pena latala baa dee kote mendatupa Esia yuu dokonya mee katea-pyaa.
Gii dokopa endakali mendapuame Kataisanya pii manapi minao paenge dokonya imbu kayapala pundu andake mende sakatasiami-pyaa.
Akali Dimitiasa lenge mendeme oapi dupa silipame wasoo katea-pyaa. Baame Atemisadokonya losuu anda doko wangi tao yakane mendapua silipame wasoo katea-pyaa. Dopa pyoo baa-pipa awapa kalai pingi dupame yole longo lao nyoo katengema-pyaa.
Baame akali dokaitapi dee kalai dopale pingi dupapi dupa nyoo elyambu petala lao pituu, “Kaimia paluma, naimanya kalai dokonya yole longo lao naima-kisa epenge doko masilyamino.
Dee mende nyakamame soo kandao masilyamiaka kanja: Epesasa yuu dakenya iki daa, akali Polo dokome Esia yuu dake pitakanya endakali dupanya masingi aloo pisetakamaitala kaita duna waka mende laitaka pyoo, endakali kingimi gote wapuingi dupa angi daana lao lamailyamo.
Tenge dokonya minao endakali dupame naimanya kalai dake kilya kandatami. Doko iki napinya, dupame enda gote Atemisa dokonya losuu anda doko kandao angi mende daa lamona lao masetamiaka. Dopana, Esia tange dupapi dee yuu dupa pitakanya endakali kalyamino dupa pitakapimi enda Atemisa lao tama pilyamino dokonya kenge epe doko alu pitana,” Dimitiasa dokome dopa lea-pyaa.
Dupame pii doko sepala etete imbumi kumapala lao pituu, “Epesasa tange Atemisa doko andakena,” lao puu lao leami-pyaa.
Dopa latala dupame taono dokonya endakali dupanya masingi minao lungu piseteaminopa dokaita pitakame lalya lana petala alo pyao limbao petenge panda dokonya kolameami-pyaa. Polo-pipa awapa paenge akali Masetonia tange Gayasa lenge dokopa Atitakasa lenge dokopa dolapo puu lao anjetala pyalya lao nyoo peami-pyaa.
Polome endakali limbiamino dokonya paanya piamopa Jisasa masoo miningi endakali dupame napena lao kaita lyokeami-pyaa.
Esia tange kapomane dupanya mendapua Polonya kaita miningi kateamino dupame apata Polo kandao, “Emba limbilyamino panda ongonya napupi lao kyoto joo wai leami-pyaa.
Limbiamino endakali dupanya mendapuame pii mendeaka lao ae leaminopa mendapuame mendeaka lao ae leami-pyaa. Dopa lao nyakamanya masingi dupa kyekeamopa, aipuma limbilyamape lao longo dupame tenge masala nayami-pyaa.
Juta dupame akali Alekesanda lenge doko endakali dupanya enombanya kalya pena latala mendapuame pii wasoo maiyaminoli pyoo baame kingi pee latala dupanya pii yanu pyao laanya pia-pyaa.
Dopaka doko, dupame akali doko Juta lamo lao masetala pitakame pii mendai dopaka lao, “Epesasa tange Atemisa doko andakena,” lao puu lao lao kateaminopa kiloko gii lapomapi mende pea-pyaa.
Maitakao Epesasa tange kapomane andake dokome dokaita pii kaena latala, “Epesasa tange akali anematupa, enda gote Atemisa dokonya losuu anda dokopa kaiti-kisa tae yainanda kuli mende isa epeamo dokopa dolapo naima Epesasa tange dupame isoo kalyamano doko endakali pitakame kandengema daape.
Endakali mendaipi mendeme doko sambona laa nayatana, nyakama pii kayalapa. Opale mende pyaanya pitamino doko yapa napyepape.
Nyakamame akali laminao ipamino dolapome losuu anda dupanya pakepi mende nanyimbi. Naimanya enda gote doko kandao pii koopi mende nalambiaka.
Dee Dimitiasa mauwapi baa-pipa awapa kalai pingi dupapi dupame mende kosimi lapenge jetamo kandao doko, kosa lapenge gii soo kapomane andake dupa katao pilyamino. Dupa katatamino dokopa dupame mende kosimi laa laa pina kayalapape.
Dee nyakamame pii lapenge setamoaka kandao doko, limbingi mana watao minao ipao tolasepenge.
Angi tenge mende nakatamopa ae lalya lana pyoo katalamano dokonya kapomane dupame naima-kisa pii setapimili lamo. Dupame naima kandatala dokonya pisipimili kandao doko, naimame kapa pao yanu napyapumalina,” lea-pyaa. Kapomane andake dokome dopa latala limbiamino dupa pena lea-pyaa.
Epesasa tange dupame ae lalya lana piamino doko etapeamopa Polome Jisasa masoo miningi endakali dupa epena lea-pyaa. Epeaminopa baame pii epe mendapua dupa pupu lasoo lamaiya-pyaa. Dopa petala dupa lasa latala baa Masetonia yuu dokonya pea-pyaa.
Baame Masetonia yuu yakane dupanya payao endakali dupa pii longo lamaiyoo pupu lasetala Gitiki yuu dokonya pea-pyaa.
Yuu dokonya kana tepoma katapala Sitia yuu dokonya sipinya pituu paanya piamopa Juta dupame baa pyao kumasalanya pii lao wasilyamino lapae doko sia-pyaa. Sepala Polome Masetonia yuu dokonya-kaita Sitia pilyetoana lao masia-pyaa.
Betia tange Pitasa ikiningi Sopata lenge dokopi, Tesalonaika tange Atitakasa Sekandasapi, Depi tange Gayasa lenge dokopi Timoti dokopi Esia tange Tikikasa Topimasapi akali dutupa Polo-pipa awapa payami-pyaa.
Dutupame wambao pupala naima malisoo Toasa yuu taono dokonya kateami-pyaa.
Naima Pilipae yuu taono dokonya kateamanopa betesanya iisa napalyoo nenge gii doko epea. Gii doko ipao pateamopa naima kote yuungi nepao sipinya pituu Toasa yuu dokonya dupa kateamisa pupala kote kalange kateama.
Angi Sandee dokonya Toasa tange dupa-pipa nee nyemana lao limbiamanopa Polome dupa pii lamaiya. Baa taita patona lao masetala pii lamaiyoaka kateamopa andatombe jia.
Naima limbao peteamano anda palo ketae namba tepo dokonya lama kaiyepae longo mendapu sia.
Wane patange Yutikasa lenge mende windoa kaita dokonya pii soo petea. Dopa piamopa Polome pii longo leamopa Yutikasa doko etete lemongati latala anda ketae namba tepo dokonya pituu isa mangea. Endakali dupame baa nyala peaminopa kumapae tupi siamo kandeami.
Poleme isa pupala wane kumapae siamo doko kopinyetala lao pituu, “Nyakamame yako lao ee kayalapa. Wane dake dee lenge telyamona,” lea.
Dopa latala Polo-pipa anda palo kisa dokonya dee pupala nee nyiama. Nee nyepala pii longo waipa soo lamaiyoo kateamo dokopa yuu yongea. Yongateamopa Polo baa pea.
Dokaitame wane doko lenge telyamona lao masetala mona etete yaepao andaka laminao peami.
Polome naima sipinya pituu Asosa yuu dokonya wambao pataminopa baa itange kaitini pato lao masetala kaitini depa latea-pyaa. Dopa piamoli pyoo naima pupala Polo baa kandanyetala lanyema sipinya pituu awapa paamano lao masiama.
Dokopa Asosa yuu dokonya Polome naima kandanyeteamopa naimame baa sipinya lanyepala pituu Mitilini yuu taono dokonya awapa peama.
Naimame Mitilini yuu dokonya katao sipinya pituu taita dopa pyoo Kayosa yuu dokonya tengesa joo peama. Oo yongama sipinya pituu Semosa yuu dokonya peama. Oo yongama Mailitasa yuu taono dokonya peama.
Polome Esia yuu dokonya koto longo nakatao yapa pato kandao Pendekosa gii doko kapa pao Jetusaleme dokonya kandatona lao masia. Dopa lao masiamosa naimame Epesasa pupenge doko kayapala sipinya pituu peama.
Naima Mailitasa yuu dokonya pyakamatala Polome Epesasa tange sosa dokonya isingi akali dupa epena lao akali mendeme lanyala pena lea.
Isingi akali dupa epeaminopa baame dupa lamaiyoo, “Wamba namba Esia yuu dakenya tee pyao ipupala nyakama-pipa koteaka lao aipa pyoo katee kandeamape lao doko nyakamame masilyamino.
Juta dupame namba koyasalanya pii lao wasetala namba makande piami. Dopa piaminoaka doko, namba anasale joo katao Kamongonya kalai doko lekeleke tao pyakamaiyoaka kateo kandeami.
Nambame pii manapi nyakama auu pisepenge dupanya mendaipi mende nyakama-kisa yapae napyoo, nyakamanya limbingi pandapi palenge andapi dupanya katao pii doko panao mana langyoo kateo kandeami.
Jutapi wakapi dupa pitakame koo dupa maita maitala Gote lao mona kapilyetala naimanya Kamongo Jisasa lao masoo minina lao nambame pii etete kyoto joo lamaiyo.
Oli Sipitisa dokome namba langipumuli pyoo Jetusaleme patopa, aki mende namba-kisa ipatape lao masala nayao pelyo.
Wamba namba taono waka waka dupanya pao kateopa Oli Sipitisa dokome anjingi kendepi kenda pipaepi dupa namba-kisa ipatana lao namba langiamo doko iki masoo pelyo.
Dopana, namba lenge tao kalyo doko angina lao masala naelyo. Nambame pipulyamo doko pyoo etapatoo. Gotenya mona epe palenge dokonya lao Wai Pii Epe lao panenge kalai Kamongo Jisasa-kisa nyio doko pyoo etasoani kaelyo.
Wamba amba nyakamanya yuu waka waka dupanya payao Goteme naima isilyamona lao pii doko lao kateo kandeami. Dee nyakama pitakame namba nakandatamina lao masilyo.
“Dopana, indupa nambame nyakama kiningi langilyo. Nyakamanya endakali mendaipi mende alu pitamo kandao doko, namba mambele daa.
Nambame paka nakayao Goteme pituna leamo dupa pitaka nyakama langio daape.
Nyakamame nyakama tangepi Jisasa minao paenge endakali dupapi dupa kandao isoo kalyepape. Oli Sipitisa tangeme kalai doko pyepape leamoli pyoo Gotenya sosa doko setao kalyepape. Goteme baanya Ikininginya taiyoko dokome dupa sambao nyiamo dokonya baanya joo kalyamino.
Namba patatopa endakali mendapuame yana kapua joo ipupala nyakama Jisasa minao paenge endakali dupa kondo kayao wakuala nayatamina lao masilyo.
Nyakama tangenya akali mendapuame Jisasa masoo miningi endakali dupa andiki pyoo nyalanya sambo pii lao naimanya pii watalapa lao katatamina lao masilyo.
Dopana, nyakama lenge tao waa katao kalyepape. Namba nyakama-pipa ee kana tepo katao mona sakatasakalanya kuka kotakapi pii ee lao langyoo kateo doko kame nasalapape.
Indupa nambame nyakama Gotenya kingipa baanya mona epe palenge piipa dolaponya yakinelyo. Baame kapa pao nyakama pupu lasetala baanya epasetae endakali dupa pitaka epe dupa maingili pyoo kapa pao nyakama dita.
Nambame endakali mendaipi mendenya munipi yonge peepi dupanya mende namba nyipu laka lao masoo nakateo.
Namba mende daa jiapi namba-pipa awapa kateamano dupa mende daa jiapi doko nambanya kingimi kalai pyoo nisio doko nyakamame masilyamino.
Nambame kalai lekeleke tao pio dupa pitakame naimame dopa pyoo endakali tambo lapae dupa nisepengena lao nyakama laitaka peteo. Kamongo Jisasame lao pituu, ‘Endakali mendeme opale mende nyepala mona yaepapengeaka doko, maitala etete mona yaepapengena,’ leamo doko kame nasalapape,” Polome dopa lea.
Polome pii dutupa lao etapala luma lakapeamopa isingi akali dutupa pitaka-pipa loma siami.
Dopa petala dupa pitakame ee andake lao baa lasa lao kopyoo nunu piami.
Nyakamame namba dee nakandatamina lao pii leamo dokome mona etete kenda pisiamopa dupame baa laminao sipi siamo dokonya mapala peami.
Epesasa tange dupame naima laminao pupala mapateaminopa, naimame dupa lasa latala sipinya pituu Kosa yuu taono dokonya tolao peama. Taita dopa pyoo yuu doko yakinatala sipinya pituu taono Losa peama. Losa yuu doko yakinatala taono Patata lenge dokonya peama.
Patata dokonya katao sipi mende Pinisia yuu dokonya paanya pianya naima dokonya pituu peama.
Sipinya pao pituu Saipotasa yuu doko kingi koya-kaita siamopa kandamama Sitia yuu taono Taya lenge dokonya peama. Sipi dokome pinju mandyuu yuu dokonya yakineamopa naima isa peama.
Taya yuu dokonya naimame masoo miningi endakali mendatupa kandasetala dupa-pipa kote kalange awapa kateama. Oli Sipitisa dokome dupa lungu piamopa dupame Polo lamaiyoo, “Emba Jetusaleme napupi,” leami.
Dokopa naima yuu dokonya katapenge gii dutupa katao etapala yuu doko yakinao peama. Masoo miningi akali dupa pitakapi dupanya enda wanepi dupame naima laminao taono dokonya kamalya peami. Dokopa solowata pete leamba dokonya lumame pitipala loma siama.
Loma setala naima dupa-pipa lasa laloo petala sipi dokonya pyakalyiamanopa dupa nyakamanya andaka pilyiami.
Naimame Taya yuu doko yakinatala sipinya pituu pao Tolemesa peama. Yuu dokonya masoo miningi kaiminingi dupa-pipa kingi nyepala kote mendai awapa kateama.
Dopa petala taita dopa pyoo sipinya pituu Sisatia yuu taono dokonya peama. Pupala waiyakali Pilipa lenge dokonya andaka awapa kateama. Pilipa doko wamba Jetusaleme tange masoo miningi dupame akali kalange yapao nyiamino dokonya mende-pyaa.
Baanya wanenge mapuakae kitomende dutupa akali napenya Gotenya pii doko panao lamaiyoo petengema-pyaa.
Naima kote mendatupa yuu dokonya kateamanopa potopesa Akapasa lenge doko Jutia yuu dokonya katao epea.
Baa naima kateamasa ipupala Polonya matapu doko lyokao nyoo Akapasa baanya kingi mokopi dupa yaki petala baame lao pituu, “Oli Sipitisa dokome dapa lelyamo: ‘Juta endakali Jetusaleme kalyamino dupame matapu dake tange doko dapa pyoo anjetala, masoo minala naengema endakali dupa maitamina,’ lelyamo,” lea.
Baame pii leamo doko sepala naimapi yuu dokonya tange endakali dupapimi, “Polo emba Jetusaleme napupi,” lao kyoto joo leama.
Dopa leamanoaka doko, Polome lao pituu, “Nyakamame aipuma ee lao nambanya mona kenda pisekelyamipi? Nambame Kamongo Jisasa lao masetala Jetusaleme pao anjetae palito dokonya iki depa latae nakalyo. Daa, kumato lao apata depa latae kalyoakana,” lea.
Dopa leamopa naimame baanya masingi doko aloo pisakamaipenge nanjiamosa Kamongo Goteme masilyamoli pyoo pina kayama latala pii mende naleama.
Kote mendatupa pateamopa naimanya oapi dupa depa latala Jetusaleme peama.
Sisatia tange Jisasa masoo miningi endakali mendapuame naima laminao akali Nesonenya andaka palyepale lao mapala peami. Akali Nesone doko Saipotasa tange mende-pyaa. Baame ee kana longo masoo minao katea-pyaa.
Naima Jetusaleme pao pyakameamano gii dokopa masoo miningi kaiminingi dupame naima mona yaepao lanyiami.
Taita dopa pyoo Polo apata Jemesa peteamo dokonya peama. Isingi akali dupa pitaka dokonya awapa peteamiaka-pyaa.
Dokopa Polome dokaita kingi nyepala baame kalai piamo dokonya Goteme endakali tata waka dupa-kisa piamo dupa pitaka panao lamaiyokondape pia.
Dupame pii doko sepala Gote lao tama piami. Dopa petala Polo lamaiyoo, “Kaimia, embame kandateleno. Juta endakali tausene longo dupame masoo minao katapelyamino. Dokaita pitakame mana setapae dupa etete minokondape pyoo katamana lao masingima.
Dopaka doko, akali mendapuame dokaita lamaiyoo lao pituu, ‘Polome Juta endakali tata waka kaina dupanya kalyamino dupame mana setapae Moseseme nyiamo dupa yakinalapape lenge. Nyakamanya wane dupanya elya pingi kambu kepala nayalapape lenge. Mana wambatae dupa watao minala nayalapape lengena,’ lao lamaipimi.
Dopana, naimame aipa pimape? Dokaitame emba ipatelenona lapae tenda salamini lumu.
Dopana, naimame emba langitamali pipi. Naimanya akali kitomendeme Gote kandao mendita mende kiningi pitamana leami.
Embame akali dutupa-pipa awapa pupala dutupame tangenya kaimala pipae walya pyao nepalanya mana miningimali pyoo minao katape. Embame dutupa nisoo yole setakamaipiaka.
